T02D1198:1b-1: shr'i sampu ta tantra r'a dza t'i ka aa ma n'a ya ma nydza ri n'a ma /
T02D1198:1b-3: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i
T02D1198:1b-4: rgya cher 'grel pa man [dd] ngag gi snye ma
T02D1198:1b-5: zhes bya ba / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1198:1b-6: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1198:1b-7: rdo rje sgeg mo'i dga' ba shin tu mang dang gnyis su med pa'i sku yis 'gro rnams kyi //
T02D1198:1b-8: mun pa'i tshogs rnams nub par mdzad pa'i sprul pa rnams kyis nang gi 'od zer 'char mdzad kyang //
T02D1198:1b-9: gang gi stobs ni gnyug ma'i spros med shes rab mchog dang thugs rje yang dag sbyor yin pa //
T02D1198:1b-10: rdo rje'i dbang phyug de yis khyed la chen po'i
T02D1198:1b-11: sa yi phun tshogs rol pa mdzad gyur cig /
T02D1198:1b-12: phal cher mgon po de yis bdag / byin gyis
T02D1198:1b-13: brlabs pas de gsung gi / don ni rang nyid
T02D1198:1b-14: gsal smra ste // dbul po la ni ma bzhin no //
T02D1198:1b-15: gzhan yang rmi lam du mthong ba'i //
T02D1198:1b-16: rdo rje btsun mos bskul ba'i phyir //
T02D1198:2a-0: @2a * // rin chen lta bu'i yang dag sbyor //
T02D1198:2a-1: sems can don du dbye bar bya //
T02D1198:2a-2: gang yang mang dag bla mas rgyas mdzad pa'i //
T02D1198:2a-3: man ngag dpag bsam ljon pa'i snye ma ni //
T02D1198:2a-4: 'bras bu'i dga' ston gags med gyur rnams kyis //
T02D1198:2a-5: 'gro ba tshim bya'i ched du bskyed par bya //
T02D1198:2a-6: 'dir nges par brjod par bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1198:2a-7: thos pa med na phal cher dam pa rnams nyan
T02D1198:2a-8: pa la sogs pa la mi 'jug pa'i phyir na
T02D1198:2a-9: brjod par bya ba la sogs pa sdud pa pos
T02D1198:2a-10: don gyi shugs kyis 'phen zhing gsungs pa /
T02D1198:2a-11: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:2a-12: 'dir brtag pa bcu'i bdag nyid dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud ni rjod par byed pa'o //
T02D1198:2a-13: de'i ston pa po ni 'bras bu'i rgyud kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D1198:2a-14: brjod par bya ba yang ngo //
T02D1198:2a-15: de mngon du byed pa'i rgyu nyid kyis na rgyu'i rgyud dang thabs kyi rgyud kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02D1198:2a-16: de lta na yang bstan par bya ba dang ston pa po'i 'brel pa dang /
T02D1198:2a-17: rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba'i 'brel pa dang /
T02D1198:2a-18: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa brjod do //
T02D1198:2a-19: gdul bya rnams kyis kyang dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i don rtogs pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02D1198:2b-0: rdo rje lta bu bde ba chen po ro @2b
T02D1198:2b-1: gcig pa 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa byed
T02D1198:2b-2: pa 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang gi ngo bo phyag
T02D1198:2b-3: rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o
T02D1198:2b-4: zhes 'phangs so // de skad du yang //
T02D1198:2b-5: dgos pa bsdus pa'i don bcas shing //
T02D1198:2b-6: tshig don bcas shing mtshams sbyar bcas //
T02D1198:2b-7: brgal len bcas pa mdo yi don //
T02D1198:2b-8: smra pa rnams kyis brjod par bya //
T02D1198:2b-9: zhes pa'i rigs pas dgos pa brjod pa'o //
T02D1198:2b-10: bsdus pa'i don la sogs pa brjod par bya ste //
T02D1198:2b-11: de la rab tu byed pa dang por bskyed pa
T02D1198:2b-12: dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rim
T02D1198:2b-14: gnyis par ni rgyu'i rgyud rdzogs pa'i rim pa kho na rgyas par bshad do //
T02D1198:2b-15: gsum pa dang bzhi pa dag gis ni rdzogs pa'i
T02D1198:2b-16: rim pa kho na rab tu rgyas par bshad par
T02D1198:2b-17: mngon par gsal bar byas so //
T02D1198:2b-18: lnga par ni rim pa gnyis po 'di yang dbang
T02D1198:2b-19: bskur ba kho na la bstan par bya zhing goms
T02D1198:2b-20: par bya'o zhes rim pa gnyis kyi yan lag tu
T02D1198:2b-21: dbang bskur ba rnam par spros so //
T02D1198:2b-22: drug par ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i dbang
T02D1198:2b-23: bskur ba thob cing rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid
T02D1198:2b-24: thob par 'dod pas dbang po rab la phyag rgya
T02D1198:2b-25: chen po'i dngos grub kyi dngos kyi thabs phyag rgya'i
T02D1198:2b-26: rnal 'byor gyi dngos su ba'i thabs rdzogs pa'i rim
T02D1198:2b-27: pa bsgom pa kho na nges par bzhag go //
T02D1198:2b-28: bdun pa dang brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang bcu
T02D1198:2b-29: pa dang bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis par dbang
T02D1198:2b-30: po 'bring dang rtul po dag gis rdzogs pa'i rim
T02D1198:2b-31: pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa rim gyis dang cig
T02D1198:2b-32: car bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas bsgom par bya'o
T02D1198:2b-33: zhes rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dngos su ba'i thabs bskyed
T02D1198:2b-34: pa'i rim pa bsgom pa gsal bar mdzad do //
T02D1198:2b-35: bcu gsum pa dang bcu bzhi pa dang bco lnga
T02D1198:2b-36: pa dang bcu drug par de ltar rim pa gnyis
T02D1198:2b-37: sgom pa po'i rnal 'byor pa las dang po pa'i
T02D1198:2b-38: mngon par 'dod pa sgrub pa'i don du nye bar
T02D1198:2b-39: gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi brda yongs su
T02D1198:2b-40: shes pa'i ched du thabs kyi yan lag ngag gi
T02D1198:2b-41: brda la sogs pa rnams gsungs so //
T02D1198:2b-42: bcu bdun par brda shes pa rjes su gzung ba'i
T02D1198:2b-43: don du gnas pa la sogs pa 'du ba'i gnas
T02D1198:2b-44: gsungs so // bco brgyad par der 'dus pa'am gzhan
T02D1198:2b-45: gyis rim pa gnyis bsgoms pas thabs kyi yan lag
T02D1198:2b-46: rnam par dag pa kho na'i yul longs spyod pa'i
T02D1198:3a-1: pa gnyis dang phung po la sogs pa rnam par dag pa gsal bar mdzad do //
T02D1198:3a-2: bcu dgu pa dang nyi shu par rnam pa de
T02D1198:3a-3: lta bu'i yang spyod pa med na phyag rgya chen
T02D1198:3a-4: po'i dngos grub ma yin no zhes pas kun du
T02D1198:3a-5: bzang po'i spyod pa gsal bar mdzad do //
T02D1198:3a-6: nyi shu rtsa gcig pa dang nyi shu rtsa gnyis
T02D1198:3a-7: par de'i rjes su rab tu byed pa gsum par
T02D1198:3a-8: gsungs pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang rtsa'i gnas kyi
T02D1198:3a-9: khyad par rnam par gzhag pa yang legs par gzhag
T02D1198:3a-10: par mdzad do // nyi shu rtsa gsum pa dang
T02D1198:3a-11: rtsa bzhi par ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'di ltar
T02D1198:3a-12: bsgom pa'i don du phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor dang
T02D1198:3a-13: sbyin sreg la sogs par 'dzin pas slu ba las
T02D1198:3a-14: grol ba'i ched du rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1198:3a-15: dang sbyin sreg dang mchod pa la sogs pa rgyas
T02D1198:3a-16: par mdzad do // par bstan to // nyi shu
T02D1198:3a-17: rtsa lnga pa dang rtsa drug pa dang rtsa bdun
T02D1198:3a-18: pa dang rtsa brgyad par sngar bshad pa'i brda dang
T02D1198:3a-19: lta stangs bzhi po rnams dang las rab 'byam yang
T02D1198:3a-20: thabs kyi yan lag nyid kyi phyir na rab tu
T02D1198:3a-21: par mdzad do // par bstan to // spros so
T02D1198:3a-22: // nyi shu rtsa dgu par ni rdo rje dang
T02D1198:3a-23: rdo rje dril bu'i rang bzhin bstan to //
T02D1198:3a-24: sum cu par bgrang phreng la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:3a-25: sum cu rtsa gcig par 'pho ba'o //
T02D1198:3a-26: sum cu rtsa gnyis par thabs kyi yan lag nyid kyis na sngags rnams bsdus so //
T02D1198:3a-27: sum cu rtsa gsum par ni rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1198:3a-28: bsgoms pas phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid can gyi
T02D1198:3a-29: bltams pa dang / byang chub pa dang chos kyi
T02D1198:3a-30: 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa'i rnam par 'phrul
T02D1198:3a-31: pa rnams kyis skye ba bstan to //
T02D1198:3a-32: sum cu rtsa bzhi par ni bgegs nye bar zhi
T02D1198:3a-33: ba la sogs pa'i don du thabs kyi yan lag
T02D1198:3a-35: sum cu rtsa lnga par ni thabs kyi yan lag thang sku dang glegs bam dag go //
T02D1198:3a-36: sum cu rtsa drug par ni sngar gsungs pa'i gnas
T02D1198:3a-37: la sogs pa rnams su tshogs la 'du ba na
T02D1198:3a-38: rnal 'byor ba'i rol mo la sogs pa gsungs so
T02D1198:3a-39: // sum cu rtsa bdun par ni de ltar zhugs
T02D1198:3a-40: pa bsgom pa dang ma bral ba la phyi rol
T02D1198:3a-41: gyi phyag rgya med par phyag rgya chen po'i dngos
T02D1198:3a-42: grub ma yin no zhes pas phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1198:3a-43: dngos grub kyi dngos su pa'i thabs rigs kyi sgeg
T02D1198:3a-44: mo bsten pa nges par byas so //
T02D1198:3a-45: sum cu rtsa brgyad par ni de ltar phyag rgya
T02D1198:3a-46: chen po'i dngos grub kyi dus su rnal 'byor can
T02D1198:3a-47: gyi dbang phyug gi gtsug gi nor bu la bsnyen
T02D1198:3b-0: bkur @3b bla na med pa gsungs so //
T02D1198:3b-1: sum cu rtsa dgu par ni rang gi don phun
T02D1198:3b-2: sum tshogs par ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'di'i rang
T02D1198:3b-3: gi ngo bo'i khyad par dang sgyu ma'i rnam par
T02D1198:3b-4: 'phrul pa sum cu rtsa gsum par mdor bstan pa
T02D1198:3b-6: bzhi bcu par rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa 'di dag 'bras bu'i rgyud yin zhing /
T02D1198:3b-7: skyes bu'i don gyi mchog 'di thams cad kyang rtog
T02D1198:3b-8: pa'i dra ba mtha' dag drungs phyung ba'i bla na
T02D1198:3b-9: med pa'i shes rab dang thabs bsgom pas dam tshigs
T02D1198:3b-10: bsten pa med na phun sum tshogs pa ma yin
T02D1198:3b-11: zhes dam tshig bsten pa gsal bar mdzad do //
T02D1198:3b-12: de ltar bsdus pa'i don gyis rgyud kyi don thams
T02D1198:3b-13: cad phul du byung bar bstan pa'i don du rgyud
T02D1198:3b-15: 'chad pa po dang nyan pa po rnams kyis bde blag tu 'chad pa dang /
T02D1198:3b-16: gzung ba'i ched du mdor bsdus pas mngon par brjod
T02D1198:3b-17: pa'i don gyi tshig gi don bshad pa la sogs
T02D1198:3b-18: pa gnas skabs ji lta ba bzhin bshad par bya'o
T02D1198:3b-19: // de la 'di skad ces pa la sogs pa
T02D1198:3b-20: 'dzum pa mdzad do'i tshig mthar thug pa dang por
T02D1198:3b-21: // gleng gzhi ste / 'di yod na bstan pa rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:3b-22: yul dang dus dang ston pa po dang 'khor tshogs pa ni bstan pa'i dang po'i rgyu ste /
T02D1198:3b-23: de rnams med na bstan pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:3b-25: dad ldan 'jug pa'i yan lag tu //
T02D1198:3b-26: ston pa 'khor dang dpang po dang //
T02D1198:3b-27: yul dang dus dag nges bstan pa //
T02D1198:3b-28: rang nyid tshad mar grub ched du'o //
T02D1198:3b-30: 'dir rang nyid tshad ma ni sdud par byed pa'i 'o //
T02D1198:3b-31: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar mngon par
T02D1198:3b-32: rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa bzhin chos bstan pa de
T02D1198:3b-33: ltar gdul bya mtha' yas pa rnams rjes su 'dzin
T02D1198:3b-34: pa yang dag par zhugs pa'o //
T02D1198:3b-35: yang de'i dus na skal pa med par gyur pa'i gdul bya gzhan rnams yod de /
T02D1198:3b-36: de rjes su gzud pa'i ched du bcom ldan 'das
T02D1198:3b-37: kyis byin gyis brlabs pa kho na'i byang chub sems
T02D1198:3b-38: dpa' rnams kyis zhus pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D1198:3b-39: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes byas nas nga'i
T02D1198:3b-40: chos bsdu bar bya'o zhes chos yang dag par sdud
T02D1198:3b-42: des na sdud par byed pas de bzhin kho nar bsdus so //
T02D1198:3b-43: 'dir sdud pa po ni su yin zhe na /
T02D1198:3b-44: ming nges par byed pa 'dis ci bya ste /
T02D1198:4a-1: ldan 'das kyis bka' gnang ba kho nas des brjod
T02D1198:4a-2: pa'i phyir 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das kho na'i gsung
T02D1198:4a-3: ste / sdud par byed pa ni rjes su brjod pa kho na'o //
T02D1198:4a-4: de nyid kyi phyir rgyud rnams su mtha' mar yang sdud pa po'i ming ma brjod do //
T02D1198:4a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chen por gtad pa'i khur
T02D1198:4a-6: yin pa nyid kyi phyir na thams cad kyis smra
T02D1198:4a-7: bar bya ba yang ma yin te /
T02D1198:4a-8: de'i phyir ston pa po las ji skad thos pa bzhin du gcig gis smra bar byed cing /
T02D1198:4a-9: de las gzhan pa de la shes pa dang ldan
T02D1198:4a-10: pa rnams kyang de'i rjes su sems par byed do
T02D1198:4a-11: zhes pa na bsdu bar brjod par bya'o //
T02D1198:4a-12: 'dir zhu ba po yin pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje snying po'o zhes gsung ngo //
T02D1198:4a-13: gzhan yang gdul bya'i skye bo'i dbang gis ston pa
T02D1198:4a-14: po kho na sdud pa por 'gyur ro zhes 'chad
T02D1198:4a-15: par 'gyur ro // de la bsdu bar bya ba'i
T02D1198:4a-16: rgyud kyi don mtha' dag phyin ci ma log par
T02D1198:4a-17: yid la mngon du bzhag par 'di skad ces pa'i
T02D1198:4a-18: tshig phrad 'dis gsal bar mdzad do //
T02D1198:4a-19: de'i phyir ae wam gyi yi ge 'di rgyud kyi
T02D1198:4a-20: don mtha' dag gis don dang ldan pa bstan to
T02D1198:4a-21: // rgyud kyi don yang shes rab dang thabs kyi
T02D1198:4a-22: rang bzhin nyid kyis na yi ge gnyis kyi cha
T02D1198:4a-23: shas su gyur pas gnas pa'o zhes 'doms par mdzad
T02D1198:4a-24: // do // ae wam gyi ye ges spyir bshad
T02D1198:4a-25: nas khyad par du rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur bas
T02D1198:4a-26: na zlos pa nyid med do //
T02D1198:4a-27: de ltar na yang 'di ni ngag chen po gcig tu gyur pa ste /
T02D1198:4a-29: bdag gis zhes pa bdag nyid kho nas rang nyid
T02D1198:4a-30: kyis bcom ldan 'das las thos kyis brgyud pas ma
T02D1198:4a-31: yin pa'o // thos pa zhes pa rna ba'i rnam
T02D1198:4a-32: par shes pas tshig las dang yid kyi rnam par
T02D1198:4a-33: shes pas don las rtogs kyi /
T02D1198:4a-34: 'di bdag gis mngon sum du byas pa ni ma yin te /
T02D1198:4a-35: bcom ldan 'das kho nas 'dir rnam pa thams cad
T02D1198:4a-36: rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes chos la gus pa nye
T02D1198:4a-37: bar ston to // yang na rtogs pa yang mngon
T02D1198:4a-38: pa'i nga rgyal med pa nyid kyis ston pa po
T02D1198:4a-39: la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas /
T02D1198:4a-40: chos rin po che nyan pa'i bdud rtsis mi ngoms
T02D1198:4a-41: pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams
T02D1198:4a-42: dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang gsan
T02D1198:4a-43: na / gzhan phra mo rnams kyis lta ci zhes bslab pa'i don du thos pa smos so //
T02D1198:4b-0: de ltar spyir nye bar @4b 'phangs nas khyad par du /
T02D1198:4b-1: dus gcig na zhes pa la sogs pas gleng gzhi de rim gyis ston par byed do //
T02D1198:4b-2: gcig 'di ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
T02D1198:4b-3: du mas nye bar thob pa tshes dang rgyu skar
T02D1198:4b-4: la sogs pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bcad pa
T02D1198:4b-5: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus kyi khyad par 'ga'
T02D1198:4b-6: zhig go // de yang 'dir skad cig bzhi pa'i ngo bo la dus zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1198:4b-7: dus gcig po der bcom ldan 'das de'i bdag nyid kyis bzhugs so zhes 'brel to //
T02D1198:4b-8: yang na dus gcig na zhes pa skad cig las te /
T02D1198:4b-9: 'dis bdag nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par
T02D1198:4b-10: thar pa'i sgo thob pa nyid gsal bar byed do
T02D1198:4b-11: // yang na dus gcig gi tshe 'di thos shing /
T02D1198:4b-12: gzhan gyi tshe gzhan no zhes pas bdag nyid mang du thos pa nyid du gsungs so //
T02D1198:4b-13: yang na dus gcig kho na na 'di thos kyi gzhan gyi tshe ni ma yin pas na /
T02D1198:4b-14: rgyud sde rin po che 'di rnyed par dka' ba nyid du rtogs par byed do //
T02D1198:4b-15: 'dis bdud bzhi po gzhom par bya bas na bcom pa ste /
T02D1198:4b-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par brjod do //
T02D1198:4b-17: de rdo rje rtse mor gsungs pa /
T02D1198:4b-18: nyon mongs bdud sogs 'joms pa'i phyir //
T02D1198:4b-19: 'joms pa bcom pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1198:4b-20: shes rab kyis gzhom nyon mongs de //
T02D1198:4b-21: de phyir shes rab bcom par brjod //
T02D1198:4b-22: yang na 'di rnams kyis skal bar byed do zhes pa skal pa ste /
T02D1198:4b-23: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams so //
T02D1198:4b-24: gang gsung bar 'gyur ba dbang phyug dang ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:4b-25: skal pa de 'di la yod pas bcom ldan no //
T02D1198:4b-26: yang na mi mthun pa'i phyogs bdud bzhi rnams bcom pas na bcom ldan te /
T02D1198:4b-27: nges pa'i tshig gis na phyis pa'o //
T02D1198:4b-28: thams cad kyang de rnams yin zhing /
T02D1198:4b-29: chos rnams thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba de pa bzhin nyid ni de bzhin te /
T02D1198:4b-30: de gshegs shing rtogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1198:4b-31: de bzhin nyid las byon pa yang ste /
T02D1198:4b-32: 'gro ba'i don du spro bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:4b-33: gzhan rnams la de bzhin kho nar gsung ngo zhes pa nges pa'i tshig gis sgrub pas /
T02D1198:4b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1198:5a-0: de rnams kyi sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang chos kyi bdag nyid sku @5a * //
T02D1198:5a-1: dang gsung dang thugs rnams so //
T02D1198:5a-2: de rnams kyi de rnams kho na ni snying po ste /
T02D1198:5a-3: de ro gcig pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1198:5a-4: de rnams de las byung ba'i phyir dang de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:5a-5: glegs bam kha cig la snying po zhes klog pa med de /
T02D1198:5a-6: 'bri mkhan gyi skyon nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:5a-7: bcom ldan 'das kho nas snying po'i sgra 'dir nye
T02D1198:5a-8: bar blangs pa ni rab tu byed pa bzhi par
T02D1198:5a-10: de nyid ni rdo rje ste stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir la /
T02D1198:5a-11: de nyid btsun mo ste bla na med pa'i dga' ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir na /
T02D1198:5a-12: rdo rje snyems ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1198:5a-13: de'i de kho na yang bha ga chos 'byung ste /
T02D1198:5a-14: de yongs su gyur pa nyid kyi phyir dang de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir te /
T02D1198:5a-15: de skad du yang gnyis su med pa rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:5a-16: bha ga bcom ldan sangs rgyas te //
T02D1198:5a-17: des na 'dod chags sun mi dbyung //
T02D1198:5a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1198:5a-20: dang thugs kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir zur gsum
T02D1198:5a-21: pa / bha ga'i bdag nyid can stobs bcu la sogs pa'i chos 'byung ba /
T02D1198:5a-22: 'khyud pa'i brten par bya ba lha mo'i padma zhes bya ba rten gyi ngo bo la bzhugs so //
T02D1198:5a-23: mang po'i tshig ni rdo rje snyems ma ni btsun
T02D1198:5a-24: mo thams cad bsdus pa'i rnam pa can nyid kyi
T02D1198:5a-25: phyir dang / gdul bya'i dbang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
T02D1198:5a-26: rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi brtan
T02D1198:5a-27: pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rdul
T02D1198:5a-28: phra rab so so'i nang du 'jug pa'i chos 'byung
T02D1198:5a-29: gi nang la gnas pa'i sna tshogs padma dang rdo
T02D1198:5a-30: rje la gnas pa'i rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo
T02D1198:5a-31: can khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1198:5a-32: pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor nye bar ston pa'i phyir
T02D1198:5a-33: phyir dang / yang ngo // 'dir rten gyi bdag
T02D1198:5a-34: nyid la khang pa brtsegs pa ma gsungs pa nyid
T02D1198:5a-35: na yang bha ga na gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs
T02D1198:5a-37: dper na grong khyer na phyug po gnas so zhes
T02D1198:5a-38: pa grong khyer na gnas pa'i khang bzangs na'o zhes
T02D1198:5a-39: don gyis yin pa bzhin no //
T02D1198:5a-40: de ltar ma gsungs pa ni don gzhan bsdu ba'i don dang /
T02D1198:5a-41: bde ba chen po'i sa gzhi gtso bo nyid du nye bar bstan pa'i don du'o //
T02D1198:5b-0: khang pa @5b brtsegs pa yang de dang ro gcig pa kho na yin pas so //
T02D1198:5b-1: yang na nang gi bdag nyid can sa la sogs
T02D1198:5b-2: pa'i rang bzhin spyan ma la sogs pa'i btsun mo'i
T02D1198:5b-3: bha ga rnams te chos 'byung dang sprul pa la
T02D1198:5b-4: sogs pa'i padma rnams te de rnams su bzhugs so
T02D1198:5b-5: // bzhugs so zhes pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D1198:5b-6: pa'i thabs can gyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams
T02D1198:5b-7: kyis mos pa sna tshogs pa gdul bya'i sems can
T02D1198:5b-8: gyi yid phrogs te aa wa rdzi ta wan kun
T02D1198:5b-9: nas 'dun par mdzad pa gang gi tshe yin pa
T02D1198:5b-10: de'i tshe de las der bdag gis thos so zhes
T02D1198:5b-12: gnas par mdzad do zhes ma brjod pa ni de
T02D1198:5b-13: kho na nyid dun [?] bcom ldan 'das gang du
T02D1198:5b-14: yang mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:5b-16: bha ga der de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' dag btsun
T02D1198:5b-17: mo dang bcas pa gnas so zhes pa der ni
T02D1198:5b-18: / dus kyi mtshams med par gnas zhes mngon par dgongs so //
T02D1198:5b-19: de ltar gyur pa'i yul gsum du bcom ldan 'das
T02D1198:5b-20: bzhugs pa bstan pas stong pa nyid dang snying rje
T02D1198:5b-21: dbyer med pa lhan cig skyes pa'i sku la gsal
T02D1198:5b-23: sku de kho nas kyang rgyud bstan pas yang de dang ro gcig par bstan to //
T02D1198:5b-24: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
T02D1198:5b-25: dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje ni
T02D1198:5b-26: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1198:5b-27: bdag po ste thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin byang
T02D1198:5b-28: chub kyi sems rdo rje kho na ste /
T02D1198:5b-29: de'i btsun mo phyag rgya chen mo bcom ldan 'das
T02D1198:5b-30: ma shes rab chen mo kun du bzang mo'i ming
T02D1198:5b-31: gzhan can no // de'i bha ga ni stong pa nyid do //
T02D1198:5b-32: bcom ldan 'das de der bzhugs te de'i bdag nyid
T02D1198:5b-33: du gyur nas ro gcig pa'i rang bzhin gyis te
T02D1198:5b-34: / dbye ba mtha' dag gi mchog tu 'dzin pa
T02D1198:5b-35: med pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i bar du brjod du med
T02D1198:5b-36: pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1198:5b-37: dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang rnal 'byor pa dang
T02D1198:5b-38: rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1198:5b-39: dang phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang sngags bye ba
T02D1198:5b-40: phrag rnams dang lhan cig tu rnam par rtog pa
T02D1198:5b-41: med kyang sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyi dbang las
T02D1198:5b-42: sems can rnams thams cad la ci bya zhes smra
T02D1198:6a-3: yid bzhin nor bu ltar rtog pa'i //
T02D1198:6a-4: rlung rnams kun gyis bskyod bya min //
T02D1198:6a-5: de ltar gnas kyang sems can gyi //
T02D1198:6a-6: re ba ma lus rdzogs par mdzad //
T02D1198:6a-9: bya ba med pa'i skyob pa la'ang //
T02D1198:6a-11: bstan pa yang dag rab 'jug byed //
T02D1198:6a-13: gang yang 'dir ae wam gyi yi ge la sogs
T02D1198:6a-14: pa'i don gzhan yang 'dir dang rgyud gzhan rnams su
T02D1198:6a-15: gsungs pa ni bstan pa gzhan kho na yin cing
T02D1198:6a-16: gdul ba'i skye bo rnams kyis gzungs thob pa'i don
T02D1198:6a-17: du ste / yi ge gcig tu don gyi phung po chen po 'phangs nas 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:6a-18: de bzhin du de rnams don chen po nyid kyis
T02D1198:6a-19: mchog tu bkra shis pa nyid kyis na rgyud kyi
T02D1198:6a-20: dang por nye bar bstan to zhes kyang gsal bar
T02D1198:6a-22: 'dir de brjod pa po nyid kyis na 'di rnams
T02D1198:6a-23: sdud pa ru 'thad pa ni ma yin te phan
T02D1198:6a-24: tshun 'brel pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:6a-25: don de yang dag gzhan rnams su nye bar dmigs
T02D1198:6a-26: par bya ba'o zhes pa 'dir rnam par bshad pa'i
T02D1198:6a-28: de ltar dus dang yul dang ston pa po phun sum tshogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1198:6a-29: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D1198:6a-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang
T02D1198:6a-31: phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i dbus su zhes so
T02D1198:6a-32: // rnal 'byor ni thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T02D1198:6a-33: de la dbang phyug ni dbang 'byor pa ste /
T02D1198:6a-34: de thob pa nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams te /
T02D1198:6a-35: sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams so //
T02D1198:6a-36: mang po nyid du nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyis
T02D1198:6a-37: na rigs mthun pa rnams las rdo rje snying po
T02D1198:6a-38: nges par gzung ba'i don du dang por bstan gyi
T02D1198:6a-39: / 'khor 'di rnams kho na tsam ni ma yin te /
T02D1198:6a-40: de rnams mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:6a-41: gang mjug tu gsung bar 'gyur ba /
T02D1198:6a-42: de nas rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma dang
T02D1198:6a-43: mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma dang byang chub sems
T02D1198:6a-44: dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang de bzhin gshegs
T02D1198:6b-0: pa'i tshogs rnam pa du ma ste @6b thams cad
T02D1198:6b-1: dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams zhes so //
T02D1198:6b-2: bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyi sems mkhyen pa nyid kyis
T02D1198:6b-3: yang dag par sbyor ba nyan pa'i skal ba dang
T02D1198:6b-5: rdo rje snying po gsol ba 'debs par nus par gzigs nas /
T02D1198:6b-6: ma bskul bar gsol ba 'debs pa po med do zhes pas na bskul bar dgongs pas /
T02D1198:6b-7: rgyud kyi rgyal po'i don 'di ni mgo smos pas
T02D1198:6b-8: shes pa kho na'i sems can rnams kyi spyod yul
T02D1198:6b-9: lo zhes gsal bar byed cing 'dzum pa mdzad do
T02D1198:6b-10: // mgo smos pas go ba nyid kyis dgongs pa
T02D1198:6b-11: de rtogs nas rdo rje snying pos gsol ba 'debs
T02D1198:6b-12: par zhugs so zhes ston to /
T02D1198:6b-13: mdzad ma thag tu ni bar ma chad par ro //
T02D1198:6b-14: stan las te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las so //
T02D1198:6b-15: sa la zhes pa ni stan la ma yin pa'o //
T02D1198:6b-16: 'di yang ma 'ongs pa rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs pa slob pa'o //
T02D1198:6b-18: nyan par zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:6b-19: ye shes kyi dbang po zhes pa la ye shes
T02D1198:6b-20: ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa ma
T02D1198:6b-21: lus pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa ma lus pa
T02D1198:6b-22: spangs pa phun sum tshogs pas chos thams cad kyi
T02D1198:6b-23: rnam pa thams cad byang chub pa rtogs pa phun
T02D1198:6b-25: de la dbang po ni mchog tu dbang thob pa'o //
T02D1198:6b-26: yang na mchog gi dbang phyug thob pa des seng
T02D1198:6b-27: ge dang 'phrog byed dang dbyig gi snying po la
T02D1198:6b-28: sogs pa ston pa po'i tshogs kyi gtsug gi nor
T02D1198:6b-29: bu nyid kyis na dbang po'o //
T02D1198:6b-30: yang na me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye
T02D1198:6b-31: shes kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis na ye shes ni
T02D1198:6b-32: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D1198:6b-34: de rnams kyi dbang po bdag po ste /
T02D1198:6b-35: de skyed pa po nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:6b-36: de'i phyir bdag lta bu rnams kyi thun mong ma
T02D1198:6b-37: yin pa'i ston pa ni khyod kho na'o zhes pa'i
T02D1198:6b-38: bsam pa ni gsol ba 'debs pa po ye shes
T02D1198:6b-39: kyi dbang po zhes bod pa po'i 'o //
T02D1198:6b-40: ae ma'o rdo rje snying po dris shig ces pa
T02D1198:6b-41: tshig yongs su bsgyur bas 'dri par 'dod pas zhes
T02D1198:6b-42: sbrel lo // ae ma byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang sbrel bar bya'o //
T02D1198:7a-1: pas go ba nyid kyis mnyan par 'os pa dang
T02D1198:7a-2: rjes su mthun pa'i nyan pa po rdo rje snying
T02D1198:7a-3: po la sogs pa rnams ngo mtshar gyi spyod yul
T02D1198:7a-4: nyid kyi phyir / ae ma zhes ngo mtshar bar byas nas bod pa'o //
T02D1198:7a-5: rdo rje stong pa nyid ye shes snying po nang
T02D1198:7a-6: du byas pa 'di'i yin pa zhes pa rdo rje
T02D1198:7a-7: snying po'o // de ltar shes rab phun sum tshogs
T02D1198:7a-8: pa bshad nas thugs rje phun sum tshogs pa gsungs
T02D1198:7a-9: snying po'o // pa / brtse ba chen po legs so legs so zhes pa ste /
T02D1198:7a-10: snying rje chen po ni shin tu legs pa nyid kyi phyir legs so legs so zhes gsungs so //
T02D1198:7a-11: bdag cag ni 'dir zab mo'i chos la skal pa
T02D1198:7a-12: med pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bos zhes
T02D1198:7a-13: dogs pas so so'i skye bo nyan pa po'i bsam
T02D1198:7a-14: pa sgyid lug pa bsal ba'i ched du bod par
T02D1198:7a-15: byed pa ni chen po zhes pa ste /
T02D1198:7a-16: nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub las che ba'i byang chub la sems dpa' ste /
T02D1198:7a-17: bsam pa 'di rnams kyi yin pa zhes pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams so //
T02D1198:7a-18: yon tan rnams ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la
T02D1198:7a-19: sogs pa rnams te de rnams kyi 'byung gnas ni
T02D1198:7a-20: rten rnams so // tshig gnyis pos ni 'di rnams
T02D1198:7a-21: kyi shes rab dang thugs rje'i rang bzhin nyid gsungs
T02D1198:7a-22: rten rnams so // so // de ltar shes rab
T02D1198:7a-23: dang thabs gsal bar gyur pa nyid kyis khyed kyang
T02D1198:7a-24: 'di nyan par dbang ba'o zhes gsal bar byas so
T02D1198:7a-25: rten rnams so // so // // de ltar gyur
T02D1198:7a-26: pa kho na'i gzhan rnams kyang 'di la dbang ba'o
T02D1198:7a-28: rgyud thams cad la zhes pa /
T02D1198:7a-29: de rnams la yod pa'i gsang chen yang 'dir dogs
T02D1198:7a-30: pa med pa nyid du brjod par 'gyur ba nyid
T02D1198:7a-31: kyi phyir ro // gsang chen rnam pa mang po bshad par bya ba nyid kyis na gsungs pa /
T02D1198:7a-33: bla na med pa'i chos nyan par rung ba nyid kyis bsngags pa'o //
T02D1198:7a-34: rab tu dga' zhing zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:7a-35: rab tu dga' ba kho na las dregs pa med
T02D1198:7a-36: pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i ched du yang yang du
T02D1198:7a-37: phyag byas pa'o // ci zhes pa ni brjod par bya ba'o //
T02D1198:7a-38: ci ltar zhes pa tshad ma'i rnam pa dris pa'o //
T02D1198:7a-39: ci zhes pa chos rnams thams cad kyi thun mong pa la ste /
T02D1198:7a-40: de'i rang gi ngo bo ci zhig pa'o //
T02D1198:7a-41: thams cad kyi yul ma yin pa nyid kyis gsang chen no //
T02D1198:7b-0: yang @7b dag sbyor byung zhes pa ni dang po'i gcig gi tshig phyis pa'o //
T02D1198:7b-1: ci ltar zhes pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po dris pa'o //
T02D1198:7b-2: de la ste yang dag par sbyor ba las byung
T02D1198:7b-3: ba las sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur
T02D1198:7b-4: ba ci ltar dang ci zhig pa'o //
T02D1198:7b-5: thams cad kyang de yin la rgyud rnams kyang yin pas zhes pa /
T02D1198:7b-6: rgyud ni rgyun rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1198:7b-7: de skad du yang 'dus pa phyi mar gsungs pa /
T02D1198:7b-8: rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar brjod //
T02D1198:7b-9: rgyun de rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
T02D1198:7b-10: gzhi dang rang bzhin nyid dang ni //
T02D1198:7b-11: mi 'phrogs pa yi rab dbye las //
T02D1198:7b-12: mdor bstan pa'i tshig rnams kyi rgyas par bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D1198:7b-13: rang bzhin rnam pa rgyu yin te //
T02D1198:7b-15: gzhi ni thabs zhes bya ba ste //
T02D1198:7b-16: gsum gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o //
T02D1198:7b-18: dngos po rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo
T02D1198:7b-19: ni rang bzhin dang rnam pa zhes pa don gzhan
T02D1198:7b-20: ma yin te rang gi ngo bo zhes pa'i don
T02D1198:7b-21: to // de rgyu ste nye bar len pa'i byed pa po rgyu'i rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1198:7b-22: gang 'di rnams kyi thog ma med pa'i bag chags
T02D1198:7b-23: kyi dri mas ma gos pa ngo bo nyid kyis
T02D1198:7b-24: grub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid de kho na ni dri
T02D1198:7b-25: ma med pa nyid thob pa'i mtshan nyid can sangs
T02D1198:7b-26: rgyas nyid kyi rgyu'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:7b-27: gal te yang ngo bo nyid kyis 'di rnams 'od gsal bar gyur pa ma yin na /
T02D1198:7b-28: sol ba bzhin du bkrus kyang dri ma med par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:7b-29: de 'phags pa byams pas gsungs pa /
T02D1198:7b-30: thams cad la ni khyad med kyang //
T02D1198:7b-31: de bzhin nyid ni dag gyur pa //
T02D1198:7b-32: de bzhin gshegs nyid de yi phyir //
T02D1198:7b-33: 'gro kun de yi snying po can //
T02D1198:7b-35: rgyu de las glo bur ba'i dri ma dang bral
T02D1198:7b-36: ba las gang dri ma dang bral ba nyid thob
T02D1198:7b-37: pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'bras bu 'bras bu'i rdo
T02D1198:7b-38: rje 'dzin pa de ni mi 'phrogs par brjod par
T02D1198:7b-39: bya ste / bag chags kyi dri ma rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa nyid kyi phyir te /
T02D1198:7b-40: 'phrogs pa ni yang dag par 'phrogs pa ste 'grib pa'am sdud pa'o //
T02D1198:7b-41: dri ma med pa nyid thob pa'i thabs te lhan
T02D1198:7b-42: cig byed pa'i rkyen bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim
T02D1198:7b-43: pa'i ngo bo ni gzhi zhes brjod par bya ste
T02D1198:7b-44: / de la brten nas skye ba dang gnas pa'i phyir na myu gu'i sa gzhi bzhin no //
T02D1198:8a-0: thabs de yang dngos su ba @8a * //
T02D1198:8a-1: ni phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i dus su /
T02D1198:8a-2: phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor las 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rjes su bsgrub pa ste /
T02D1198:8a-3: de'i yang dngos su ba'i thabs rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D1198:8a-4: de'i ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1198:8a-5: de'i yan lag rnams ni las rab 'byam dang dbang bskur ba la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1198:8a-6: de ltar rgyu'i rgyud dang 'bras bu'i rgyud dang thabs
T02D1198:8a-7: kyi rgyud ces pa rgyud gsum rnams kyis rgyud kyi
T02D1198:8a-8: don khyad par du rtogs par bya ba bsdus so
T02D1198:8a-9: // 'dus pa la sogs pa rnams zhes pa la 'dus pa ni brjod par bya ba'i don te /
T02D1198:8a-10: de ltar ni 'dus pa phyi mar /
T02D1198:8a-11: sku dang gsung thugs rnam pa gsum //
T02D1198:8a-12: gsang ba zhes par brjod par bya //
T02D1198:8a-13: 'dus pa tshogs par rab brjod de //
T02D1198:8a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon brjod pa'o //
T02D1198:8a-16: stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi nyid kyis na /
T02D1198:8a-17: so sor rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D1198:8a-18: skal pa med pa'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma yin
T02D1198:8a-19: pa nyid kyi phyir gsang ba ste sba bar bya
T02D1198:8a-20: ba'o // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D1198:8a-21: kyis na 'gro ba'i don gsal bar gyur pa de'i

T02D1198:9a-27: na yang dag pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1198:9a-28: dang sgrub par byed pa med pas na ma nges

T02D1198:17b-37: kun du spyod pa de yang bha ga ste chos
T02D1198:17b-39: gang rab tu byed pa bzhi par gsungs bar 'gyur ba /
T02D1198:17b-40: gru gsum yangs pa'i gzugs can no //
T02D1198:17b-42: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sogs pa yang bha ga ste /

T02D1198:17b-44: chen po'i ngo bo nyid du 'byung zhing skye ba'o
T02D1198:17b-46: gtso bo zhes pa byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag
T02D1198:17b-47: nyid kho na byed pa dang 'phrog pa la gtso

T02D1198:18a-1: gnod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:18a-2: de'i phyir byed pa po de kho na'i las dang
T02D1198:18a-3: las ma yin te dge ba dang mi dge bar
T02D1198:18a-4: 'gyur ro // dus ji tsam du zhe na gsungs pa /

T02D1198:18a-8: 'di nyid rgyas par ston par byed //
T02D1198:18a-9: ces pa la sogs pas tha mal pa'i nga rgyal
T02D1198:18a-10: la sogs pa 'di kho na slar mi skye ba'i
T02D1198:18a-11: ched du lha'i rnal 'byor sgom pa gsungs so //

T02D1198:18a-14: bsgom pa ni gus pa dang bcas par rgyun ma chad par yun ring du goms par byed pa'o //

T02D1198:18a-16: pa las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu'am
T02D1198:18a-17: rgyu'i lus so // de 'dra ba zhes pa thog

T02D1198:18a-28: la sogs pa med pa'i phyir 'di ci ltar gzhan
T02D1198:18a-29: gyi don byed pa nyid zhe na /

T02D1198:18a-33: cad yongs su dag pa'i dge ba gcig pu mthar
T02D1198:18a-34: thug pa mchog tu nus pa'o //
T02D1198:18a-35: gang gis zhes pa 'khor ba'i bar du rgyun ma
T02D1198:18a-36: chad par dpag tu med pa'i sprul pa'i sku rnams
T02D1198:18a-37: kyis 'gro ba khyab par byas nas kun ston pa

T02D1198:18a-40: bde 'gro dang theg pa gsum la 'jog bar mdzad
T02D1198:18a-41: cing sdig pa la sogs pa rnams 'phrog go //

T02D1198:18a-45: kha dog ces pa la sogs pa ste /

T02D1198:18b-1: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba stong pa ste /

T02D1198:18b-7: / shes rab kyis srid mi gnas shing //
T02D1198:18b-8: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas pa //
T02D1198:18b-9: zhes pas srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D1198:18b-10: la mi gnas pa sgrib pa thams cad nges par
T02D1198:18b-11: song ba zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po
T02D1198:18b-12: gcig pu'i rang bzhin la rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor

T02D1198:18b-15: chu skyes bzhin du mi mthun pa'i phyogs chu'i skyon

T02D1198:18b-22: chos 'di rnams ni stong shes nas //

T02D1198:18b-30: 'di rnams stong nyid ye shes mes //

T02D1198:18b-32: 'on kyang snying rjes brlan pa gang //

T02D1198:18b-37: chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor dang //
T02D1198:18b-38: lha ru gshegs kyang mya ngan 'das //

T02D1198:18b-40: thugs rje'i dbang gis rab 'jug pa'i ;

T02D1198:18b-42: tshangs dbang nye dbang drag sogs kyi //

T02D1198:18b-45: snying rje'i bsam ldan zlos gar mdzad //

T02D1198:19a-0: @19a * // gos pa bag chags la nges par byung ba yang 'di yin la /

T02D1198:19a-14: nges pa'i don ni rang nyid kyis gsung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:19a-15: shes rab ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo'i rnal 'byor ma rnams so //

T02D1198:19a-21: nan gyis rnal 'byor mar sbyor las //

T02D1198:19a-25: ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa //
T02D1198:19a-26: de srid shes rab sten par bya //
T02D1198:19a-28: de kho na nyid ni 'dir thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin te /

T02D1198:19a-45: de kho na nyid shes par 'dod pa po la
T02D1198:19b-0: 'di rnams kyis ci bya zhe na gsungs @19b pa

T02D1198:19b-3: rigs mo dang dmangs rigs mo rnams ni rnam par

T02D1198:19b-12: de bzhin nyid du zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
T02D1198:19b-13: de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin pa nyid de /
T02D1198:19b-14: chos kyi khyad par ma bstan pa'i phyir 'di ni chos thams cad kyi'o //
T02D1198:19b-15: de'i phyir chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji
T02D1198:19b-16: lta ba'i de kho na nyid ni de bzhin nyid
T02D1198:19b-17: du brjod do // de yang stong pa nyid tsam

T02D1198:19b-19: du brjod do // byas shing // 'dir ni nye

T02D1198:19b-22: du brjod do // byas shing // du zhes pa'o
T02D1198:19b-23: // der gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste

T02D1198:19b-25: dpal ldan te tshogs gnyis dang ldan par gyur pa zhes snga ma dang sbrel lo //

T02D1198:19b-27: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin kho na 'gro
T02D1198:19b-28: ba'i don du rigs lnga la sogs pa'i dngos por

T02D1198:19b-31: shes dang dbyer med pa'i shes rab kyis dang sbyor
T02D1198:19b-32: bas te de'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyis so

T02D1198:19b-35: rnams kyang rang bzhin med pa'i bdag nyid kyi de

T02D1198:19b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang chos kyi bdog

T02D1198:19b-39: sogs pa'i ye shes lnga rnams te /

T02D1198:19b-41: glo bur gyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa na
T02D1198:19b-42: rang gi rang bzhin la gnas bzhin pa rnams ni
T02D1198:20a-1: pa dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpar bshad pa 'thob pa 'ba' zhig ste /
T02D1198:20a-2: snga ma ni sa bon du bshad pa kho na'o //

T02D1198:20a-4: yin pa'i phyir skye rigs rnams dang sde rigs rnams
T02D1198:20a-5: su brjod do // 'o na de lta na de

T02D1198:20a-7: sogs pa'i ye shes lnga can rnams te /
T02D1198:20a-8: so sor de rnams me long lta bu la sogs pa'i rigs lnga rnams yin na /
T02D1198:20a-9: de ci ltar sde rigs tha dad pa yin zhe na /
T02D1198:20a-10: skye rigs tha dad pa'i phyir te /
T02D1198:20a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi me long lta bu

T02D1198:20a-13: rigs thog ma med pa nas grub cing /

T02D1198:20a-35: rgyu med pa'i phyir sems can gyi rigs kho nar

T02D1198:21a-5: / de gnyis gsal bar byas kyi //

T02D1198:21a-7: rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i rigs lnga'i rnal 'byor ma rnams nges par bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1198:21a-8: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyang de'i sgo kho nas de ltar gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
T02D1198:21a-10: de kho na nyid du na bsgom par bya ba dang /
T02D1198:21a-12: bsgoms pa rnams skye ba med pas gdod ma nas
T02D1198:21a-13: zhi ba nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad der ston
T02D1198:21a-14: pa ni / sgom pa po med ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:21a-15: de ci sngags dang lha dag chad pa kho na rdzogs pa'i rim pa'am zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1198:21a-17: spros pa med pa ni stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:21a-18: rang bzhin ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen
T02D1198:21a-19: po'i ngo bo ste de'i ngo bos sngags dang lha

T02D1198:21a-21: a'a ro li ka ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //

T02D1198:21a-26: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bos spros

T02D1198:21a-28: du brjod do zhes pa'i don to //

T02D1198:21a-30: lugs su ma grags pa nyid kyi phyir don gsungs
T02D1198:21a-31: pa // tshangs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:21a-32: mya ngan las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D1198:21a-33: de'i phyir sangs rgyas kho na dngos por na tshangs pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
T02D1198:21a-34: de ni rang gi ngo bos mya ngan las ma 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:21a-35: de ltar phyi ma rnams la yang ngo //
T02D1198:21a-36: 'jug phyir zhes pa khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:21a-37: dge phyir zhes pa shin tu dge ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:21a-38: thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni gnyug ma'i ngo bo ste /
T02D1198:21a-39: gang gi phyir de la rgyun gyis gnas pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad do zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:21a-40: 'di thams cad gang gi bdag nyid yin pa de
T02D1198:21a-41: kho na nyid de ni da dung yang mi shes
T02D1198:21b-1: bde pa dam pas zhes pa ste /
T02D1198:21b-2: bde ba dam pa ni spros pa med pa'i bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1198:21b-3: dga' ba rtogs phyir rnams sangs rgyas //
T02D1198:21b-4: zhes pa bde ba chen po de kho na rtogs
T02D1198:21b-5: pa'i phyir rnam sangs rgyas te sangs rgyas kho na'o
T02D1198:21b-6: // 'o na lha'i khyad par rnams bsgrubs zin mod ;
T02D1198:21b-7: ci lha nyid ni ma bsgrubs so zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1198:21b-9: lus la 'byung zhes pa lha ste yi ge bsnan pa dang phyis pa dag gis so //
T02D1198:21b-10: de ltar gyur pa de kho na bcom ldan 'das su brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
T02D1198:21b-11: skal pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:21b-12: de ltar yongs su dag pa'i yid la bde ba
T02D1198:21b-13: chen po'i ros rjes su dran pa'i dbang phyug la
T02D1198:21b-14: sogs pa'i yon tan rnams gnyug ma'i sa bon las
T02D1198:21b-15: skye ba'o zhes pas de rnams 'di la yod pa'o
T02D1198:21b-16: // phyag rgya rnams kyi nges pa'i don gsungs pa /
T02D1198:21b-17: skyed byed ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:21b-18: 'gro ba'i skye bo zhes pa 'gro bar 'jug pa 'phags pa'i 'jig rten no //
T02D1198:21b-19: rnam dbye zhes pa spang bar bya ba dang blang bar bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba'o //
T02D1198:21b-20: tshos ma zhes pa la sogs pas mdor bstan nas /
T02D1198:21b-21: chags byed phyir zhes pa la sogs pas rgyas par bshad do //
T02D1198:21b-22: chags byed phyir zhes pa rjes su chags par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:21b-23: shes rab kyis ni bsam pa dang bag la nyal
T02D1198:21b-24: rnam par mkhyen nas ji ltar rigs par rjes su
T02D1198:21b-25: gnas par byed pa'i phyir sems can thams cad rjes
T02D1198:21b-26: su chags pa can nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pas
T02D1198:21b-27: shes rab kho na de skad brjod do //
T02D1198:21b-28: yon tan te stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs
T02D1198:21b-29: pa'i ngo bo nam mkha'i 'dod 'jo las 'jo phyir
T02D1198:21b-30: te skyed par byed pa'i phyir shes rab kho na
T02D1198:21b-32: g-yo ba'i phyir zhes pa srid pa dang mya ngan
T02D1198:21b-33: las 'das pa la mi gnas pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1198:21b-34: ro // reg min zhes pa stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:21b-35: phyi rol gyi phyag rgya rnams kyang shes rab kyi
T02D1198:21b-36: yon tan de rnams nyid kyi rjes su byed pa'i
T02D1198:21b-37: phyir shes rab nyid du rjes su rtogs par bya'o
T02D1198:21b-38: // de nyid kyi phyir 'di ltar gyur pa'i shes
T02D1198:21b-39: rab kyi rang bzhin phyi rol gyi phyag rgya rnams
T02D1198:22a-0: kho na lhag par mos pas kyang @22a * //
T02D1198:22a-1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams kyi
T02D1198:22a-2: stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i bde ba chen
T02D1198:22a-3: po'i de kho na nyid shes rab 'dod pa pos
T02D1198:22a-4: bsten pa'o zhes pas brten par bya'o zhes bshad do
T02D1198:22a-5: // rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i lha bsgrubs nas sngags sgrub pa gsungs pa /
T02D1198:22a-6: bzlas pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:22a-7: a'a li dang k'a li shes rab dang thabs kyi
T02D1198:22a-8: ngo bo dag sngags mchog nyid kyi phyir na thams
T02D1198:22a-9: cad de'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir brjod pa bzlas
T02D1198:22a-10: pa zhes pa 'di ni spros pa med pa'i sngags
T02D1198:22a-11: so // dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya dag kyang rdzogs pa la rtogs par byed pa gsungs pa /
T02D1198:22a-13: 'bri ba ni ri mo ste rdul dang 'dam la
T02D1198:22a-14: sogs pa rnams la rkang pa'i gzugs brnyan ni rkang
T02D1198:22a-15: pa'i ri mo'o // nyed phyir zhes pa nyed par byed pa'i phyir te /
T02D1198:22a-16: kun du bskyod pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i bar ro //
T02D1198:22a-17: 'di ni mngon par dgongs pa ste /
T02D1198:22a-18: dkyil 'khor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gshegs par byed pa kho na'i phyir te /
T02D1198:22a-19: de ltar 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bor
T02D1198:22a-20: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas kun nas bskyed pa'i phyir
T02D1198:22a-21: de mthong ba rnams kyi yang bsod nams du ma
T02D1198:22a-22: nye bar sog pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir dkyil 'khor
T02D1198:22a-23: du brjod par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:22a-24: lag pa bskyod pa phyag rgyar 'gyur //
T02D1198:22a-25: sor mo nyed pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02D1198:22a-26: zhes pa 'dir ni rgyu rjes su ma bkod par 'di ltar ston par byed de /
T02D1198:22a-27: bya ba dpag tu med pa can gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi /
T02D1198:22a-28: thams cad la rgyu bkod na rgya ches par 'gyur te /
T02D1198:22a-29: 'di thams cad ni shes rab dang thabs kyi rang
T02D1198:22a-30: bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i ngo bor
T02D1198:22a-32: 'o na de ltar bsgom par bya ba dang sgom pa po dang bsgoms pa mi 'thad na /
T02D1198:22a-33: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nges par bstan pa'i bsam par
T02D1198:22a-34: bya ba dang bsam pa la ci rnam par thams
T02D1198:22a-35: cad du rdzogs pa kho na ma yin no zhe
T02D1198:22a-36: na gsungs pa / de ni bsam bya zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:22a-37: 'o na de ltar sems kyi rgyu ba dpag tu
T02D1198:22a-38: med pa mi 'gag na rnam par g-yeng ba kho
T02D1198:22a-39: na ste / bsam gtan ma yin no zhes pas
T02D1198:22b-0: de bsam byar yang mi 'gyur ro @22b zhe na
T02D1198:22b-1: na ste / gsungs pa / phal zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:22b-2: bde de rang gis longs spyad bya //
T02D1198:22b-3: zhes pa man ngag ji lta ba bzhin rgyun mi 'chad par goms pa las sam /
T02D1198:22b-4: lang tsho can dbang bskur bdag gis de ltar thog
T02D1198:22b-5: ma dang bar ma dang tha ma rnams su gang
T02D1198:22b-6: bde ba de 'gog pa med par nyams su myong
T02D1198:22b-7: ba ni bsam gtan du brjod par bya'o //
T02D1198:22b-8: de bzhin du bsam pa gzhan rnams la yang 'gog
T02D1198:22b-9: pa med par rab tu 'byung ba'i bde ba chen
T02D1198:22b-10: po rjes su dran pa las gang la bsam bya
T02D1198:22b-11: dang bsam gtan dag tu mi 'gyur ba g-yeng ba
T02D1198:22b-12: ci las yin zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
T02D1198:22b-13: yang na phal zhes pa bla ma la dbang bskur
T02D1198:22b-14: ba'i dus su gang thob ste nyams su myong ba'i
T02D1198:22b-15: lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po de longs
T02D1198:22b-16: spyad bya ste rang nyid kun nas spyad par bya
T02D1198:22b-17: zhing gzhan gyi tshe na yang ngo //
T02D1198:22b-18: yang na phyag rgya'i sbyor ba las de lta kho nar spyad par bya'o //
T02D1198:22b-19: nye bar spyad pa'i bde ba gang gis 'chi ste dbang po rnams 'gog par 'gyur zhing /
T02D1198:22b-20: 'dir zhes pa mthong ba'i skye ba kho na la ste /
T02D1198:22b-21: bde ba de bsam gtan du brjod do //
T02D1198:22b-22: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i de ltar gyur pa'i bsam
T02D1198:22b-23: gtan ni lhun gyis grub pa las de ltar rjes
T02D1198:22b-24: su dran pa tsam gyis bshad ma thag pa'i man
T02D1198:22b-25: ngag la yang rjes su shes par bya'o zhes pa'o
T02D1198:22b-26: // ces pa zhes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1198:22b-27: sogs pa'i sgra yis go cha la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:22b-28: rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba byang
T02D1198:22b-29: chub tu sems bskyed pa dang go cha la sogs
T02D1198:22b-30: pa sgom pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid de
T02D1198:22b-31: phyin ci ma log pa'i de kho na nyid 'dis
T02D1198:22b-32: skabs su byed cing skabs su bab par byed pas
T02D1198:22b-33: na skabs te yongs su bcad pa dang /
T02D1198:22b-34: le'u zhes pa don tha dad pa ma yin zhing /
T02D1198:22b-35: dang po ni thog mar bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:22b-36: yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02D1198:22b-37: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma dang po'o /
T02D1198:22b-39: // / de ltar yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems kho na bsgom byar mdor bstan to //
T02D1198:22b-40: de kho na yang 'bras bu dang /
T02D1198:22b-42: thabs kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyud gsum gyi bdag
T02D1198:22b-43: nyid can no zhes pa 'di tsam ni bcom ldan
T02D1198:23a-1: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:23a-2: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D1198:23a-3: gang du sems ni rab bsgom pa //
T02D1198:23a-4: de nyid sangs rgyas chos dang ni //
T02D1198:23a-7: bsgom par bya ba de kho na la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams nang du 'dus kyi /
T02D1198:23a-8: log par bsgom par bya ba ni ma yin no //
T02D1198:23a-9: yang na yongs su 'dris pa'i don du byang chub
T02D1198:23a-10: kyi phyogs pa'i rnam pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor
T02D1198:23a-11: ba'i bsgom bya byang chub sems de goms par bya
T02D1198:23a-12: ste / de'i phyir de rnams skabs su mdzad pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:23a-13: de nas zhes pa lam bstan pa'i de ma thag par ro //
T02D1198:23a-14: byang chub ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de /
T02D1198:23a-15: de'i phyogs ni rjes su mthun pa rnams so //
T02D1198:23a-16: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams kho na ni byang chub kyi phyogs nyid do //
T02D1198:23a-17: de la rjes su lta ba gang rnams kyis lus
T02D1198:23a-18: dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos rnams la gcig
T02D1198:23a-19: nyid dang du ma nyid la sogs pa mi rung
T02D1198:23a-20: bas na / rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi shes
T02D1198:23a-21: pa rnams kyis dran pa nye bar 'jog pa de
T02D1198:23a-22: rnams ni dran pa'i rgyu shes rab kyi rang bzhin
T02D1198:23a-23: rnams te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yin
T02D1198:23a-24: bas na / zhing / dmigs pa'i bye brag las bzhi rnams te /
T02D1198:23a-25: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02D1198:23a-26: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02D1198:23a-27: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02D1198:23a-28: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
T02D1198:23a-29: de la nang gi lus ni mig la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02D1198:23a-30: phyi'i lus ni rang gi lus las phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02D1198:23a-31: nang dang phyi'i lus ni rang gi lus la sogs
T02D1198:23a-32: par gtogs pa'i 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur
T02D1198:23a-33: pa lhag ma'o // tshor ba la sogs pa rnams
T02D1198:23a-34: kyi gsum nyid ni lus rnam pa gsum rnams la
T02D1198:23a-35: dmigs pa'i bye brag gis so //
T02D1198:23a-36: tshor ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang sdug
T02D1198:23a-37: bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'o
T02D1198:23a-38: // sems ni dbang po lnga'i shes pa rnams so //
T02D1198:23a-39: chos rnams ni sems las byung ba dge ba dang
T02D1198:23a-40: mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa rnams
T02D1198:23a-41: so // lus la sogs pa'i rjes su lta ba zhes pa /
T02D1198:23a-42: lus la sogs pa'i chos nyid kyi rjes su lta ba ste /
T02D1198:23b-0: 'di @23b ni lus so bdag gi lus so rtag
T02D1198:23b-1: pa'o mi rtag pa'i bde ba'o sdug bsngal ba'o zhes
T02D1198:23b-2: pa 'di lta bu la sogs par rnam par mi
T02D1198:23b-5: rnam par mi rtog pa de yang mi dmigs pa'i sbyor bas so //
T02D1198:23b-6: 'o na gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
T02D1198:23b-7: rnams kyis chos thams cad shes na byang chub kyi
T02D1198:23b-8: phyogs phyi ma rnams kyis ci bya zhe na /
T02D1198:23b-10: gang gi phyir de rnams kyis chos nyid du yongs
T02D1198:23b-11: su shes na yang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1198:23b-12: rnam pa nyid kyis chos kyi khyad par yongs su
T02D1198:23b-13: shes pa'i ched du sum cu rtsa bdun du yang
T02D1198:23b-15: de nyid kyi phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams
T02D1198:23b-16: ni mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa nyid
T02D1198:23b-17: du dmigs par byed la byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D1198:23b-18: ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02D1198:23b-19: de nyid kyi phyir mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1198:23b-20: rnam pa dang stong pa nyid kyang 'di rnams kyi
T02D1198:23b-21: yul du 'gyur ro zhes pas nyan thos kyi lam
T02D1198:23b-22: yang chos nyid kyi sgo nas goms par byas par
T02D1198:23b-23: 'gyur ro // yang gis gdung ba med pa nyid sdud par byed do //
T02D1198:23b-24: de'i phyir gus par byas te rgyun du sbyor ba'i phyir gdung ba med pa'o //
T02D1198:23b-25: rjes su blta bas dang shes bzhin du yang sbyor ba'i phyir shes bzhin can no //
T02D1198:23b-26: mi brjed pa'i bdag nyid dang srung ba med pa nyid kyis dang /
T02D1198:23b-27: g-yeng ba med par 'byung bas dran pas sbyor ba'i phyir dran pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1198:23b-28: brtson 'grus dang shes rab dang dran pa 'di rnams kho na'i rjes su bsngags pa gsungs pa /
T02D1198:23b-29: rnam par bsal te zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:23b-30: rnam par bsal te zhes pa ni rab tu spangs nas so //
T02D1198:23b-31: 'jig rten la zhes pa 'jig rten gyi chos rnyed
T02D1198:23b-32: pa dang grags pa dang bde ba dang bstod pa
T02D1198:23b-33: rnams la brnab sems te chags pa dang ma rnyed
T02D1198:23b-34: pa dang ma grags pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang
T02D1198:23b-35: smad pa rnams la yid mi bde ba'o //
T02D1198:23b-36: 'di rnams kyis sems sam lus dang ngag dang yid
T02D1198:23b-37: rnams yang dag par 'jog ste yang dag par 'dzin
T02D1198:23b-38: pa'am rab tu 'jug pa'o zhes pa yang dag par
T02D1198:23b-40: 'di rnams kyis bag la nyal rnams rab tu spong
T02D1198:23b-41: ba'o zhes byas nas yang dag par spong ba rnams
T02D1198:24a-1: rnams ni chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las
T02D1198:24a-2: gong du brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo bzhi rnams te
T02D1198:24a-4: ma skyes pa rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:24a-5: ngan 'gro rnams su ltung bar byed cing /
T02D1198:24a-6: rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis gnod pa byed la /
T02D1198:24a-7: las rigs mthun pa'am las kyi bag chags byed do zhes pa sdig pa rnams te /
T02D1198:24a-8: nges pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid kyis sa //
T02D1198:24a-9: mi dge ba rnams ni lus kyi nyes par spyod
T02D1198:24a-10: pa la sogs pa phyin ci log gi ngo bo
T02D1198:24a-11: kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams te /
T02D1198:24a-12: thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis spang bar bya ba
T02D1198:24a-13: nyid na yang rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir
T02D1198:24a-14: chos rnams so // 'dun pa bskyed de /
T02D1198:24a-15: go cha'i brtson 'grus 'di ltar bya'o zhes par ro //
T02D1198:24a-16: 'bad do ste sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyis so //
T02D1198:24a-18: skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis so //
T02D1198:24a-19: sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par 'jog ste thabs kyi brtson 'grus kyis so //
T02D1198:24a-20: de la sems zhum pa na rab tu 'dzin cing gzengs stod par byed pa'o //
T02D1198:24a-21: rgod pa'i sems ni yang dag par 'jog ste mngon par sdud par byed do //
T02D1198:24a-22: dge ba rnams ni byang chub kyi sems dang sbyin
T02D1198:24a-23: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa 'khor
T02D1198:24a-25: rang dang gzhan la phan pa 'dod pa rnams kyis
T02D1198:24a-26: blang bar bya ba nyid kyis na gzung bar bya
T02D1198:24a-27: bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir chos rnams so //
T02D1198:24a-28: de skyes pa rnams rgyun gyis gnas pa'i ched du ste tshogs kyi lam du'o //
T02D1198:24a-29: dpag tu med pa'i bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa
T02D1198:24a-30: dang tshad med pa la sogs pa'i thabs rnams kyis
T02D1198:24a-31: bsgom pa ste / sbyor ba'i lam du ji ltar slar yang 'byung bar 'gyur bltar ro //
T02D1198:24a-32: mthong ba'i lam du yongs su rdzogs pa ste ji
T02D1198:24a-33: ltar rigs par 'phel bar ji ltar 'gyur ba ltar
T02D1198:24a-34: ro // yongs su ma rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs
T02D1198:24a-35: pa ni dri ma med pa la sogs par bsgom
T02D1198:24a-36: pa'i lam la ste ji ltar rigs par yangs pa
T02D1198:24a-37: nyid du ji ltar 'gyur ba ltar ro //
T02D1198:24a-38: yang 'byung ba dang 'phel ba dang yangs pa nyid
T02D1198:24a-39: ces pa kun sdud pa ste 'dun pa bskyed pa
T02D1198:24a-40: la sogs pa bya ba'i khyad par rnams so //
T02D1198:24b-0: rdzu 'phrul ni phun sum tshogs pa @24b ste mngon
T02D1198:24b-1: par shes pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang mi
T02D1198:24b-2: 'jigs pa nyid la sogs pa 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1198:24b-4: rdzu 'phrul gyi bzhi ste rgyu rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //
T02D1198:24b-5: de rnams kyang bzhi rnams te /
T02D1198:24b-6: 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang brtson 'grus kyi ting
T02D1198:24b-7: nge 'dzin dang sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang dpyod
T02D1198:24b-9: de ltar na kha cig 'dun pa drag po nyid
T02D1198:24b-10: kho nas yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis sems
T02D1198:24b-11: nang du 'jog pa la sems rtse gcig pa nyid
T02D1198:24b-12: kyi mtshan nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin gus par
T02D1198:24b-13: bya ste sbyor ba'o stobs las skye'o //
T02D1198:24b-14: kha cig yang dag par spong ba'i brtson 'grus rnams
T02D1198:24b-15: kyis mi dge ba spong ba dang dge ba bskyed
T02D1198:24b-16: pa la shin tu rab tu sbyor ba la'o //
T02D1198:24b-17: kha cig zhi gnas dang rab tu 'dzin pa dang
T02D1198:24b-18: btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan sems rnams kyis yongs su
T02D1198:24b-19: sbyong ba la'o // kha cig ni ci bdag mi dge ba phra mo rnams kun du spyod dam //
T02D1198:24b-20: gang bdag yongs su dpyad par bya'o zhes yang dag par nye bar 'jog pa la'o //
T02D1198:24b-21: der de rnams ni 'dun pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams te /
T02D1198:24b-22: 'di rnams skyes pa na rmugs pa dang gnyid dang
T02D1198:24b-23: rgod pa dang 'gyod pa dang phrag dog dang ser
T02D1198:24b-24: sna dang ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa
T02D1198:24b-25: dang khro ba dang sdig pa sbed pa'i ngo bo
T02D1198:24b-26: 'chab pa zhes pa kun nas dkris pa bcu po
T02D1198:24b-27: thub pa'i dgongs pa'i rgyan du rnam par phye ba
T02D1198:24b-28: rnams ring du gyur pa na /
T02D1198:24b-29: 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang
T02D1198:24b-30: ma rig pa dang the tshom dang 'jig tshogs la
T02D1198:24b-31: lta ba dang / mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang /
T02D1198:24b-32: log par lta ba dang lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1198:24b-33: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa zhes
T02D1198:24b-34: pa bag la nyal bcu bo thub pa'i dgongs pa'i
T02D1198:24b-35: rgyan du rnam par phye ba rnams spang ba'i ched
T02D1198:24b-36: du yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis brtson 'grus
T02D1198:24b-37: rtsom pa kho na'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi
T02D1198:24b-38: skyon le lo dang dmigs pa brjed pa dang /
T02D1198:24b-39: bying pa dang rgod pa dang /
T02D1198:24b-40: 'du mi byed pa dang 'du byed pa zhes pa
T02D1198:24b-41: drug gi gnyen po'i phyogs spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad
T02D1198:25a-1: dang rtsol ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang dran
T02D1198:25a-2: pa dang shes bzhin dang sems pa dang btang snyoms
T02D1198:25a-3: shes pa'o // de la dang po bzhi rnams le lo'i gnyen po ste /
T02D1198:25a-4: de ltar ni ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan rnams
T02D1198:25a-5: la yod pa nyid dang yon tan can nyid dang
T02D1198:25a-6: nus pa nyid du mngon par yid ches pa'i mtshan
T02D1198:25a-7: nyid can gyi dad pas de la rnal 'byor pa
T02D1198:25a-8: rnams mngon par 'dod pa skye zhing /
T02D1198:25a-10: de las lus dang sems las su rung ba nyid de de las le lo ldog go //
T02D1198:25a-11: dran pa ni dmigs pa brjed pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs so //
T02D1198:25a-12: shes bzhin ni bying ba dang rgod pa dag gi gnyen po ste /
T02D1198:25a-13: des de dag nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro /
T02D1198:25a-14: de la sems bying ba'i rgyu ni gnyis te /
T02D1198:25a-15: lus dang yid dag lji ba nyid du gyur pas sems dmigs pa rtogs pa la /
T02D1198:25a-16: las su mi rung ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid can rmugs pa dang /
T02D1198:25a-17: rnam par shes pa lnga 'jug pa dang 'gal ba'i
T02D1198:25a-18: chos yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang blun par
T02D1198:25a-19: 'gyur ba'i rgyu shes pa 'di lta bu'i mtshan nyid
T02D1198:25a-21: rmugs pa dang gnyid dag gi zas ni rmya ba
T02D1198:25a-22: dang mi dga' ba dang glal ba dang zas la
T02D1198:25a-23: snyoms ma shes pa dang sems zhum pa nyid ces
T02D1198:25a-25: rgod pas ni 'gyod pa nye bar mtshon par byed de /
T02D1198:25a-26: de dag gi zas ni nye du'i rtog pa dang
T02D1198:25a-27: ljongs kyi rnam par rtog pa dang mi 'chi ba'i
T02D1198:25a-29: brgyad pa dang brtses pa la yongs su spyad pa dran pa zhes pa bzhi rnams so //
T02D1198:25a-30: de dag gi bya ba ni sems rnam par ma zhi bar byed pa'o //
T02D1198:25a-31: bying ba dang rgod pa dang rab tu ma zhi
T02D1198:25a-32: ba'i dus na ni rtsol ba med pa skyon te
T02D1198:25a-33: de'i gnyen por sems pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1198:25a-34: bying ba dang rgod pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba na /
T02D1198:25a-35: gang gi tshe sems rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba de'i tshe rtsol ba'i skyon te /
T02D1198:25a-36: de'i tshe de'i gnyen por btang snyoms sgom par bya'o //
T02D1198:25a-37: spong ba'i rgyu brgyad po 'di rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin las su rung bar 'gyur zhing /
T02D1198:25a-38: de yis rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams rdzogs par byed do //
T02D1198:25a-39: 'di yang 'dir zhi gnas kyi rim pa ste /
T02D1198:25b-0: thog mar byang chub sems dpa' nang du @25b ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa la sems 'jog go //
T02D1198:25b-1: de nas gzhan du 'gro ba bkag pa las rgyun gyis rab tu 'jug par byed do //
T02D1198:25b-2: sems rang bzhin gyis g-yo ba nyid kyi phyir ci
T02D1198:25b-3: zhig ltar gzhan du 'gro ba na de rtogs nas
T02D1198:25b-4: myur du sdud par byed do //
T02D1198:25b-5: gong nas gong du phra bar byed pas sems de kho na la 'jog par byed do //
T02D1198:25b-6: ting nge 'dzin la dga' bar byed do //
T02D1198:25b-7: ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan mthong ba la ste /
T02D1198:25b-8: de yang ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar
T02D1198:25b-9: gyi yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa thams cad
T02D1198:25b-10: do // mi dga' ba zhi bar byed de //
T02D1198:25b-11: rnam par g-yeng ba'i skyon rnams mthong ba las te /
T02D1198:25b-12: de rnams kyang mnar med pa ji srid pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad do //
T02D1198:25b-13: brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba la sogs pa skyes pa rnams nye bar zhi bar byed de /
T02D1198:25b-15: de ltar rnam pa bdun rnams kyis skyon dang bral
T02D1198:25b-16: ba'i sems rtsol ba las rang gi ngang gis 'byung
T02D1198:25b-17: bar byed do // rang gi ngang gis zhugs nas
T02D1198:25b-18: rang nyid las rtsol ba med par rang gi dang
T02D1198:25b-19: gis 'byung ba nyid kyis yang dag par dmigs pa
T02D1198:25b-21: de ltar gang gi tshe dmigs pa de la mngon
T02D1198:25b-22: par 'du bya ba mang bar 'byung ba nyid kyis
T02D1198:25b-23: ji srid 'dod par sems rab tu 'jug par 'gyur
T02D1198:25b-24: ba de'i tshe zhi gnas rdzogs par rig par bya'o
T02D1198:25b-25: // sgom pa'i rim pa 'di kho na gsungs pa 'dun pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:25b-26: 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang spong ba'i 'du byed rnams dang ldan pa /
T02D1198:25b-27: nyon mongs pa rnams las dben pa /
T02D1198:25b-28: srid pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid 'dod chags dang bral ba /
T02D1198:25b-29: sdug bsngal 'gog pa ste de rnams la brten pa'o //
T02D1198:25b-30: rnam par spong ba ni rdzas thams cad mchog tu
T02D1198:25b-31: 'dor ba ste de'i ched du yongs su bsgyur ba'o
T02D1198:25b-32: // shin tu rab tu bzung ba ni rgod pa'o //
T02D1198:25b-33: dbang byed pa'i phyir dbang po ste /
T02D1198:25b-34: dad pa la sogs pa lnga rnams 'jig rten las
T02D1198:25b-35: 'das pa'i chos bskyed pa'i ched du bdag po nyid
T02D1198:25b-36: thob pa ni dbang po rnams su 'gyur te /
T02D1198:25b-37: dad pa'i dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi dbang po
T02D1198:26a-0: dang dran pa'i dbang po dang ting nge 'dzin @26a
T02D1198:26a-1: * // gyi dbang po dang shes rab kyi dbang po'o //
T02D1198:26a-2: de la bden pa dang dkon mchog gsum dang las
T02D1198:26a-3: kyi 'bras bu rnams la mngon par yid ches pa
T02D1198:26a-5: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la shin tu rab
T02D1198:26a-6: tu sbyor ba po la rtags mthong ba las gong
T02D1198:26a-7: ma'i khyad par skye ba la nges pa skye ba'i
T02D1198:26a-8: phyir / ston pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D1198:26a-9: kyi rtogs pa la mngon par yid ches pa skye
T02D1198:26a-10: phyir / ste / de 'di'i dad pa'i dbang po'o //
T02D1198:26a-11: dad pa lhag pa las brtson 'grus la sogs pa rnams lhag pa nyid de /
T02D1198:26a-12: de'i phyir dbang po lnga rnams su 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:26a-13: de rnams de zhes pa la sogs pas gsungs te /
T02D1198:26a-14: 'dod pa na spyod pa ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'o //
T02D1198:26a-15: 'jig rten pa ni de kho na nyid ma rtogs pa'o //
T02D1198:26a-16: yang dag pa'i lta ba ni chos thams cad bdag
T02D1198:26a-17: med pa nyid du mos pa'i mtshan nyid can dang
T02D1198:26a-19: dad par byed de yod pa nyid la sogs par yid ches par byed do //
T02D1198:26a-21: dbang po rnams kho na bsgom pa bzhin pa ni de ltar 'phel te /
T02D1198:26a-22: ji ltar bdud la sogs pa rnams dang ma dad
T02D1198:26a-23: pa la sogs pa mi mthun phyogs rnams kyis thub
T02D1198:26a-24: par dka' ba nyid las gzhom du med pa nyid
T02D1198:26a-25: kyi phyir stobs zhes bya ba 'thob po zhes gsungs
T02D1198:26a-26: pa / lnga zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:26a-27: de la zhes pa la sogs pa la mthong ba'i
T02D1198:26a-28: lam la ji lta ba'i yang dag par rtogs pa
T02D1198:26a-30: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ngo //
T02D1198:26a-31: de'i yan lag rnams ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnams so //
T02D1198:26a-32: de la chos rnam par 'byed pa dang brtson 'grus
T02D1198:26a-33: dang dga' ba zhes pa gsum rnams ni lhag mthong
T02D1198:26a-34: gi phyogs dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang ting
T02D1198:26a-35: nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms rnams ni zhi gnas kyi
T02D1198:26a-36: gi phyogs dang / phyogs te / dran pa ni gnyi ga'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1198:26a-37: dga' ba ni gang dmigs pa de kho na la yid dga' ba nyid do //
T02D1198:26a-38: ting nge 'dzin ni brtag par bya ba'i dngos po la sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
T02D1198:26a-39: de la dran pa ni gnas kyi yan lag ste
T02D1198:26a-40: thams cad rnams de la brten pas 'jug pa'i phyir
T02D1198:26b-0: ro // chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa ni rang bzhin @26b gyi yan lag ste /
T02D1198:26b-1: byang chub ni de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:26b-2: brtson 'grus ni nges par 'byung ba'i yan lag ste /
T02D1198:26b-3: des thob bya mthar thug pa lhag par gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:26b-4: dga' ba ni phan yon gyi yan lag ste sems bde ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:26b-5: shin tu sbyangs pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang btang
T02D1198:26b-6: snyoms gsum rnams ni gang gis gang la brten nas
T02D1198:26b-7: gang zhig nyon mongs pa med pa zhes pas kun
T02D1198:26b-8: nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i yan lag ste /
T02D1198:26b-9: gang phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu gnas ngan
T02D1198:26b-10: len gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni shin tu sbyangs
T02D1198:26b-11: pa ste de'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa med
T02D1198:26b-12: pa'i rgyu'o // gnas ni ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D1198:26b-13: rang bzhin ni btang snyoms so //
T02D1198:26b-14: de ltar byang chub kyi yan lag 'di rnams thob
T02D1198:26b-15: pa las bdag nyid kyi mthong bas spang bar bya
T02D1198:26b-16: ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs par mthong nas bsgom
T02D1198:26b-17: pas spang bar bya ba rnams spang ba'i ched du
T02D1198:26b-18: phung po gsum po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
T02D1198:26b-19: pa bsgom mo zhes mdor ston pa /
T02D1198:26b-20: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ces pa ste /
T02D1198:26b-21: 'phags pa rnams ni slob pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
T02D1198:26b-22: de rnams kyis lam 'di nyon mongs pa las rnam
T02D1198:26b-23: par grol ba mngon du bya ba'i ched du bskyed
T02D1198:26b-24: par bya'o // de'i phyir 'di 'phags pa rnams kyi
T02D1198:26b-25: yan lag brgyad do zhes pa 'phags pa'i lam yan
T02D1198:26b-26: par bya'o // lag brgyad do // yan lag 'di rnams la nges pa kho na'i ste /
T02D1198:26b-27: lam la mnyam par gzhag pa la ni yang dag
T02D1198:26b-28: pa'i rtog pa dang dag dang las kyi mtha' dang
T02D1198:26b-29: 'tsho ba dang dran pa rnams mi srid do //
T02D1198:26b-30: 'o na lam la snyoms par zhugs pa la yan
T02D1198:26b-31: lag brgyad sgrub pa'i chos ci ltar 'gyur zhe na
T02D1198:26b-32: / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thob pa las
T02D1198:26b-33: de'i ngo bo'i zag pa med pa'i rnam par rig
T02D1198:26b-34: byed ma yin pa thob ste /
T02D1198:26b-35: gang thob pa las langs kyang log pa'i ngag la
T02D1198:26b-36: sogs pa rnams la mi 'jug cing yang dag pa'i
T02D1198:26b-37: ngag la sogs pa rnams la yang 'jug go //
T02D1198:26b-38: de'i phyir rgyu mtshan can la rgyu mtshan can btags pa las yan lag brgyad nyid de /
T02D1198:26b-39: rnam pa gzhan du na lam la snyoms par zhugs pa las 'gal lo //
T02D1198:27a-0: @27a * // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di yang tshangs
T02D1198:27a-1: pa mya ngan las 'das pa la phan par spyod
T02D1198:27a-2: pas tshangs par spyod par mdor gsungs so //
T02D1198:27a-3: 'di'i yang yang dag pa'i lta ba lus te lhag ma 'khor ro //
T02D1198:27a-4: de la yang dag pa'i lta ba dang rtog pa dang /
T02D1198:27a-5: rtsol ba rnams shes rab kyi phung po'o //
T02D1198:27a-6: yang dag pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rnams tshul khrims kyi phung po'o //
T02D1198:27a-7: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dag ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'o //
T02D1198:27a-8: de la yang dag pa'i lta ba ni byang chub
T02D1198:27a-9: kyi yan lag gi dus las gong du chos thams
T02D1198:27a-10: cad bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi yang dag
T02D1198:27a-11: pa ji lta ba rtogs pa rjes su 'jug pa
T02D1198:27a-12: dang / brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log par lta ba las ldog pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1198:27a-13: yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni rtogs pa de kho
T02D1198:27a-14: na'i rnam par 'jog pa las spang bar bya ba
T02D1198:27a-15: dang blang bar bya ba spong ba dang mngon du
T02D1198:27a-16: bya bar yid la byed pa dang dge ba 'ba'
T02D1198:27a-17: zhig sems pa'o // yang dag pa'i ngag ni yang
T02D1198:27a-18: dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi don rtogs par
T02D1198:27a-19: zhig sems pa'o // byed pa dang / brdzun du
T02D1198:27a-20: smra ba dang phra ma dang tshig rtsub po dang
T02D1198:27a-21: dag 'khyal pa las ldog pa'i rang bzhin yang ngo
T02D1198:27a-22: zhig sems pa'o // byed pa dang / // yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni /
T02D1198:27a-23: gang las gong na med pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bya ba ste /
T02D1198:27a-24: srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang
T02D1198:27a-25: 'dod pas log par spyod pa zhes bya ba lus
T02D1198:27a-26: kyi nyes par spyod pa la byed pa dang byed
T02D1198:27a-27: du 'jug pa dang rjes su yi rang ba las
T02D1198:27a-29: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni rigs pas bsags pa'i nor gyis 'tsho ba ste /
T02D1198:27a-30: tshul 'chos dang kha gsag la sogs pa log pa'i 'tsho ba las ldog pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:27a-31: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni brtson 'grus te rang
T02D1198:27a-32: dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang rjes
T02D1198:27a-33: su 'brel ba'i mngon par spro ba'o //
T02D1198:27a-34: yang dag pa'i dran pa ni ji ltar rtogs pa'i chos mi brjed pa nyid de /
T02D1198:27a-35: yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi dmigs pa dang rnam pa mngon du byed pa yang ngo //
T02D1198:27a-36: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bsgom par bya ba la sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
T02D1198:27b-0: de la mthong ba'i lam yongs su gcod pa yang dag pa'i @27b lta ba'o //
T02D1198:27b-1: gzhan go bar byed pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i ngag ste /
T02D1198:27b-2: yang dag pas kun nas bslang ba'i ngag gis de go bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:27b-3: gzhan yid ches par byed pa'i yan lag ni rnam
T02D1198:27b-4: pa gsum po yang dag pa'i ngag dang las kyi
T02D1198:27b-6: de rnams kyis ni rim pa ji lta bar gsum
T02D1198:27b-7: rnams la yid ches par 'gyur te gtam dang 'brel
T02D1198:27b-8: ba'i gtam rnam par nges pas shes rab la'o //
