T02D1198:78b-2: sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob //
T02D1198:78b-3: bsam gtan ye shes snyoms zhugs nas //
T02D1198:78b-4: mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur //
T02D1198:78b-5: srog gi rtsol bas nges par ni //
T02D1198:78b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs //
T02D1198:78b-7: 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis rtag par ni //
T02D1198:78b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'jug / rjes dran yang dag sbyor ba las //
T02D1198:78b-11: sgrib pa med dang ldan par 'gyur //
T02D1198:78b-13: ting nge 'dzin 'di kho na slob dpon klu sgrub zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1198:78b-14: sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon sangs rgyas //
T02D1198:78b-15: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol son //
T02D1198:78b-16: bya ba byas pa'i rnal 'byor che //
T02D1198:78b-17: bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas //
T02D1198:78b-18: 'di nyid gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1198:78b-19: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yin //
T02D1198:78b-20: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
T02D1198:78b-21: de bzhin kun gyi dbang phyug nyid //
T02D1198:78b-22: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin yang //
T02D1198:78b-23: rdzogs pa'i rim pa kho na ste //
T02D1198:78b-24: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang //
T02D1198:78b-25: gnyis su med par de bshad do //
T02D1198:78b-26: skye ba med la sogs pa'i sgra /
T02D1198:78b-27: gnyis med ye shes gsal byed rnams //
T02D1198:78b-28: thams cad 'di yi rjod byed de //
T02D1198:78b-29: der ni gzhan pa ma brjod do //
T02D1198:78b-30: gang g'a'i bye ma snyed lta yi //
T02D1198:78b-31: sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di nyid kyis //
T02D1198:78b-32: yod dang med pa'i rtog spangs pa //
T02D1198:78b-33: phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid 'grub //
T02D1198:78b-35: / sgom pa nye bar sdud de /
T02D1198:78b-36: dngos po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:78b-37: skyon rnams ni le lo la sogs pa sngar bshad pa rnams so //
T02D1198:78b-38: nyon mongs pa rnams dang las rnams dang skye ba
T02D1198:78b-39: zhes pa gsum ni kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams
T02D1198:78b-40: so // kun nas nyon mongs pa las phyir phyogs
T02D1198:78b-41: pa bya dka' ba yang ma yin no zhes sgrub
T02D1198:78b-42: so // pa gsungs pa / mi chud zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:78b-43: rnam par rtog pa thams cad kho na ni mun pa rnams te shes bya'i sgrib pa rnams so //
T02D1198:78b-44: g-yo ba ni ting nge 'dzin la mngon par mi dga' ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:79a-1: sogs ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnams so //
T02D1198:79a-2: bsgos pa ni bag chags so //
T02D1198:79a-3: gzung ba med ni rang gi ngo bo kho na med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:79a-4: de nyid kyi phyir 'dzin pa med de /
T02D1198:79a-5: de las gzhan pa'i gzung bar bya ba med pa'i phyir yang ngo //
T02D1198:79a-6: de kho na ste sems ni mya ngan 'das mchog ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D1198:79a-7: de las te sems las so //
T02D1198:79a-8: nus pa ni mi phod pa'i gnyen po nyid do //
T02D1198:79a-9: dpyad ces pa gcig dang gcig ma yin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba nyid la sogs pas so //
T02D1198:79a-10: de'i ste sems kyi rang bzhin te rang bzhin med pa nyid rang bzhin du ste /
T02D1198:79a-11: bdag nyid kyi gnyug ma'i ngo bor gyis shig /
T02D1198:79a-12: dngos med ces klog pa la ni sems kyi dngos
T02D1198:79a-13: med de / rang bzhin med pa nyid rang bzhin du gyis shig ces pa'i don to //
T02D1198:79a-14: des te rtog pa'i mun pas de nyid 'gyur /
T02D1198:79a-16: brtson pa ni byang chub kyi sems sgom pa la'o //
T02D1198:79a-17: sdig pa rnams las 'phags te ring du song ba rnams ni 'phags pa rnams so //
T02D1198:79a-19: de zhes pa bde ba nyid do //
T02D1198:79a-20: rjes su gnang ba ni bla ma rnams kyis so //
T02D1198:79a-21: dam tshig ni phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor te gtso bo dang phal pa yang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:79a-22: de ltar rgyun du rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom pa
T02D1198:79a-23: po la bya ba gzhan g-yeng ba'i ched du ba
T02D1198:79a-25: ci zhig ces pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1198:79a-26: sngags ni aom yig la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:79a-27: sku gzugs kyi nga rgyal ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lha'i nga rgyal lo //
T02D1198:79a-28: dam tshig ni bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:79a-29: 'dis ni rnam pa 'di lta bu'i lus dang ngag
T02D1198:79a-30: dang sems kyi bya ba yang mi bya na gzhan
T02D1198:79a-31: lta ci smos zhes gsungs so //
T02D1198:79a-32: zhen pa med pas ni ji ltar tshogs pa'i dam tshig bsten pa rjes su gnang ngo //
T02D1198:79a-33: 'o na des bya ba ci zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1198:79a-34: mtshon bya zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:79a-35: rang 'dod lha ni bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1198:79a-36: gang brtag pa gnyis par gsungs pa /
T02D1198:79a-37: byang chub sems ni lha nyid do //
T02D1198:79b-0: de'i rnal @79b 'byor mtshon par bya ba bskyed pa'i ched du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1198:79b-1: nam mkha' lta bu zhes pa de kho na nyid dang ro gcig pa'o //
T02D1198:79b-2: gnas ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1198:79b-3: padma'i tshal ni dur khrod do //
T02D1198:79b-4: gnas mngon par 'dod pa zhes rnam dbye bsgyur bas sbrel lo //
T02D1198:79b-6: man shes pa la'o zhes pa'am /
T02D1198:79b-7: ma nu rtogs pa la'o zhes pa'i phyir bklags pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1198:79b-8: gtso bo la mngon par yid ches pa'i phyir ji
T02D1198:79b-9: skad brjod pa'i phyag rgya chen po gnyis su med
T02D1198:79b-10: pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kho
T02D1198:79b-11: na sngags so // gal te yang rnam pa de
T02D1198:79b-12: lta bu'i ye shes bsgoms pas sgrib pa gnyis spangs
T02D1198:79b-13: nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob pa'i phyir yid
T02D1198:79b-14: skyob pa'i don gyis na de kho na sngags nyid
T02D1198:79b-15: du phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kho na'i dbang
T02D1198:79b-17: de'i phyir de nyid rang gi sems zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1198:79b-18: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1198:79b-19: 'on kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngags rnams kyi
T02D1198:79b-20: mtshan nyid ni sangs rgyas rnams thams cad kyis ma
T02D1198:79b-21: mdzad byed du ma bcug / rjes su yi rang
T02D1198:79b-24: chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di lta ste de
T02D1198:79b-25: bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang
T02D1198:79b-26: rung gnas pa kho na ste /
T02D1198:79b-27: chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1198:79b-28: sngags rnams kyi chos nyid de nas ji srid du
T02D1198:79b-29: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig
T02D1198:79b-30: rten du byung ba de'i tshe chos nyid de tshul
T02D1198:79b-31: sna tshogs dang dgongs pa sna tshogs rnams kyis bsam
T02D1198:79b-32: pa sna tshogs pa rnams la tshig sna tshogs rnams
T02D1198:79b-33: dang yi ge sna tshogs rnams dang bstan pa dang
T02D1198:79b-34: nges pa'i tshig dang dper brjod sna tshogs rnams kyis
T02D1198:79b-35: dang dbyangs dang rtog pa sna tshogs rnams kyis byin
T02D1198:79b-36: gyis brlabs nas sngags kyi tshig ston to zhes te
T02D1198:79b-37: nges pa'i tshig ni lha'i skad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:79b-38: de ltar na sngags shes pa nyid kyis 'di la
T02D1198:79b-39: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kho na srung ba
T02D1198:80a-0: bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa po'i bzhin du kun rdzob pa'i srung @80a * //
T02D1198:80a-1: bsngags klog pas ci bya zhes gsal bar byed do //
T02D1198:80a-2: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das mar gsungs pa /
T02D1198:80a-3: koo shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D1198:80a-4: pa de kho na de la bsrung ba dang 'gebs
T02D1198:80a-5: pa dang sba bar byed de /
T02D1198:80a-6: khyod kyis ci bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:80a-7: ji ltar gzhon nu ma'i zhes pa mdor bstan pa rgyas par ston te /
T02D1198:80a-8: shes rab thabs kyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:80a-9: dngos su zhes sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab
T02D1198:80a-10: ni skyes pa'i ma yin zhing sgom pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1198:80a-11: gyi thabs kyang bud med kyi ma yin no zhes
T02D1198:80a-12: pa'i don to // de'i phyir dngos su phyi rol
T02D1198:80a-13: gyi shes rab ma spangs nas sangs rgyas nyid ma
T02D1198:80a-14: yin pa kho na'o zhes sbrel lo //
T02D1198:80a-16: gang gi phyir gcig bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes
T02D1198:80a-17: rab 'di kho na'am gcig ste phyi rol gyi shes
T02D1198:80a-18: rab ma ni phyag rgya mngon sbyor ba ste phyi
T02D1198:80a-19: rol gyi phyag rgya dang mnyam par sbyor ba med
T02D1198:80a-20: pa dngos grub ste phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub
T02D1198:80a-21: mi ster te / phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang
T02D1198:80a-22: snyoms par 'jug pa kho na las ye shes bde
T02D1198:80a-23: ba chen po skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:80a-24: de nyid kyi phyir phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'i rnal
T02D1198:80a-25: 'byor ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi dngos
T02D1198:80a-26: su ba'i thabs su gsungs so //
T02D1198:80a-27: 'on kyang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la yang skyes pa
T02D1198:80a-28: dang bud med kyang rdzogs pa'i lha'i ngo bor bdag
T02D1198:80a-29: nyid lhag par mos par bya ste /
T02D1198:80a-30: de las kyang gnyis ka'i bdag nyid kyi shes rab tu 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa ste /
T02D1198:80a-31: gcig dang gcig ces pa'i gsung las so //
T02D1198:80a-32: bskyed pa'i rim pa la ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya gcig kyang 'gyur te /
T02D1198:80a-33: dngos grub kyi dus su ni de yang gnyis ka'i bdag nyid kho na'o //
T02D1198:80a-34: de'i phyir phyag rgya bzhi sbyar bya ste rim pa gnyis ka la yang ngo //
T02D1198:80a-35: de la rdzogs pa'i rim pa la phyi rol gyi
T02D1198:80a-36: shes rab ma ni las kyi phyag rgya ste 'khyud
T02D1198:80a-37: pa la sogs pa'i las kyi dga' ba ster zhes
T02D1198:80a-38: byas nas so // nang gi shes rab ma aa
T02D1198:80a-39: wa dh'u t'i'i stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa
T02D1198:80a-40: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i bdag nyid dang chos
T02D1198:80a-41: kyi dbyings ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1198:80b-0: bde ba chen @80b po'i rang bzhin bla na med
T02D1198:80b-1: pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni
T02D1198:80b-3: lha rnams sna tshogs pa sprul pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1198:80b-4: yang na las kyi phyag rgya de kho na bshad
T02D1198:80b-5: zin pa'i phyag rgya chen po kho na las dag
T02D1198:80b-6: pa mthar thug par gnas pa ni chos kyi phyag
T02D1198:80b-8: de ni sems kyi chos nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:80b-9: las kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag par sbyor ba
T02D1198:80b-10: ji ltar rigs par mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rnam
T02D1198:80b-11: par mdzes pa'i sku longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang
T02D1198:80b-12: mu mtha' med par sna tshogs pa mtha' yas pa'i
T02D1198:80b-13: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rnam par
T02D1198:80b-14: sprul pa'i sku ni skal pa dang ldan pa'i gdul
T02D1198:80b-15: bya'i skye bo rjes su 'dzin pa'i dus las mi
T02D1198:80b-16: 'da' ba'i phyir dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1198:80b-17: byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i sku ni
T02D1198:80b-18: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir dang
T02D1198:80b-19: / khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1198:80b-20: phyag rgya yang chos rnams la rgyas 'debs te gang
T02D1198:80b-21: rang gi ngo bo'o zhes gtso bor na byang chub
T02D1198:80b-23: de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ni phyag
T02D1198:80b-24: rgya gzhan yang phyag rgya dang 'dra ba phyag rgya'o
T02D1198:80b-25: // yang na chen po'i dga' ba len to zhes
T02D1198:80b-26: pas phyag rgya chen po ste mtshan dang dpe byad
T02D1198:80b-27: mchog tu 'bar ba phyag dang zhal dang phyag mtshan
T02D1198:80b-28: la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i gzugs longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1198:80b-29: // pa'i sku'o // dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni
T02D1198:80b-30: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin so so rang gi
T02D1198:80b-31: rig par bya ba chos kyi sku ste /
T02D1198:80b-32: dam tshig ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes byas nas so //
T02D1198:80b-33: chos kyi phyag rgya ni chos dang longs spyod rdzogs
T02D1198:80b-34: pa'i sku'i byin rlabs las rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
T02D1198:80b-35: chos kyi de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa'i
T02D1198:80b-37: las kyi phyag rgya ni bya ba sgrub pa'i ngo
T02D1198:80b-38: bo nyid kyi phyir sprul pa sna tshogs pa rnams
T02D1198:80b-39: kyis bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i phyir sprul pa'i
T02D1198:80b-40: sku'o // yang na las kyi phyag rgya ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D1198:80b-41: chos kyi phyag rgya ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1198:80b-42: phyag rgya chen po ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1198:81a-0: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni byang chub kyi sems te bde ba @81a * //
T02D1198:81a-1: chen po dang stong pa nyid dang snying rje rnams kyi dang /
T02D1198:81a-2: chos rnams thams cad kyi yang 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:81a-3: 'dus pa ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams de'i rang
T02D1198:81a-4: bzhin du nye bar dmigs par bya ba nyid kyi
T02D1198:81a-5: phyir ro // rnam par gzhag pa 'di yang 'di
T02D1198:81a-6: skad bdag gis zhes pa'i rnam par bshad par byas
T02D1198:81a-7: phyir ro // so // phyag rgya bzhi po 'di
T02D1198:81a-8: rnams kyang so sor phyag rgya bzhi'i bdag nyid rnams
T02D1198:81a-9: so zhes 'di kho na las shes rab can rnams
T02D1198:81a-10: kyis rnam par shes par bya ste /
T02D1198:81a-12: rgya che bas 'jigs pa las so //
T02D1198:81a-13: bskyed pa'i rim pa la ni phyi rol gyi shes
T02D1198:81a-14: rab ma kho na mngon par 'dod pa'i lha mo'i
T02D1198:81a-15: gzugs su bsgom pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1198:81a-16: rang 'dra'i bud med ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes pa ming gzhan no //
T02D1198:81a-17: lus la bsgoms pa'i h'um yig la sogs pa'ang chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1198:81a-18: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni sa bon la sogs
T02D1198:81a-19: pa las rdzogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor 'dus
T02D1198:81a-20: pa'i spro ba dang sdud pa la sogs pa'i byed
T02D1198:81a-21: pa can rnams te mtshan ma yang ngo //
T02D1198:81a-22: gtso bo'i lha'i sku rang nyid ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1198:81a-23: de las 'phros pa'i lha'i 'khor lo yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1198:81a-24: rnam par gzhag pa 'di thams cad kyang rgyud gzhan
T02D1198:81a-25: rnams su bcom ldan 'das kho nas gdul bya'o bsam
T02D1198:81a-26: pa'i dbye bas rjes su 'jug pas mdzad pa'o //
T02D1198:81a-27: de dang de'i gzhung rnams ni mangs bas skrag pa las 'dir ma brjod do //
T02D1198:81a-28: 'di ni rnam pa gzhan du rnam par 'jog ste /
T02D1198:81a-29: gti mug ces pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1198:81a-30: 'dod chags zhes pa rnam par dag pa'i 'dod chags te /
T02D1198:81a-31: 'od dpag tu med pa dang rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1198:81a-32: de ni rnam par dag pa'i bde ba'i tshor ba dang nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1198:81a-33: ma dag pa'i gnas skabs su ni tshor ba kho na nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1198:81a-34: bde ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba la nga bde
T02D1198:81a-35: ba can no zhes pa la sogs pa nga'o snyam
T02D1198:81a-36: pa'i nga rgyal kun du spyod pa'i phyir ro zhes
T02D1198:81a-38: rig ma ni phyi rol gyi'o //
T02D1198:81b-0: gnyis @81b ka ste rig ma dang thabs dag gi'o //
T02D1198:81b-2: rdzogs pa'i rim pas sam bskyed pa'i rim pas so //
T02D1198:81b-3: lha'i gzugs su bsgom pa yang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:81b-4: gti mug las zhes pa la sogs pa phyis pa la lnga pa'o //
T02D1198:81b-5: zhi ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do ;
T02D1198:81b-6: /'di yang rnam par dpyad pas chos thams cad rang
T02D1198:81b-7: bzhin med pa ma rtogs pa'i ngo bo can gti
T02D1198:81b-8: mug gi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir zhi ba nyid
T02D1198:81b-9: de / zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba nyid kyi phyir yang ngo //
T02D1198:81b-10: snying rje chen po kho nas phyir rol gyi khro
T02D1198:81b-11: bo'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir khro ba ni mi
T02D1198:81b-12: bskyod pa dang don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1198:81b-13: khro ba ni sems can dang sems can ma yin pa'i yul la sems 'khrug pa'o //
T02D1198:81b-14: 'dir ni zhe sdang dang phrag dog kyang khro bar brjod par bya ste /
T02D1198:81b-15: phrag dog ni khro ba'i rgyu can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:81b-16: chags pa ni snang ba mtha' yas dang rin chen 'byung ldan no ;
T02D1198:81b-17: /'dod chags ni 'dir 'dod chags dang nga rgyal yang ste /
T02D1198:81b-18: pha rol po rnams kyi gti mug dang zhe sdang
T02D1198:81b-19: dang phrag dog dang 'dod chags dang nga rgyal yang
T02D1198:81b-20: mngon par mtshon nas de dang de rnam par dag
T02D1198:81b-21: pa'i bya ba byed do zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:81b-22: de'i don can rab byed ces pa de ste de
T02D1198:81b-23: dang de rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo don te

T02D1198:95a-23: nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni stong pa nyid du nges par 'dzin pas bcom pa'o ;
T02D1198:95a-24: /'chi bdag gi bdud ni ma skyes shing mi skye bas bcom pa'o //

T02D1198:95a-28: 'chi bdag gi bdud dbang phyug chen po dkar po dang /
T02D1198:95a-29: lha'i bu'i bdud lha'i dbang po kham ser ro //
T02D1198:95a-30: 'jigs pa'i zhes pa ni 'jigs par byed pa'i'o //

T02D1198:95a-36: phyir ram gcer bu nyid kyi phyir mi sdog pa'o
T02D1198:95a-37: // sgeg pa'i rjes su byed pa gang yin pa de ni dgod pa zhes grags so //
T02D1198:95a-38: 'jigs pa'i dus su dus gcig tu shar ba'i nyi
T02D1198:95b-0: ma'i dkyil @95b 'khor drag po rnams dang nye bar
T02D1198:95b-1: mtshungs pa'i spyan rnams kyis drag po'o //
T02D1198:95b-2: lha dang lha ma yin mtha' dag skrag par byed pa'i gzugs nyid kyis 'jigs su rung ba'o //
T02D1198:95b-3: rnam par rtog pa mtha' dag pas nye bar mi

T02D1198:95b-24: gnas byed bsam 'gyur bdag nyid de //

T02D1198:95b-26: ro mtha'i bar du gnas par byed //
T02D1198:95b-27: ces pa gnas byed rnams te /

T02D1198:95b-29: dgod bro dga' dang mya ngan dang //
T02D1198:95b-30: khro dang spro ba de bzhin 'jigs //

T02D1198:95b-32: gnas byed bsam 'gyur rab tu bsgrags //

T02D1198:95b-38: 'dren pa de phyir tshul yin no //
T02D1198:95b-39: sdud dang lus ngag snying stobs kyi //

T02D1198:95b-42: tu gsal ba'i gos dang byug pa dang phreng ba
T02D1198:95b-43: dang so rtsi dang rgyan la sogs pa ni kun

T02D1198:95b-48: rgyan gyi gar ni rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1198:95b-49: phreng du bya ba rnam lngar bshad //
T02D1198:95b-50: kun nas 'bigs pa rna rgyan sogs //

T02D1198:96a-0: @96a * // rked rgyan skud pa dpung rgyan sogs //
T02D1198:96a-1: bcing bar bya ba rnams su bstan //
T02D1198:96a-2: rkang gdub rkang rgyan bcas pa dang //
T02D1198:96a-3: rkang 'ching gos kyi rigs rnams ni //

T02D1198:96a-5: do shal la sogs gdags byar 'dod //
T02D1198:96a-6: dkris dang brdal ba nyid dang ni //

T02D1198:96a-15: rab gsal ngo bo snying stobs te //
T02D1198:96a-17: spu ldang thim dang rengs pa dang //

T02D1198:96a-27: dga' ba khro ba 'jigs pa dang //

T02D1198:96a-30: rdul gyi rgyu ru shes par bya //
T02D1198:96a-31: grang dang dro dang 'jigs dang nad //

T02D1198:96a-33: 'dar ba'i grang dang dga' dag dang //
T02D1198:96a-34: rims dang khro ba 'jigs rnams so //
T02D1198:96a-35: myos dang dpag med khro ba las //
T02D1198:96a-36: dbyangs kyi dbye ba yang dag 'byung //
T02D1198:96a-37: dga' dang phrag dog nyen las byung //
T02D1198:96a-38: mchi ma yod pa rnam gsum nyid //
T02D1198:96a-39: gang yang ro gcig la mthong zhing //

T02D1198:96a-42: / skyed pa 'khrul pa can rnams so //

T02D1198:96a-44: dang dogs pa dang mi bzod pa dang dregs pa

T02D1198:96b-5: byed dang / gdung ba dang smyo ba dang 'chi
T02D1198:96b-6: ba dang skrag pa dang rtog zhes pa sum cu
T02D1198:96b-7: byed dang / rtsa gsum mo // mgo dang lag pa rked pa brang //
T02D1198:96b-8: rkang pa logs dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1198:96b-9: yan lag nye ba'i yan lag ldan //
T02D1198:96b-10: yan lag drug pa'i gar bsdus pa'o //
T02D1198:96b-11: mgo dang logs dang brang dang rked pa dang lag

T02D1198:96b-13: so // smin ma dang mig dang sna dang mchu dang 'gram pa dang /
T02D1198:96b-14: ao sko rnams nye ba'i yan lag go //
T02D1198:96b-15: lta stangs ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa ste de la /

T02D1198:96b-19: cung zad gyen zlog mig gis gang //
T02D1198:96b-20: steng gi mig lpags mdzes brdzes pa //

T02D1198:96b-22: ngo mtshar ba yi lta stangs 'dod //

T02D1198:96b-24: sbubs ni rtag tu cher ma phye //
T02D1198:96b-25: mig rgyan mu ku la de 'gyur //
T02D1198:96b-27: rdzi ma'i rtse mo g-yo bzhin pa //
T02D1198:96b-28: steng gi mig lpags snum mdzes pa //
T02D1198:96b-29: dri dang reg pa dga' ba la //
T02D1198:96b-30: lta stangs mu ku l'a ru 'dod //
T02D1198:96b-31: 'jam la cung zhig bskums pa gang //
T02D1198:96b-32: cung zad 'dzum zhing de bzhin mdzes //
T02D1198:96b-33: lta stangs rol pa zhes bya ste ;
T02D1198:96b-34: / bud med rnams kyis phyed lta ba'o //
T02D1198:96b-36: lta stangs so drug bstan bcos su //
T02D1198:96b-37: bsam 'gyur ro yi rten rnams bshad //
T02D1198:96b-38: byed pa rnams ni khyad par las //
T02D1198:96b-39: brgyad kyi lhag pa'i brgya ru bshad //
T02D1198:96b-40: lus sgyur sum cu rtsa gnyis te //
T02D1198:96b-41: de bzhin dbyung ba bzhi rnams so //

T02D1198:96b-43: slob mas rtogs pa'i ched du bshad //
T02D1198:96b-44: de rnams rgya cher nges byas pa //
T02D1198:96b-45: bha ra ta sogs su shes bya //
T02D1198:96b-46: bsam pa'i 'gyur ba la sogs pa 'di rnams kyang
T02D1198:97a-0: ji ltar rigs par rgyud 'dir rtogs par @97a *
T02D1198:97a-2: khyad par du bcom ldan 'das kyi gar gyi kun

T02D1198:97a-4: pa'i rgyud la sogs pa rnams su nye bar bsgrags
T02D1198:97a-5: te / bdag gis rdo rje phreng bar rgyas pa
T02D1198:97a-6: dang bcas par rnam par phye'o zhes pas 'dir zhar
T02D1198:97a-7: byung rgya che bas chog go //
T02D1198:97a-8: 'dis mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal byas pas ni de skad brjod do //
T02D1198:97a-9: gar stabs ni drag po'i gar ro //
T02D1198:97a-10: ji ltar 'jigs par byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sku mdog nag po'o //
T02D1198:97a-11: spro bar bya zhes pa ni spro bar byed pa'o //
T02D1198:97a-13: dga' ba ni dga' rtsed de khyad dga'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1198:97a-14: de kho na gnyis gnyis te rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:97a-15: de la snyoms zhugs pa ni de sngon du mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:97a-16: de kho na nyid 'dis cis phyag rgyar bya zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1198:97a-17: bdag med ma zhes pa bdag med ma dang lhan cig sbyor ba /
T02D1198:97a-18: dba' rlabs med pa spros pa med pa'i bde ba lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1198:97a-19: de thob pa ni thob par gyur pa'o //
T02D1198:97a-20: de kho na nyid 'dis ci zhig rgyas gdab ce na /
T02D1198:97a-21: gsungs pa dba' rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1198:97a-22: spros pa thams cad kyi gnyen po nyid kyi phyir
T02D1198:97a-23: dba' rlabs med pa gang rang gi ngo bo yin
T02D1198:97a-24: pa kye'i rdo rje'i ngo bo ste /
T02D1198:97a-25: de 'di la yod pas na de skad bshad do //
T02D1198:97a-26: rnam par gtsigs pa ni mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'o //
T02D1198:97a-27: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i spyan gyis phyug pa ni zhal brgyad la /
T02D1198:97a-28: so sor dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:97a-29: tshigs bcad 'di'i rjes thogs su sgeg pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bshad gcig rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1198:97a-30: zhal thams cad ni sgeg pa'i ro ste /
T02D1198:97a-31: dkar po la zhi ba dang nag po la drag
T02D1198:97a-32: po dang lhag ma rnams la ji ltar rigs par
T02D1198:97a-33: ro // gshor ni thod po chang gis bkang ba'o ;
T02D1198:97a-34: / thod pa ni khrag gis gang ba'o //
T02D1198:97a-35: rnam pa 'di lta'i cho ga yis //
T02D1198:97a-36: zhes pa bcom ldan 'das rdzogs pa'i cho ga byas
T02D1198:97a-37: nas phyung ba'i goo r'i la sogs pa rnams dgod

T02D1198:97a-39: dang ro hi ta'i nya dang bcas pa'i khrag gis
T02D1198:97b-1: / chom rkun ma'i g-yon pa dag na lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa'o //
T02D1198:97b-2: rab rmongs ma ni g-yung mo ste //
T02D1198:97b-3: de'i g-yon pa dag na bdud rtsi lnga'i thod pa la gnas pa'i ce spyang dang /
T02D1198:97b-5: ro langs ma dkar po dang bsres pa'i ser po ste ;
T02D1198:97b-6: g-yon pa dag na thod pa gzung ba na chang
T02D1198:97b-7: dang gci ba dag dang g-yas pa khrag dang bcas
T02D1198:97b-8: pa'i thod pa na rus sbal lo //
T02D1198:97b-9: pukka s'i'i g-yas pa dag na shas gang ba'i thod
T02D1198:97b-10: pa dag la gnas pa'i seng ge dang mchog sbyin
T02D1198:97b-11: gyi phyag rgya'o // gtum mo'i g-yas pa na khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa la stag go //
T02D1198:97b-12: gha sma r'i ljang gu cung zad ser ba g-yon
T02D1198:97b-13: pa dag na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i me thab dang
T02D1198:97b-14: dgra sta dang / g-yas pa dag na tshil gyis
T02D1198:97b-15: gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i sbrul dang mi
T02D1198:97b-17: sha ba r'i'i g-yas pa dag na khu ba dang

T02D1198:97b-25: 'di rnams kyi yang sa bon gyi rim pa bzhin dgod do //
T02D1198:97b-26: de la goo r'i dang chom rkun ma dang ro langs ma dang /
T02D1198:97b-27: gha sma r'i dang pukka s'i dang ri khrod ma
T02D1198:97b-28: dang gtum mo dang rab rmongs ma rnams rim pa

T02D1198:97b-32: pa dang rab tu rmongs pa'i lta stangs can gyi

T02D1198:97b-36: rta gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi gtso bo dang

T02D1198:100b-18: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis gzhi bsgom par bya zhing

T02D1198:100b-34: brlabs pa'i rdo rje bsgoms nas /

T02D1198:104b-28: // pas so // zla ba chu shel nor bu
T02D1198:104b-29: ni mtshan ma med pa'i zla ba gang ba lta
T02D1198:104b-30: // pas so // bu ste / de'i 'od lta bu gang gi 'od yin pa ste /
T02D1198:104b-31: zla pa'i 'od can zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:104b-32: 'di ni gdan yang nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D1198:104b-33: drag mo nyid na yang lha mo zla ba'i gdan
T02D1198:104b-34: dang zla ba'i 'od can no zhes pa'i don to
T02D1198:104b-35: // de ltar thams cad ces pa de las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor ma bcu bzhi rnams so //
T02D1198:104b-36: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin las zhes pa so
T02D1198:104b-37: sor rtog pa dang bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes
T02D1198:104b-38: dag kyang de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:104b-39: 'di nyid kyi rgyas par ston pa gsungs pa /
T02D1198:104b-40: shes rab a'a li zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:104b-41: yi ge'i dbye ba zhes pa /
T02D1198:105a-1: a'im aum aam lim aem aeem aom a'um rim r'im
T02D1198:105a-2: l'im aoom aam zhes pa'i sa bon gyi dbye ba
T02D1198:105a-3: rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1198:105a-4: phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1198:105a-5: zhes pa de dang de'i don rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1198:105a-6: rang bzhin du rnal 'byor ma rnams bsgom par bya'o
T02D1198:105a-7: // 'di lta kho nar ni ma yin no zhes ston to //
T02D1198:105a-8: goo r'i la sogs pa rnams dang rdo rje ma la sogs pa phyogs su gnas pa rnams te /
T02D1198:105a-9: pukka s'i la sogs pa rnams dbang ldan la sogs
T02D1198:105a-10: pa'i mtshams su gnas pa ste g-yas skor gyis so
T02D1198:105a-11: // 'og srung ngo zhes pa 'og srung ma ste /
T02D1198:105a-12: de bzhin du steng srung ma'o //
T02D1198:105a-13: de nas kyang su dag ce na /
T02D1198:105a-15: mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod ces pa ste sa
T02D1198:105a-16: spyod ma srid pa'i rang bzhin gyis gnas pa ste
T02D1198:105a-17: / 'og tu 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:105a-18: de nyid kyi phyir de 'og zhal ma'o //
T02D1198:105a-19: mkha' spyod ma mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1198:105a-20: gyis gnas pa ste steng du 'gro ba nyid kyi
T02D1198:105a-21: phyir ro // de nyid kyi phyir de steng du lta ba'o //
T02D1198:105a-22: dngos su gnas pa zhes pa bdag med ma'i 'og nub kyi ngos su sa spyod ma dang /
T02D1198:105a-23: steng shar gyi ngos su mkha' spyod ma'o //
T02D1198:105a-24: kha dog sna tshogs pa zhes pa phyi'i 'phar mar
T02D1198:105a-25: gnas pa'i brgyad po rnams phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil
T02D1198:105a-26: 'khor bzhin du ser mo la sogs pa'i mdog can
T02D1198:105a-27: rnams so // cher drag pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams thams cad rnams kyis te /
T02D1198:105a-28: khyad par ni rtsa ba kho na la'o //
T02D1198:105a-29: 'khor lo can la sogs pa rnams ni mgo dang
T02D1198:105a-30: rna ba dang mgul ba dang lag pa dang rked
T02D1198:105a-31: pa rnams la'o // 'di 'dra ba zhes pa kha dog sngon por mtshungs pa ma gtogs pa'o //
T02D1198:105a-32: bdag med ma ci lta bu zhe na /
T02D1198:105a-35: khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa'o //
T02D1198:105a-36: 'od 'bar zhes pa sku yis 'bar zhing sems kyi 'od do //
T02D1198:105a-37: mdog sngon zhes pa 'dis nang gi 'phar mar bzhugs
T02D1198:105a-38: pa rnams dang sa spyod ma dang mkha' spyod ma
T02D1198:105a-39: yang mdog sngon mo rnams so zhes gsungs so //
T02D1198:105a-40: de zhes pa bdag med ma'o //
T02D1198:105a-41: phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'dir yang
T02D1198:105b-0: sgo @105b srung ma rnams dang mchod pa'i lha mo
T02D1198:105b-2: khyad par gsungs pa ni lho zhes pa la sogs pa shar dang nub dag nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1198:105b-3: de la shar gyi sgor rta gdong ma dkar sngo'o //
T02D1198:105b-4: lho ru phag gdong ma ser sngo'o //
T02D1198:105b-5: nub tu khyi gdong ma dmar sngo'o //
T02D1198:105b-6: byang du seng gdong ma ljang sngo ma'o //
T02D1198:105b-7: bzhi po 'di rnams kyang gri gug dang thod pa
T02D1198:105b-8: 'dzin pa'i phyag gnyis ma ming dang rjes su mthun
T02D1198:105b-9: pa'i zhal gcig ma rnams so //
T02D1198:105b-10: bzhad cing khro la sgeg pa ste //
T02D1198:105b-11: zhes pa ni lha mo nyi shu rtsa gsum po rnams kyi 'ang khyad par ro //
T02D1198:105b-12: de mchod pa'i gzugs zhes pa /
T02D1198:105b-13: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su gling bu
T02D1198:105b-14: ma dang pi wang ma dang rnga zlum ma dang
T02D1198:105b-15: rdza rnga ma'i lha mo rnams sngon bzhin du rig
T02D1198:105b-16: par bya'o // 'dis ni stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gsum gsungs so //
T02D1198:105b-17: de'i rjes su bsgom par bya ba'i rnal 'byor bzhi pa gsungs pa /
T02D1198:105b-18: gsum zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:105b-19: de nyid gsum gyi ngo bo rnams ni aom a'a: h'um gi yi ge rnams te /
T02D1198:105b-20: de rnams kyis mgo dang mgrin pa dang snying ga rnams su ldan par bdag nyid do //
T02D1198:105b-22: dbus ma'i stan la gnas nas m'a ste rang dang
T02D1198:105b-23: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa 'di'i zhes byas
T02D1198:105b-24: nas so // 'di ni 'dir mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa ste /
T02D1198:105b-25: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyis bkug pa'i bdag
T02D1198:105b-26: med ma'i dkyil 'khor la lha mo brgyad po rnams
T02D1198:105b-27: kyis yang dag par mchod de sdig pa bshags pa
T02D1198:105b-28: la sogs pa nas ji srid gzhal yas khang gi
T02D1198:105b-29: bar du'o // der dkyil 'khor 'phar ma gnyis pa
T02D1198:105b-30: ro'i gdan nyi shu rtsa gsum dang bcas pa ste
T02D1198:105b-31: bar du'o // / ro so so'i snying gar zla
T02D1198:105b-32: ba la a'a li k'a li las skyes pa'i zla
T02D1198:105b-33: ba nyi ma dang rang rang gi sa bon las
T02D1198:105b-34: skyes pa'i phyag mtshan sa bon can yongs su gyur
T02D1198:105b-35: pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa gsum rnams bsgom
T02D1198:105b-36: bar du'o // / par bya'o // de'i rjes su
T02D1198:105b-37: he ru ka gsum gyi mngon par rtogs pa bzhin
T02D1198:105b-38: du mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa nas
T02D1198:105b-39: ji srid dbang bskur gyi bar du bsams te /
T02D1198:105b-40: bdag med ma dang rdo rje ma dang goo r'i /
T02D1198:106a-0: @106a * // dang chu ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams
T02D1198:106a-1: mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin
T02D1198:106a-3: 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams kyis dang /
T02D1198:106a-4: goo r'i dang tsoo r'i dang be t'a l'i dang
T02D1198:106a-5: gha sma ri rnams dang pukka s'i dang ri khrod
T02D1198:106a-6: ma dang gtum mo dang g-yung mo rnams mi bskyod
T02D1198:106a-7: pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung
T02D1198:106a-8: ba dang 'od dpag med rnams kyis dang sa spyod
T02D1198:106a-9: ma rnam par snang mdzad kyis dang /
T02D1198:106a-10: mkha' spyod ma 'od dpag med kyis dang /
T02D1198:106a-11: rta gdong ma la sogs pa rnams rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhin dang /
T02D1198:106a-12: gling bu ma la sogs pa rnams rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D1198:106a-13: de las gzhan thams cad he ru ka gsum gyi
T02D1198:106a-14: mngon par rtogs par bshad pa rtogs par bya'o zhes
T02D1198:106a-15: pa'o // dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi
T02D1198:106a-16: rgya cher 'grel pa man ngag gi snye mar snye
T02D1198:106a-19: // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa dang //
T02D1198:106a-20: dngos grub gzhan rnams kyang dkyil 'khor sngon ma can no zhes /
T02D1198:106a-21: bsgom bya'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'i bri bya'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:106a-22: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:106a-23: de'i phyir zhes pa gang gi phyir 'di med par dngos grub rnams med pa'i'o //
T02D1198:106a-24: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i
T02D1198:106a-25: bdag nyid kyi phyir dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1198:106a-26: yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir chen po yang de
T02D1198:106a-28: byang chub kyi sems sngar ji skad bshad pa'o //
T02D1198:106a-29: de'i ngo bor lhag par mos pa'i phyir rdul tshon
T02D1198:106a-30: gyi dkyil 'khor yang dkyil 'khor chen por brjod par
T02D1198:106a-31: bya'o // de nyid kyis na mchog go //
T02D1198:106a-32: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:106a-33: rdo rje stong pa nyid 'di'i dbyings te rang bzhin yin pas rdo rje dbyings te /
T02D1198:106a-34: byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1198:106a-35: de gsal bar byed pa'i phyir dang de'i bdag nyid
T02D1198:106a-36: du mos pa'i phyir de dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa
T02D1198:106a-37: 'di'i yin pa ni de skad do //
T02D1198:106a-38: yang na gal te byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i
T02D1198:106b-0: @106b dkyil 'khor yin na de lta na rigs drug
T02D1198:106b-1: gi bdag nyid du gyur pa ma yin no zhe
T02D1198:106b-2: na / gsungs pa rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:106b-3: dkyil 'khor de ni rigs drug gi bdag nyid kho na ste /
T02D1198:106b-4: gang gi phyir rdo rje dbyings dang rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1198:106b-5: pa dang 'dra ba bdag po'i ror ldan pa nyid
T02D1198:106b-6: kyis na rnam par bya ba'o zhes pas rnam pa
T02D1198:106b-7: rnams te rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams
T02D1198:106b-8: gang du yin pa de ni de skad do //
T02D1198:106b-9: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje dbyings zhes par 'di'i
T02D1198:106b-10: mtshan de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1198:106b-11: rgyud rnams su rgyas par brjod do //
T02D1198:106b-12: yang dag sbyangs nas zhes pa cho ga ji lta
T02D1198:106b-13: bar sa yongs su gzung ba la sogs pa rnams
T02D1198:106b-14: kyis so // phyag rgya chen po ni lha'i sku ste /
T02D1198:106b-15: de yongs 'dzin pa gang du de ji lta bar 'gyur pa ste /
T02D1198:106b-16: cho ga ji lta bar bsgoms pas sam myur bas
T02D1198:106b-17: kyang rung lhag pa'i bdag po'i rnal 'byor sngon ma
T02D1198:106b-18: can gyis zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:106b-19: 'di ni ste rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1198:106b-20: sngags pas zhes pa ji ltar rigs par sngags 'don cing /
T02D1198:106b-21: dkyil 'khor gyi gnas thams cad bgegs bskrad pa'i don du blta'o //
T02D1198:106b-22: gsar pa byung nas yun ring po ma lon pa longs ma spyad pa sra bas so //
T02D1198:106b-23: legs sbyar ba ste legs par bsgril ba dang ye shes kyi skud par byas pas so //
T02D1198:106b-24: legs par tshad ldan ni dkyil 'khor gyi dkyus kyi tshad nyis 'gyur du ring bas so //
T02D1198:106b-25: mdzes pa ste kha dog lnga dang ldan pas dang mdud pa med pas so //
T02D1198:106b-26: shes rab can ni dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shes
T02D1198:106b-27: pa dang ri mo la sogs pa'i las la mkhas
T02D1198:106b-28: pa'o // ji bzhin te khru gang la sogs pa'i tshad kyi khyad par gyis so //
T02D1198:106b-30: khru gang nas ni brtsams nas ni //
T02D1198:106b-31: ji srid khru ni stong gi bar //
T02D1198:106b-33: nus pas zhes pa 'dri ba'i yo byad nye bar
T02D1198:106b-34: sgrub pa la sogs pa'i nus pa nges par bzung
T02D1198:106b-35: nas so // de lta na yang mi mkhas pa'i
T02D1198:106b-36: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad nges pa la sel bar byed
T02D1198:106b-37: nas so // do // dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo ste /
T02D1198:107a-2: sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas ma yin pa mnyam pa
T02D1198:107a-3: nyid kyis ni mi mnyam pa med pa nyid las
T02D1198:107a-4: gru bzhi pa ste zur bzhi pa'o //
T02D1198:107a-5: sgo rnams ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha can rnams so //
T02D1198:107a-6: rta babs rnams kyi tshad ni sgo'i sum 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:107a-7: thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02D1198:107a-8: phyogs bzhi'i thig rnams dang zur thig rnams kyis mnyam par byas pa'o //
T02D1198:107a-9: thams cad du ste bzhi rnams su /
T02D1198:107a-10: sgo dang sgo khyud rnams kyi mtshams rnams su ste
T02D1198:107a-11: brgyad rnams su sgo dang sgo khyud dag gi mtshams
T02D1198:107a-13: rin chen rdo rje rnams kyi ste zla ba phyed
T02D1198:107a-14: pa la gnas pa'i rin po che'i steng du rdo
T02D1198:107a-16: de'i zhes pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi'o //
T02D1198:107a-17: 'khor lo 'dra ba ni zlum po ste de'i dbus
T02D1198:107a-18: su 'khor lo ni yongs su zlum po kun nas
T02D1198:107a-19: bri zhes pa'i gsung las so //
T02D1198:107a-20: de yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyis te /
T02D1198:107a-21: grong ste dkyil 'khor slar yang thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1198:107a-22: rdo rje skud pa ni rdo rje sngon po'i phreng ba'i skud pa dag ste /
T02D1198:107a-23: de dag gis yongs su bcad pa ni /
T02D1198:107a-24: gang las nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thig zlum
T02D1198:107a-25: po gnyis kyi dbus su rdo rje phreng ba 'di
T02D1198:107a-26: yin pa'o // 'khor lo'i ka bdag dang rin po
T02D1198:107a-27: che'i ka ba dag dang padma'i ka ba dag dang
T02D1198:107a-28: ral gri'i ka ba dag ces pa ka ba brgyad
T02D1198:107a-29: yin pa'o // rnams so // rdo rje ka rtse'i gnas rnams su //
T02D1198:107a-31: rdo rje ste rdo rje phreng ba gnas pa rnams
T02D1198:107a-32: kyis mtshan pa'i ka ba'i rtse mo de rnams kyi
T02D1198:107a-33: gnas ni yang dag pa'i gnas rnams te /
T02D1198:107a-35: nang gi re mig dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor lnga
T02D1198:107a-36: rnams kyi bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i re mig
T02D1198:107a-37: rnams kyis brgyan cing spyan ma la sogs pa'i re
T02D1198:107a-38: mig rnams dang lhan cig dgu rnams kyis so //
T02D1198:107a-39: sngar gsungs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag po nyid du rtogs par dgongs pas so //
T02D1198:107a-40: nang gi re mig spangs nas brgyad rnams kyis brgyan pa ste /
T02D1198:107a-41: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1198:107a-42: de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni //
T02D1198:107a-43: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu yin //
T02D1198:107a-44: phyi yi 'khor lo'i phyed kyis te //
T02D1198:107a-45: kun nas yongs su zlum po yi //
T02D1198:107b-0: 'khor @107b lo ka ba sogs pas spras //
T02D1198:107b-1: rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba dge //
T02D1198:107b-3: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu ni dkyil 'khor brgyad pa 'dra ba'o //
T02D1198:107b-4: sangs rgyas gzugs zhes pa gnas ji lta bar zla ba la sogs pa'i gdan rnams bris la /
T02D1198:107b-5: ji ltar rigs par rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs
T02D1198:107b-6: pa rnams kyi sa bon nam phyag mtshan rnams sam
T02D1198:107b-7: / lag pa'i phyag rgya rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D1198:107b-8: de skad du yang mngon par brjod pa phyi ma'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:107b-9: bri ba'i dkyil 'khor dang po ste /
T02D1198:107b-10: gnyis pa mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1198:107b-11: gsum pa lag pa'i phyag rgya ste ;
T02D1198:107b-13: lnga pa me tog mchod pa ste //
T02D1198:107b-14: drug pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1198:107b-16: gzugs ni thang kar bris pa dang brkos pa dang
T02D1198:107b-17: lugs ma dang gsar ma'i las kyis 'dus byas pa'o
T02D1198:107b-18: // shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can phyag
T02D1198:107b-19: rgya chen po'i sku ni rdul tshon du son pa
T02D1198:107b-20: // ma yin te / mu stegs rnams la phan don du //
T02D1198:107b-21: sangs rgyas btsun mo sbas pa yin //
T02D1198:107b-23: skal pa med pa'i skye bo 'dus pa na yi
T02D1198:107b-24: ge dang gzugs dag kyang ma yin pa kho na'o
T02D1198:107b-25: // lha'i khyim zhes pa nye bar mtshon pa ste yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas so //
T02D1198:107b-26: sngags pa ni gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba'i sngags dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1198:107b-27: aa yig gis zhes pa snying gar gnas pas so //
T02D1198:107b-28: rdo rje ni h'um las skyes shing h'um gi snying po can no //
T02D1198:107b-29: tshogs zhes pa stong pa nyid du mos pas tha mal pa'i nga rgyal bsal te /
T02D1198:107b-30: yud kyis bdag nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sku mdog
T02D1198:107b-31: dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rdo
T02D1198:107b-32: rje sems dpar lhag par mos nas /
T02D1198:107b-33: de'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis lha mo bcu drug spros pas so //
T02D1198:107b-34: brjod ces pa sgrub pa pos brjod pa'o //
T02D1198:107b-35: dgongs su gsol te nges par 'dzin pa dang bcas pas rnam par gzigs shig pa'o //
T02D1198:107b-36: che ge mo zhes bgyi ba zhes pa nges par
T02D1198:107b-37: byas nas khas blangs pa yongs su mi gtong bar
T02D1198:107b-38: dgongs pas rang gi ming gzung ba'o //
T02D1198:108a-1: ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1198:108a-2: de kho na snying po ste chos thams cad kyi nyid khu'o //
T02D1198:108a-3: de la 'dug pa ni gnas pa'o //
T02D1198:108a-4: dam pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan 'thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:108a-5: de nyid kyi phyir bla na med ces pa'o //
T02D1198:108a-6: mgon du bya bas na mgon po rnams te sangs
T02D1198:108a-7: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1198:108a-8: rnams so // rang dang gzhan rdzogs par byang chub
T02D1198:108a-9: pa'i rgyu mtshan gdon mi za bar bsgrub par bya
T02D1198:108a-10: ba nyid du nges par mdzad pa ste /
T02D1198:108a-11: ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed zin pa rnams
T02D1198:108a-12: dang bskyed pa bzhin pa rnams dang skyed par 'gyur

T02D1198:110a-2: de 'chad pa ni dka' ba yin //

T02D1198:111b-7: pos byin gyis brlabs pa des nyan thos dang rang

T02D1198:111b-9: blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs yongs su sbyong ba'i khyad par la ltos /
T02D1198:111b-10: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon
T02D1198:111b-11: pa med par chos thams cad so sor rtog cing
T02D1198:111b-12: nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mong pa'i ting
T02D1198:111b-13: nge 'dzin de rnams snyoms par 'jug la /
T02D1198:111b-14: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi lhung ngo zhes so //
T02D1198:111b-15: 'di'i rjes su rten sngon du 'gro bar brten pa
T02D1198:111b-16: rnam par gnas zhes pas 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil
T02D1198:111b-17: 'khor gyi don ni de ltar bdag nyid ces pa
T02D1198:111b-18: la sogs pa h'um zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'i gzhung
T02D1198:111b-19: ngo // de'i bar ma chad kho nar gcig aam
T02D1198:111b-20: ka rigs te dbus su ni sus kyang dgod par
T02D1198:111b-21: ngo // dka' ste / aam ka rnams thams cad kyang gtsug lag min pa'o //
T02D1198:111b-22: de'i rjes su de nas rang gi sems de nyid
T02D1198:111b-23: ces pa la sogs pa dge ba'o zhes pa'i bar
T02D1198:111b-24: ro // de'i rjes su rang gi snying zhes pa la sogs par rab brtag bya zhes pa'i mtha'o //
T02D1198:111b-25: de'i rjes su de nas rdo rje snying po zhes
T02D1198:111b-26: pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1198:111b-27: ces pa mtha'o // de'i rjes su shar du rnam
T02D1198:111b-28: par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa'o zhes pa
T02D1198:111b-29: ces pa mtha'o // rim pa'o // bla ma med pa srid pa'i mthar 'gro min //
T02D1198:111b-30: zhes pas glegs bam las mkhas pa nyid bsal ba'i
T02D1198:111b-31: don du rim pa ma yin par bklag pa ste
T02D1198:111b-32: / gzhan du yang ji ltar rigs par 'di ltar rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1198:111b-33: ji ltar bklags pa ltar bshad par bya ste 'brel
T02D1198:111b-34: ba ni don gyi rjes su 'brang ba kho nas
T02D1198:111b-35: shes par bya'o // de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi
T02D1198:111b-36: byang chub 'chi ba'i bar ma chad du bar ma
T02D1198:112a-0: do'i srid pa byang chub sems kyi sa @112a *
T02D1198:112a-1: shes par bya'o // // bon bsdu ba'i don du /
T02D1198:112a-2: khang pa brtsegs pa'i bar ma chad du bsgom par
T02D1198:112a-3: bya ba gsungs pa de nas zhes pa la sogs
T02D1198:112a-4: pa'o // de nyid de stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i rang gi sems so //
T02D1198:112a-5: ci dgar zlos pas zhes pa nang gi brjod pa ste /
T02D1198:112a-7: rang gi sems kho na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par blta ste /
T02D1198:112a-8: sngags nang du bzlas par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:112a-9: aom zhes pa la sogs pa kun rdzob pa'i sngags te /
T02D1198:112a-10: des rtogs par bya ba ni sems so sor rtog
T02D1198:112a-11: par byed pa don dam pa'i sngags rjes su bsgrub
T02D1198:112a-12: pa'o // sems so sor rtog pa yang phyag rgya
T02D1198:112a-13: chen po'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mngon du
T02D1198:112a-15: ye shes de nyid ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir stug pa'o //
T02D1198:112a-16: nam mkha'i khams mthar thug pa med pa'i phyogs kyi
T02D1198:112a-17: 'khor lo khyab pa nyid kyis na dkyil 'khor ro
T02D1198:112a-18: // 'dod chags la sogs pa glo bur ba'i dri
T02D1198:112a-19: ma'i rnyog pa mtha' dag dang bral ba nyid kyis
T02D1198:112a-20: 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dag pa
T02D1198:112a-21: // chen po'o // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa ;
T02D1198:112a-22: nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med //
T02D1198:112a-24: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad kyi
T02D1198:112a-25: bdag nyid kyis 'gro ba dga' bar byed pa'i ngo
T02D1198:112a-26: bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1198:112a-27: yid mi bde ba kun las grol lo //
T02D1198:112a-28: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul ba'i 'od zer
T02D1198:112a-29: rnams kyis sems can gyi khams mtha' dag la phan
T02D1198:112a-30: 'dogs pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1198:112a-31: rnam par rtog pa sel ba'o //
T02D1198:112a-32: de nyid kyi phyir mchog ste khyad par du gyur pa'o //
T02D1198:112a-33: dag pa che ba nyid rgyas par ston pa ni /
T02D1198:112a-34: nyon mongs kun gyi dri ma dag /
T02D1198:112a-36: mngon par mtho ba dang des par legs pa'i 'bras
T02D1198:112a-37: bu rgya chen po mtha' dag dang ldan pas yongs
T02D1198:112a-38: su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir zla ba gang ba
T02D1198:112a-39: lta bu ste / de'i phyir de gsal bar byed
T02D1198:112a-40: pa nyid kyi phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa la yang
T02D1198:112b-0: sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par @112b blta
T02D1198:112b-1: lta bu ste / ba'o // ci ltar zhe na /
T02D1198:112b-2: gang phyir thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:112b-3: gru gsum zhes pa chos 'byung ste /
T02D1198:112b-4: der skyes pa nyid kyis na 'bras bu la rgyur
T02D1198:112b-5: nye bar btags pa las gru gsum ni 'dir pha
T02D1198:112b-6: las skyes pa'i khu ba ste /
T02D1198:112b-7: thabs gzhan med pa nyid du gsal ba'i don du nye bar btags pa'o //
T02D1198:112b-8: 'di ni rgya che ba'i gzugs can gyi byang chub kyi sems su brjod de /
T02D1198:112b-9: zab cing rgya che ba'i gzugs can ni stong pa
T02D1198:112b-10: nyid dang snying rje gnyis su med pa kho na'o
T02D1198:112b-11: // sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan rnams ni bde
T02D1198:112b-12: ba chen po'i ngo bo me long lta bu'i ye
T02D1198:112b-13: shes kyi nang du gtogs pa rnams te /
T02D1198:112b-14: de rnams kyi gnas ni de'i bdag nyid kyi gzhi'o //
T02D1198:112b-15: bsgom par bya ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dkar po
T02D1198:112b-16: khu ba nyid du mos par bya bzhin pa 'di
T02D1198:112b-17: yang / de'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa nyid kyis lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D1198:112b-18: shel dang zla ba 'dra ba ni dkar po dang zla ba'i 'od dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1198:112b-19: de'i steng du zhes pa zla ba'i steng du ste /
T02D1198:112b-20: skyes pa 'dod pa'i bud med kyi bzhin no //
T02D1198:112b-21: bskyed par bya zhes pa bskyed bzhin pas nang gi brjod pas sngags bklag ces pa'i don to //
T02D1198:112b-22: aom zhes pa la sogs pa sngags te /
T02D1198:112b-23: sngar bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T02D1198:112b-25: snying rje rjes su chags las byung //
T02D1198:112b-26: zhes pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo ste /
T02D1198:112b-27: de yang rtag tu thugs rje chen po dang byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1198:112b-28: de ltar yang rgyas pa dang bcas par thub pa'i dgongs pa'i rgyan du nye bar bshad do //
T02D1198:112b-29: nges par gnon pa ni nyams par byed pa'o //
T02D1198:112b-30: byang chub zla ba zhes pa byang chub kyi sems
T02D1198:112b-31: zla ba ma las skyes pa kha dog dmar ba
T02D1198:112b-32: ste bskyed par bya zhes sbrel lo //
T02D1198:112b-34: mig dmar la sogs pa'i skar ma bzhin du 'od dang bcas pa'i kha dog dmar pos so //
T02D1198:112b-35: sangs rgyas yon tan rnams ni bde ba chen po'i
T02D1198:112b-36: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su son pa
T02D1198:112b-37: rnams so // gzugs brnyan sbyor bas zhes pa snga ma yang shes par bya'o //
T02D1198:113a-0: a'a li dang k'a li dag zla ba'i gzugs su @113a * //
T02D1198:113a-1: yongs su gyur pa dag slar yang zla ba dag
T02D1198:113a-2: la gzugs brnyan du byas pa dag blta bar bya'o
T02D1198:113a-3: // de la 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dga' ba bcu
T02D1198:113a-4: drug gi dbye ba las zla ba cha bcu drug
T02D1198:113a-5: pa ste tshes gcig la sogs pa rnams su 'phel
T02D1198:113a-6: ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba las kyang ngo //
T02D1198:113a-7: de skad du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1198:113a-8: aa yig mthe ba chen rtsa bar 'gyur //
T02D1198:113a-9: a'a yig byin pa dag la nyid //
T02D1198:113a-10: ai yig kyang ni brla zung la /
T02D1198:113a-11: a'i yig gsang ba'i phyogs su'o //
T02D1198:113a-12: au yig lte ba'i rtsa bar te //
T02D1198:113a-13: a'u yig lto ba mchog la'o ;
T02D1198:113a-14: / ri yig nu ma'i dbus su ste /
T02D1198:113a-15: r'i yig de bzhin lag la'o //
T02D1198:113a-16: li yig mgrin pa'i phyogs su ste //
T02D1198:113a-17: l'i yig kyang ni mchu la gnas //
T02D1198:113a-18: ae yig 'gram pa'i phyogs su ste //
T02D1198:113a-19: aee yig kyang ni mig la'o //
T02D1198:113a-20: ao yig rna ba'i rtsa bar te /
T02D1198:113a-21: aoo yig mgo bor yang dag gnas //
T02D1198:113a-22: aam aa: spyi gtsug tu lus la //
T02D1198:113a-23: mkhas pas 'di ltar bsam par bya //
T02D1198:113a-24: dkar po'i phyogs la 'di ltar gnas //
T02D1198:113a-25: nag po zlog pas de ltar ro //
T02D1198:113a-26: bud med la 'di rdo rje sems //
T02D1198:113a-27: skyes pa rnams la'ang dus kun du'o //
T02D1198:113a-29: de ltar cha bcu drug rtogs par byed pa dbyangs bcu drug rnams te /
T02D1198:113a-31: khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'gyur //
T02D1198:113a-32: de yi bde ba 'dod mar bshad //
T02D1198:113a-33: ces pa shes rab dang thabs kyi dbye bas sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1198:113a-34: de ltar ni aa'i yi ge la sogs pa lnga
T02D1198:113a-35: rnams rim pa ji lta bar mgrin gyur dang rkan
T02D1198:113a-36: du gyur dang mchur gyur dang spyi bor gyur dang
T02D1198:113a-38: nam mkha' dang rlung dang chu dang me dang sa rnams kyi rjod par byed pa ste /
T02D1198:113a-39: mnyam pa'i tshes rnams la nyis 'gyur du brjod par
T02D1198:113a-40: bya'o zhes pa'i ring por yi ge gnyis pa rnams
T02D1198:113a-41: so // bcu gcig pa la ni rlung dang sbyor ba las nam mkha' gong du byung ba ste /
T02D1198:113a-42: bcu gnyis pa la shin tu gong du byung ba'o //
T02D1198:113a-43: bcu gsum pa dang bcu bzhi pa la chu dang sbyor ba las de ltar ro //
T02D1198:113b-0: bco lnga pa'i nyin mo la ye shes kyi khams rjes su @113b nga ro brjod par bya'o //
T02D1198:113b-1: mtshan mo la de kho na nyis 'gyur mgrin pa
T02D1198:113b-2: las byung ba rnam par bcad par brjod par bya'o
T02D1198:113b-3: // nam mkha'i khams kho na stong pa nyid dang
T02D1198:113b-4: snying rje dbyer med pa nyid kyis ye shes kyi
T02D1198:113b-5: khams so zhes kha cig tu rnam par gzhag go
T02D1198:113b-6: // // kha cig tu ni de lta nyid du yang nam mkha'i khams kho nar brjod par bya'o //
T02D1198:113b-7: de nyid kyi phyir dang po dang mtha' dag tu
T02D1198:113b-8: nam mkha' dang ye shes kyi khams dag rlung la
T02D1198:113b-9: sogs pa'i khams la khyab par byed pa nyid du
T02D1198:113b-10: gsal bar byed pa aa yig gsungs so //
T02D1198:113b-12: aa yig yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / ces sngar bshad pa'o //
T02D1198:113b-13: de ltar nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams kyi rang
T02D1198:113b-14: bzhin nyid na yang khu ba kho na la khu
T02D1198:113b-15: ba ma yin pa'i las ldog pa'i phyir rnam pa
T02D1198:113b-17: bde ba ma yin pa las ldog pa'i phyir yang
T02D1198:113b-18: rnam par bcu drug ces pas sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1198:113b-19: so // zla ba gnyis pa ni bud med rnams
T02D1198:113b-20: kyi zla mtshan mang ba las byung ba'i nyi ma'i
T02D1198:113b-22: de nyid kyi phyir de sngon du nyi mar gsungs so //
T02D1198:113b-23: de'i phyir 'di gsal byed rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1198:113b-24: de ltar ni 'dir sa dang chu dang me dang
T02D1198:113b-25: rlung ste bzhi rnams gang na 'byung ba gcig yod
T02D1198:113b-26: pa der bzhi rnams so zhes pa'i lung las /
T02D1198:113b-27: so sor rnam pa bzhi nyid kyis bcu drug ste /
T02D1198:113b-28: bde ba nam mkha'i khams zhes pa'i gsung las nam
T02D1198:113b-29: mkha'i khams zhes bya ba dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin
T02D1198:113b-31: rdul dang ldan pa'i phyir nyis 'gyur rnams te bzhi bcu rnams so //
T02D1198:113b-32: stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i ngo bo shes rab
T02D1198:113b-33: dang thabs kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis na slar yang
T02D1198:113b-35: de ltar de rjod par byed pa'i gsal byed rnams kyang /
T02D1198:113b-36: ka la sogs pa rnams yang ba dang lci ba'i
T02D1198:113b-37: 'bad pa nyid kyis rnam pa gnyis su brjod par
T02D1198:113b-38: bya bzhin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:113b-39: da dha ya ra la wa dang bcas pa rnams nyis 'gyur nyid kyis na brgyad cu kho na'o //
T02D1198:113b-40: de ltar ni ha dang ya dang ra dang la
T02D1198:113b-41: dang wa rnams rim pa ji lta bar mgrin gyur
T02D1198:114a-0: dang @114a * // rkan gyur dang spyi bor gyur dang sor gyur dang mchur gyur rnams te /
T02D1198:114a-1: nam mkha' dang rlung dang med sa dang chu'i khams rnams kyi rjod par byed pa'o //
T02D1198:114a-2: de bzhin du ka la sogs pa'i sde pa lnga rnams kyang ste /
T02D1198:114a-3: sde pa rnams ni gsal byed lnga'i bdag nyid kyis
T02D1198:114a-4: na so sor slar yang rim pa ji lta bar
T02D1198:114a-5: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'
T02D1198:114a-6: rnams kyi'o // sha dang sha dang rnams ni rlung dang me dang sa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1198:114a-7: ksha yig ni nam mkha'i khams gong du gyur pa
T02D1198:114a-8: me rdul dag de'i bdag nyid du yang dag par
T02D1198:114a-9: ldan pa nyid dang gong du gyur pa dang khams
T02D1198:114a-10: gzhan la khyab par byed pa nyid du sgrub pa'i
T02D1198:114a-12: thams cad la khyab pa po stong pa nyid dang
T02D1198:114a-13: snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems sgom
T02D1198:114a-14: pa rab kyi mthar thug pa las skyes pa sgrib
T02D1198:114a-15: pa med pa'i ni bsgrub par bya'o zhes shes par
T02D1198:114a-16: bya ba'i ched du aa yig dang tsheg drag dag
T02D1198:114a-17: thams cad kyi mthar bklags pa dag go //
T02D1198:114a-18: de nyid kyi phyir snying rje nye bar mtshon pa'i
T02D1198:114a-19: stong pa nyid gsal bar byed pa'i aa yi ga
T02D1198:114a-20: ni / ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed kyi mtha' rnams su brjod pa'o //
T02D1198:114a-21: de nyid kyi phyir 'ga' cig tu ye shes kyi
T02D1198:114a-22: mes sgrib pa'i bud shing thams cad sreg par dgongs
T02D1198:114a-23: pas / ksha yig dus kyi me gsal bar byed par rnam par gzhag go //
T02D1198:114a-25: ksha yi yi ge srin por bshad //
T02D1198:114a-26: 'og gi cha la lhag par gnas //
T02D1198:114a-28: byang chub kyi sems kho na rnam par rtog pa
T02D1198:114a-29: ma lus pa za bar mtshungs pa'i phyir srin po
T02D1198:114a-31: de ltar na ka nga nya na na ma ha
T02D1198:114a-32: ksha rnams nam mkha'i khams kyi gsal bar byed pa
T02D1198:114a-33: rnams so // gha dang dzha dang dha dang dha dang bha dang ya dang sha rnams rlung gi'o //
T02D1198:114a-34: ga dza da da ba ra sha rnams me'i 'o //
T02D1198:114a-35: kha tsha tha tha pha wa rnams chu'i 'o //
T02D1198:114a-36: tsa dang ta dang ta dang ba dang la dang sa rnams sa'i 'o //
T02D1198:114a-37: de ltar bzhi bcu nyis 'gyur du byas pa gsal byed brgyad cu rnams so //
T02D1198:114a-38: aa yig la sogs pa'i yig 'bru 'di rnams kyang
T02D1198:114a-39: gzhan zhig tu brjod par bya ba dang rjod par
T02D1198:114b-0: byed pa @114b dag tha mi dad par nye bar
T02D1198:114b-1: btags pas kyang rnam par gzhag par bya sta /
T02D1198:114b-2: dper na aa yig nam mkha'i khams //
T02D1198:114b-3: zhes pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02D1198:114b-4: sgom pa'i rnam par rtog pa la yang zla ba
T02D1198:114b-5: gnyis dang yig 'bru rnams gzugs brnyan du byas pa
T02D1198:114b-6: kho nar rtogs par bya ste /
T02D1198:114b-7: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1198:114b-8: gzugs brnyan sbyor ba yis zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:114b-9: chos rnams thams cad kyang gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid du gsal bar byed par 'dir dgongs pa'o //
T02D1198:114b-10: de la a'a li'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni me long ye shes te /
T02D1198:114b-11: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams so //
T02D1198:114b-12: k'a li'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni mnyam
T02D1198:114b-13: pa nyid kyi ye shes te rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras
T02D1198:114b-14: bu ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams so
T02D1198:114b-15: // 'di thams cad nang gi tshul du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:114b-16: 'di zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:114b-17: dkyil 'khor kun gyi cho ga zhes pa rdul tshon
T02D1198:114b-18: gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dang 'khor dang bcas pa'i bsgom
T02D1198:114b-20: der te zla ba de dag la h'um las skyes
T02D1198:114b-21: shing lte bar gnas pa'i h'um dang ldan pa'i rdo
T02D1198:114b-22: rje'i gzugs bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1198:114b-23: bar do'i srid pa'i sems kyi sa bon pha ma
T02D1198:114b-24: dag dang rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi bar du
T02D1198:114b-26: nyi ma dag la gnas pa bzhin no //
T02D1198:114b-27: rtse lnga pa ni lag pa dang rkang pa dang mgrin pa'i mtshams kyi yan lag mchog ste /
T02D1198:114b-28: 'bur po lnga rnams kyi rgyu nyid kyis so //
T02D1198:114b-29: ngos gnyis par gnas pa'i rtse mo lnga nyid du
T02D1198:114b-30: 'bur po so so la slar yang 'bur po lnga
T02D1198:114b-31: rnams kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:114b-32: de rnams ni bzhi rnams la sor mo rnams dang /
T02D1198:114b-33: mgo bo la ni mig dang rna ba dang sna
T02D1198:114b-34: dang lce dang lus kyi dbang po rnams te lus
T02D1198:114b-35: kyi dbang po gtso bo ni bde ba chen po'i
T02D1198:114b-36: gnas dpral ba nas bzung pa'i steng la rnam par
T02D1198:114b-37: gzhag go // kun du bzang po'i sems ni sgrib
T02D1198:114b-38: pa med pa nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad du
T02D1198:114b-39: yongs su dag pa'i spyod pa'i byang chub sems kyi
T02D1198:114b-40: ngo bo kho na'i 'dod chags pa spro ba'i phyir
T02D1198:114b-41: gzhag go // ro // de don dam par skye
T02D1198:114b-42: ba med pa'i ngo bo'i sgyu ma bzhin du bskyed
T02D1198:114b-43: gzhag go // ro // pa ste / de brtan
T02D1198:114b-44: par byed pa ni nges par byas pa nyid kyis
T02D1198:115a-0: gzhag go // ro // pa ste / @115a * // 'jug pa'o // de yis rgyur te /
T02D1198:115a-3: sems bdag go zhes pa'i gsung rab las so //
T02D1198:115a-4: ti shtha gnas par gyis te nam mkha' ji srid par ro //
T02D1198:115a-5: badzra ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1198:115a-6: 'dis ni sa bon gyi mtshan ma'i phyag mtshan ni
T02D1198:115a-7: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes su mdor bstan to
T02D1198:115a-8: // bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes mdor ston te /
T02D1198:115a-9: byang chub spyod pa zhes pa sems can rnams bla
T02D1198:115a-10: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T02D1198:115a-12: de nyid kyi phyir bla na med pa ste bsgom par bya zhes 'brel lo //
T02D1198:115a-14: gang gi phyir de'i ste kun du bzang po'i sems
T02D1198:115a-15: kyi 'di ni ste byang chub spyod pa ni sa
T02D1198:115a-16: ru spyod yul du rtogs sla ste /
T02D1198:115a-17: so sor rtog pa ni byang chub sgrub pa'i don kho nar zhes pa go sla ba'o //
T02D1198:115a-18: de'i phyir de'i bar ma chad du 'di'o //
T02D1198:115a-19: de'i rjes su ye shes dag pa'o //
T02D1198:115a-20: ci'i phyir zhe na gang gi phyir zag pa med ces pa /
T02D1198:115a-21: srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa ji srid
T02D1198:115a-22: par skye mched kyi rma drug rnams kyis zag go
T02D1198:115a-23: zhes pa'am / 'di rnams kyi rgyud yul rnams su zag go zhes pas zag pa bcu rnams te /
T02D1198:115a-24: 'dod chags dang khong khro dang nga rgyal dang ma
T02D1198:115a-25: rig pa dang the tshom dang 'jig tshogs la lta
T02D1198:115a-26: ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang log par
T02D1198:115a-27: lta ba dang lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang
T02D1198:115a-28: tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1198:115a-29: 'di rnams kyi rim pa ni ji ltar gnas pa'i
T02D1198:115a-30: dngos po ji lta ba bzhin nyid ma rtogs pa
T02D1198:115a-31: las dang yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin sgro
T02D1198:115a-32: 'dogs pa las dang por ma rig pa'o //
T02D1198:115a-33: de nas yang dag pa dang log pa'i phyogs gnyis
T02D1198:115a-34: thos na 'di bden nam 'di mi bden zhes the
T02D1198:115a-35: tshom mo // de nas log pa'i phyogs goms pa
T02D1198:115a-36: las dngos po la yang dag par yod pa nyid
T02D1198:115a-37: du sgro 'dogs pas phyin ci log tu lta ba
T02D1198:115a-39: 'dir log par lta ba ni log par nges pa
T02D1198:115a-40: 'di lta bu'i bdag nyid kho na gzung bar bya'i
T02D1198:115b-0: / rgyu dang 'bras bu la skur ba 'debs pa'i bdag @115b nyid ni ma yin no //
T02D1198:115b-1: de nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba ste /
T02D1198:115b-2: de ni 'jig pa'i bdag nyid can nye bar len
T02D1198:115b-3: pa'i phung po lnga po rang bzhin med pa rnams
T02D1198:115b-4: la phyin ci log las rang bzhin dang bcas pa
T02D1198:115b-5: nyid du gzung ba rnams la bdag tu byed pa
T02D1198:115b-6: dang bdag gir byed par rab tu zhugs pa'i bdag
T02D1198:115b-7: nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:115b-8: de nas mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba ste /
T02D1198:115b-9: de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po
T02D1198:115b-10: rnams la kye ma bdag dang 'jig rten 'di rtag
T02D1198:115b-11: pa'am chad pa'am / de bzhin du yod do med
T02D1198:115b-12: do zhes pa la sogs pa mtha' gnyis su rtog
T02D1198:115b-13: pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:115b-14: de nas tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1198:115b-15: gang la mthar 'dzin pa des dag par yid ches pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:115b-16: de nas lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1198:115b-17: gang gis dag par yid ches pa de mchog tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:115b-18: de nas rang gi lta ba la 'dod chags so //
T02D1198:115b-19: lta ba des kyang nga rgyal lo //
T02D1198:115b-20: de nas de las gzhan la zhe sdang ngo zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:115b-21: thag pa 'di rnams dang bral ba ni zag med
T02D1198:115b-22: de zag pa dang bcas pas gnas gzhan du gyur
T02D1198:115b-23: pa'i phyir ro // 'dis shin tu rnam par dag
T02D1198:115b-24: pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes mdor bstan to
T02D1198:115b-25: pa'i phyir ro // // de la so sor rtog
T02D1198:115b-26: pa'i ye shes kyi rgyas par ston pa gsungs pa
T02D1198:115b-27: pa'i phyir ro // // / zla ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:115b-28: rdo rje ni rang gi mngon par 'dod pa'i nam mkha' khyab pa'i tshad di tsam mo //
T02D1198:115b-29: aom ti shtha badzra zhes pa byin gyis brlab pa'i don can gyi sngags so //
T02D1198:115b-30: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes pa 'di bdag nyid
T02D1198:115b-31: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D1198:115b-32: du rtogs par byed pa'i don can no /
T02D1198:115b-33: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba las //
T02D1198:115b-34: zhes pa bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes rgyas par ston pa'o //
T02D1198:115b-35: de ltar ni h'um yig las spros pa'i de bzhin
T02D1198:115b-36: gshegs pa rnams kyis 'gro ba yang dag par rdzogs
T02D1198:115b-37: pa'i sangs rgyas su byas shing de rnams kyang h'um
T02D1198:115b-38: yig gi nang du zhugs pa na bya ba sgrub
T02D1198:115b-39: pa'o // de ltar zla ba dang zla ba'i sa
T02D1198:115b-40: bon rnams gsungs nas de'i gsang ba brjod pa'i ched
T02D1198:115b-41: pa'o // du gsungs pa / thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:116a-1: rnams thams cad kyi ste me long lta bu la
T02D1198:116a-2: sogs pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo can rnam par
T02D1198:116a-3: snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi sku gang yin
T02D1198:116a-4: pa zla ba gnyis dang sa bon dang phyag mtshan
T02D1198:116a-5: dang sprul pa dang 'gro bar ro gcig pa de
T02D1198:116a-6: bsgom par bya'o zhes sbrel lo //
T02D1198:116a-8: snang ba med pa dngos por na rang bzhin med pa ste /
T02D1198:116a-9: snang ba dang rnam pa dang dngos po rnams ni rnam grangs so //
T02D1198:116a-10: gnas med pa zhes pa gnas kyang rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan ma med pa'o //
T02D1198:116a-11: ci las snang ba med ce na /
T02D1198:116a-12: gang gi phyir ma skyes pa ste don dam par skye ba mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:116a-13: de nyid kyi phyir rgyu'i bya ba la mi ltos pa'i phyir ma byas pa'o //
T02D1198:116a-14: dag pa ni dri ma med pa ste /
T02D1198:116a-15: gang las med do dang yod do la sogs pa'i spros pa spangs pa'o //
T02D1198:116a-16: dag pa de yang lus dang ngag dang sems kyi
T02D1198:116a-17: ngo bo gzugs la sogs pa ni gcad du med
T02D1198:116a-18: pa ste mi rtag pa la sogs pa spyi'i mtshan
T02D1198:116a-19: nyid tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:116a-20: dbyer med pa ste gzugs su rung ba la sogs
T02D1198:116a-21: pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad med pa nyid
T02D1198:116a-22: kyi phyir ro // gzung ba med pa ste /
T02D1198:116a-23: sems 'di kho na lus dang ngag gi rnam pa
T02D1198:116a-24: snang ba'i lus la sogs pa zhes bya ba gzung
T02D1198:116a-25: bar bya ba ni yod pa ma yin pas so
T02D1198:116a-26: // 'di ltar gyur pa'i lus la sogs pa las
T02D1198:116a-27: logs pa 'dzin pa po gzhan sems yod pa yang
T02D1198:116a-28: // ma yin te / gzung ba med na de 'dzin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:116a-29: de ltar na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral
T02D1198:116a-30: ba'i stong pa nyid du ro gcig pa phan tshun
T02D1198:116a-31: tha mi dad pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems ni
T02D1198:116a-32: byang chub kyi sems su brjod cing /
T02D1198:116a-33: de kho na yang chos kyi sku dang phung po
T02D1198:116a-34: med pa ste rgyu la 'bras bu nye bar btags
T02D1198:116a-35: pa'i phyir ro / sgrib pa dang bcas pa'i phung
T02D1198:116a-36: po lnga'i ngo bo phung po gnas gzhan du gyur
T02D1198:116a-37: pa'i bar ma chad du yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:116a-38: rdo rje'i bdag nyid yang dag par byung ba ni
T02D1198:116a-39: lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i rang gi ngo
T02D1198:116a-41: byang chub kyi sems la yang thog ma dang tha ma med na yang /
T02D1198:116b-0: mngon du byed pa'i gnas skabs @116b na yang kun rdzob tu skyes par brjod do //
T02D1198:116b-1: de nyid kyi phyir nye bar sdud de /
T02D1198:116b-2: de ltar rdo rje'i sku bla na med pa zhes pa ste /
T02D1198:116b-3: 'dis kyang sku'i gsang ba sgrub pa'i zur gyis ji
T02D1198:116b-4: ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces 'chad par
T02D1198:116b-5: 'gyur ba'i dpe'i ngo bo chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin
T02D1198:116b-6: 'bras bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyang gsal bar byas
T02D1198:116b-7: so // de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1198:116b-8: thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams byang
T02D1198:116b-9: chub kyi sems nyid du rtogs nas dpe can rtogs
T02D1198:116b-11: slar yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:116b-12: rdo rje de ni gang lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bdag nyid du gsungs pa'o //
T02D1198:116b-13: 'o na skad cig gcig gis mngon par rdzogs par
T02D1198:116b-14: byang chub pa'i gnas skabs 'dir yang rdo rje lta
T02D1198:116b-15: bu'i bar chad med pa'i lam gyi ngo bor gyur
T02D1198:116b-16: pa na / gal te gzhan gyi gdams ngag la
T02D1198:116b-17: ltos nas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod
T02D1198:116b-18: pa na / na / de ci bcom ldan 'das
T02D1198:116b-19: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs
T02D1198:116b-20: pa nyid kyi phyir slob dpon med pa'i ye shes
T02D1198:116b-21: can du rnam par gzhag par bya ba ma yin
T02D1198:116b-22: pa na / na / zhing / rang byung nyid du yang ma yin no zhe na /
T02D1198:116b-23: ma yin te rnam par gzhag par bya ba ma yin te /
T02D1198:116b-24: so so'i skye bo'i bsam pas rdo rje snying po'i dri ba 'di'o //
T02D1198:116b-25: de yang gnas skabs 'di la lhag par mos pa
T02D1198:116b-26: kho na yin gyi mngon du byas pa ni ma
T02D1198:116b-27: yin no // de'i phyir 'di'i dri ba rigs so //
T02D1198:116b-28: de'i gnas skabs rtogs pa'i bar ma chad pa kho
T02D1198:116b-29: nar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni slob
T02D1198:116b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra ni de'i rang gi ngo
T02D1198:116b-32: bo dang mtshungs pa'i dbang po nyid kyi don to
T02D1198:116b-33: // gang gi rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid rdo
T02D1198:116b-34: rje gsungs pa de nyid slar yang khyad par du
T02D1198:116b-35: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag dang zhal la sogs pas
T02D1198:116b-36: // / rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs me long lta
T02D1198:116b-37: bu'i ye shes la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad
T02D1198:116b-39: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid /
T02D1198:117a-1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag nyid kyi dngos
T02D1198:117a-2: po mtshungs pa nyid du bsgom zhing sngags brjod do
T02D1198:117a-3: // nye bar sdud pa lus kyi gsang ba zhes te /
T02D1198:117a-4: lus kyi ste zla ba dang zla ba'i sa bon
T02D1198:117a-5: gyi bdag nyid kyi ji skad bshad pa'i rang gi
T02D1198:117a-6: ngo bo ni gsang ba ste ;
T02D1198:117a-7: gzhan rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:117a-8: 'dis ni ye shes gsum nye bar bsdus so //
T02D1198:117a-9: spyod pa zhes pa la sogs pas bzhi pa'o //
T02D1198:117a-10: de kho na nyid ces pa la sogs pas lnga pa'o //
T02D1198:117a-11: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas lnga'i
T02D1198:117a-12: bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun bdag
T02D1198:117a-13: ste drug pa'o // bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib
T02D1198:117a-14: pa ma lus pa spangs pa las mchog tu bla
T02D1198:117a-15: na med pa'i dge ba nyid kyis na dge ba'o
T02D1198:117a-16: ste drug pa'o // // 'di 'dra ba kho na'i
T02D1198:117a-17: mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga pa rdzogs
T02D1198:117a-18: pa'i rim pas rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor rtogs
T02D1198:117a-20: skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis dag / ces pa la sogs pas gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:117a-21: 'di kho na yang 'dir 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1198:117a-22: snga mas ni zla ba gnyis dang sa bon dang
T02D1198:117a-23: bcas pa'i phyag mtshan dang sprul pa rnams dang 'gro
T02D1198:117a-24: ba dang lhan cig ro gcig par gyur pa'i gnas
T02D1198:117a-25: skabs su rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1198:117a-26: de kho na yang 'dir skad cig gcig la mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje lta bu ste /
T02D1198:117a-27: 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa chos kyi sku'i
T02D1198:117a-28: bar chad med pa'i lam nyid kyis na chos kyi
T02D1198:117a-29: sku dang phung po med par brjod do ;
T02D1198:117a-30: / de skad du yang 'phags pa sa bcu par gsungs pa /
T02D1198:117a-31: sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po la yang dag par gzhol ba dang /
T02D1198:117a-32: bsam pa ji lta bar sems can thams cad la
T02D1198:117a-33: yang dag par bstan cing tshim pa'i ched du zhes
T02D1198:117a-34: so // 'dis ni rgyu yongs su dag pa ni
T02D1198:117a-35: rgya che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu
T02D1198:117a-36: 'jug pa mngon par sgrub pa nyid kyis dang /
T02D1198:117a-37: 'bras bu dag pa ni bsam pa ji lta bar
T02D1198:117a-38: sems can la yang dag par ston cing tshim par
T02D1198:117a-40: ye shes dang mthu dag gis zhes gsungs so //
T02D1198:117b-0: de ltar ni @117b 'das pa'i srid pa'i gnas skabs
T02D1198:117b-1: bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs kyi
T02D1198:117b-2: sa ste / yang dag par sog par chos mthun pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:117b-3: 'dir ni sbyin pa la sogs pa bsod nams rnams sog cing /
T02D1198:117b-4: snga mar ni dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams so //
T02D1198:117b-5: 'chi ba la mngon par phyogs par sbyor ba'i gnas skabs bzhin du mos pas spyod pa'i sa ste /
T02D1198:117b-6: de kho na nyid nges par 'byed pa'i sbyor ba'i ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:117b-7: de'i rjes su 'das pa'i srid pa 'gog pa las
T02D1198:117b-8: bar do'i srid pa'i gnas skabs bzhin du sbyor ba'i
T02D1198:117b-9: gnas skabs kyi mtha' nye'i skad cig gi mthar thug
T02D1198:117b-10: pa 'gog pa las mtha'i skad cig gi ngo bor
T02D1198:117b-11: rab tu dga' ba'i sa'i bar chad med pa'i lam
T02D1198:117b-13: de'i rjes su bar do'i srid pa ji lta ba
T02D1198:117b-14: bzhin gyi gzugs 'gags pa'i rjes kyi mngal gyi gnas
T02D1198:117b-15: skabs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bar
T02D1198:117b-16: chad med pa'i lam 'gags pa'i rjes la sa bcu'i
T02D1198:117b-17: gnas skabs rig par bya ste /
T02D1198:117b-18: sa 'di rnams sgrib pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:117b-19: btsas pa'i gnas skabs dang 'dra ba ni sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs te /
T02D1198:117b-20: 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa nye bar bzung nas
T02D1198:117b-21: spyod yul thams cad so sor nyams su myong ba'i
T02D1198:117b-22: phyir te / btsas pa ni dbang po thams cad
T02D1198:117b-23: kyi spyod yul so sor nyams su myong bas so
T02D1198:117b-24: phyir te / // de nas bu la sogs pa
T02D1198:117b-25: skyod par byed pa'i gnas skabs dang 'dra ba ni
T02D1198:117b-26: sprul pa'i sku lha spro ba'i gnas skabs so //
T02D1198:117b-27: de la mngal gyi gnas skabs bcu rnams te /
T02D1198:117b-28: khu ba'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T02D1198:117b-29: nur nur po'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T02D1198:117b-30: ltar ltar po'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T02D1198:117b-31: mkhrang gyur gyi lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T02D1198:117b-32: lus dang rjes su mthun pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T02D1198:117b-33: rang bzhin dang rjes su mthun pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T02D1198:117b-34: las dang bcas pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs dang /
T02D1198:117b-35: yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus kyi gnas skabs rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1198:118a-2: mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1198:118a-3: chu zheng yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1198:118a-4: de rnams dang rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1198:118a-5: sa rnams chos mthun pa nyid du nye bar mtshon
T02D1198:118a-6: par bya'o // de ltar de dang der lhag par mos par bsgom pa la yang ste /
T02D1198:118a-7: gang phyir 'di la 'ang rang gi snying ga'i sa
T02D1198:118a-8: bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin
T02D1198:118a-9: gshegs pa la sogs pa mchod pa la sogs pa
T02D1198:118a-10: rnams kyis bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi sa'o //
T02D1198:118a-11: de'i rjes su stong pa nyid la gzhug pa ni sbyor ba'i gnas skabs so //
T02D1198:118a-12: de nas de'i gnas skabs 'gags pa las srid pa
T02D1198:118a-13: bar do'i gnas skabs dang 'dra bar kha cig tu
T02D1198:118a-14: ho: yig dmar po gnyis kyi nang du chud pa'i
T02D1198:118a-15: sa bon gyi yi ge'i gnas skabs sam yi ge
T02D1198:118a-16: gsum gyi gnas skabs sam kha cig tu n'a da
T02D1198:118a-17: tsam ste / rnam pa gsum ka yang lus dang ngag dang sems rnams bskyed pa'i phyir ro //

T02D1198:121b-5: / 'dis ni sems rnams thams cad dang byang chub
T02D1198:121b-6: kyang de bzhin nyid dag pa las mi g-yo ba
T02D1198:121b-7: nyid la gnas pa'o zhes pas de rnams la brnyas
T02D1198:121b-8: / par byed do // padma mthar byed ni phung
T02D1198:121b-9: po stong pa nyid la dran pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1198:121b-10: kyis na ma dag pa'i 'dod chags las skyes pa'i
T02D1198:121b-11: thun mong ba'i ngag phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug
T02D1198:121b-12: pa las kyang mthar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:121b-13: de nyid kyi phyir phung po'i bdud las rgyal ba la yang 'di rab tu nus so //
T02D1198:121b-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rnam par rtog pa'i
T02D1198:121b-15: nyon mongs pa can no zhes pas ma dag pa'i
T02D1198:121b-16: nyon mongs pa dang las thams cad dang rnam par
T02D1198:121b-17: rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi bgegs la gnod pa
T02D1198:121b-18: byed pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i bdud las mchog tu
T02D1198:121b-19: rgyal ba ni bgegs mthar byed do //
T02D1198:121b-20: 'dzin pa dngos po dmigs pa tsam dang /
T02D1198:121b-21: chags pa de la 'dun pa dang /
T02D1198:121b-22: rnam pa dngos po'i rnam par byed pa dang /
T02D1198:121b-23: g-yo med brtan par gyur pa'i reg pa dang /
T02D1198:121b-24: rgyu nyid rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i sems gzhan skye ba'i ngor dang /
T02D1198:121b-25: 'bras bu nyid rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyu la ltos nas te /
T02D1198:121b-26: 'di rnams rnam par dag pas na rnam par dag

T02D1198:121b-28: rnams ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa drug
T02D1198:121b-29: rnams te / khro bo'i dbang po de rnams kyang
T02D1198:121b-30: mi mthun phyogs las ldog pa na mthu thogs pa
T02D1198:121b-31: med pa'i ngo bo can yin pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1198:121b-32: rnams te / ro // de skad du yang 'dus pa phyi mar gsungs pa /
T02D1198:121b-33: 'dzin dang chags pa nyid dang ni //
T02D1198:121b-34: rnam pa de bzhin g-yo med pa //
T02D1198:121b-35: rgyu nyid dang ni 'bras bu nyid //
T02D1198:121b-36: drug por sems yang dag 'byung ba //
T02D1198:121b-37: 'dod pa'i rgyal po sogs drug rnams //
T02D1198:121b-38: khro bo'i dbang po rnams zhes bsgrags /
T02D1198:122a-0: rnam par rtog pa mi mthun phyogs ma lus pa zil gyis gnon pa'i @122a * //
T02D1198:122a-1: phyir rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin las g-yo ba med do zhes pa mi g-yo ba'o //

T02D1198:122a-3: de rnam par dag pas na mngon par 'dod pa thob pas gsal ba'o zhes 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
T02D1198:122a-4: sems can rnams kyi sdig pa ni sngon po ste /

T02D1198:122a-6: sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i phung po 'jig
T02D1198:122a-7: pa'i ched du 'di stobs te nus pa chen po'o
T02D1198:122a-9: gtsug tor ni khams gsum pa las shin tu 'das

T02D1198:122a-12: bya rnams la bskor ba la 'di'i ngang tshul yin
T02D1198:122a-13: pa ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
T02D1198:122a-14: bgegs rnams gnod pa ste 'jigs par byed pa bsal lo zhes pa gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //
T02D1198:122a-15: ye shes sems dpa' dam tshig sems dpa' la gzhug pa ste /
T02D1198:122a-16: de ni 'dir tha mal pa'i nga rgyal bsal bar
T02D1198:122a-17: rang gi sems snang ba'i ngo bo phyag la sogs
T02D1198:122a-18: pas rnam par mdzes pa'i lha'i sku'o //
T02D1198:122a-19: kha cig tu sa bon yang gsungs shing /
T02D1198:122a-20: kha cig ni sa bon kho na'o //
T02D1198:122a-21: de'i bdag nyid du mngon du byas pa'i gnyis su

T02D1198:122a-26: sems can gyi don byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang
T02D1198:122a-27: rnam par dag pa'i sems can gyi tha snyad kyi
T02D1198:122a-29: sa bon yang nur nur po bzhin du sems can no //
T02D1198:122a-30: 'o na dam tshig sems dpa' ni ye shes sems
T02D1198:122a-31: dpa' dang ste kha cig tu sangs rgyas rnams thams
T02D1198:122a-32: cad dang / kha cig tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D1198:122a-33: kha cig tu 'gro ba dang yang lhan cig de'i

T02D1198:122a-37: yin / zhing / mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags
T02D1198:122a-38: pa la sogs pa'i dang snying rje chen po'i dang
T02D1198:122a-39: yin / zhing / / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1198:122a-40: tshogs kyi spyod yul cung zad kyang med par yang
T02D1198:122b-1: zhig 'ga' zhig tu ye shes sems dpa' dang sangs
T02D1198:122b-2: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'gro ba
T02D1198:122b-3: rgyud gcig gi nang du chud na yang /
T02D1198:122b-4: slar yang spro ba gsungs pa de ni ches shin tu 'gal te /
T02D1198:122b-5: sems can rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyun re re ba'o zhes pa'i grub mtha'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:122b-6: cig car rtog pa med pa'i shes pa du ma skye ba la ni /
T02D1198:122b-7: rnam par dbye ba med par 'jug cing bya ba
T02D1198:122b-8: gcig byed pa rnams la gcig tu mos pa kho
T02D1198:122b-9: na'i gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i rdul
T02D1198:122b-10: phra rab 'dus pa la bum par mos pa bzhin
T02D1198:122b-11: no zhes pas sems can gcig tu tha snyad bya
T02D1198:122b-13: gal te rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud dag gcig pa
T02D1198:122b-14: nyid dngos po pa brjod par 'dod na 'gal bar
T02D1198:122b-15: 'gyur mod / de ltar yang ma yin no //
T02D1198:122b-18: gcig nyid du lhag par mos pa yang thog mar
T02D1198:122b-19: goms pa dang ldan pa kho na'i sgrib pa med
T02D1198:122b-20: pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag
T02D1198:122b-21: pa'i sems dpa' de'i bdag nyid du lhag par mos
T02D1198:122b-22: pa ni / brtan par gus pa dang bcas shing
