T02D1198:122b-24: nga rgyal bsal la nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1198:122b-25: rnam par dag pa nye bar byed do //
T02D1198:122b-27: dpal de kho na nyid 'dus par /
T02D1198:122b-28: rnam pa lnga mngon par byang chub par gyur pa na /
T02D1198:122b-29: aom ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yin
T02D1198:122b-30: pa de ltar nga'o zhes pa'i rjes thogs su gsungs
T02D1198:122b-31: pa / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
T02D1198:122b-32: rdo rje dbyings kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bdag
T02D1198:122b-33: nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas /
T02D1198:122b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing bod nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D1198:122b-35: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad
T02D1198:122b-36: bdag la byin gyis rlobs shig / mngon par byang
T02D1198:122b-37: chub pa 'di brtan par mdzad du gsol zhes so
T02D1198:122b-38: // de nas de skad gsol pa na de bzhin
T02D1198:122b-39: gshegs pa rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rdo
T02D1198:122b-40: rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje la rab tu
T02D1198:122b-42: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings /
T02D1198:123a-1: la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa
T02D1198:123a-2: nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
T02D1198:123a-3: so // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo
T02D1198:123a-4: rje mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes phyag rgya gsang
T02D1198:123a-5: ba'i dam tshig la zhugs so //
T02D1198:123a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa
T02D1198:123a-7: nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa rang bzhin gyis dag
T02D1198:123a-8: go // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams
T02D1198:123a-9: cad mnyam pa nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i
T02D1198:123a-10: ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur to //
T02D1198:123a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur ro zhes so //
T02D1198:123a-12: 'dir rdo rje dbyings kyis ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo
T02D1198:123a-13: la mngon par dgongs pas don du gnyer bar byed
T02D1198:123a-14: de / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1198:123a-15: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1198:123a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhes so //
T02D1198:123a-17: sems dpa'i rdo rje la ni dam tshig sems dpa' la'o //
T02D1198:123a-18: de kho na la ste rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D1198:123a-19: sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D1198:123a-20: ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin bzhugs pa'i rjes
T02D1198:123a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1198:123a-23: ye shes zhes pa'i tshig bzhin rnams kyis me long
T02D1198:123a-24: lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes bzhi rnams gsungs
T02D1198:123a-25: so // yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes pa 'dis lnga pa'o //
T02D1198:123a-26: mnyam pa nyid ces pa'i tshig rnams kyis ye shes thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid gsungs so //
T02D1198:123a-27: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dang
T02D1198:123a-28: lhan cig bdag nyid brtan par gcig pa nyid du
T02D1198:123a-29: lhag par mos pa ni mnyam pa nyid du yid
T02D1198:123a-31: de bzhin du 'gro ba yang lhan cig gcig pa
T02D1198:123a-32: nyid du lhag par mos pa ni rang bzhin rnam

T02D1198:123a-35: de ltar na yang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i gnas skabs
T02D1198:123a-36: dag la byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin kho
T02D1198:123a-37: na sna tshogs pa'o zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
T02D1198:123a-38: de nyid kyi phyir rang gi sems kyi rgyun kho
T02D1198:123a-39: na'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu'i gnas skabs ye
T02D1198:123b-0: shes sems dpa' ngo bo dang lhan cig de'i @123b
T02D1198:123b-1: bdag nyid du lhag par mos par byed cing gzhan
T02D1198:123b-2: gyi rgyud kyi ye shes sems dpa' dang mnyam pa
T02D1198:123b-3: nyid kyis bar ma'i sems can rnams dang ngo zhes
T02D1198:123b-5: de'i phyir dngos po par rang nyid gzhan gyi sems
T02D1198:123b-6: kyi rgyud dang de'i bdag nyid du bsgom pa ma

T02D1198:123b-9: yin zhing / med do // de bzhin du gzhan la yang ji ltar rigs par brtag par bya'o //
T02D1198:123b-10: gang yang lha mo gcig la lha mo gzhan rnams
T02D1198:123b-11: nang du 'dus nas gtso bo la bde ba chen
T02D1198:123b-12: pos mchod par byed do zhes gsungs pa de la
T02D1198:123b-13: / yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus can thogs pa

T02D1198:123b-15: na lhan cig yul gcig tu gnas pa tsam ni
T02D1198:123b-17: phan tshun de'i bdag nyid ni ma yin no //
T02D1198:123b-18: rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud las sprul pa nyid la ni de'i bdag nyid kyang mi 'gal lo //
T02D1198:123b-19: gang phyir dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1198:123b-20: kha cig tu phal cher rgyud tha dad pa'i tshul te /
T02D1198:123b-21: dper na dpal de kho na nyid 'dus par rgyas
T02D1198:123b-22: par bstan pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D1198:123b-24: kha cig tu phal cher rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud la sprul pa ste /
T02D1198:123b-25: dper na dpal 'dus pa dang bde mchog dang kye'i
T02D1198:123b-26: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bzhin no zhes
T02D1198:123b-27: pa'o // dbang po lhag par rno ba'i sems can
T02D1198:123b-28: rnams la ni su zhig dang yang de'i bdag nyid
T02D1198:123b-30: gang phyir de ni yud kyis rdzogs pa'i rdo rje
T02D1198:123b-31: 'dzin pa'i sku kho nar 'ba' zhig pa'am dkyil 'khor
T02D1198:123b-32: pa dang bcas pa yang rung /
T02D1198:123b-33: shes rab dang bcas pa'am shes rab med par bdag nyid goms par byed do //
T02D1198:123b-34: de ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la
T02D1198:123b-35: byang chub sems kyi rang gi ngo bor nges pa
T02D1198:123b-36: nyid du goms par byed cing 'di snyam du sems
T02D1198:123b-37: te / bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo
T02D1198:123b-38: rje de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab dang thabs kyi
T02D1198:123b-39: ye shes kyi ngo bo 'di kho na 'dod chags
T02D1198:123b-40: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
T02D1198:123b-41: dang rig ma la sogs pa'i rnam pas kun rdzob
T02D1198:124a-1: nyon mongs pas yongs su gos pa'i sems can gyi
T02D1198:124a-2: khams kyi sems dri ma med par byed pa'i don
T02D1198:124a-3: du / de ltar gyur pa'i lam la 'jug pa'i
T02D1198:124a-4: skal pa dang ldan pa'i gdul bya de rnams de
T02D1198:124a-5: kho na nyid la sbyor bar mdzad cing 'di ltar
T02D1198:124a-6: rnam par gnas pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:124a-7: 'di lta bu kho na yang man ngag go //
T02D1198:124a-8: 'di ltar yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa
T02D1198:124a-9: dang 'dra ba kho nar chos rnams thams cad kyang
T02D1198:124a-10: rang bzhin med pa nyid du bla ma'i man ngag
T02D1198:124a-12: de nyid kyi phyir rim pa 'dis rdo rje sems
T02D1198:124a-13: dpa' la sogs pa bsgoms pas chos thams cad rang
T02D1198:124a-14: bzhin med pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes dgongs
T02D1198:124a-15: nas / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgom
T02D1198:124a-16: pa phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi ched du
T02D1198:124a-17: 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis nye bar

T02D1198:124a-19: par dgongs nas gdul bya rnams kyi sems kyi 'jug
T02D1198:124a-20: pa rjes su gzhug pa'i ched du dam tshig gi
T02D1198:124a-21: de kho na nyid kyi rgyud chen por gsungs pa
T02D1198:124a-22: nas / bstan to // / 'dir ni bdag gi gsang ba yi //
T02D1198:124a-23: snying po kun bsdus la gnas nas //
T02D1198:124a-24: rdo rje lha mo kun 'dus dang /
T02D1198:124a-25: gar kun gyis ni gar mdzad do //
T02D1198:124a-27: 'di la shin tu mang zhing legs par bshad par nus te /
T02D1198:124a-28: gzhung mangs pas 'jigs pas ma brjod do //
T02D1198:124a-29: dbang bskur ba ni ye shes kyi chu rnams kyis
T02D1198:124a-30: bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi
T02D1198:124a-32: de'i phyir dbang bskur ba'i khu bas spyi bor gnas
T02D1198:124a-33: pas rgyas gdab par rigs kyi dbye bas 'gyur ro
T02D1198:124a-34: // de ltar yang gus par byed pa'i tshul du
T02D1198:124a-35: gang spyi bor bsgom pa de ni rgyas gdab pa'o
T02D1198:124a-36: // // 'di rnams ni rang gi bdag po'i ting nge 'dzin las 'byung ba'i phyir te /
T02D1198:124a-37: de med par rang nyid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:124a-38: 'di ni 'di rnams mgu bar byed pa dang sdug bsngal bar byed pa ni ma yin gyi /
T02D1198:124a-39: 'on kyang yongs su tshim par byed pa kho na'o //
T02D1198:124a-40: de la sems tsam gyi lus can nyid kyi phyir
T02D1198:124a-41: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams la mi bskyod
T02D1198:124b-0: de'i @124b rang bzhin nyid du nye bar gsal ba'i don du'o //
T02D1198:124b-1: byang chub sems las rab tu byung ba nyid kyi
T02D1198:124b-2: phyir mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pas so
T02D1198:124b-3: // rdo rje 'dzin pa ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D1198:124b-4: rgyu'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir te /
T02D1198:124b-5: 'bras bu kho nar 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:124b-6: 'dis gnyis kar yang gnyis ka khyab par byed pa
T02D1198:124b-7: nyid kyi phyir yang 'di dag phan tshun rgyas gdab
T02D1198:124b-8: po // de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1198:124b-9: 'bras bus rgyu la rgyas gdab cing //
T02D1198:124b-10: rgyu yis 'bras bu rgyas gdab bya //
T02D1198:124b-11: bsgom bya gzhan du dngos grub ni //
T02D1198:124b-12: bskal pa byed pas skye mi 'gyur //
T02D1198:124b-14: 'bras bu mi bskyod pas rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa la rgyas btab nas bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1198:124b-15: 'bras bu la yang rgyu yis so //
T02D1198:124b-16: gang yang rdo rje 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D1198:124b-17: pa lnga'i cod pan can nyid du de dang der
T02D1198:124b-18: gsungs pa'i rgyas gdab pa de yang de ni ye
T02D1198:124b-19: shes lnga rnams su de'i bdag nyid kyis nang du
T02D1198:124b-20: 'dus pa'i phyir / 'bras bu de rnams kyi ste rab tu bsgom pa'i dbang du byas nas so //
T02D1198:124b-21: 'o na de lta na 'di dag kho na dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid du rigs te /
T02D1198:124b-22: thams cad kyi bdag po nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
T02D1198:124b-23: rnam pa sna tshogs pa la mos pa'i dbang las
T02D1198:124b-24: gzhan gyi sgo nas kyang dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi
T02D1198:124b-25: de kho na nyid rnam par gzigs pa'i phyir rnam
T02D1198:124b-26: par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyang bdag po
T02D1198:124b-27: nyid do // gang gsung bar 'gyur ba /
T02D1198:124b-28: lha ni gang dang ci zhig ni //
T02D1198:124b-29: 'khor lo'i dbus su nges gnas pa'i //
T02D1198:124b-30: mtshan mngon 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes //
T02D1198:124b-31: dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrags //
T02D1198:124b-33: rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas gdab pa ni bu'i sgo nas pha'i rjes su 'brang ba na /
T02D1198:124b-34: de las skyes pa nyid du bshad pa'i don du'o //
T02D1198:124b-35: de kho na la mes po yang nang du 'dus so //
T02D1198:124b-36: gang yang mi bskyod pa dkyil 'khor pa nyid yin
T02D1198:124b-37: pa de ni me long lta bu la sogs pa
T02D1198:124b-38: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi bdag
T02D1198:124b-39: nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shin tu rnam
T02D1198:124b-40: par dag pa'i me long lta bu la sogs pa'i
T02D1198:124b-41: ngo bo yin pa de yis rig par bya'o //
T02D1198:125a-1: pa la ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos
T02D1198:125a-2: kyi dbyings kyi ye shes tsam gyi ngo bo mi
T02D1198:125a-3: bskyod pa'o // byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1198:125a-4: rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D1198:125a-5: phyogs gcig yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1198:125a-6: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gti mug rdo rje la sogs
T02D1198:125a-7: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la sogs
T02D1198:125a-8: pa'i ming gzhan gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i
T02D1198:125a-9: shes rab kyis 'khyud pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1198:125a-11: de ltar 'o na sa'i snying po la sogs pa
T02D1198:125a-12: lnga rnams dang gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa
T02D1198:125a-13: rnams dang spyan ma la sogs pa rnams rnam par
T02D1198:125a-14: snang mdzad kyis rgyas gdab pa 'thob ste /
T02D1198:125a-15: 'di rnams gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
T02D1198:125a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni so sor de bzhin
T02D1198:125a-18: gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1198:125a-19: / gzhan gyi yul la yang de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan bdag po nyid du yod do zhes pas /
T02D1198:125a-20: ji ltar rigs par gzhan rnams kyis rgyas gdab pa'o //
T02D1198:125a-21: de ltar ni 'du byed kyi phung po'i rang bzhin
T02D1198:125a-22: gti mug la sogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs
T02D1198:125a-23: pa lnga'i bdag nyid can du brjod par bya bas
T02D1198:125a-24: so // shin tu dang ba nyid kyi phyir mig ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas gdab pa'o //
T02D1198:125a-25: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba ni mi bskyod pas so //
T02D1198:125a-26: dri la longs spyod pa srid pa bar do dang
T02D1198:125a-27: cig shos kyi gnas skabs dag la dril mngon par
T02D1198:125a-28: dga' bas khyab pa'i phyir sna la rin chen dbang
T02D1198:125a-29: pos so // ro la chags pa ni shin tu
T02D1198:125a-30: stobs dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir lce la 'dod
T02D1198:125a-31: pos so // chags kyis so // lus kyi yan
T02D1198:125a-32: lag thams cad la rnam par rgyu ba nyid kyi
T02D1198:125a-33: phyir reg byed la don yod kyis so //
T02D1198:125a-34: dbang po thams cad la rjes su 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir yid la mi bskyod pas so //
T02D1198:125a-35: dbang po'i rjes su 'brang bas de'i yul gzugs la
T02D1198:125a-36: sogs pa rnams kyis rgyas gdab pa kha cig tu
T02D1198:125a-37: gsungs te / ji ltar ye shes zhabs kyis 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs ltar ro //
T02D1198:125b-0: kha cig tu ni rnam pa gzhan du @125b ste ;
T02D1198:125b-1: ji ltar bsdus pa'i rim pa ltar ro //
T02D1198:125b-2: gti mug gi gzhi can nyid kyi phyir gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas gdab pa'o //
T02D1198:125b-3: bstod pa la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis mtho bar
T02D1198:125b-4: khengs pa'i phyir sgra la rin chen 'byung bas so
T02D1198:125b-5: // gur gum la sogs pa rnams la rjes su
T02D1198:125b-6: chags pa'i phyir dri la 'od dpag med kyis so
T02D1198:125b-7: // // lus kyi yan lag thams cad tshim par
T02D1198:125b-8: byed cing rnam par rgyu ba nyid kyi phyir rol
T02D1198:125b-10: dbang po thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir reg bya la mi bskyod pas te /
T02D1198:125b-11: chos kyi dbyings la yang ngo zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:125b-12: sra zhing mkhregs pa nyid kyis gti mug chen po'i
T02D1198:125b-13: gzhi nyid kyi phyir sa la rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1198:125b-14: kyis so // chu ni nam mkha' bzhin pa nyid
T02D1198:125b-15: kyi phyir dang chad pa dang phug pa rnams kyang
T02D1198:125b-16: de lta kho nar sdud pas mi bskyod pa nyid
T02D1198:125b-17: kyi phyir mi bskyod pas so //
T02D1198:125b-18: me de 'od dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir 'od dpag med kyis so //
T02D1198:125b-19: rnam par rgyu ba nyid kyi phyir rlung ni don yod kyis so //
T02D1198:125b-20: gti mug dga' ma la sogs pa'i ngo bo yin
T02D1198:125b-21: pa nyid kyi phyir spyan ma la sogs pa rnams
T02D1198:125b-22: gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyas
T02D1198:125b-23: gdab pa'o // de bzhin du gti mug la nye
T02D1198:125b-24: bar longs spyod pa las dang gti mug zad pa'i
T02D1198:125b-25: ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir gshin rje mthar
T02D1198:125b-26: byed dang mi g-yo ba rnam par snang mdzad kyis
T02D1198:125b-28: nga rgyal la nye bar longs spyod pa dang nga
T02D1198:125b-29: rgyal zad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir shes rab
T02D1198:125b-30: mthar byed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po rin chen 'byung
T02D1198:125b-31: bas so // 'dod chags la longs spyod pa las
T02D1198:125b-32: dang 'dod chags zad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir
T02D1198:125b-33: padma mthar byed dang dbyug pa sngon po 'od dpag
T02D1198:125b-34: bas so // med kyis so // phrag dog la
T02D1198:125b-35: longs spyod pa dang phrag dog zad pa'i ngo bo
T02D1198:125b-36: nyid kyi phyir bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang stobs po
T02D1198:125b-38: zhe sdang la longs spyod pa dang zhe sdang zad
T02D1198:125b-39: pa'i ngo bo yin pa nyid kyi phyir gtsug tor
T02D1198:125b-40: 'khor los sgyur ba dang gnod mdzes rgyal po mi
T02D1198:125b-41: bskyod pas so // 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs
T02D1198:125b-42: su ni sems las skye ba'i khyad par gyi ngo
T02D1198:125b-43: bo nyid kyi phyir dang dang khro bo'i ngo bo
T02D1198:126a-1: phyir khro bo brgyad rnams mi bskyod pas rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D1198:126a-2: sems las skye ba'i khyad par nyid yod na yang
T02D1198:126a-3: gshin rje mthar byed pa dang padma mthar byed dag
T02D1198:126a-5: gang kha cig tu rigs kyi bdag po rnams ni
T02D1198:126a-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams su nang du 'dus par
T02D1198:126a-7: gsungs pa de rang gi ngo bo tha mi dad
T02D1198:126a-9: rigs kyi bdag po'i kha dog gi rim pa las 'das pa la rgyu dang yang /
T02D1198:126a-10: ci ltar rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa tha mi dad
T02D1198:126a-11: pa la 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams tha
T02D1198:126a-12: dad ces pa'i dogs pas gang ba la /
T02D1198:126a-13: bcom ldan 'das kho nas gsungs pa /
T02D1198:126a-14: rgyags pas kha dog tha dad de //
T02D1198:126a-15: ro yi snying yang de bzhin no //
T02D1198:126a-16: rang gi rgyu ni dbang bskur bas //
T02D1198:126a-17: 'bras bu rten gyi dbye bas so //
T02D1198:126a-18: sngags kyis chos ni dbye bar bya //
T02D1198:126a-19: rig ma'ang chos kyi phyag rgyas so //
T02D1198:126a-21: rgyags pa ni 'dir sems spro ba'i khyad par ro //
T02D1198:126a-22: de'i tha dad las sa bon la sogs pa rnams kyi kha dog tha dad pa'o //
T02D1198:126a-23: ro ni so so rang la yod pa'i bsam pa'i 'gyur ba'i bye brag ste /
T02D1198:126a-25: de nyid kyi phyir dang po pa'i sa bon la
T02D1198:126a-26: sogs pa'i kha dog gi dbye ba dang snying ga'i
T02D1198:126a-27: sa bon gyi dbye ba ji ltar rigs par brjod
T02D1198:126a-28: do // rang gi rgyu ni ji ltar rigs par zhe sdang la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D1198:126a-29: de dbang bskur bas tha dad de //
T02D1198:126a-31: rgyu'i dbye ba las rgyas 'debs pa'i dbye ba'o zhes
T02D1198:126a-32: pas gang du rgyas 'debs tha dad pa der rgyu
T02D1198:126a-33: yang tha dad pa kho na'o zhes rtogs par bya'o
T02D1198:126a-34: // de ltar kha dog gi dbye ba la sogs pa la yang rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1198:126a-35: de ltar rigs gcig nyid du yod na yang bsam pa'i 'gyur ba'i dbye ba las dang /
T02D1198:126a-36: spro ba'i dbye ba las khro bo la sogs pa
T02D1198:126a-37: rnams las rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams
T02D1198:126a-39: bsam pa'i 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba med
T02D1198:126a-40: na yang khro bo rnams kha cig zhe sdang gi
T02D1198:126a-41: rigs nyid yin gyi zhe sdang gi ngo bo nyid
T02D1198:126a-42: ma yin te / sems las skye ba'i khyad par
T02D1198:126a-43: rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang
T02D1198:126b-0: ma yin te / / mi @126b bskyod pas ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:126b-1: de ltar rten gyi dbye ba las ji skad bshad pa'i ngo bo gnas kyi khyad par bskyed nas /
T02D1198:126b-2: rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa mtshungs na yang 'bras bu'i rdo rje 'dzin pa tha dad pa'o //
T02D1198:126b-3: de yang gtso bo'i phyir 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1198:126b-4: pa ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi dbang du
T02D1198:126b-5: byas nas gsungs par rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1198:126b-6: ngag gi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni sngags
T02D1198:126b-7: kyis zhes pa sa bon gyi yi ges chos zhes
T02D1198:126b-8: pa yi ge gsum la sogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D1198:126b-9: sngags so // de ltar rig ma yang ste lus
T02D1198:126b-10: kyang chos kyi phyag rgyas zhes pa sa bon de
T02D1198:126b-11: kho nas so zhes pa shin tu 'phros pas chog
T02D1198:126b-12: sngags so // go // 'di ltar man ngag ji lta bar bsgom pa'i rim pa ni 'di'o //
T02D1198:126b-13: snga bar sgom pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas
T02D1198:126b-14: su stan bde ba la ji ltar bde bar 'dug
T02D1198:126b-15: pas / aom a'a: h'um zhes pas gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba byas nas /
T02D1198:126b-16: dam tshig bsten pa sngon ma can gyis gtor ma byin te /
T02D1198:126b-17: sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa la bltas nas snying rje bar gyur bzhin pas /
T02D1198:126b-18: yud kyis stong pa nyid du mos pa las 'chad
T02D1198:126b-19: par 'gyur ba'i phyag mtshan dang sku mdog la sogs
T02D1198:126b-20: pa dang ldan pa shes rab dang bcas pa'i rdo
T02D1198:126b-21: rje sems dpar bdag nyid lhag par mos nas /
T02D1198:126b-22: rang gi snying gar aam yig las skyes pa'i zla
T02D1198:126b-23: ba la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems mngon par
T02D1198:126b-25: dbus su sngon po nyid kyis dang phyi rol du
T02D1198:126b-26: dkar po nyid kyis dngul chu 'dra ba'i mdog can
T02D1198:126b-27: gyi h'um yig 'od zer lnga 'phro ba yang dag
T02D1198:126b-28: par bltas te / de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams
T02D1198:126b-29: kyis lus mtha' dag snang bar byas nas phyir 'phros
T02D1198:126b-30: par bltas te / pa rnams kyis / bcom ldan
T02D1198:126b-31: 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil 'khor ba'i lha dang
T02D1198:126b-32: bcas pa 'og min gyi mthar thug pa bdag nyid
T02D1198:126b-33: dang nye bar mdun gyi nam mkha' la mar me
T02D1198:126b-34: len pa'i rigs pas bkug nas /
T02D1198:126b-35: h'um yig la 'od zer zhugs pa'i rjes thogs su
T02D1198:126b-36: cig car spros pa'i lha mo bcu drug po rnams
T02D1198:127a-1: de la gling bu ma dang pi wang ma dang
T02D1198:127a-2: rnga zlum ma dang rdza rnga ma dang bzhad ma
T02D1198:127a-3: dang sgeg mo dang glu ma dang gar ma dang
T02D1198:127a-4: me tog ma dang bdug pa ma dang mar me
T02D1198:127a-5: ma dang dri chab ma dang /
T02D1198:127a-6: me long ma dang reg bya ma rnams phyi'i mchod pa ste /
T02D1198:127a-7: reg bya mas sna tshogs pa'i gos 'bul ba'o //
T02D1198:127a-8: ro mas gsang ba'i mchod pas so //
T02D1198:127a-9: chos mas de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa ste /
T02D1198:127a-10: rdo rje snyems ma la rab tu zhugs nas /
T02D1198:127a-11: bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud de bde ba chen po'i rjes su chags par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:127a-13: bdag nyid kyi sdig pa bdag gis 'chags shing slar yang mi bgyid do //
T02D1198:127a-14: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa
T02D1198:127a-15: dang so so'i skye bo rnams thams cad kyi bsod
T02D1198:127a-16: nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D1198:127a-17: bdag nyid dang 'gro ba'i dge ba bla na med
T02D1198:127a-18: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ched
T02D1198:127a-19: du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
T02D1198:127a-20: byang chub kyi bar du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /
T02D1198:127a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma chos dkon mchog dang /
T02D1198:127a-22: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1198:127a-23: ae ma ma la bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi'o //
T02D1198:127a-24: de'i lam sgrub pas bde ba chen po'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba /
T02D1198:127a-25: nam mkha' ji srid par rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba /
T02D1198:127a-26: de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa la sems can
T02D1198:127a-27: rnams thams cad dgod par bgyi'o zhes sdig pa bshags
T02D1198:127a-28: pa la sogs pa bya ba'am /
T02D1198:127a-29: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i rjes thogs su /
T02D1198:127a-30: byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02D1198:127a-31: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D1198:127a-32: zhes pa nas sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D1198:127a-33: ces pa'i mtha' thug pa don mngon du byed cing bklag par bya'o //
T02D1198:127a-34: de ltar dge ba'i tshogs nye bar bsags nas ye shes kyi tshogs kyi don du /
T02D1198:127b-0: 'gro ba de nyid lta ba'i dra bas 'khrugs pa la bltas nas gdon par 'dod @127b pas ;
T02D1198:127b-1: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems gcig dang du
T02D1198:127b-2: ma'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir dang ma skyes pa
T02D1198:127b-3: nyid kyi phyir dngos po rnams dang de'i rgyu rnams
T02D1198:127b-5: dngos po ma grub na dngos po med pa yang
T02D1198:127b-6: mi 'grub pa'i phyir de la yang mi gnas pa
T02D1198:127b-7: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon
T02D1198:127b-8: pa med par chos rnams thams cad bsgom pa bskyed
T02D1198:127b-10: aom a'a: h'um gi ngo bor bdag nyid kyi lus
T02D1198:127b-11: dang ngag dang yid steng dang 'og dang 'og tu
T02D1198:127b-12: gnas pa gzugs brnyan lta bu stong pa nyid dang
T02D1198:127b-14: aom yig a'a: yig la dang /
T02D1198:127b-15: aa yig gdon dang bcas pa h'um yig la dang /
T02D1198:127b-16: au yig ha yig la dang de mgo bo la dang /
T02D1198:127b-17: mgo bo zla ba phyed pa la dang /
T02D1198:127b-18: de thig le la dang thig le n'a da la nang du gzhug ste /
T02D1198:127b-19: skra'i rtse mo brgya phrag stong gi cha'i tshad du gzhag nas snying rje chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1198:127b-20: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1198:127b-21: zhes pa'i sngags kyi don mngon du byed pas /
T02D1198:127b-22: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid stong pa
T02D1198:127b-23: nyid la rab tu gzhug cing n'a da tsam gyi
T02D1198:127b-24: rnam par rtog pa yang yongs su dor bar bya'o
T02D1198:127b-25: // de'i rjes su snying rje chen po'i dbang gis /
T02D1198:127b-26: n'a da'i ngo bor bdag nyid srid pa bar do'i rang bzhin nam mkha' la gzhag nas /
T02D1198:127b-27: sna tshogs chu skyes la ram las skyes pa'i nyi
T02D1198:127b-28: ma la gnas pa'i h'um yig las byung ba'i sna
T02D1198:127b-29: tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i h'um yig gi 'od
T02D1198:127b-30: zer las skyes pa'i 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i tshogs rnams
T02D1198:127b-31: kyis mtshams med par dum bu gcig tu gyur pa'i
T02D1198:127b-32: rdo rje'i ra ba dang gur dang mda'i dra ba
T02D1198:127b-34: 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi rjes su bsams nas /
T02D1198:127b-35: de'i dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma
T02D1198:127b-36: la gnas pa'i bhr'um yongs su gyur pa las 'khor
T02D1198:127b-37: lo ser po g-yas skor du 'khor ba rtsibs bcu
T02D1198:127b-38: pa'i lte ba'i dbus kyi bar skabs su gnas pa'i
T02D1198:127b-39: bdag nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sku mdog dang phyag
T02D1198:127b-40: mtshan la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i rdo rje sems
T02D1198:128a-1: sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis khro bo bcus
T02D1198:128a-2: yongs su bskor ba'i mi bskyod pa spyan drangs pa
T02D1198:128a-3: kha nas bcug pa zhu bar gyur pa lha mo'i
T02D1198:128a-4: mtsho skyes su khro bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i mi
T02D1198:128a-6: h'um zhes brjod la mi bskyod pa spros nas rang gi lus dang ro mnyam par byas te /
T02D1198:128a-7: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs yongs su gyur pas rdo
T02D1198:128a-8: rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs kyi h'um yig bcu po
T02D1198:128a-9: rnams kyi khro bo bcu rnams spro bar bya'o //
T02D1198:128a-11: khams gsum rnam par rgyal gyur nas //
T02D1198:128a-12: bgegs rnams thams cad bskrad par bya //
T02D1198:128a-13: slar yang khro bo rnam rgyal gyur //
T02D1198:128a-14: zhal gsum phyag drug par bsgoms te //
T02D1198:128a-15: khro bo'i sprin rnams spro bar bya //
T02D1198:128a-17: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad khros pa 'jig pa'i
T02D1198:128a-18: dus kyi me ltar 'bar ba'i me lce'i tshogs can
T02D1198:128a-19: / 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs dbang
T02D1198:128a-20: med pa rnams za ba lta bu sngon po dang
T02D1198:128a-21: ser po dang ljang gu'i rtsa ba dang g-yas pa
T02D1198:128a-22: dang cig shos kyi zhal gsum gdangs shing rnam par
T02D1198:128a-23: / 'gyur ba can / mche ba gtsigs shing ljags 'gyur ba /
T02D1198:128a-25: zhal so so la smin ma 'khyog cing g-yo ba
T02D1198:128a-26: dang bcas pa'i spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum pa yang
T02D1198:128a-27: yang du h'um yig sgrogs pas nga ro 'don cing
T02D1198:128a-29: dpral ba'i steng du yongs su bskor ba'i thod pa
T02D1198:128a-30: lnga'i phreng ba can mgul bar 'phyang ba'i khrag 'dzag
T02D1198:128a-31: cing / dring ba'i mgo bo lnga bcu'i phreng ba can /
T02D1198:128a-32: yid du 'ong ba'i mi'i rus pa'i rang bzhin gyi

T02D1198:128b-7: ba'i phyag rgyas rang 'dra'i shes rab ma la snyoms

T02D1198:128b-12: sdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni //

T02D1198:128b-21: de ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad du bdag nyid rnam par bsams nas /

T02D1198:128b-23: de la gshin rje gshed rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo
T02D1198:128b-24: rje ro langs ma la yang dag par 'khyud pa

T02D1198:128b-33: gzhan gyis mi thub ma la 'khyud pa rin 'byung

T02D1198:129a-22: sgrog tu sbrel bas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag

T02D1198:129a-24: dang ral gri dag dang cig shos dag na rdo

T02D1198:129a-29: zhal sngon po dang dkar ba dang dmar ba dang /
T02D1198:129a-30: g-yas rnams su dbyug pa dang ral gri dang 'khor lo rnams te /

T02D1198:130a-1: rgya'i g-yon pa'i sdigs mdzub dang mthe bong gis se

T02D1198:130a-9: aom badzra k'a li ta rdza ya h'um /

T02D1198:130a-11: de rnams ni phyogs bcu rnams su song nas bgegs
T02D1198:130a-12: kyi bdag po rnams lcags kyus bkug cing zhags pas
T02D1198:130a-13: mgrin par bcings la yang dag par bsdigs te /
T02D1198:130a-15: khro bo bcu rnams la gtod do //

T02D1198:130a-30: pa'i ngo bor bsam par bya zhing bgegs ltag ma

T02D1198:130a-34: pa thams cad du bgegs med par lhag par mos

T02D1198:130a-36: bdag nyid kyi 'og tu yam las skyes pa ba
T02D1198:130a-37: dan gnyis pa can gzhu lta bu sngon po'i rlung
T02D1198:130a-38: gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ram yig yongs su
T02D1198:130a-39: gyur pa me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa

T02D1198:130a-42: pa zlum zhing dkar ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D1198:130b-0: pa'i lam yig las skyes pa rdo @130b rjes mtshan

T02D1198:130b-5: su gyur pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag mtshan la

T02D1198:130b-22: dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom mo //

T02D1198:130b-27: n'a da'i ngo bo la bcug pa rnams rang gi
T02D1198:130b-28: sems dang tha mi dad par mos nas de las
T02D1198:130b-29: gdan dbus ma'i steng du 'phros pa rnams dbyangs kyi

T02D1198:135a-2: de bzhin du lha gzhan rnams kyang rang rang gi

T02D1198:135a-4: // de la rim pa gnyis par shar phyogs su

T02D1198:135a-18: dbang ldan du rdo rje gnod sbyin ma dkar ser

T02D1198:135a-22: phyag gi yal 'dab bzhi pa g-yas pas padma dang

T02D1198:135a-28: rlung mtshams su sa rdo rje ma ljang dkar phyag

T02D1198:135a-32: dril bu 'dzin pa cig shos so //

T02D1198:135a-35: bcas pas bzhad pa'i tshul can no //

T02D1198:135b-0: rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas 'gying ba @135b dang
T02D1198:135b-1: bcas pa'i sgeg pa'i tshul can no //
T02D1198:135b-3: h'um gi glu len cing gar sngon ma can /

T02D1198:135b-5: bas g-yas rol du bzhag nas rol ba dang bcas
T02D1198:135b-6: par mgo bo cung zad g-yon gyi char dud pa
T02D1198:135b-7: ni rdo rje sgeg mo'o zhes so //
T02D1198:135b-8: nub tu glu ma ser mo sgeg pas lus cung
T02D1198:135b-9: zad g-yo zhing phyag gnyis 'khar ba'i sil khrol 'dzin

T02D1198:135b-12: pa'o // sbrel ba'o // de gsungs pa /

T02D1198:135b-19: rlung mtshams su rdza rnga ma du ba'i mdog can no //
T02D1198:135b-20: bzhi po 'di rnams ni phyag gnyis rang rang gi rol cha sgrogs pa lhur len pa'o //
T02D1198:135b-21: de las phyi rol gyi sna ma bu la me

T02D1198:135b-23: cig shos kyi phyag gis me tog phreng ba dang
T02D1198:135b-24: 'khor lo 'dzin pas gar byed pa sngon du 'gro
T02D1198:135b-25: bas rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag nas phab
T02D1198:135b-26: ste / snying gar me tog 'bul ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1198:135b-27: bden bral du bdug spos ma du ba'i mdog can
T02D1198:135b-28: g-yon pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gis bdug spos
T02D1198:135b-29: kyi snod dang rin po che 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1198:135b-30: rlung du mar me ma gser gyi mdog can g-yon
T02D1198:135b-31: pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gis mar me'i mchod
T02D1198:135b-33: dbang ljan du dri chab ma dmar mo dri'i dung
T02D1198:135b-34: dang ral gri g-yon pa dang cig shos kyi phyag
T02D1198:135b-35: gis 'dzin pa'o // shar du me long ma dkar mo phyag zung gis me long 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1198:135b-36: lhor ro ma dmar mo phyag gnyis ro'i snod 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1198:136a-0: nub tu reg bya ma ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis gos sna tshogs @136a * //
T02D1198:136a-2: byang du chos ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis chos 'byung dkar mo 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1198:136a-3: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams

T02D1198:136a-5: pan can / thod skam lnga dang 'khor lo can

T02D1198:136a-7: pan can / / skyil krung phyed pa'i gar stabs can no //

T02D1198:136a-9: bsangs g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal na nag
T02D1198:136a-12: g-yas pa rnams kyis lcags kyu dang ral gri dang /

T02D1198:136a-15: lhor rdo rje zhags pa ma dkar ser g-yas pa
T02D1198:136a-16: dang cig shos kyi zhal nag po dang dmar po

T02D1198:136a-19: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa rnams 'dzin pa'o
T02D1198:136a-20: // nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dmar mo
T02D1198:136a-21: g-yas dang cig shos kyi zhal nag po dang dkar
T02D1198:136a-22: // ba / phyag drug ma g-yas pas lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin cing /
T02D1198:136a-23: g-yon pas 'khor lo dang dril bu dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1198:136a-24: byang du rdo rje dril bu ma ljang gu g-yas
T02D1198:136a-25: pa dang cig shos kyi zhal nag po dang dkar
T02D1198:136a-26: ba / phyag drug pa g-yas pa rnams kyis dril bu dang rdo rje dang ral gri rnams dang /
T02D1198:136a-27: g-yon pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa rnams 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1198:136a-28: bzhi po 'di rnams zhal so so la spyan gsum pa /
T02D1198:136a-29: skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba thod pa lnga
T02D1198:136a-30: dang 'khor lo can la sogs pas brgyan pa stag
T02D1198:136a-32: g-yas brkyang gi zla bos gar byed pa ste sna tshogs padma dang thod pa dang nyi ma la'o //
T02D1198:136a-33: rin chen 'byung ba dang 'od dpag med dang don
T02D1198:136a-34: yod grub pa rnams kyang sna tshogs chu skyes dang
T02D1198:136a-35: thod pa dang nyi ma la ste /
T02D1198:136b-0: lha @136b gzhan rnams thams cad ni sna tshogs mtsho
T02D1198:136b-1: skyes dang thod pa dang zla ba la gnas pa
T02D1198:136b-2: ste thams cad nyi ma'i 'od can kho na'o //
T02D1198:136b-3: de ltar sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bdag nyid kyi lha'i 'khor lo 'di bkod nas /
T02D1198:136b-4: snying ga'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu spros la /
T02D1198:136b-5: snying ga'i 'od zer gzhan rnams kyis rdo rje lcags kyu ma yang dag par bskul te /
T02D1198:136b-6: des dza: zhes brjod pas snying ga nas spros pa'i
T02D1198:136b-7: khro bo rnams kyis yongs su bskor bas ye shes
T02D1198:136b-8: kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas mdun du bzhugs su
T02D1198:136b-9: gsol te / mchod yon dang zhabs bsil phul cing yang dag par mchod la /
T02D1198:136b-10: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bskul ba'i rdo rje zhags
T02D1198:136b-11: pa ma h'um yig brjod pa mos snying ga nas
T02D1198:136b-12: spros pa'i 'od zer dkar po rnams kyis ye shes
T02D1198:136b-13: kyi 'khor lo bzhengs su gsol te /

T02D1198:136b-15: pa ti h'um dza: sv'a h'a zhes brjod cing spyan
T02D1198:136b-16: drangs nas pad kor sngon ma can gyis rang gi

T02D1198:136b-19: rje lcags sgrog mas snying ga nas spros pa'i 'od
T02D1198:136b-20: zer ser po rnams kyis dkyil 'khor la khyab par

T02D1198:136b-24: dkyil 'khor 'gegs pa'i phyir mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1198:136b-25: thams cad la mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1198:136b-26: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa dang /

T02D1198:136b-28: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i snying ga'i sa bon gyi
T02D1198:136b-29: 'od rnams kyis bskul ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

T02D1198:136b-32: pa rnams kyis sngar bzhin du thams cad la dus
T02D1198:136b-33: gcig tu dbang bskur ba na cod pan la rigs

T02D1198:136b-35: de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de

T02D1198:136b-37: rdo rje ma dang glu ma dang reg bya rdo
T02D1198:137a-0: rje ma dang chos kyi dbyings rdo rje ma @137a
T02D1198:137a-1: * // rnams kyi rigs kyi dbang po mi bskyod pa'o //

T02D1198:137a-3: rje ma dang me tog ma dang bzhad ma dang
T02D1198:137a-4: gling bu ma dang rdo rje lcags kyu ma rnams
T02D1198:137a-5: kyi rnam par snang mdzad do //

T02D1198:137a-7: pi wang ma dang rdo rje zhags pa ma rnams kyi rin chen 'byung ba'o //
T02D1198:137a-8: gos dkar mo dang rdo rje chags pa ma dang
T02D1198:137a-9: mar me ma dang dri chab ma dang mu ku
T02D1198:137a-10: nda ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma rnams kyi

T02D1198:137a-14: rdza rnga ma dang rdo rje dril bu ma rnams
T02D1198:137a-16: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyis bkug cing zhal
T02D1198:137a-17: du zhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D1198:137a-18: byang chub sems zhu ba las skyes pa padma'i nang
T02D1198:137a-19: du gnas pa'i lha mo bcu drug gi sa bon
T02D1198:137a-20: gyi 'od zer rnams kyis bkug pa'i lha mo'i tshogs
T02D1198:137a-21: lha mo'i zhal nas zhugs pa byang chub sems zhu
T02D1198:137a-22: ba'i ngo bos de nyid du dbab po //

T02D1198:137a-24: dang 'od zer rnams shes rab ma'i ba spu'i bu
T02D1198:137a-25: ga nas phyung ba rnams las lha mo'i tshogs dang
T02D1198:137a-26: sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa dang nye bar spyod pa
T02D1198:137a-28: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1198:137a-29: zhes pa'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o //
T02D1198:137a-30: de nas sum cu rtsa gnyis par 'chad par 'gyur
T02D1198:137a-31: ba rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags rnams kyis bcom ldan
T02D1198:137a-32: 'das pa lha mo rnams kyis zhal rnams kyis bstod
T02D1198:137a-33: par bya'o // 'od zer gyis bskul ba'i sems can
T02D1198:137a-34: thams cad kyis kyang phyag 'tshal ba dang bstod pa
T02D1198:137a-35: dang gsol ba 'debs pa mos par bya'o //
T02D1198:137a-36: de nas sum cu rtsa bzhi par 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas bdud rtsi rab tu bsgrubs te /
T02D1198:137a-37: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bskul ba las /
T02D1198:137a-38: snod sum cu rtsa bdun du son pa'am so so'i lag par gnas pa /
T02D1198:137a-39: h'um dkar po las skyes pa nas kyi 'bras bu'i
T02D1198:137a-40: tshad tsam pa h'um yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i
T02D1198:137a-41: rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i lce'i 'od zer gyi sbu
T02D1198:137b-0: gu rnams kyis sam yid kyis drangs @137b pa rnams
T02D1198:137b-1: ma zhen par myang bar bya'o //
T02D1198:137b-2: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid kyang kun rdzob
T02D1198:137b-3: dang don dam pa yang brtag par bya'o zhes pa
T02D1198:137b-4: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge
T02D1198:137b-5: 'dzin gnyis pa'o // de'i rjes su rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1198:137b-6: pas bskul ba'i dkyil 'khor pa'i lha ma lus pa
T02D1198:137b-7: rnams dang bcom ldan 'das kyis sku'i bkod pa spros
T02D1198:137b-8: pa yud kyis nam mkha'i khongs khyab pa rnams kyis
T02D1198:137b-9: gzhan rnams kyi don dang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i
T02D1198:137b-10: go 'phang 'thob par nus pa nyid du bskyed nas
T02D1198:137b-11: rang gi lus kyi bkod pa rnams rtsa ba'i lus
T02D1198:137b-12: la bsdu'o zhes pa las rgyal po mchog ces bya
T02D1198:137b-14: de'i rjes su dngos grub thams cad myur du 'grub
T02D1198:137b-15: pa'i ched du sems brtan par byed par 'dod pas
T02D1198:137b-16: lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin pa dang bde
T02D1198:137b-17: ba chen po'i mdud pa'i bu ga rnams su aam
T02D1198:137b-19: gsang ba'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i rlung gis me bskul
T02D1198:137b-20: ba'i gtum mo'i rang bzhin aam yig 'bar ba'i 'od
T02D1198:137b-21: zer gyis zhu ba'i ham yig la sogs pa yi
T02D1198:137b-22: ge gsum dang lhan cig dbyer med pa'i aam yig
T02D1198:137b-23: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis thig
T02D1198:137b-24: ler gyur par bsgom zhing sgom pa yongs su smin
T02D1198:137b-25: par mos nas / de nyid las 'od zer gyi
T02D1198:137b-26: re kh'a phra mo me lce gcig tu 'bar ba
T02D1198:137b-28: de'i mthus bdud rtsi 'dzag pas gang ba'i thig le brkyal [?] zhing /
T02D1198:137b-29: 'od zer gyi re kh'a de yang bsil bar gyur te /
T02D1198:137b-30: de nas thig le sems nges pas ji srid du
T02D1198:137b-31: brtan pa thob par mtshan ma rnams kyis nye bar
T02D1198:137b-32: dmigs pa de srid du blta'o //
T02D1198:137b-33: brtan pa nye bar mtshon pa na 'od zer gyi
T02D1198:137b-34: re kh'a de'i snang ba gsal bas sna tshogs par
T02D1198:137b-35: mtshon par byed par bsams te thams cad lag pa'i
T02D1198:137b-36: mthil gyi skyu ru ra bzhin du blta'o //
T02D1198:137b-37: ting nge 'dzin yang myur du rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes pa thig le'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1198:137b-38: yang na snying ga'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyi tshogs
T02D1198:137b-39: las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'gro
T02D1198:137b-40: ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su byas pas der nang
T02D1198:138a-1: na thig le'i rnam par h'um yig la ji srid 'dod par yid gzhag go //
T02D1198:138a-2: de'i rjes su dbugs 'byung ba nges par 'byin pa'i
T02D1198:138a-3: rim pas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i mthar
T02D1198:138a-4: thug par de'i 'od zer rnams kyis snang bar byas
T02D1198:138a-5: nas dbugs 'jug pa'i tshul gyis bsdus pa na sa
T02D1198:138a-6: bon dang thig le la ni yud kyis rdzogs pa'i
T02D1198:138a-8: slar yang dbugs 'byung ba'i tshul gyis 'od 'phro ba na 'gro ba snang bar byas nas /
T02D1198:138a-9: de las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
T02D1198:138a-10: kyang 'gro ba'i don byed par mos te dbugs 'jug

T02D1198:138a-12: zhes pa ji srid 'dod par bya'o zhes pa 'di
T02D1198:138a-13: ni thig le'i rnal 'byor gzhan pa'o //

T02D1198:138a-18: le la de'i bdag nyid du rdul phra rab kyi
T02D1198:138a-19: ngo bor gnas par de ltar bsam mo zhes pa

T02D1198:138a-24: yi ge zhu bar ro gcig pa lhan cig skyes
T02D1198:138a-25: pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin byang chub sems kyi thig
T02D1198:138a-26: le yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam pa yud
T02D1198:138a-27: kyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa
T02D1198:138a-28: rdo rje'i che mo'i nor bu'am de las 'phos pa

T02D1198:141b-17: brtson par mi gzigs so zhes pa la sogs pa

T02D1198:141b-33: pa'i rig ma'i brtul zhugs spyad cing de nas de
T02D1198:141b-34: lta kho nar rjes su bsgrub bo //
T02D1198:141b-35: de lta na yang mi gzigs na slar yang de

T02D1198:141b-37: zhugs spyad nas de lta kho nar rnam par bsgrub

T02D1198:142a-2: rang gi rig ma dang gnyis su med par snyoms

T02D1198:142a-16: bskyed pa'i rnam par snang mdzad phyag g-yas pa dang
T02D1198:142a-17: cig shos dag gis phur bu'i mgrin pa dang tho

T02D1198:142b-6: de bzhin du nag cing khros pa'i mi bskyod pa

T02D1198:142b-21: 'byor pa yang de rnams la mi 'dud pa yin
T02D1198:142b-24: zhes gsungs pa ma yin nam /
T02D1198:142b-25: 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi gar te /
T02D1198:142b-26: ci zhig ltar rnal 'byor ba rnam pa gzhan du

T02D1198:142b-30: su chags pa'i don du gar kho na'o //
T02D1198:142b-31: bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyang 'jigs pa bzhin du

T02D1198:142b-35: 'jigs shing skrag pa'i yid can ni //

T02D1198:142b-37: yid ni dga' zhing mgu rnams la //

T02D1198:142b-43: 'khor ltar grub bzhi pa nyid la sogs pa dang
T02D1198:142b-44: ldan pa dang rdo rje drag mo la sogs pa

T02D1198:143a-2: phyi'i dkyil 'khor de'i phyed kyi nang du zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1198:143a-3: phyi rol zhes pa zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa las te /

T02D1198:143a-13: 'di rnams kyi ming dang dgod pa dang /
T02D1198:143a-14: kha dog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa ni phyag
T02D1198:143a-15: bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor du ji skad bshad pa

T02D1198:143a-17: snga ma bzhin zhes pa 'dir phyag bcu drug pa'i
T02D1198:143a-18: dkyil 'khor ltar zhes pa'i dogs pa bsal ba'i ched
T02D1198:143a-19: du 'chad par 'gyur pa'i sngags kyi rjes su 'brang

T02D1198:143a-21: 'khor pa rnams kyi yang sa bon rnams nye bar
T02D1198:143a-23: gling bu ma la sogs pa rnams kyi sa bon
T02D1198:143a-24: aom yig la sogs pa rnams gsungs so zhes bla
T02D1198:143a-26: dbus kyi rim par bcom ldan 'das dang goo r'i la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D1198:143a-27: gnyis par gling bu ma la sogs pa rnams so
T02D1198:143a-28: zhes pa'i lha bcu bdun pa rim pa gnyis pa
T02D1198:143a-29: rnams dkyil 'khor 'di'o zhes bla ma gzhan rnams gsung
T02D1198:143a-30: ngo // phyogs 'di la ri mo bzhi rnams ni
T02D1198:143a-31: rdo rje dang 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang lha
T02D1198:143a-33: phyi rol zhes pa khang pa brtsegs pa las so //
T02D1198:143a-34: ha ri bha sa ni shing tsandan no //
T02D1198:143a-35: lha'i tshogs ni brgya byin no //
T02D1198:143a-36: sprin gyi rgyal po ni chu lha ste /
T02D1198:143a-37: sprin rnams la bdag po nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:143a-38: gnod sbyin gyi sde can zhes pa gang gi sde
T02D1198:143b-0: gnod sbyin yin pa de @143b ni de skad de
T02D1198:143b-1: lus ngan pa'o // drang srong gi tshogs kun du 'khrigs pa ni me lha ste /
T02D1198:143b-2: drang srong rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:143b-3: srin po ni bden bral lo //

T02D1198:143b-13: de rnams kyi cha shas can ni rang rang gi

T02D1198:143b-27: zil gyis mnan nas de dang de las bzlog par

T02D1198:143b-30: khang pa brtsegs pa'i shar phyogs su gtum drag ces pa'i dur khrod de /

T02D1198:143b-34: phyogs skyong ba dbang po dang khyab 'jug dang /

T02D1198:144a-4: po dkar po dang sprin stug po'o //
T02D1198:144a-5: lhor keng rus 'jigs pa'am ming gzhan 'jigs su rung
T02D1198:144a-6: ba mun pa can zhes bya ba'i dur khrod de
T02D1198:144a-8: rdzu 'phrul chen po ba ma he'i gdong pa can dang /

T02D1198:144a-17: shing kam ke lli dang rdzu 'phrul chen po pa
T02D1198:144a-18: chu srin gyi gdong ba can dang chu lha stobs
T02D1198:144a-19: rgyu ljang gu dang sprin 'jigs su rung ngo //

T02D1198:144a-23: rlung lha dang rigs ldan khra bo dang sprin char 'bebs so //

T02D1198:144a-32: skyong ser po dang sprin gtum byed can no //

T02D1198:144b-4: gzhan rnams zla bar zla 'od can //
T02D1198:144b-5: dbang ldan gshin rje srin po rnams //

T02D1198:144b-11: gzhan gyis byin pa'i gtor ma la //

T02D1198:144b-15: 'ga' zhig char gyi rgyun can rnams so //

T02D1198:144b-17: shing mchog gzhan rnams kyis kyang rnam par mdzes pa
T02D1198:144b-18: / bya rog dang 'ug pa dang bya rgod dang
T02D1198:144b-19: khyi dang ce spyang dang seng ge dang phag dang
T02D1198:144b-20: stag la sogs pa rnams kyis 'jigs su rung ba

T02D1198:144b-26: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i grub pa dang rig pa

T02D1198:144b-29: sgrogs bzhin pa'i ro langs dang gnod sbyin dang srin

T02D1198:144b-31: 'di nas dang de nas rgyug pa dang /

T02D1198:158b-1: n'a da'i mtha' ni ham ngo //
T02D1198:158b-2: gsang ba'i padma ni aom ste /
T02D1198:158b-3: gsang ba'i padma 'di'i rten yin zhes byas nas so //
T02D1198:158b-4: h'um yig la sogs pa rnams rim pa ji lta bar bdag gi gdan la sogs pa'i gnas so //
T02D1198:158b-5: rim pa gnyis mdor bstan pa 'di ni skabs bzhin du rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:158b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'i rim par gsungs pa /
T02D1198:158b-7: sngon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:158b-8: thams cad de gzugs kyi khams la sogs pa rnams /
T02D1198:158b-9: sngon du rab tu byed pa dang por gsungs pa'i
T02D1198:158b-10: mtshan nyid kyi stong nyid de nyid dang mtshan ma
T02D1198:158b-11: med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang
T02D1198:158b-12: yin pa des bkrus nas so //
T02D1198:158b-13: sgro btags pa'i dri ma ste gos pa'o //
T02D1198:158b-14: dkar ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:158b-15: dkar po kun da zla ba dang 'dra ba'i mdog gang gi yin pa de ste /
T02D1198:158b-16: gnyis pa'i don la drug pa'o //
T02D1198:158b-17: zla ba'i 'od rnams bzhin du 'di'i 'od zer rnams 'phro ba ni gyen du 'greng ba'o //
T02D1198:158b-18: sems dpa'i skyil krung can ni de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:158b-20: phyag rgya chen po ni rang 'dra'i shes rab ma ste /
T02D1198:158b-21: de la phyag gnyis dag gis gnas pa ste gnas pa la btsir ba'o //
T02D1198:158b-22: gzugs rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i mdzes pa ste 'dod par
T02D1198:158b-23: bya ba nyid 'di'i yin pa ni gzugs rdzogs pa'i
T02D1198:158b-25: de ltar ye shes sems dpa' rnams la ste ye
T02D1198:158b-26: shes sems dpa' gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1198:158b-27: rang bzhin dam tshig sems dpa' sgom pa'o //
T02D1198:158b-28: de las gzhan pa'i bsgom par bya ba gsungs pa /
T02D1198:158b-29: chu shing zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:158b-30: cung zad kha bye ba nyid kyis na chu shing
T02D1198:158b-31: gi me tog bzhin du gnas pa'i rtsa rnams so
T02D1198:158b-32: // lte bar de rnams kho na bsgreng ba ste gyen du son pa snying gar gnas pa'i padma'o //
T02D1198:158b-33: sngar gyi rab tu byed pa bzhi par gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1198:158b-34: spros nas ni phyung nas so //
T02D1198:158b-35: bcom ldan 'das rdzogs pa dang dus mnyam du ste de'i yan lag nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:158b-36: der sngon gyi padmar ni snying ga'i padmar ste /
T02D1198:159a-1: gyi gnas skabs su de skye ba las phyis padma gzhan rnams skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:159a-2: 'dab mar te 'dab ma brgyad rnams so //
T02D1198:159a-3: lte bar bcas ni lte ba dang bcas pa rnams so //
T02D1198:159a-4: yi ge rnam par 'god par byed do zhes pa rnam 'god ni yid de de dgod pa'o ;
T02D1198:159a-5: / sgom pas yid kho na yi ge'i rnam par dgod par bya'o //
T02D1198:159a-6: phyi rol gyi yi ge ni ma yin no zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
T02D1198:159a-7: 'di thams cad ci byas nas she na /
T02D1198:159a-9: dbus su dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:159a-10: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bzhin du bskyed pa'i
T02D1198:159a-11: rim pa gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa'i dam
T02D1198:159a-12: tshig sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D1198:159a-13: lha brgyad sems kyi dbus su bsams nas /
T02D1198:159a-14: de'i dbus su ste snying gar zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar po can /
T02D1198:159a-15: gsung rdo rje nyid kyi phyir dmar ba'i mdangs can rnam shes te ye shes sems dpa'o //
T02D1198:159a-16: ye shes sems dpa' de kho na'i thugs kar ye shes te ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' h'um ngo //
T02D1198:159a-17: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1198:159a-18: du yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag
T02D1198:159a-19: nyid can no zhes pa man ngag go ;
T02D1198:159a-20: / de'i shar gyi 'dab mar byams pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1198:159a-21: nyid kyis na sems can gyi log par sgrub pa
T02D1198:159a-22: rnams kyis mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir mi bskyod pa ni
T02D1198:159a-24: de'i sa bon ni bum mo //
T02D1198:159a-25: sgo zhes pa phyogs nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1198:159a-26: rin chen de nyid sa bon ni lhor rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ste a'am ngo //
T02D1198:159a-27: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas kyi hr'i:'o //
T02D1198:159a-28: don yod gtso bo'i sems kyi sa bon ni don yod grub pa'i ste kham ngo //
T02D1198:159a-29: lte ba'i padmar dbyangs kyang 'di ste aa yig go //
T02D1198:159a-30: aa yig sogs rnams las thog ma yang yin la mchog gtso bo yang ste /
T02D1198:159a-31: chos rnams thams cad aa yig gi sgo can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:159a-32: sa bon yang ste 'bras bu 'grub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:159a-33: zla ba phyed pa dang thig le ldan pa aam ngo //
T02D1198:159a-34: bum yig la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams ni /
T02D1198:159a-35: zla ba'i 'od kyis mngon par brgyan pa rnams so //
T02D1198:159b-0: @159b phyogs mtshams rnams su ni dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su'o //
T02D1198:159b-1: rim r'im lim l'im ma ning rnams te /
T02D1198:159b-3: sa bon bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1198:159b-4: zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1198:159b-5: yi ge brgyad po de rnams kyi dbus su de'i
T02D1198:159b-6: ste padma'i lte ba sems kyi yi ge mi bskyod
T02D1198:159b-7: pa'i sa bon h'um ste des so //
T02D1198:159b-8: bshad zin pa'i ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' kho na
T02D1198:159b-9: mi bskyod pa'i sa bon no zhes dgongs pas nye
T02D1198:159b-10: bar sdud pa'o // de skad gsungs te /
T02D1198:159b-11: dam tshig sems dpa' ste lte ba'i chu skyes la aam ngo //
T02D1198:159b-12: snying ga'i chu skyes la gnas pa'i ye shes sems
T02D1198:159b-13: dpa'i thugs kar mtsho skyes la yang yi ge dgu
T02D1198:159b-14: rnams bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:159b-15: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa ni stong pa'i bdag
T02D1198:159b-16: nyid can nyid kho nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub
T02D1198:159b-17: par byed pa'o zhes rtogs par bya ba'i ched du
T02D1198:159b-18: gsungs pa / ya mtshan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:159b-19: ya mtshan gyi rnam pa gsungs pa /
T02D1198:159b-20: mtshan nyid med pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:159b-21: sbyor ba dang pos ni dang po'i sbyor ba ste /
T02D1198:159b-22: nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog la sogs pa yang ngo //
T02D1198:159b-23: yi ge ni h'um la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:159b-25: ci ltar te rnam pa ci zhig gis kyang mtshon par mi nus na /
T02D1198:159b-26: de la ci zhig las de'i 'bras bu don du gnyer ba 'jug pa yin /
T02D1198:159b-27: rdo rje ni rdo rje snying po'o //
T02D1198:159b-28: mtshon bya ni gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar ro //
T02D1198:159b-29: mtshan nyid ni gzugs su yod pa nas rang gsal ba'i bar te /
T02D1198:159b-30: de dag la snying po nyid du sgro btags pa
T02D1198:159b-31: dag gi stong pa nyid ni phyin ci ma log
T02D1198:159b-32: pa'i de kho na nyid do //
T02D1198:159b-33: gzhan ni phyin ci log pa las de kho na nyid du snying por sgro 'dogs so //
T02D1198:159b-34: de'i phyir ji ltar snying po med pa'i chu shing
T02D1198:159b-35: las snying po bdud rtsi lta bu'i 'bras bu yin
T02D1198:159b-36: pa de ltar snying po med pa'i kun rdzob pa
T02D1198:159b-37: dang po'i sbyor ba la sogs pa bskyed pa'i rim
T02D1198:159b-38: pa spros pa med pa nyid du bsgom bzhin pa'i
T02D1198:159b-39: snying po spros pa med pa'i bdud rtsi srid pa
T02D1198:159b-40: dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i
T02D1198:160a-0: mya ngan las 'das pa'i ye shes sku @160a *
T02D1198:160a-2: chu shing ni chu shing ngo //
T02D1198:160a-4: ci ltar rab tu gsal ba yang mtshan nyid yin zhe na /
T02D1198:160a-5: gang gi phyir rnam par shes pas na rnam shes
T02D1198:160a-6: dang 'dis shes par bya ba'o zhes pas ye shes
T02D1198:160a-7: te / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa de dag gi dbus su gzugs med ye shes gzugs su ste /
T02D1198:160a-8: yod pa ma yin pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i
T02D1198:160a-9: ngo bor rang nyid rab tu gsal ba nyid kho
T02D1198:160a-10: nar mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pas mtshon par
T02D1198:160a-12: so so skye bos ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin kho nar mtshon par bya ste /
T02D1198:160a-13: rnal 'byor pas ni ye shes sku //
T02D1198:160a-14: zhes pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje chen po
T02D1198:160a-15: dbyer med pa spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyang
T02D1198:160a-16: ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la sogs pa'i rten
T02D1198:160a-17: yang ngo // ye shes sku ni chos kyi sku ste /
T02D1198:160a-18: de nyid 'bras bu'i zhes khyad par can skabs las thob pa'o //
T02D1198:160a-19: sgro btags pa'i bag chags ma lus pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi g-yo ba'o //
T02D1198:160a-20: gang las dngos po ste rang rig pa'am gzhan don dam par yod pa nyid dang /
T02D1198:160a-21: dngos med de med pa nyid de /
T02D1198:160a-22: de dag las rnam par grol ba'o //
T02D1198:160a-23: kha dog gzugs ni kha dog med ;
T02D1198:160a-25: kha dog ni sngon po la sogs pa gzung ba nyid du mngon par zhen pa ste /
T02D1198:160a-26: kha dog med pa ni bde ba la sogs pa 'dzin pa nyid du ste /
T02D1198:160a-27: de'i ngo bo nyid du med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:160a-28: de'i ngo bo ma yin pa ni shin tu dngos po dngos med pa dag go //
T02D1198:160a-29: de las dbus ni gzung ba dang /
T02D1198:160a-32: tha dad pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i
T02D1198:160a-33: rang gi ngo bo stong pa kho nar de kho
T02D1198:160a-34: na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1198:160a-35: ji ltar 'di dang tshu rol mthong bas mtshan nyid
T02D1198:160a-36: la sogs pa 'dzin pa dang rjes su dpag pa
T02D1198:160a-38: stong pa nyid du yid ches pas srid pa de
T02D1198:160a-39: ltar rgyas pa dang bcas par kho bo cag gis
T02D1198:160a-40: gzhung du phye bar zin to //
T02D1198:160a-41: de ltar kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i rang gi
T02D1198:160a-42: ngo bo phyin ci ma log par shes nas bskyed
T02D1198:160b-0: pa'i rim pa mnyam pa nyid kyi @160b ye shes
T02D1198:160b-1: kyis dang snyig rje chen po'i sems kyis kyang yongs
T02D1198:160b-2: su sbyangs pa goms par bya'o //
T02D1198:160b-3: de ltar na de ni de bskyed pa'i rim pa
T02D1198:160b-4: rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam gyi 'bras bu yun mi
T02D1198:160b-5: ring ba nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:160b-6: de ci ltar 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i shin tu
T02D1198:160b-7: sbas pa'i don can gyi ngag rnams kyis rtogs par
T02D1198:160b-9: bla ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:160b-10: bla ma ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1198:160b-11: des nye bar gnang ba'i lam shes su 'jug pa las gzhan yang ngo //
T02D1198:160b-12: de'i man ngag ni yang dag pa ji lta ba ston pa ste /
T02D1198:160b-13: lam ni rtogs pa'i thabs so //
T02D1198:160b-14: bstan bcos ni gsung rab ste /
T02D1198:160b-15: mdor ston par byed do zhes pas mdor ston tsam mo //
T02D1198:160b-16: mdor bstan par bya ba ni mtshan nyid do //
T02D1198:160b-17: rang gi ngo bo ni de kho na nyid do //
T02D1198:160b-18: ye shes ni de kho na nyid kyi rnam pa can la /
T02D1198:160b-19: rnam shes ni kun rdzob kyi rnam pa can te /
T02D1198:160b-21: bden pa gnyis kyi de kho na nyid de rnams
T02D1198:160b-22: kyang dpa' ba ste bla mas gsal bar byed de
T02D1198:160b-23: / so so skye bos kyang ngo zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:160b-24: zhar la 'ongs pa'i de ma thag tu dkyus ma
T02D1198:160b-25: rjes su sbrel ba ni 'di'i zhes pa la sogs
T02D1198:160b-26: pa ste / kun gyi bsgom byas pa ni rnal 'byor pas te /
T02D1198:160b-27: mngal du dang por lnga ste lag pa dang rkang
T02D1198:160b-28: pa dang mgo bo 'bur ba dang ldan pa rnams
T02D1198:160b-29: so // mchod rten ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams te /
T02D1198:160b-30: de rnams sems par byed pa ni rtas par byed pa'o //
T02D1198:160b-31: bdud rtsi ni khu ba ste /
T02D1198:160b-32: de nyid sa bon te bskyed pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D1198:160b-33: / aom ha yig kyang bskyed pa'i rim pa la bdud rtsi'i sa bon no //
T02D1198:160b-34: de la 'od zer dkar po can bzang po ste
T02D1198:160b-35: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin kha dog dkar po'i
T02D1198:160b-36: 'od can khu ba'i rgyun gyi ngo bo 'dzag cing
T02D1198:160b-37: / snying ga'i sa bon gyi chu skyes la ni
T02D1198:160b-38: lte bar mthe bong gi tshad tsam gyi zlum po
T02D1198:160b-40: de la sa bon a'a li k'a li dag las phyung ba'i h'um nag po'o //
T02D1198:160b-41: de ltar tshim par byed pa gsungs nas thig le'i rnal 'byor gsung ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:160b-42: dkar po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:161a-0: h'um yig de'i 'od zer dkar po zla 'od lta bu rnams gyen du mgo bo'i @161a * //
T02D1198:161a-2: mgo bo'i chu skyes de'i sgo rtsa'i bu ga rnams
T02D1198:161a-3: kyi dbus su aa wa dh'u t'i'i bug par rab
T02D1198:161a-4: tu bsgrags pa'i gang thig le'i sems byang chub kyi
T02D1198:161a-6: de dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur nas aa wa dh'u t'i'i lam nas 'ongs shing /
T02D1198:161a-7: snying gar h'um gi thig le la de'i bdag nyid
T02D1198:161a-8: du skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i cha shas bzhin
T02D1198:161a-9: du rdul phra rab kyi ngo bor yang dag gnas
T02D1198:161a-10: / rdul phra rab kyi ngo bo dkar po de
T02D1198:161a-11: yang mtshon bya mtshan nyid ye shes can rnams dbyer
T02D1198:161a-12: / med pas na / spros pa dang rnam par
T02D1198:161a-13: bral ba'i shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ni
T02D1198:161a-14: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa ste
T02D1198:161a-15: / med pas na / / der ltos shig ste /
T02D1198:161a-16: nges par dpyad nas mngon sum du gyis shig pa'o //
T02D1198:161a-17: mtshon par bya ba'am mtshan nyid kyang ci zhe na /
T02D1198:161a-18: thig le'i go 'phang gnas te thig le kho na
T02D1198:161a-19: mtshan nyid kyi rten mtshon par bya ba zhes pa'i
T02D1198:161a-20: don to // shes med sems kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1198:161a-21: shes pa gzung bar bya ba'i dngos pa dang dngos po med pa dag dang /
T02D1198:161a-22: de'i 'dzin pa yang med pa ni mtshan nyid do //
T02D1198:161a-25: ci zhig gis 'ongs nas she na /
T02D1198:161a-26: gser gyi sgo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i rlabs rtsa dang
T02D1198:161a-27: 'brel pa nyid kyi phyir na gang thig le'i sgo
T02D1198:161a-29: de'i lam las ni 'og gi mtha'i lam gyis aa
T02D1198:161a-30: wa dh'u t'i'i bu gas so zhes pa'i don to
T02D1198:161a-31: // rdo rje'i tshig 'di yang bla ma'i bstan pas dbye bar bya ste /
T02D1198:161a-32: gzung bya gzung bar 'os pa la rnam shes ye shes dag ni las la ste /
T02D1198:161a-33: kun rdzob dang don dam pa dag go //
T02D1198:161a-34: gang gi phyir bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid rtogs pa can gyi lam las sam /
T02D1198:161a-35: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi bstan bcos
T02D1198:161a-36: kyi don rtogs pa dang ldan pa las bstan pa
T02D1198:161a-37: lhur len pa de yin gyi /
T02D1198:161a-38: lam dang bstan bcos las phyi rol pa ring ba
T02D1198:161a-39: las te phyin ci log gi don ston pa las
T02D1198:161a-41: de ltar na 'di las bsgrub par bya ba la
T02D1198:161a-42: sgrub pa snying por byed pas 'byung bar bya dgos
T02D1198:161a-43: so zhes dgongs pa dang ldan pas gsungs pa /
T02D1198:161a-44: rnyed par sla zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:161b-0: de'i phyir dang @161b por sbyor bar 'dod pa bla
T02D1198:161b-1: ma yongs su mnyes pa'i thabs kyi bsnyen bkur gyis
T02D1198:161b-2: rnal 'byor gyi rab tu sbyor ba lhur len pa'i
T02D1198:161b-3: slob ma la / bla ma mkhas pas ji ltar
T02D1198:161b-4: 'os par bden pa gnyis dang rim pa gnyis rtogs
T02D1198:161b-5: par bya ba'i ched du mkhas pas bstan par bya'o
T02D1198:161b-6: slob ma la / // mnyam par gzhag pa ste /
T02D1198:161b-7: mnyam par te srid pa dang /
T02D1198:161b-8: zhi ba dag ro gcig pa'i rang gi ngo bo
T02D1198:161b-9: la gzhag pa ste de'i rang bzhin bden pa gnyis
T02D1198:161b-10: gnyis su med pa shes rab dang snying rje yongs
T02D1198:161b-12: mi g-yo ba ni the tshom gyis mi bskyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:161b-13: nyer 'tshe med pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba bsal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:161b-15: yid kho na 'di lta bu yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
T02D1198:161b-16: dngos po 'byung bas te rgyu yis so //
T02D1198:161b-17: 'byung bas na dngos po ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1198:161b-18: dag pa rnams kyang de rnams kyi 'byung ba ste 'byung byed kyi skyed par byed pa nyid do //
T02D1198:161b-19: gang gi phyir yid nyon mongs pa dang las kyi
T02D1198:161b-20: bdag nyid ni rgyu nyid kyi phyir sngon du 'gro
T02D1198:161b-21: ba'i chos rnams 'khor ba can gyi phung po rnams
T02D1198:161b-22: so // 'di kho nas dag pa ni yid kyis dag pa ste /
T02D1198:161b-23: yid dag pa rnams kyis de rnams dag pa skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:161b-24: dag pa ni sgrib pa thams cad 'gog pa'o //
T02D1198:161b-25: yid kho nas mgyogs pa rnams ni shugs dang ldan pa rnams te /
T02D1198:161b-26: thabs kyi khyad par gyi shugs dang ldan pa'i yid
T02D1198:161b-27: kyi sbyor ba kho na las tshul gzhan pas myur
T02D1198:161b-28: bar dag pa thob pas na mgyogs pa'i lam yin
T02D1198:161b-30: 'dis ni bden pa bzhi'i bdag nyid can ni yid
T02D1198:161b-31: kho na ste gtso bo nyid las so zhes gsungs
T02D1198:161b-32: shing / rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa dang
T02D1198:161b-33: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i ngo bo yang
T02D1198:161b-35: yid kyis shes pa yid kyi'o //
T02D1198:161b-38: phrag dog la sogs pa'i dri ma'i rnyog pa bkrus
T02D1198:161b-39: pa nyid kyis na rab tu dang ba nyid kyis
T02D1198:161b-40: so // gzhan gyi don ni chos gsung ba dang
T02D1198:161b-41: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la sogs pa byed par
T02D1198:162a-0: so // 'gyur ro // de nyid kyi phyir @162a * //
T02D1198:162a-1: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid na yang sngon
T02D1198:162a-2: gyi smon lam gyi dbang nyid kyis skye dgu smin
T02D1198:162a-3: par byed pa'i phyir 'di'i rgyal po nyid de /
T02D1198:162a-4: 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyi'o //
T02D1198:162a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo'i yang rnam par rtog pa can nyid na yang ngo //
T02D1198:162a-6: so so skye bo'i bdag nyid kyi ni ji ltar rigs pa kho na ste /
T02D1198:162a-7: rnam pa gzhan du yang ngag dang lus kyi las dag go //
T02D1198:162a-8: gang gi phyir yang de ltar thams cad du yid
T02D1198:162a-9: gtso bo yin pa de'i phyir yid kyi rang bzhin
T02D1198:162a-10: gyi 'bad rtsol rnams kyis thos pa dang bsam pa'i
T02D1198:162a-11: rang bzhin gyi yid las byung bsgom pa'i blo ldan
T02D1198:162a-12: du gyur pa ni gal te de la mnyam par
T02D1198:162a-13: gzhag pa'i yid lhag par rtogs par 'dod na de'i
T02D1198:162a-14: tshe bzlas bya goms par bya ste sgom pa'i rang
T02D1198:162a-16: ci zhe na sems pa ste rtas par byed pa dang /
T02D1198:162a-17: bde mchog ste sham bde ba 'dam par byed pa
T02D1198:162a-18: ni g-yeng ba thams cad zad par byed pa'i phyir
T02D1198:162a-19: ro zhes pa bde mchog thig le'o //
T02D1198:162a-20: 'on kyang rgyu sgom pa'i dbang dang 'bras bu mnyam
T02D1198:162a-21: par gzhag pa'i yid kyi dang yang dag pa'i sa
T02D1198:162a-22: bon thig le bsgom par bya ba'i yin gyi /
T02D1198:162a-23: rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor nges mi dpyod pa las ni min zhing /
T02D1198:162a-24: kun rdzob pa'i 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po la
T02D1198:162a-25: sogs pa rnams de kho na nyid rnams su ste
T02D1198:162a-26: don dam pa pa rnams su lta ba sgro btags
T02D1198:162a-27: pa las 'di'i goms pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa
T02D1198:162a-28: ma yin no // bzlog pa kho na las de
T02D1198:162a-29: kho na nyid 'di rnams so zhes dbu ma'i snye
T02D1198:162a-30: mar nges par dpyad zin to //
T02D1198:162a-31: thig le'i rnal 'byor gzhan dang phra mo'i rnal 'byor
T02D1198:162a-32: gsal bar bya ba'i ched du yang dag pa'i sa
T02D1198:162a-33: bon nyid rtogs par byed de /
T02D1198:162a-34: gzugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:162a-35: gzugs la sogs pa rnams srid pa 'khor ba ste
T02D1198:162a-36: de'i longs spyod ni gtso bor na reg bya'i bde
T02D1198:162a-38: de'i dmigs pa sa bon lnga po ni 'di'i cha
T02D1198:162a-39: shas lnga rnams so zhes pa lnga pa ste sa
T02D1198:162b-0: de rnams kyang rgyu dang rkyen rnams las @162b 'byung
T02D1198:162b-1: ba'i sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam
T02D1198:162b-4: de rnams kho na sa bon rnams te /
T02D1198:162b-5: ma'i mngal du ming dang gzugs kyi gnas skabs rnams skye mched drug la sogs pa'i dang /
T02D1198:162b-6: lang tsho la sogs par bu rgyud kyi dang /
T02D1198:162b-9: sa bon lnga po la dmigs nas rang gi bde ba ro myang ba skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:162b-10: 'chi ba na ni de sdig pa can gyis nges par mi byed do zhes gsung ngo //
T02D1198:162b-11: dang po'i nam mkha'i dmigs pa ni 'byung ba bzhi rnams te /
T02D1198:162b-12: gnas skabs gsum du yang ngo zhes go sla ba nyid kyis ma gsungs so //
T02D1198:162b-14: sa bon lnga po rnams kun gyi yang kun gyis te /
T02D1198:162b-15: chung ngu la sogs pa'i dbye bas so //
T02D1198:162b-16: rtsa ni aa wa dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1198:162b-17: mgo bo ni gtso bo'i gnas te /
T02D1198:162b-18: gzhan du mi gnas pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1198:162b-19: 'bab pa ni mngal gyi gnas so //
T02D1198:162b-21: gang srid pa bar do'i gnas skabs su bud med
T02D1198:162b-22: kyi'am skyes pa'i 'dod chags kyis ji ltar rigs par
T02D1198:162b-23: bdag nyid kyi dga' ba'i bya ba lhag par mos
T02D1198:162b-24: nas nyon mongs pa dang las kyis 'phen pa las
T02D1198:162b-25: de spangs shing / pha dang ma snyoms par zhugs
T02D1198:162b-26: pa dag gi 'dzag pa 'dres pa'i zla ba dag
T02D1198:162b-27: kho na bsil ba'i 'od can nyid kyi phyir sems
T02D1198:162b-28: sgra gcan skye gnas kyi sgo nas rab tu zhugs
T02D1198:162b-30: nyi ma 'dres pa ni ma yin te /
T02D1198:162b-31: 'od zer cha ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:162b-32: ji ltar phyi rol gyi gnam stong gi mthar ri
T02D1198:162b-33: bong can nyi ma la zhugs pa'i phyir nyi ma
T02D1198:162b-34: gzas zin no zhes tha snyad byed pa de ltar
T02D1198:162b-35: nang ngo // kha cig ni mchu'i sbrang rtsi 'jib
T02D1198:162b-36: pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis kha nas zhugs nas
T02D1198:162b-37: 'dzag bzhin pa'i zla ba la 'khyud de phyi nas
T02D1198:162b-38: zla ba dang nyi ma gzhan dang 'dre'o //
T02D1198:162b-39: de skad du yang phyag rgya chen po thig le'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:162b-40: sngon las rlung gi rnam shes ni //
T02D1198:162b-41: gang tshe glo bur du 'khyam zhing //
T02D1198:162b-42: pha yi kha dang nye gnas pa //
T02D1198:163a-2: gang tshe mi mo zla mtshan ldan //
T02D1198:163a-3: me dang nyi ma 'byung gyur nas //
T02D1198:163a-4: de tshe shin tu chags pas non //
T02D1198:163a-6: bo l'a ka kko la du phyogs na //
T02D1198:163a-7: pha yi kha ru rlung 'jug cing //
T02D1198:163a-8: de tshe sa bon yang dag 'byung //
T02D1198:163a-9: sa bon las ni sems can 'byung //
T02D1198:163a-11: rlung ni rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1198:163a-12: 'ga' zhig ni skra nas 'dzin pa dang 'o byed
T02D1198:163a-13: pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1198:163a-14: kyi sgo nas te sngar bzhin du 'dre bar byed
T02D1198:163a-15: do / kha'i sgo dang gser gyi sgor yang skyes pa las chags pas pha yir te /
T02D1198:163a-16: bud med la ma yir ro //
T02D1198:163a-17: pha kho na yir te ma yir ni ma yin no zhes kha cig go //
T02D1198:163a-18: thams cad du mthar skye gnas kho nar 'jug go //
T02D1198:163a-19: de nyid kyi phyir 'di la dgongs nas lha 'ga'
T02D1198:163a-20: zhig la gser gyi sgo nas dri za'i sems can
T02D1198:163a-21: 'jug pa dang / 'ga' zhig la kha nas dang /
T02D1198:163a-22: 'ga' zhig la rnam pa gzhan du'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud rnams su rtogs par mdzad do //
T02D1198:163a-23: lang tsho la sogs par ni bde ba chen po'i
T02D1198:163a-24: 'khor lo la sogs pa rnams su gnas pa rnams
T02D1198:163a-25: gnas skabs ji lta bar 'bab po //
T02D1198:163a-26: khyad par du ni rtag tu ste rgyun mi 'chad par ro //
T02D1198:163a-27: rtsa ba ni rtsa rnams kyi ste lte ba'i 'khor
T02D1198:163a-28: lo'i mdud pa'i ngo bo rnams btsir ba las te
T02D1198:163a-29: 'phrul pa las ji ltar mos pa bzhin du gtum
T02D1198:163a-30: mo gsum las gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor gyis
T02D1198:163a-31: de rnams su rlung 'phrul par byed pa las so
T02D1198:163a-32: // ye shes rnam shes sa bon las ni stong
T02D1198:163a-33: pa nyid kyi ye shes dang snying rje'i rang bzhin
T02D1198:163a-34: gyi sa bon gyi rang bzhin gyis so //
T02D1198:163a-35: thig le yang khu ba'i bdag nyid mgo bo la
T02D1198:163a-36: gnas pa dang n'a da yang rdul gyi ngo bo
T02D1198:163a-38: yang dag ldan ni n'a da steng du rab tu
T02D1198:163a-39: song ba las thig le dang 'dus pa'i phyir mgo
T02D1198:163a-40: bor 'bab bo // de'i rjes su de gnyis 'dres
T02D1198:163a-41: pa 'bab bzhin pa ni 'khor ba'i longs spyod 'dod
T02D1198:163a-43: nor bu las phyi rol 'thob kyis 'jig rten las
T02D1198:163b-0: 'das pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs @163b pa la
T02D1198:163b-1: spro ba dang ldan pa'i ni ma yin te /
T02D1198:163b-2: de'i lte bar thig le'i rnal 'byor goms pa las
T02D1198:163b-3: dang nor bu yang phra mo'i rnal 'byor goms pa
T02D1198:163b-4: las rim pas de mi 'gyur bar gyur cing 'jig
T02D1198:163b-5: rten las 'das pa'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D1198:163b-6: nye bar skye'o // de nyid gsungs pa yid kyis zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1198:163b-7: yid kyis bzlas pa ni bsgom pa'o //
T02D1198:163b-8: sngags kyi yi ge smra ba dang bral ba'o //
T02D1198:163b-9: brtan pa ni gnas pa mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1198:163b-10: rang bzhin rtag pa nyid kyis na rtag pa ni chos kyi sku ste /
T02D1198:163b-11: go 'phang longs spyod rdzogs pa la sogs pa gang gi rten yin pa de'i gnas ni gzhi ste /
T02D1198:163b-12: 'di la brten nas bde ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:163b-13: ther zug pa ni rang bzhin gyi rtag pa nyid kyis te /
T02D1198:163b-14: de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bos so //
T02D1198:163b-15: kun rdzob pa'i ngo bos kyang rtag pa yang ste /
T02D1198:163b-16: skad cig rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:163b-17: phra ba yang ste bden pa gnyis kyi ngo bo
T02D1198:163b-18: nyid kyi blo phra mos rig par bya ba nyid
T02D1198:163b-19: kyi phyir ro // mi g-yo ba yang ste sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir te /
T02D1198:163b-20: sa bcu gcig pa la'o zhes khyad par gsal bar byed pa ni'o //
T02D1198:163b-22: ye shes rnam shes dag thim par gyis te /
T02D1198:163b-23: de'i bdag nyid kyis zhes sbyor ro //
T02D1198:163b-24: de'i tshe ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis rnam
T02D1198:163b-25: par shes pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ste stong
T02D1198:163b-26: pa nyid dang snying rje'i rang bzhin 'jig rten las
T02D1198:163b-27: 'das pa'i byang chub sems kyi ngo bo de kho
T02D1198:163b-28: na nyid rtogs pa'i rim pa de rtogs pa'i mtshan
T02D1198:163b-29: ma rnams kyang rang nyid kyis yongs su gcad par
T02D1198:163b-30: bya zhing gzhan rnams la yang ji ltar rigs par
T02D1198:163b-31: bstan par bya'o // sems bskyed pa gzhan de rnams
T02D1198:163b-32: kyang gegs brten pa nye bar gyur pa med na
T02D1198:163b-33: brgyud nas sam dngos su gong ma'i rtogs pa bskyed
T02D1198:163b-34: par rung ba rnams su gsal bar byed de /
T02D1198:163b-35: de la 'dun pa'i gnas skabs su mar me'i lta
T02D1198:163b-36: bu 'bar zhing ser ba'i snang ba yongs su thams
T02D1198:163b-38: bsam pa'i gnas skabs su gcig nas gcig tu rab
T02D1198:163b-39: tu rgyu ba 'byung zhing 'jigs pa'i ser po nyid
T02D1198:164a-1: pa'i phyir me khyer gyi rnam pa'i rdul rnams so //
T02D1198:164a-2: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i gnas skabs su rdul dkar po'i 'khor lo phyogs rnams su rab tu 'phro'o //
T02D1198:164a-3: de bzhin zhes pa ji ltar lhag pa'i bsam pa'i
T02D1198:164a-4: gnas skabs su rdul dkar po'i 'khor lo yin pa
T02D1198:164a-6: khyad par ni 'dir nyon mongs phyung ba ste /
T02D1198:164a-7: nyon mongs pa rnams cher son pa 'joms pa ste /
T02D1198:164a-8: phra mo nyid ces pa'i don to //
T02D1198:164a-9: de ltar sems bskyed pa gnyis su mtshan ma gsum pa'o //
T02D1198:164a-10: rtse mo la 'dod pa'i khams par gyur pa'i lha'i
T02D1198:164a-11: longs spyod bya 'dod pa'i lha mo la sogs pa
T02D1198:164a-12: rnams kyang rang gi ngang gis 'dus pa rnams so
T02D1198:164a-13: // bzod pa la gzugs kyi mtho ris shin tu
T02D1198:164a-14: dang ba'i lus la sogs pa dang bsam gtan gyi
T02D1198:164a-15: bde ba la sogs pa yang lha rnams kyi bzhin
T02D1198:164a-16: te gzugs khams par gyur pa rnams kyi lta bur
T02D1198:164a-17: // ro // mthong ba ni mthong bar byed pa'o //
T02D1198:164a-18: chos mchog la gzugs med longs spyod de /
T02D1198:164a-19: 'khor 'ga' zhig tu gzhan gyi don la dgongs pas
T02D1198:164a-20: nam mkha' mtha' yas la sogs pa la snyoms par
T02D1198:164a-22: mthong ba'i lam du rab tu dga' ba'i sa la
T02D1198:164a-23: chos kyi dbyings te de kho na nyid rtogs pa
T02D1198:164a-24: ni bdun pa'o // bsgom pa'i lam gyi bdag nyid
T02D1198:164a-25: can gyi dri ma med pa la sogs pa'i sa
T02D1198:164a-26: rnams su de kho na nyid mthong ba kho na
T02D1198:164a-27: bya dka' ba'o zhes dgongs pa las /
T02D1198:164a-28: rang 'dod de 'bad pa chung ngus sangs rgyas nyid
T02D1198:164a-29: 'di'i don te dgos pa mchog yin pa ni rang
T02D1198:164a-30: dgar sangs rgyas nyid don la ma rtogs pa'i ngo
T02D1198:164a-32: de kho na nyid yang dag par byang chub pa ni brgyad pa'o //
T02D1198:164a-33: 'di thams cad thig le'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa goms pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D1198:164a-34: de yang bskyed pa'i rim pas sngar rgyas pa dang bcas par brjod zin la /
T02D1198:164a-35: rdzogs pa'i rim pas ni rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:164a-36: de ltar thabs kyi rgyud yan lag dang bcas pa las dngos grub gsungs shing /
T02D1198:164a-37: de yang rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo kho na'o
T02D1198:164a-38: zhes de'i dbang du byas nas 'bras bu'i rgyud bshad
T02D1198:164b-0: nyon @164b cig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:164b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje snying po'o //
T02D1198:164b-2: rnam par dag pa las de bzhin nyid tha mi
T02D1198:164b-3: dad pa nyid kyi phyir rnam dag de bzhin nyid
T02D1198:164b-4: ces gsungs shing / rnam par dag zin pa'i de
T02D1198:164b-5: bzhin nyid ni rnam par dag pa'o zhes pa'i don
T02D1198:164b-6: yin gyi de bzhin nyid tsam ni rnam par dag
T02D1198:164b-8: de bzhin nyid ni thams cad du thams cad kyi tshe yod pa'i phyir na /
T02D1198:164b-9: thams cad kyang thams cad kyi tshe rnam par dag pa thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:164b-10: de ltar thun mong du bshad nas khyad par du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:164b-11: phyi nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:164b-12: yang khyad par gyi ngo bo gsungs te /
T02D1198:164b-13: lha'i ngo bo nyid kyis na rnam par dag pa
T02D1198:164b-14: ni lha rnams dang 'brel pa can nyid kyi phyir
T02D1198:164b-15: lha rnams kyi zhes gsungs te de bzhin nyid rnam
T02D1198:164b-16: par dag par ni zhe sdang la sogs pa rnam
T02D1198:164b-17: par dag pa'i ngo bo dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1198:164b-18: bdag nyid can bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba'i don
T02D1198:164b-20: ci zhig rnam par dag par bya zhe na /
T02D1198:164b-21: phung po khams dang skye mched rnams so //
T02D1198:164b-22: 'o na gang rnam par ma dag pa de dag
T02D1198:164b-23: par byed mi nus te rnam par ma dag pa'i
T02D1198:164b-24: rang bzhin can nyid kyi phyir la /
T02D1198:164b-25: gang dag pa de yang dag par bya ba ma yin te /
T02D1198:164b-26: dag pa nyid kho na'i phyir ro zhes pas rnam
T02D1198:164b-27: par dag pa la 'bad pa don med pa'o zhe
T02D1198:164b-29: rang bzhin gyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:164b-30: shes bya chos kyi dbyings la ye shes skye ba'i
T02D1198:164b-31: gegs su gyur pa'i sgrib pa nyon mongs pa can
T02D1198:164b-32: ma yin pa'i mi shes pa shes bya'i sgrib pa
T02D1198:164b-33: ste / gang so sor rim gyis spangs pa las
T02D1198:164b-34: rim gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams 'thob
T02D1198:164b-35: ste / pa'o // nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags
T02D1198:164b-36: la sogs pa rnams te nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'o
T02D1198:164b-37: ste / pa'o // // ci'i zhe na thar pa thob pa'i ste /
T02D1198:164b-38: de la nyon mongs pas gegs byed par 'gyur te /
T02D1198:164b-39: khyim du 'jug pa la sgo glegs bzhin no //
T02D1198:164b-40: ci ltar des gegs yin zhe na //
T02D1198:164b-41: de yod na de mi skye ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:164b-42: de rnams kyis bsgribs te dri ma can du zhes
T02D1198:164b-43: pa ni glo bur ba'i dri ma bsal ba las
T02D1198:164b-44: gser bzhin du rdzab kyi dri mas gos pa rnams
T02D1198:165a-0: sbyang bya'o // rnam par dag pa de kho na rgyas @165a * //
T02D1198:165a-1: par ston pa rang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:165a-2: stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa kun rdzob pa'i
T02D1198:165a-3: rang rig pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rnam
T02D1198:165a-5: dag pa gzhan gyis min zhes pa 'di 'dra ba'i
T02D1198:165a-6: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par dag pa med par
T02D1198:165a-7: dag pa gzhan gyis rnam par grol ba min no
T02D1198:165a-8: // 'o na yul rnams rnam par dag par mi
T02D1198:165a-9: 'gyur te rang rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D1198:165a-11: yul rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:165a-12: 'di rnams dag pa nyid kyi phyir //
T02D1198:165a-13: rang gis rig bya bde ba mchog /'di rnams kyi
T02D1198:165a-14: bde ba chen po rang rig par bya ba kho
T02D1198:165a-16: de nyid sgrub par byed pa gsungs pa /
T02D1198:165a-17: gzugs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:165a-18: rnam dag rang bzhin phyir zhes pa //
T02D1198:165a-19: gang phyir 'di rnams rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:165a-20: rnal 'byor par zhes pa rnal 'byor pa la'o //
T02D1198:165a-21: so sor snang gi rang dbang can du yod pa rnams ni ma yin te /
T02D1198:165a-22: rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa 'di kho na ltar snang ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:165a-23: gal te 'di lta bu de ltar 'gyur mod /
