T02D1198:175b-4: khyab pa rnam par dag pas zla ba'o //
T02D1198:175b-5: me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga dag pas dpral bar rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1198:175b-6: rigs lnga'i rnam par rtog pa dag pas dpral ba'i steng du thod pa lnga rnams so //
T02D1198:175b-7: mi bskyod pa dang 'od dpag med dang rin chen
T02D1198:175b-8: dbang po dang rtag pa dang don yod dag pas
T02D1198:175b-9: 'khor lo can dang rna rgyan dang mgul rgyan dang
T02D1198:175b-10: dgu bu dang ske rags rnams so //
T02D1198:175b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' dag pas thal ba ste /
T02D1198:175b-12: yan lag thams cad la byugs pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1198:175b-13: sems kyis yan lag thams cad la khyab pa nyid
T02D1198:175b-15: tshangs pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T02D1198:175b-16: de rnam par dag pas tshangs pa'i skud pa'o //
T02D1198:175b-17: a'a li dang k'a li'i yi ge lnga bcu dag pas mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1198:175b-18: ye shes lnga po ro mnyam par gyur pa dag pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
T02D1198:175b-19: de dang spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi dag pa dang lhan cig pas rtse mo dgu pa'o //
T02D1198:175b-20: sku gsung thugs dag pas rtse mo gsum pa'o //
T02D1198:175b-21: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa dag pas rtse gcig pa'o //
T02D1198:175b-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pas rdo rje'i dril bu'o //
T02D1198:175b-23: rgyas par rdo rje dang dril bu dag gi dag pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:175b-24: gti mug dag pas glang po che'i pags pa brgyangs pa dang tshangs pa'i pags pa'o //
T02D1198:175b-25: 'dod chags dag pas dbang phyug chen po'i pags pa'o //
T02D1198:175b-26: zhe sdang dag pas khyab 'jug gi pags pa'o //
T02D1198:175b-27: bgegs nye bar bcom pa dag pas tshogs kyi bdag po'i pags pa'o //
T02D1198:175b-28: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phul du dbyung du med
T02D1198:175b-29: pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag po nyid rnam par
T02D1198:175b-30: dag pas dbang po'i pags pa'o //
T02D1198:175b-31: thams cad la dbang sgyur pa nyid dag pas 'dod lha'i pags pa'o //
T02D1198:175b-32: sgrib pa thams cad dag pas rgyal ba'i pags pa'o //
T02D1198:176a-1: po brgyad khri bzhi stong dag pa dang mchog tu dga' ba dag pas cang te'u ste /
T02D1198:176a-2: de'i sgras sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:176a-3: lus ngag sems kyi skyon gcod pa dag pas sgra sta'o //
T02D1198:176a-4: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rnam par rtog
T02D1198:176a-5: pa gcod pa'i shes rab dag pas gri gug go
T02D1198:176a-6: // srid pa gsum gyi nyon mongs pa 'joms pa dag pas rtse gsum pa'o //
T02D1198:176a-7: byang chub kyi sems dag pas kha tv'am ga'o //
T02D1198:176a-8: bde ba chen po dang snying rje'i ro dag pa
T02D1198:176a-9: dang bdud bzhi dag pas brag gis gang ba'i thod
T02D1198:176a-10: pa'o // yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis 'ching ba
T02D1198:176a-11: dag pa dang dam tshig thams cad kyis 'ching ba
T02D1198:176a-12: dag pas rdo rje zhags pa'o //
T02D1198:176a-13: spros pa med pa'i thar pa dag pas tshangs pa'i mgo bo'o //
T02D1198:176a-14: gzhan la rag ma las pa'i thar pa dag pas dbang phyug gi mgo bo'o //
T02D1198:176a-15: yul dang dus dang lus gzhan rnams la tshangs pa
T02D1198:176a-16: gcig sgro btags pa las log pa'i thar pa dag
T02D1198:176a-18: bdud bzhi gzhan du 'gyur ba dag pas bdud bzhi'i mgo bo'o //
T02D1198:176a-19: 'dod chags la sogs pa dag pas stag gi pags pa'o //
T02D1198:176a-20: ser sna dag pas nya ro hi ta'o //
T02D1198:176a-21: gti mug dag pas phag pa'o //
T02D1198:176a-22: phrag dog dag pas rus sbal lo //
T02D1198:176a-23: zhe sdang dag pas sbrul lo //
T02D1198:176a-24: 'dod chags dag pas rnal 'byor gyi snod do //
T02D1198:176a-25: byang chub kyi sems dag pas dge slong ngo //
T02D1198:176a-26: dran pa nyams pa dag pas gsil byed do //
T02D1198:176a-27: bgegs thams cad 'byed par byed pa dag pas thong gshol lo //
T02D1198:176a-28: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis dbye ba la sdig pa dag pas sdigs mdzub bo //
T02D1198:176a-29: glo dang dbugs mi bde ba dang smyo ba dang zad byed dang mdze dang bi rdzi ka dang /
T02D1198:176a-31: glang po dang rta dang bong bu dang ba lang dang rnga mo dang /
T02D1198:176a-32: mi dang sha ra bha dang phyi la rnams te /
T02D1198:176a-33: sems can rnams kyi glo la sogs pa bsal nas so //
T02D1198:176b-0: dbang @176b phyug gi dngos grub thams cad dag pas
T02D1198:176b-1: sa dang chu dang rlung dang me dang zla ba
T02D1198:176b-2: dang nyi ma dang gshin rje dang nor sbyin rnams
T02D1198:176b-3: so // gdug pa'i log 'dren thams cad gcod pa dag pas ral gri'o //
T02D1198:176b-4: gdug pa dang log 'dren thams cad brdung ba dag pas gtun shing ngo //
T02D1198:176b-5: yi dags la sogs pa thams cad bskul ba dag pas ba dan no //
T02D1198:176b-6: mi mthun phyogs thams cad brdung ba dag pas dbyug pa'o //
T02D1198:176b-7: mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'gugs pa dag pas lcags kyu'o //
T02D1198:176b-8: bdud thams cad brdung ba dag pas rdo rje tho ba'o //
T02D1198:176b-9: bdud kyi 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon pa dag pas mda'o //
T02D1198:176b-10: gdug pa can thams cad bsdigs pa dag pas gzhu'o //
T02D1198:176b-11: bdud kyi rjes su spyod pa thams cad gsod pa dag pas sha kti'o //
T02D1198:176b-12: 'gro ba'i mig skal pa bzang ba'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dag pas autpala'o //
T02D1198:176b-13: 'gro ba'i yid 'phrog pa lhan cig skyes pa'i lus
T02D1198:176b-14: kyi dri bzang po dag pas n'a ga gser gyi
T02D1198:176b-15: me tog go // sems can thams cad dga' bar
T02D1198:176b-16: byed pa dag pas gling bu la sogs pa'i rol
T02D1198:176b-17: me tog go // cha rnams so // de ltar
T02D1198:176b-18: rdo rje rab la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa
T02D1198:176b-19: 'di rnams dpal mchog dang po dang rdo rje rtse
T02D1198:176b-20: mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i
T02D1198:176b-21: rgyud rnams su gsal bar mdzad bdag gis phye ba'o
T02D1198:176b-22: me tog go // cha rnams so // // de
T02D1198:176b-23: las gzhan gzhal yas khang gi dbye ba rnams dang
T02D1198:176b-24: lha'i bye brag rnams dang de'i gdan dang dbyibs dang
T02D1198:176b-25: sku mdog dang zhal dang rgyan dang mtshan ma dang
T02D1198:176b-26: zhabs dang phyag dang mtshon cha'i khyad par rnams kyi
T02D1198:176b-27: rnam par dag pa dpag tu med pa rnams yod
T02D1198:176b-28: me tog go // cha rnams so // // mod
T02D1198:176b-29: / de rnams la 'ga' zhig brjod zin pa'i rjes
T02D1198:176b-30: su 'brang bas brtag par bya ste /
T02D1198:176b-31: rnam par dbye bar nus na yang gzhung mangs pas 'jigs pas ngal bso'o //
T02D1198:176b-32: de ltar shin tu ba'i yang khyad par gyi rnam
T02D1198:176b-33: par dag pa rgyas par bstan pa rtogs par bya'o
T02D1198:177a-0: // de dang 'di kho na nges par rim pa gnyis ga la @177a * //
T02D1198:177a-1: yang mnyam par gzhag pa dang mnyam par ma bzhag
T02D1198:177a-2: pa'i rnal 'byor dag la lhag par mos par bya'o
T02D1198:177a-3: // phung po la sogs pa rnams lha'i ngo bor
T02D1198:177a-4: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor la mos par
T02D1198:177a-5: // bya'o // mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor la
T02D1198:177a-6: lha rnams kho na de rnams rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1198:177a-8: de ltar rtag tu lhag par mos pa'i dngos grub
T02D1198:177a-9: ni de kho na nyid gcig tu mthar thug pa'i
T02D1198:177a-11: lha'i rnam pa tsam du rtog pa po la ni ma yin no //
T02D1198:177a-12: de kho na nyid shes pas dman pa la ni
T02D1198:177a-13: nam yang dngos grub srid pa ma yin pas so
T02D1198:177a-14: // de kho na nyid kyang stong pa nyid dang snying rje ro gcig pa'o //
T02D1198:177a-15: de nyid kyi phyir nye bar sdud te de ltar shes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:177a-16: nyon mongs la sogs pas yul nye ba la sogs pa thob nas so //
T02D1198:177a-17: gang lus de bskyed pa'i cha de bskyed pa'i rim
T02D1198:177a-18: pa dang nye bar blang bya nyid kyis na rdzogs
T02D1198:177a-19: pa'i rim pa la yang brten nas lha'i bdag nyid
T02D1198:177a-20: du gyur pa ni srid pa yongs su shes pa
T02D1198:177a-21: kho na mya ngan 'das yin zhes pa'i rig pa
T02D1198:177a-22: las / srid pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni srid pa mya ngan las 'das pa de //
T02D1198:177a-24: snying rje dag gis 'khor ba dang /
T02D1198:177a-25: zhi ba dag la mi gnas pa 'thob po //
T02D1198:177a-26: skye ba dang 'jig pa la brten nas zhes 'don pa la ni /
T02D1198:177a-27: skye ba dang 'chi ba la brten nas lus gang yin pa'o zhes sbrel bar bya'o //
T02D1198:177a-28: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel ba /
T02D1198:177a-29: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma bco brgyad pa'o /
T02D1198:177a-31: // / rim pa gnyis la mngon du phyogs par gyur
T02D1198:177a-32: na yang spyod pa med na phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1198:177a-33: dngos grub ma yin zhes spyod pa mdor bstan pa
T02D1198:177a-34: gsungs pa / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:177a-35: lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi bya ba khyad par can ni spyod pa'o //
T02D1198:177a-36: lus dang ngag dag kyang sems rnam par dag pa
T02D1198:177a-37: kho nas dag pa nyid kyi phyir sems kyi spyod
T02D1198:177a-38: pa ni spyod pa gzhan las mchog nyid kyis na
T02D1198:177a-39: yang dag pa'o // gang gi phyir rnam par rtog
T02D1198:177a-40: pa'i bar du gcod pa ma lus pa 'dul bar
T02D1198:177b-0: nus pa kun @177b rdzob pa'i gzugs kyi phung po
T02D1198:177b-1: la sogs pa chos thams cad kyi rang gi ngo
T02D1198:177b-2: bos yang dag pa don dam pa la gsal bar
T02D1198:177b-3: yang dag pa'o // gyur pa ste / ji skad du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:177b-5: de ni stong pa nyid du bshad //
T02D1198:177b-6: de ni brten nas gdags pa ste //
T02D1198:177b-7: de nyid dbu ma'i la ma yin no //
T02D1198:177b-9: de nyid spyod pa ni de kho na nyid bsgom pa'i khyad par can gyi go 'phang 'di'o //
T02D1198:177b-10: bla na med pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa
T02D1198:177b-11: dang gong ma dang bcas pa'i theg pa chen po
T02D1198:177b-12: bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i spyod pa rnams las
T02D1198:177b-14: phan pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02D1198:177b-16: rnam par g-yeng ba rnams bsal nas gang brtan par gyur pa'i sems rgyud do //
T02D1198:177b-17: de nyid du ste yang dag pa ji lta ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:177b-18: yan lag med ni 'dod pa mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po dang /
T02D1198:177b-19: rdo rje stong pa nyid 'di'i yin pa'am /
T02D1198:177b-20: ma rig pa la sogs pa yan lag bcu gnyis
T02D1198:177b-21: dang bral ba'i phyir yan lag med pa'i rdo rje
T02D1198:177b-22: ni rdo rje 'dzin pa ste des gsungs pa'o zhes
T02D1198:177b-23: sbrel bar bya'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D1198:177b-24: phyin pa ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje gnyis
T02D1198:177b-25: su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1198:177b-26: mchog ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:177b-28: dge ba ni thar pa ste 'khor ba'i pha rol lo //
T02D1198:177b-29: shin tu spros pa me dpa'i spyod pa yin pa
T02D1198:177b-30: nyid kyi phyir na spyod pa gzhan la ltos nas
T02D1198:177b-31: myur du dngos grub byed pa ste /
T02D1198:177b-32: skye ba 'di kho na la rang gi ngo bo yongs su sgyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:177b-33: spros pa dang bcas pa dang spros pa med pa
T02D1198:177b-34: dang shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa rnams
T02D1198:177b-35: ni rim pa ji lta bar bud shing dang t'a
T02D1198:177b-36: la'i 'dab ma dang ras bal sreg pa'i dus bzhin
T02D1198:177b-37: du yun ring ba dang yun mi ring ba dang
T02D1198:177b-38: myur bar 'grub pa'i rgyu nyid du spyod bsdus su
T02D1198:177b-39: gsungs so // bzang po ni yul du dbyung du med pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:177b-40: yid 'ong ba ni thabs sla ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:177b-41: yon tan kun gyi gnas ni mngon par shes pa la sogs pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:177b-42: sems kyi rin chen ni byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1198:177b-43: de'i ngo bo chags pa dang bral ba las yang
T02D1198:177b-44: dag par rab tu byung ba rang dang gzhan gyi
T02D1198:178a-2: ldog pa'i sgo nas gsungs pa /
T02D1198:178a-3: 'di med ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:178a-4: rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas gsungs pa /
T02D1198:178a-7: ji ltar mar me'i snye ma phra mos kyang phug
T02D1198:178a-8: gi mun pa yun ring du bsags pa yang skad
T02D1198:178a-9: cig gis 'joms pa de ltar rnal 'byor 'dis kyang
T02D1198:178a-10: yun ring por bsags pa'i nyes pa'i tshogs chen po
T02D1198:178a-11: yang ngo // byang chub kyi sems la 'jug pa
T02D1198:178a-12: na ni kha na ma tho ba thams cad rnam
T02D1198:178a-13: par dag pa la the tshom med do //
T02D1198:178a-14: ji skad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdzod
T02D1198:178a-15: kyi mdor gsungs pa 'od srung gang pha yang yin
T02D1198:178a-16: la rang sangs rgyas kyang yin pa de srog dang
T02D1198:178a-17: phral ba 'di ni srog gcod pa rnams kyi che
T02D1198:178a-18: ba'o // 'di lta ste dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor
T02D1198:178a-19: 'phrog pa 'di ni ma byin par len pa rnams
T02D1198:178a-20: ba'o // kyi che ba'o // ma yang yin la
T02D1198:178a-21: dgra bcom ma yang yin pa de la bgrod pa
T02D1198:178a-22: 'di ni 'dod pas log par g-yem pa rnams kyi
T02D1198:178a-23: ba'o // kyi che ba'o // che ba'o nas /
T02D1198:178a-24: ji srid du 'od srungs mi dge ba'i las kyi
T02D1198:178a-25: lam bcu po 'di rnams thams cad ni kha na
T02D1198:178a-26: ma tho ba dang bcas pa chen po rnams te
T02D1198:178a-27: ba'o // kyi che ba'o // che ba'o nas /
T02D1198:178a-28: / 'od srungs de gal te sems can gcig kha
T02D1198:178a-29: na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chen po'i las
T02D1198:178a-30: kyi lam bcu po 'di rnams dang ldan par gyur
T02D1198:178a-31: ba'o // kyi che ba'o // che ba'o nas /
T02D1198:178a-32: / la / de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
T02D1198:178a-33: ston pa rgyu dang rkyen dang ldan pa la 'jug
T02D1198:178a-35: 'di ltar ma byas pa mngon par 'dus ma byas pa sgyu ma'i chos nyid la 'jug go nas /
T02D1198:178a-36: ji srid du sems can de ngan 'gror 'gro ba
T02D1198:178a-37: rang mi smra'o dang ji srid du gang 'di ltar
T02D1198:178a-39: de la ni nam yang ltung ba'am ltung ba'i gnas med do //
T02D1198:178a-41: gar sgrib pa med pa la ltung ba gnas par
T02D1198:178a-42: byed pa ni gnas med cing go skabs med de
T02D1198:178a-43: / 'di ni gnas yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'i bar du'o //
T02D1198:178a-44: de'i phyir shes rab dang thabs las byung ba gnyis
T02D1198:178a-45: su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bsgom pa
T02D1198:178a-46: kho na sdig pa thams cad dag par byed pa
T02D1198:178a-47: shin tu legs pa thams cad byed pa'o //
T02D1198:178a-48: ji skad du 'phags pas gsungs pa /
T02D1198:178a-49: gang rnams rnam par dben pa zhes //
T02D1198:178b-0: g-yo ba'i yid kyang mi @178b g-yo ba //
T02D1198:178b-1: de rnams nyon mongs sbrul dkrigs pa'i //
T02D1198:178b-2: srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'jigs pa brgal //
T02D1198:178b-4: byang chub kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa la yang //
T02D1198:178b-5: sdig pa shin tu mi bzad byas na yang //
T02D1198:178b-6: dpa' la brten nas 'jigs pa chen po ltar //
T02D1198:178b-7: gang la brten nas yud kyis sgrol de la //
T02D1198:178b-8: mi shes sems can rnams kyis cis mi brten //
T02D1198:178b-11: gzhan gyi don gyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyi thabs bla na med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:178b-12: aa wa dh'u t'i yis te kun du rtog pa mtha' dag nges par spong bas spyod pa'o //
T02D1198:178b-13: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1198:178b-14: 'di ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:178b-15: sdig pa la 'gong ba'i phyir bzang ba'o //
T02D1198:178b-16: rigs kyi dngos po dang dngos po med pa la
T02D1198:178b-17: sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa lam du byed pa'i
T02D1198:178b-19: rang dang gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i rten nyid kyi phyir gnas so //
T02D1198:178b-20: nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir shin tu gsang ba'o //
T02D1198:178b-21: dam tshig ni rgyas par ston par 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:178b-22: 'o na rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rgyun mi 'chad
T02D1198:178b-23: par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor sgrub par dka'o zhes dogs
T02D1198:178b-24: par byas nas spyod pa'i rim pa mdor ston te
T02D1198:178b-25: / dang po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:178b-26: 'dra ba 'byung ba ni rgyu mthun pa'o //
T02D1198:178b-27: thos pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa rnams kyi rgyu mthun gyi 'bras bu ni sgom pa ste /
T02D1198:178b-28: de'i rang gi ngo bo la rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:178b-29: de ltar yang yul dang dus kyi bye brag la
T02D1198:178b-30: mnyam par gzhag pa dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i
T02D1198:178b-31: rnal 'byor gyi gnas skabs dag tu goms pa'i bye
T02D1198:178b-32: brag las rnal 'byor rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba'i
T02D1198:178b-33: don du / brtag pa gnyis par gsungs pa /
T02D1198:178b-34: dang po goms par byed dus kyi //
T02D1198:178b-35: gnas ni bzang po rnam brtags pa //
T02D1198:178b-36: gang du gnas pa'i sngags pa sems //
T02D1198:178b-38: rang gi khyim du mtshan dus su //
T02D1198:178b-39: bdag ni grub pa'o zhes sems kyis //
T02D1198:179a-1: ka la yang bar ma chad par bsgom pa brtan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:179a-2: sgom pa zhum pas ni nges pa'i gnas la sogs pa bsdus pa las /
T02D1198:179a-3: rang gi 'dun pa zhes pa la sogs pa 'chad
T02D1198:179a-4: par 'gyur ba'i rim pas byis pa bzhin du gnas
T02D1198:179a-5: par bya'o // de la yang rnal 'byor rab tu
T02D1198:179a-6: gyur pa la 'dod par bya ba'i gzugs su 'dul
T02D1198:179a-7: bar rung ba'i skye bo la 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:179a-8: bla na med pa'i spyod pa nyid mdor bstan pa rgyas par 'chad pa /
T02D1198:179a-9: dngos grub ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:179a-10: ji skad gsungs pa ni bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud la sogs pa rnams su'o //
T02D1198:179a-11: de rnams su ni so sor nges pa'i spyod pas
T02D1198:179a-12: so sor nges pa'i bsgrub par bya ba re re
T02D1198:179a-14: 'di ni mnyam med las te phyag rgya chen po las 'grub pa kho na'i spyod pa'o //
T02D1198:179a-15: kun du bzang po ni dngos grub rnam pa thams cad 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //

T02D1198:179a-17: rdzi'i bar gyi sems can gyi rgyud la yod pa'i
T02D1198:179a-18: ye shes sam ting nge 'dzin gzhan la phan pa'i
T02D1198:179a-19: thabs su gyur pa de thams cad de nyid du

T02D1198:179a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1198:179a-24: dang thugs kyi dngos grub rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das
T02D1198:179a-27: sku gsum gyi gsang ba sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D1198:179a-28: ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi sku dang gsung dang
T02D1198:179a-30: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ci la gnas /

T02D1198:179a-32: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
T02D1198:179a-35: de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis phyag 'os ;

T02D1198:179a-39: mtha' yas pa rnams yang dag 'byung //
T02D1198:179a-40: phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gsang sngags rnams //
T02D1198:179a-41: rnal 'byor de las rnam dag nyid //
T02D1198:179b-0: zhi ba rgyas pa @179b nyid kyi las //

T02D1198:179b-2: chu bo gang+g'a'i bye ma'i grangs //
T02D1198:179b-3: ji snyed dngos grub phra mo dang //
T02D1198:179b-4: phyag rgya'i dngos grub gzhan nyid rnams //
T02D1198:179b-5: ji snyed sa la rnam grags pa //
T02D1198:179b-7: thugs kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa yin //
T02D1198:179b-9: shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med

T02D1198:179b-23: kyi gang yid de ni yid kyi ngo bo ste

T02D1198:179b-28: skyob pa'i don las te yongs su mi stong pa'i don gyis tra'o //
T02D1198:179b-29: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i ye
T02D1198:179b-30: shes kho na sngags so zhes pa'i don te de'i

T02D1198:179b-33: 'phags pa'i las grol ba ni 'dod pa rnams so //

T02D1198:179b-36: sngags kyi spyod pa'i yan lag nyid kyis na sngags kyi spyod pa ste /
T02D1198:179b-37: dper na aom la sogs pa kun rdzob pa'i sngags bzhin no //
T02D1198:179b-38: gzhan min zhes pa spyod pa gzhan ni kun du bzang po ma yin zhing /

T02D1198:179b-40: yang na min zhes klog pa ni /
T02D1198:179b-41: yang na 'di spyod pa ma yin te /
T02D1198:179b-42: don dam par spyod pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bshad par bya'o //
T02D1198:180a-0: gsungs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu @180a * //
T02D1198:180a-1: phyin pa la nga spyod do shes rab kyi pha

T02D1198:180a-8: gzhan rnams kyis mi shes pa ltar de dang por

T02D1198:180a-13: dogs med bya ba thams cad spyod //
T02D1198:180a-14: sbas pa'i brtul zhugs bsgrub byas nas //
T02D1198:180a-15: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub //
T02D1198:180a-17: bya ba byas pa ni rnal 'byor phul du byung ba thob pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:180a-18: gang brtag pa gnyis par gsungs pa /
T02D1198:180a-19: rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1198:180a-20: mnyam par gzhag pa dngos grub thob //
T02D1198:180a-21: zla ba gcig tu gsang la spyod //
T02D1198:180a-22: ji srid phyag rgya ma thob par //
T02D1198:180a-24: dngos grub ni 'dir rnal 'byor phul du byung ba sems brtan pa nyid la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1198:180a-25: de nyid kyi phyir blo gros che ste /
T02D1198:180a-26: gzhan gyi don la mngon par dga' ba'i bsam pa can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:180a-27: 'di ltar lhag par mos pa rnams la yang rang
T02D1198:180a-28: don la rjes su chags pa'i dri ma'i skabs yod
T02D1198:180a-29: pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:180a-30: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1198:180a-31: dogs pa kun las phyi rol phyogs //
T02D1198:180a-33: ral pa can bzhin ni seng ge bzhin du 'jigs pa'i dogs pa med pa'o //
T02D1198:180a-34: yang dag lta ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1198:180a-35: sems brtan pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la the tsom med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:180a-36: gnas med ni gnas ma nges pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:180a-37: rmi lam sgyu ma'i dpe gnyis ni rang bzhin med
T02D1198:180a-38: par ro gcig cing kun rdzob tu sna tshogs su
T02D1198:180a-39: snang bar mtshungs pa nyid kyis don gcig kyang 'ga'
T02D1198:180a-40: zhig la 'ga' zhig rab tu grub pa'o zhes gsungs
T02D1198:180a-41: pa'o // sgrib pa kun dang lhan cig ces tshig sdud do //
T02D1198:180a-42: sgrib pa ni 'dir chung ma la sogs pa kun nas 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1198:180b-0: brgyad rnams @180b ni rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa

T02D1198:180b-3: rnams so // rnam mi rtog ni dgra dang bshes
T02D1198:180b-4: dang btang snyoms pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa las

T02D1198:180b-16: rtog pa thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /

T02D1198:181a-1: ni bla na med pa ste /

T02D1198:181a-6: bzhin rnams thams cad de ltar rtogs pa las sangs

T02D1198:181a-22: sdug bsngal las ni sems g-yengs byed //
T02D1198:181a-23: g-yengs pas byang chub gzhan du 'gyur //
T02D1198:181a-24: zhes pa'i rigs pa las dang /

T02D1198:181a-27: byang chub 'thob cing bde gyur pa'i //
T02D1198:181a-28: sems ni mnyam par 'jog par byed //
T02D1198:181a-29: ces pa'i rigs pa las so //
T02D1198:181a-30: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dka' ba'i
T02D1198:181a-31: spyod pa spyad ces brjod par bya ba yang ma
T02D1198:181a-32: yin te / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sngags
T02D1198:181a-33: kyi spyod pa mchog spyod pa kho nar gyur pa

T02D1198:181a-37: nas kyang mthar thug pa na sngags kyis spyad pa
T02D1198:181a-38: spyod pa kho na las de rnams kyang 'grub pa'i

T02D1198:181a-40: sems dpar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' ba'i

T02D1198:181a-43: phyir ro // // de lta na yang de la

T02D1198:181b-19: sprul pa ni nges par dpyad nas gzhal ba ste /

T02D1198:181b-26: rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo'i rnal 'byor bas ni

T02D1198:181b-28: pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor gzugs la

T02D1198:181b-39: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku mtshan nyid //

T02D1198:182a-37: dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa la /

T02D1198:189a-29: de ltar ba lang la sogs pa rnams las rnam
T02D1198:189a-30: pa tha dad pa rnams ni de rnams kho na
T02D1198:189a-31: las rigs tha dad kyi phan tshun ni ma yin
T02D1198:189a-32: te / rnam pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:189a-33: de ltar shin tu gsal por 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob tu yang rigs gcig nyid yin na /
T02D1198:189a-34: rnal 'byor pa'i kun rdzob tu lta ci smos te /
T02D1198:189b-0: thog @189b ma med pa dang ldan pa'i shin tu
T02D1198:189b-1: 'khor bar thams cad rigs thams cad can nyid kyi
T02D1198:189b-2: phyir zhing / don dam par slar smra ci dgos /
T02D1198:189b-3: de ltar ni thams cad don dam par de bzhin nyid yin zhing /
T02D1198:189b-4: de yang rang bzhin kho nas yongs su dag pa ste /
T02D1198:189b-5: de kho na la lhag par mos nas rigs lngar gnas pa'o //
T02D1198:189b-6: de'i phyir du ma'i rigs kyi tshul can du rigs gcig brtags pas dbye ba mi srid do //
T02D1198:189b-7: gnyid ni rnal 'byor gyi gegs chen po ste /
T02D1198:189b-8: lus dang 'tsho ba la ltos pa yang rnal 'byor gyi gegs rnams kyi rtsa ba ste /
T02D1198:189b-9: the tshom med pa ni gnyid kyi bdag nyid spong ba la so ma nyi med pa'o //
T02D1198:189b-10: de ltar shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ni /
T02D1198:189b-11: dbang po rab kyi sems can gyis ye shes kyi
T02D1198:189b-12: phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pas sam phyag rgya
T02D1198:189b-14: 'khor ba mu mtha' med par gnas pa'i sdug bsngal
T02D1198:189b-15: brgyud pa rjes su dran nas 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1198:189b-16: pa'i bde ba 'dod pas chags pa thams cad spang
T02D1198:189b-17: zhing / tha na rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang
T02D1198:189b-18: 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang yid kyi rgyal srid
T02D1198:189b-19: zhing / la yang ste / don dam pa'i bden pa la mngon par dgongs nas /
T02D1198:189b-20: rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
T02D1198:189b-21: dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa dang
T02D1198:189b-22: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
T02D1198:189b-23: pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
T02D1198:189b-24: par 'dod pas lus dang srog la ltos pa med
T02D1198:189b-26: de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub phra mo
T02D1198:189b-27: dang 'jig rten pa'i grub pa chen po brgyad kyang
T02D1198:189b-28: don du gnyer bar mi bya ste /
T02D1198:189b-29: rnam par g-yeng ba'i phyir dang phyir ldog pa'i phyir
T02D1198:189b-30: ro zhes ting nge 'dzin rgyal por gsungs pa'i phyir
T02D1198:189b-31: na / lus dang srog la sogs pa la 'dod pa med par goms par bya'o //
T02D1198:189b-32: de skad du yang dpal 'dus par gsungs pa /
T02D1198:189b-33: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che //
T02D1198:189b-34: yang dang yang du bskul bar bya //
T02D1198:189b-36: bskul bar bya ba ni yid la bya ba'o //
T02D1198:189b-38: rkang pa brkyang ba spangs nas ni /
T02D1198:189b-39: 'khor ba'i sgrom ni dkrol byas nas //
T02D1198:190a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba sgrub //
T02D1198:190a-3: 'gyod dang rmugs dang gnyid sogs rnams //
T02D1198:190a-4: 'bad pas yongs su spangs nas so //
T02D1198:190a-5: gzhan du bskal pa bye ba rnams //
T02D1198:190a-6: brgyas kyang dngos grub mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:190a-8: de ltar yang goms par byed pa 'di'i mngon par
T02D1198:190a-9: 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'bad pa med pa
T02D1198:190a-12: gsang ba grub par gsungs pa /
T02D1198:190a-13: rang bzhin med pa'i go 'phang gnas //
T02D1198:190a-14: thabs bzang po dang ldan pa yi //
T02D1198:190a-15: rtog pas bskul ba gang ci dung //
T02D1198:190a-17: sgom pa'i rnal 'byor nus pa las //
T02D1198:190a-18: dngos grub mtshan nyid ci yang rung //
T02D1198:190a-19: de kun skad cig tsam gyis ni //
T02D1198:190a-20: rang nyid nye bar gnas par 'gyur //
T02D1198:190a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1198:190a-23: gang tshe dpa' bo rnams mi rtog /'jig rten pa yi gnas bcom nas //
T02D1198:190a-24: bya ba thams cad spyod byed pa //
T02D1198:190a-25: de tshe de sangs rgyas kyis gzigs //
T02D1198:190a-26: byis pa bzhin du spyod ldan pas //
T02D1198:190a-27: gud nas the tshom chad pa can //
T02D1198:190a-28: gang tshe rnal 'byor lhun grub pa //
T02D1198:190a-29: de tshe phun sum tshogs rnams 'byung //
T02D1198:190a-30: sdig pa ma lus ldan rnams kyi //
T02D1198:190a-31: gti mug sgrib pa cher gnas rnams //
T02D1198:190a-32: smyon pa'i brtul zhugs sbyor ba yis //
T02D1198:190a-33: zla ba drug gis don yod grub //

T02D1198:190a-35: dngos po ched du gtad pas bsgom //
T02D1198:190a-36: ji srid sems skyor ma gyur par //
T02D1198:190a-37: blo bzang mnyam par gzhag yid kyis //
T02D1198:190a-38: skyo na phyi nas ji lta bur //
T02D1198:190a-39: 'dod pa'i spyod pas rgyu par bya //
T02D1198:190a-40: byang chub rgya chen sgom byed cing //
T02D1198:190a-41: cung zad mig mi 'dzum lta ba //
T02D1198:190a-42: de ltar ting 'dzin ldan pa yi //
T02D1198:190a-43: rnam par mi rtog sngags pa yis ;
T02D1198:190a-44: / dus kyi mtshan ni yongs spangs te //
T02D1198:190a-49: kun rdzob la ni dmigs pa las //
T02D1198:190a-50: sna tshogs nad rnams skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1198:190b-0: de rnams sgyu ma'i @190b sman gyis rgyal //
T02D1198:190b-1: sgyu ma la gnas rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1198:190b-2: lha rnams rtag tu 'dir srung byed //
T02D1198:190b-3: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D1198:190b-5: rdo rje mtshon cha brtson 'grus che //
T02D1198:190b-6: lang tsho nad med dam pa'i sde //
T02D1198:190b-7: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yongs thob nas ;
T02D1198:190b-9: mthong ba kho nas bskul ba yi //
T02D1198:190b-10: sems can rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur //
T02D1198:190b-11: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D1198:190b-12: thams cad don du ma gnyer 'thob //
T02D1198:190b-13: mi 'grub pa ni ci yang med //
T02D1198:190b-14: rdo rje sems dpas mtshan pa ste //
T02D1198:190b-15: sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che //
T02D1198:190b-16: rang nyid so so rjes su 'grub //
T02D1198:190b-18: grub pa'i mtshan ma yang rdul phra rab kyi ngo
T02D1198:190b-19: bo nyid dang lus yang ba nyid dang 'jig rten
T02D1198:190b-20: gsum po mtha' dag khyab par byed pa nyid dang
T02D1198:190b-21: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'thob pa dang ye shes
T02D1198:190b-22: kyi snang ba dang de la brtan par gyur pa
T02D1198:190b-23: nyid dang skye bo thams cad bdag nyid kyi dbang
T02D1198:190b-24: du gyur pa nyid dang 'dod dgur sgyur ba mthar
T02D1198:190b-25: skye'o // de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1198:190b-26: phra mo'i gzugs dang reg yang ba //
T02D1198:190b-27: khyab dang yang dag thob pa nyid //
T02D1198:190b-28: rab tu gsal dang gtan pa nyid //
T02D1198:190b-29: dbang ldan 'dod dgur sgyur mtha' can //
T02D1198:190b-31: gzugs phra ba nyid la sogs pa kho na shin
T02D1198:190b-32: tu phra ba dang yang ba dang shin tu che
T02D1198:190b-33: ba dang gar yang phyin pa dang gsal bar 'os
T02D1198:190b-34: pa dang / dbang po nyid dang dbang sgyur ba
T02D1198:190b-35: nyid dang gang du 'dod par gnas pa zhes pa
T02D1198:190b-36: pa dang / / dbang phyug nyid rnam pa brgyad du brjod par bya'o //
T02D1198:190b-37: bhu su ku'i spyod pa yang ste /
T02D1198:190b-38: za ba dang nyal ba dang bshad sar 'gro ba
T02D1198:190b-39: tsam gyi bya ba la yang byang chub kyi sems
T02D1198:190b-40: sgom pa bar ma chad pa nyid kyi ngo bo

T02D1198:190b-43: bar mas ni las kyi phyag rgyas lha mo'i gzugs
T02D1198:190b-44: can lnga rnams dang dam tshig gcig gis spros pa
T02D1198:190b-45: med pa'i spyod pa goms par byed do //
T02D1198:190b-46: chung ngus ni tha mal pa'i nga rgyal bsal ba
T02D1198:190b-47: dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma mdzes ma rnams dang
T02D1198:190b-48: lhan cig dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis /
T02D1198:191a-0: lag pa'i phyag rgya dang glu dang nye bar spyod @191a * //
T02D1198:191a-1: pa dang kun skyong dang tshul gyi gar la sogs
T02D1198:191a-2: pa'i rab tu sbyor ba rnams kyis rtag tu brtson
T02D1198:191a-3: pa'i yid can gyis nyin mtshan du spros pa'i spyod
T02D1198:191a-4: pas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub sgrub par byed
T02D1198:191a-5: de / dper na rgyal po ai ndra bh'u ti'i bzhin no //
T02D1198:191a-6: spyod pa gnyis po 'di yang 'dir gsal bar byas shing /
T02D1198:191a-7: shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ni rgyas par mdzad de /
T02D1198:191a-8: dbang po rnon po'i sems can gyi dbang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:191a-9: de'i phyir de spyad nas gang bya ba de sum cu rtsa bdun bar 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:191a-10: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02D1198:191a-11: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma nyi shu pa'o /
T02D1198:191a-13: // / rdzogs pa'i rim pa kho na rnam pa gzhan
T02D1198:191a-14: gyis gsal bar bya ba'i ched du bcom ldan 'das
T02D1198:191a-15: ma rdo rje snyems mas zhus pa /

T02D1198:191a-17: rang gi ste phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can lhag
T02D1198:191a-18: pa'i lha nyid du gnas pa rtogs pa ni byin
T02D1198:191a-20: gsang chen zhes pa la sogs pa'i man ngag ni /
T02D1198:191a-21: gsang chen mchog tu dgyes bya na //
T02D1198:191a-22: thams cad bdag nyid la rtag zhugs //
T02D1198:191a-23: zhes pa rab tu byed pa gsum par mdor bstan pa ste ;
T02D1198:191a-24: rab tu sbyar ba'o zhes pa dgos pa ste brjod par bya ba 'di'i ci yin pa'o //
T02D1198:191a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' brtse ba che //
T02D1198:191a-26: zhes pa'i tshig dag gis stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i rang bzhin gyi skur bdag nyid brjod cing /
T02D1198:191a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis rang byin gyis brlab pa'i don rgyas par mdzad do //
T02D1198:191a-28: nges par drang bar bya'o zhes pa nges pa ste brjod bya'o //
T02D1198:191a-29: ae yig ni dang po'i dag nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1198:191a-30: rab gsungs pa ni ae yig sa ru shes bya ste /
T02D1198:191a-31: las kyi phyag rgya zhes pa la sogs par dang /
T02D1198:191a-32: dang po'i ngag tu yang ngo //
T02D1198:191a-33: 'gro ba dang rjes su 'gro ste 'ong ba'o //
T02D1198:191a-35: bgrod pa ni 'og nas steng du'am steng nas 'og tu'o //
T02D1198:191a-36: ci las zhes pa brjod par 'dod par la gnas
T02D1198:191a-37: pa'i brjod par bya ba las gang rjod par byed
T02D1198:191a-38: pa'o // gsang chen du zhes pa ni mchog tu
T02D1198:191b-0: zhes pa la sogs pa @191b nye bar mtshon pa
T02D1198:191b-1: ste zhes pa yi ge bcu drug gsungs pa gang
T02D1198:191b-2: de'i brjod par bya ba 'di tsam ste /
T02D1198:191b-5: reg par bya bas na reg bya ste rlung ngo //
T02D1198:191b-6: khrag bzhin du reg bya la sogs pa rnams kyang
T02D1198:191b-7: 'phel ba'am 'grib pa na lus dang srog dag 'dzin
T02D1198:191b-9: ldan pa ni tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid kyis phan tshun 'brel ba'o //
T02D1198:191b-10: shin tu mdzes pa ni rang bzhin gyis sgom pas phan tshun bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:191b-11: byang chub sems las byung ba ni skye ba la sogs pa khu ba las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:191b-13: khu ba las ni gong bu skye //
T02D1198:191b-14: gong bu las ni mi 'byung ngo //
T02D1198:191b-16: khu ba ni rdul nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1198:191b-18: rtsa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:191b-19: aa wa dh'u t'i la n'a da ni gtum mo rdul gyi ri mo'o //
T02D1198:191b-20: cha'i bdag nyid ni cha bcu drug gi rang bzhin no //
T02D1198:191b-21: rdul dang khu ba'i rnam 'gyur gyi rang bzhin 'di thams cad yin zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:191b-22: de nyid kyi phyir khrag dang rlung dang bad kan dang /
T02D1198:191b-23: mkhris pa dang ro dang tshil bu dang me dang
T02D1198:191b-24: sha dang bshad pa dang zhag dang pags pa dang
T02D1198:191b-25: rus pa dang gci ba dang glo ba dang padma
T02D1198:191b-27: khams bcu drug rnams kyi dang po dang mthar rdul dang khu ba dag gsungs pa ni /
T02D1198:191b-28: de dag gi rnam 'gyur thams cad yin no zhes rtogs pa'i don du'o //
T02D1198:191b-29: 'di thams cad kyang sems kyi rang bzhin yin zhing /
T02D1198:191b-30: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa yang stong pa
T02D1198:191b-31: nyid dang ro gcig cing zag pa med pa bde
T02D1198:191b-32: ba chen po'i sems kyi rang bzhin rdul dang khu
T02D1198:191b-34: de dang dbyer med pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma rdul
T02D1198:191b-35: gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la
T02D1198:191b-36: sogs par 'gyur ba ni rnam par gzhag pa tsam
T02D1198:191b-38: de'i phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa kho na khrag kyang
T02D1198:191b-39: yin rlung yang yin la ji srid khu ba'o zhes
T02D1198:191b-40: pa ste las 'dzin pa las so //
T02D1198:191b-41: rdzas bcu drug po 'di rnams kho na ma bzhin
T02D1198:191b-42: du 'phel bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir khrag rnams
T02D1198:192a-0: so // 'di rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyi lha dbyer med @192a * //
T02D1198:192a-1: par mos pa las lus kyi dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:192a-2: de skad du yang rdo rje mkha' 'gror gsungs pa /
T02D1198:192a-3: bcu drug rnams nyid sgyu ma che //
T02D1198:192a-4: ma bzhin du ni yongs sgom pa //
T02D1198:192a-5: de yis nang gi dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1198:192a-6: the tshom med par 'gyur ba nyid ;
T02D1198:192a-8: de nyid kyi phyir rdul dang khu ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1198:192a-9: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi mer
T02D1198:192a-10: mer po la sogs pa'i gnas skabs la khyab pa
T02D1198:192a-11: nyid kyis na khams kyi gtso bo nyid kyis sa
T02D1198:192a-12: bon nyid de / bar gyi gnas skabs su ni
T02D1198:192a-13: me dang chu la sogs pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i
T02D1198:192a-14: ngo bo nyid kyis mkhris pa dang bad kan la
T02D1198:192a-15: sogs pa rnams phal pa'i khams nyid kyis na sa
T02D1198:192a-16: bon nyid do zhes brjod pa'i ched du gsungs pa
T02D1198:192a-17: bon nyid de / / ra yig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:192a-18: ra ni me ste brjod par bya ba dang rjod
T02D1198:192a-19: byed dag tha mi dad par sgro btags pa'i phyir
T02D1198:192a-21: 'phro 'du ni 'du ba ste gnas sna tshogs na gnas pa'i ro 'dus pa rnams bad kan te /
T02D1198:192a-23: chu rgyus kyi lhan cig byed pa can de las skyes pa'o //
T02D1198:192a-24: de yang rtags gzhan dang dbyibs gzhan gyi rtags rnams nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D1198:192a-25: de rnams ni bstan bcos gzhan las shes par bya'o //
T02D1198:192a-26: 'dir mkhris pa dang bad kan ni phal pa'i khams rnams nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1198:192a-27: de ste khu ba ni mgon po ste /
T02D1198:192a-28: thams cad kyi bdag po nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:192a-29: ha yig ni ha yig gi brjod bya'o //
T02D1198:192a-30: kun du 'gro ba ni khams thams cad la khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:192a-31: de nyid kyi phyir des khams rnams de dang de nas drangs pa rnams so //
T02D1198:192a-33: sa ni rgyus pa dang rus pa'i tshigs kyis gsal
T02D1198:192a-34: bar byas shing rten nyid kyis rtogs pa kho na'o
T02D1198:192a-36: de'i phyir 'thad pa 'dis thob pa sa bon rnam lnga can no //
T02D1198:192a-37: ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1198:192a-38: ra yig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:192a-39: ra yig ni me ste gtum mo rdul gyi ngo
T02D1198:192b-0: bo yab yum snyoms par zhugs pas @192b 'bar ba
T02D1198:192b-1: ni / rkan la ste bde ba chen po chu
T02D1198:192b-2: skyes su son pa gang gi tshe khu ba dang
T02D1198:192b-3: 'dus pa de'i tshes dang chu dang me dang rlung
T02D1198:192b-4: ste khams bzhi po rnams thams cad sa bon mchog
T02D1198:192b-5: ste bde ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:192b-6: de ste sa bon bzhi 'di'i dang po yin pa zhes pa de thog ma can sa bon lnga /
T02D1198:192b-7: mdzes pa ste lha'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dang lha bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:192b-8: lnga pa ci zhig ce na gsungs pa /

T02D1198:192b-10: ha dang au'i brjod par bya ba lus dang ngag
T02D1198:192b-11: dang ldan pa ma yin brjod par bya ba sems
T02D1198:192b-13: brjod par bya ba zhes pa gzhan du bsgrubs zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:192b-14: de ni lnga par gsungs so //

T02D1198:196a-20: mgo bo dang smin ma dang mig dang rna ba dang sna dang kha dang lte ba dang /

T02D1198:196a-22: byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:196a-23: der son pa'i lus kyi sgo rnam pa dgu'o //
T02D1198:196a-24: 'byung ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin spyan ma dang
T02D1198:196a-25: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis
T02D1198:196a-26: sprul pa ste sngags la sogs pas sprul pa bzhin
T02D1198:196a-27: du rang bzhin med pa'o zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
T02D1198:196a-28: dri ba gsum pa lan 'debs te /
T02D1198:196a-29: sems kyi zhes pa sems rlung la zhon pa ni
T02D1198:196a-30: skyes bu rnal 'byor pa stong pa nyid dang snying
T02D1198:196a-31: rje dbyer med pa kho na'o zhes pa'i don te
T02D1198:196a-33: grangs can po'i skyes bu bzhin du rtag par rang bzhin dang bcas pa ni ma yin te /
T02D1198:196a-34: gang las 'di'i de dang 'dra bar 'gro ba la sogs pa med pa yin pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1198:196a-35: rtag tu ni rgyun mi 'chad par ro //
T02D1198:196a-36: 'gro ba'i khyad par ni 'og dang steng dag tu 'jug pa dang 'byung ba dag ste /
T02D1198:196a-37: sgo dgu rnams kyi bar gyi gnas skabs su rlung 'bab pa'i dbang las so //
T02D1198:196b-0: de skad du ni rdo rje'i sgo'i @196b rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du /
T02D1198:196b-1: srog dang thur sel dang mnyam gnas dang gyen rgyu
T02D1198:196b-2: dang khyab byed dang rgyu ba dang rnam par rgyu
T02D1198:196b-3: dang yang dag rgyu dang nges par rgyu dang rab
T02D1198:196b-4: tu rgyu ste rlung bcu rnams kyi bya ba bstan
T02D1198:196b-5: to // de la snying gar gnas pa'i rlung ni /
T02D1198:196b-6: rab gnon las dang srog rtsol las //
T02D1198:196b-7: dbang po'i sgo yi rgyun rnams kyis //
T02D1198:196b-8: rtag pa'i dus su rab 'gro ba //
T02D1198:196b-9: srog ces par ni mngon par brjod //
T02D1198:196b-10: rab gnon ni 'byung ba dang 'jug pa dag go //
T02D1198:196b-11: srog rtsol ni tshe ring bar byed pa ste /
T02D1198:196b-12: srog ste sems kyi rtsol ba ste ring du byed
T02D1198:196b-13: cing rgyas par byed pa zhes pa srog rtsol lo
T02D1198:196b-14: // srog tu byed dbugs su byed pas srog ste /
T02D1198:196b-16: bshad lam du gnas pa ni /
T02D1198:196b-17: rlung gcig bshang ba khu ba sogs //
T02D1198:196b-18: thur du 'dren phyir thur sel lo //
T02D1198:196b-19: lte gnas bza' btung la sogs rnams //
T02D1198:196b-20: mnyam par 'dren phyir mnyam gnas so //
T02D1198:196b-22: gyen 'gro'i phyir dang sdud pa las //
T02D1198:196b-23: bza' dang bca' sogs za ba yis //
T02D1198:196b-24: gyen rgyu'i las su rnam shes bya //
T02D1198:196b-25: shes dang lhan cig sbyor las so //
T02D1198:196b-26: gyen 'gro ni sna'i bu ga la sogs pa rnams nas so //
T02D1198:196b-27: sdud pa ni nang du 'jug pa'o //
T02D1198:196b-28: shes pa dang sbyor ba ni rlung bcu po rnams kyang 'bab par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:196b-30: khyab dang 'dzin pa nyid dang ni //
T02D1198:196b-32: tshigs rnams kun du khyab pa'i phyir //
T02D1198:196b-33: khyab byed ces par mngon par brjod //
T02D1198:196b-34: rgyu ba ni mig la brten nas gzugs kyi rnam shes skyed par byed do //
T02D1198:196b-35: rnam par rgyu ni rna ba la brten nas sgra la shes pa'o //
T02D1198:196b-36: yang dag rgyu ni sna la brten nas dri'i shes pa'o //
T02D1198:196b-37: rab tu rgyu ni lce la brten nas ro'i shes pa'o //
T02D1198:196b-38: nges par rgyu ni lus kyi skye mched la brten nas reg bya la shes pa'o //
T02D1198:196b-39: 'phags pa'i lha'i zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1198:196b-40: rlung bcu po 'di rnams ni slar yang dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02D1198:196b-41: dkyil 'khor bzhi'i bdag nyid rnams dang 'byung ba lnga'i
T02D1198:196b-42: bdag nyid rnams dang me long lta bu la sogs
T02D1198:197a-0: pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid @197a * //
T02D1198:197a-1: dang 'od zer lnga'i bdag nyid rnams te /
T02D1198:197a-2: de rnams kyang yi ge gsum gyi gzhir gyur nas 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang /
T02D1198:197a-3: ldang ba'i rim gyis rdo rje bzlas pa byed do //
T02D1198:197a-4: de rnams kyang aa yig gi gzhir gyur nas tshig brjod pa ma lus pa byed du 'jug go //
T02D1198:197a-5: de rnams kyang gzhom du med pa thob nas rang bzhin med par 'gyur ro zhes so //
T02D1198:197a-6: dgongs pa lung ston pa'i rgyud du yang /
T02D1198:197a-7: byang chub sems ni rlung 'gyur zhing //
T02D1198:197a-8: nam mkha' la yang rnam par gnas //
T02D1198:197a-9: sems can rnams kyi srog gyur pa //
T02D1198:197a-10: lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can //
T02D1198:197a-12: nam mkha' la ste lus kyi bu ga la'o //
T02D1198:197a-13: lnga'i bdag nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1198:197a-14: mtha'i gnas skabs su ni bgrod pa'i khyad par 'pho ba'i rab tu byed par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:197a-15: ngag gi bgrod pa'i sgo brjod pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:197a-16: de ltar zhes pa ste bgrod pa'i khyad par las
T02D1198:197a-17: 'gro ba'i rlung nyid la sogs dbye bas rlung rnam
T02D1198:197a-18: pa bzhi'o // 'gro ba ni sems kyi gnas pa'i khyad par kho na ste /
T02D1198:197a-19: gnas pa yang rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D1198:197a-20: de la zhum pa'i rgyas par ston pa /
T02D1198:197a-21: zhum pa'i gnas pa'o zhes pa brtan pa nyid de 'bab par gyur pa'i rlung brtan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:197a-22: rab rgyu'i cho ga rgyas par bstan pa ni //
T02D1198:197a-23: rtag tu rab rgyu'i 'gro dang 'ong zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:197a-24: bgrod pa'i khyad par zhes pa 'di ci zhe na /
T02D1198:197a-26: me zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:197a-28: kun spyod ni 'jug pa dang 'byung ba dag go //
T02D1198:197a-30: steng du song ba ni me'i dkyil 'khor du 'bab pa ste sna'i bu ga'i g-yas ngos nas so //
T02D1198:197a-31: g-yon ngos su son pa ni rlung gi ru'o //
T02D1198:197a-32: thad kar gnyis kar son pa ni sa'i ru'o //
T02D1198:197a-33: 'og tu son pa ni chu'i ru'o //
T02D1198:197a-34: 'byung ba lnga pa nam mkha'i khams ni khyab par
T02D1198:197a-35: byed pa nyid kyis gnas bzhi rnam pa gsum yang
T02D1198:197a-36: dkyil 'khor bzhi yang dag rgyu ba'i dus kho nar
T02D1198:197a-37: yang dag par rgyu'o zhes pa la sogs su ma
T02D1198:197b-0: gsungs so // de skad du yang 'phags pa'i lha'i zhabs @197b kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1198:197b-1: rdo rje dang padma dag gi sna dag las 'od zer byung zhing /
T02D1198:197b-2: gyen du song ste rab tu grags pa'i sna'i rtse mo nas rgyu'o //
T02D1198:197b-3: de las dang chu dang me dang rlung zhes khams
T02D1198:197b-4: kyi bya ba dkyil 'khor bzhi rnams phyir 'byung zhing
T02D1198:197b-5: / khyab byed ni khyab par byed pa'i rlung phyir mi 'byung ba khyab pa'i 'od zer can te /
T02D1198:197b-6: rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1198:197b-7: 'on kyang 'od zer re re 'byung ba na /
T02D1198:197b-8: 'od zer lnga can rnams phyir 'byung ste /
T02D1198:197b-9: khams kyi dkyil 'khor gcig gis khams bzhi rnams la khyab pa'o zhes so //
T02D1198:197b-10: 'dir ni sa la sogs pa'i rlung 'od zer bzhi
T02D1198:197b-11: po rnams 'di yis khyab pa rnams so zhes pas
T02D1198:197b-12: khyab pa'i 'od zer can zhes par khams kyi zhes
T02D1198:197b-13: pa la sogs pas gsal bar mdzad do //
T02D1198:197b-14: cha shas re re ni dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams
T02D1198:197b-15: kyi dkyil 'khor so so'i 'od zer dge ba ste
T02D1198:197b-16: bde ba bskyed par rung ba nyid kyis bde ba'i
T02D1198:197b-17: ngo bo nam mkha'i bdag nyid kyi rlung ma'i skye
T02D1198:197b-18: gnas nas phyi rol du byung ba nas brtsams te
T02D1198:197b-19: 'byung zhing / de nyid dang lhan cig sa la
T02D1198:197b-20: sogs pa rnams 'od zer lnga can rnams su 'gyur
T02D1198:197b-21: 'byung zhing / ro // rlung bcu po rnams dkyil
T02D1198:197b-22: 'khor bzhi'i bdag nyid can rnams dang 'byung ba lnga'i
T02D1198:197b-23: bdag nyid rnams shes pa yang 'thad do //
T02D1198:197b-24: dus tha dad par nam mkha' rgyun ni thun phyed
T02D1198:197b-25: kyis me la sogs pa'i dus sbyor bzhi po rnams
T02D1198:197b-26: kho na'i 'o // dgongs pa lung ston pa'i rgyud du /
T02D1198:197b-27: gos dkar la sogs bzlas bshad pa //
T02D1198:197b-28: brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga //
T02D1198:197b-29: bzhi yis yang dag bsgyur ba ni //
T02D1198:197b-30: sbyor ba bzhi la brgya phrag dgu //
T02D1198:197b-31: zhes nyin mtshan gyi thun phyed pa nyi shu rtsa
T02D1198:197b-32: bzhi rnams kyis so sor 'byung ba'i rnam pas bsgyur
T02D1198:197b-33: ba las / dgu brgya rnams su gang bstan pa //
T02D1198:197b-34: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rim rnams kyis //
T02D1198:197b-35: de ni so sor 'byung ba las //
T02D1198:197b-36: nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o //
T02D1198:197b-37: zhes 'pho ba'i dbugs kyis grangs gsungs pa ci ltar yin /
T02D1198:197b-38: so sor rang dbang du yang dag par rgyun ni
T02D1198:197b-39: nam mkha'i yang dbugs kyi grangs gsungs pa'i bya ba
T02D1198:198a-1: rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud du yang nam mkha' nang
T02D1198:198a-2: du 'dus pa kho nas dkyil 'khor bzhi rnams kho
T02D1198:198a-4: sna rtse yungs kar zhes bya ba //
T02D1198:198a-5: srog dang rtsol bar brtags pa ste //
T02D1198:198a-6: srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa //
T02D1198:198a-7: 'od lnga sangs rgyas rnams su sgom //
T02D1198:198a-8: steng du sna las nges 'byung ba //
T02D1198:198a-9: g-yon dang g-yas dang gnyi ga dang //
T02D1198:198a-10: dal ba zhes pa rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1198:198a-11: nang gi dus ni yin par 'dod //
T02D1198:198a-12: mgrin pa snying ga lte ba dang //
T02D1198:198a-14: thun phyed dus su rim 'ongs pas //
T02D1198:198a-15: go rims ji bzhin gnas par byed //
T02D1198:198a-17: me yi dkyil 'khor de yin te //
T02D1198:198a-18: kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba 'di //
T02D1198:198a-21: rlung gi dkyil 'khor ming can te //
T02D1198:198a-22: ljang sngon ru ni rab snang ba //
T02D1198:198a-23: las kyi mgon po 'dir lha nyid //
T02D1198:198a-24: gnyis ka las ni byung ba'i 'od //
T02D1198:198a-25: kha dog ser po'i 'od chen po //
T02D1198:198a-27: rin chen mgon po 'di la lha'o //
T02D1198:198a-28: dal zhing dman par rab rgyu ba //
T02D1198:198a-29: dkar ba kun da ltar snang ba //
T02D1198:198a-31: rdo rje mgon po 'di lha nyid //
T02D1198:198a-32: lus kun la ni rjes song rlung //
T02D1198:198a-33: bya ba kun la 'jug byed pa //
T02D1198:198a-34: 'di ni rnam snang mdzad rang bzhin //
T02D1198:198a-36: rlung gi de nyid gsal ba 'di //
T02D1198:198a-37: ye shes lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1198:198a-39: de bzhin du gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud du /
T02D1198:198a-40: ya yig don gyis gang ci'ang rung /
T02D1198:198a-42: ra la sogs pa gsum gyis kyang //
T02D1198:198a-44: me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang //
T02D1198:198a-46: thun ni phyed phyed dus rnams su //
T02D1198:198a-47: las dag gnyis gnyis gnas par 'gyur //
T02D1198:198a-48: zhes pa 'dis sa dang chu dang me dang rlung
T02D1198:198a-49: gi dkyil 'khor rgyu ba rnams su rim pa ji
T02D1198:198a-50: lta bar zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang du
T02D1198:198a-51: bya ba dang mngon spyod kyi las gtso bor dang
T02D1198:198b-0: / dkyil 'khor re re la ni gang na @198b
T02D1198:198b-1: gcig yin pa de na bzhi rnams so zhes pa'i
T02D1198:198b-2: rig pa las gzhan pa'i las gsum phal pa'o zhes
T02D1198:198b-3: thun phyed kyi dkyil 'khor so so la gtso bo'i
T02D1198:198b-5: de ltar nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi gang du yang ma yin no //
T02D1198:198b-6: las thams cad pa nyid ni 'di la gcig dkyil
T02D1198:198b-7: 'khor bzhi'i nang du 'dus pa kho na las shes
T02D1198:198b-8: par bya'o zhes pas ma brjod do //
T02D1198:198b-9: aa wa dh'u t'i'i lam nas kyang rgyu ba'i rlung
T02D1198:198b-10: ni dkyil 'khor bzhi rnams sna bug dag las rgyu
T02D1198:198b-11: ste / lnga pa de ni de'i nang du 'dus
T02D1198:198b-12: pa kho na'i phyir logs par ni ma yin no
T02D1198:198b-13: ste / // gzhan yang brtag pa gnyis pa'i rgyud du /
T02D1198:198b-14: bde ba nyid ni nam mkha'i khams //
T02D1198:198b-15: zhes pa 'dis mer mer po'i gnas skabs su khams
T02D1198:198b-16: bzhi'i rnam pa can kho na'i bde ba'i shes pa
T02D1198:198b-18: lhan cig gnas pa'i rnam pa med pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1198:198b-19: khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'gyur //
T02D1198:198b-20: de yi bde ba 'dod mar bshad //
T02D1198:198b-21: ces pa 'dis kyang shes rab dang thabs dag dbyer
T02D1198:198b-22: med pa mang du gsal bar byed pa'i phyir khu
T02D1198:198b-23: ba'i rnam pa can kho na bde ba nyams su
T02D1198:198b-25: ye shes rnam pa med pa yang ma yin no //
T02D1198:198b-26: de las gzhan pa'i nam mkha' zhes bya ba cung zad yod pa yang ma yin la /
T02D1198:198b-27: de 'byung ba yang ma yin te /
T02D1198:198b-28: ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:198b-30: mun pa'i ngo bo yang 'byung ba dang /
T02D1198:198b-31: 'byung ba las gyur pa'i ngo bo'i khyad par gzugs kho na'o zhes gzhan du dpyad zin to //
T02D1198:198b-32: des na cis stong pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhan pa'o zhes brjod /
T02D1198:198b-33: gang dus kyi 'khor lor nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor logs
T02D1198:198b-34: su bton nas gsungs pa de ni mu stegs pa'i
T02D1198:198b-35: lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i nyi ma'i shing
T02D1198:198b-36: rta la sogs pa gdul bya rnams nges pa'i don
T02D1198:198b-37: la gzhug pa la ldem por dgongs pas drang ba'i
T02D1198:198b-39: phag la sogs pa 'dod pa'i rjes su 'jug pas
T02D1198:198b-40: ri rab kyi steng gi mtshams su khams gsum pa'i
T02D1198:198b-41: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi bkod pa la sogs pa
T02D1198:199a-0: 'o na dus kyi 'khor lo dang de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i gzhung rnams @199a * //
T02D1198:199a-1: su theg pa gsum dang 'gal ba'i rnam par gzhag pa mang po rnams bya ste /
T02D1198:199a-2: de'i gzhung byed pa grags pa dang padma dkar po
T02D1198:199a-3: dang rdo rje snying po dang phyag na rdo rje'i
T02D1198:199a-4: ming can de rnams byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma
T02D1198:199a-5: yin pa kho na'o zhes mang du shes pa rnams
T02D1198:199a-6: smra'o // 'di'i phyir 'gal ba thams cad ma spangs pas na /
T02D1198:199a-7: 'ga' zhig tu 'gal ba spong ba'i 'bad rtsol gyis ci bya zhe na /
T02D1198:199a-8: dus kyi 'khor lor bstan pa rgyud gzhan dang mi
T02D1198:199a-9: 'gal ba'i don gyi cha 'ga' zhig gi ni kho
T02D1198:199a-10: bos rang gzhung gi phyogs rnams su rjes su 'brang
T02D1198:199a-11: zhing / gdul bya 'ga' zhig gi bsam pa'i rjes su 'jug pas 'gal ba'ang kha cig spangs so //
T02D1198:199a-12: de las gzhan la ni 'gal ba ma spangs na
T02D1198:199a-13: yang 'di rnams la nyes pa ci yang med do
T02D1198:199a-14: zhes pa shin tu rgyas par brjod pas chog go
T02D1198:199a-16: zhes pa 'di la man ngag gis nyin mtshan so
T02D1198:199a-17: sor thun tshod phyed pa so so la bzhi rnams
T02D1198:199a-18: so zhes pas thun tshod phyed pa nyi shu rtsa
T02D1198:199a-19: bzhi rnams kyis khams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rnams to /
T02D1198:199a-21: khams kyi dkyil 'khor gcig la rkang pa dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag gnyis kyi dbugs rnams so //
T02D1198:199a-22: de la dbugs phyed dang bcas pa'i bdun rnams ni khyab byed kyi ste /
T02D1198:199a-23: mi phyed ma la sogs pa rtsa sum cu rtsa
T02D1198:199a-24: gcig rnams su dbugs sum cu rtsa gcig gi rjes
T02D1198:199a-25: su bdud 'dral ma zhes bya ba dus kyi rtsar
T02D1198:199a-26: dbugs re re rgyu ba'i phyir dang lhag ma gcig
T02D1198:199a-27: gi phyed rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:199a-28: des na dkyil 'khor dgu bcu rtsa drug rnams la
T02D1198:199a-29: khyab byed kyi dbugs bdun brgya nyi shu ste chu
T02D1198:199a-31: lo brgya'i nyin mtshan rnams chu tshod gnyis kyis bsgyur ba rnams la /
T02D1198:199a-32: chu tshod stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams su 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:199a-33: de nyid kyi phyir ma'i skye gnas las phyir 'byung
T02D1198:199a-34: ba nas brtsams nas nyin mtshan so so la lus
T02D1198:199a-35: kyi chu tshod gnyis dag tshe zad pa'i phyir lo
T02D1198:199b-0: brgya rnams kyis chu tshod stong phrag bdun cu @199b
T02D1198:199b-1: rtsa gnyis rnams la tshe thams cad zad de /
T02D1198:199b-2: 'di'i phyir 'chi ba'i skad cig la khyab byed kyi rlung /
T02D1198:199b-6: ji srid 'jig rten brdar btags dang //
T02D1198:199b-7: de bzhin brtags pa sna tshogs rnams //
T02D1198:199b-9: rnam rtog rlung las rtag tu'o //
T02D1198:199b-10: zhes dgongs pa lung ston pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i phyir na /
T02D1198:199b-11: ngag rnams kyi rgyu ni rlung dang rnam par rtog pa dag go //
T02D1198:199b-12: rnam par rtog pa'i ni sngar gyi shes pa dang rlung ngo //
T02D1198:199b-13: de'i phyir de rnams kyi yang dngos su dang brgyud
T02D1198:199b-14: pas rlung rgyu yin no zhes pa ngag gi ba'i
T02D1198:199b-15: sgo'o // rlung dang sems 'di dag kyang sgro btags pa nyid kyis te /

T02D1198:203a-0: @203a * // dbu mar srog ni nyin mtshan du //
T02D1198:203a-1: zhugs pas nad rnams 'phrog par byed //
T02D1198:203a-2: srog ni tshes kyi nyin bcings pa //
T02D1198:203a-3: 'dis ni mkha' la spyod nyid ster //
T02D1198:203a-4: zla gcig snying la gnas gsang bas //
T02D1198:203a-6: zla ba drug tu lte par bsregs //
T02D1198:203a-7: des ni thams cad mkhyen nyid ster //
T02D1198:203a-8: dpral ba mgrin pa'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1198:203a-9: snying ga lte bar rim ji bzhin //
T02D1198:203a-11: bsad dang bsregs pa'o mi rnams kyi //
T02D1198:203a-12: srog dang thur sel 'gog pa yis //
T02D1198:203a-14: de bzhin sangs rgyas nyid du ni //
T02D1198:203a-15: gnyis bsregs pa yis sngags mkhan 'gyur //
T02D1198:203a-16: srog dang thur sel zad kho nas //
T02D1198:203a-17: yan lag bcu gnyis zad par 'gyur //
T02D1198:203a-19: sangs rgyas mi 'gyur su zhig yin //
T02D1198:203a-21: rlung bkag pa na ni gtum mo rang bzhin gyis 'bar te /
T02D1198:203a-22: zla ba des gdungs pa yang 'dzag go //
T02D1198:203a-23: de las bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:203a-24: byang chub sems kyang mi g-yo zhing //
T02D1198:203a-25: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi
T02D1198:203a-26: gnas pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa rnams
T02D1198:203a-27: su nye bar bsags pa phul du byung ba mchog
T02D1198:203a-28: dang rab mchog la sogs pa'i rim gyis dpral ba
T02D1198:203a-29: nas rdo rje nor bu'i mthar thug pa bar ma
T02D1198:203a-30: chad pa ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer
T02D1198:203a-31: med pa / rim gyis 'phel ba nye bar bgrod
T02D1198:203a-32: cing bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i rtsa sum cu
T02D1198:203a-33: rtsa gnyis su khyab par byed do //
T02D1198:203a-35: ji srid rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis po rnams kyi bar ro zhes pa ste /
T02D1198:203a-36: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pas rnams gsal bar
T02D1198:203a-37: 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du
T02D1198:203a-38: mi 'dod // bskyed pa'i rim pa la ni dkyil
T02D1198:203a-39: 'khor chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis rdo rje bzlas pa
T02D1198:203a-42: sgom pa yi ni bar chad can //
T02D1198:203a-43: rnal 'byor phyi rol bzlas pa spang //
T02D1198:203a-44: sngags don bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1198:203b-0: rdo rje'i @203b bdag nyid ci ltar bzlas /
T02D1198:203b-2: gang rnams bzlas pa 'di mi nus pa'i sngags pa byis pa'i blo can te /
T02D1198:203b-3: de rnams kho na bgrang phreng gis //
T02D1198:203b-4: rab tu brjod pa rab bstan te //
T02D1198:203b-5: sngags pa bsod nams thob byed du //
T02D1198:203b-6: phyi'i ngag mngon par 'dod rnams la'o //
T02D1198:203b-7: de ltar rdo rje bzlas pa la yang sems kyi rang bzhin rnams nges par byas te //
T02D1198:203b-8: ji ltar rigs par spangs shing blangs nas shin tu
T02D1198:203b-9: goms pa las rlung 'gags pa na sngar bzhin du
T02D1198:203b-10: yon tan rnams su 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:203b-12: 'di skad ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:203b-13: bde ba chen po'i khyad par gyis ni 'di ltar
T02D1198:203b-14: goms pa'i phyir bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rdo
T02D1198:203b-15: rje 'dzin pa 'grub pa zhes gsal bar byed do
T02D1198:203b-16: // bsam gtan la sogs pa rgyas par bstan pa'i ched du gsol ba 'debs pa /
T02D1198:203b-17: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:203b-19: ci ltar te bya ba'i khyad par ci la brten
T02D1198:203b-20: nas mi phyed ma la sogs pa'i rtsa rnams 'byung
T02D1198:203b-21: // de rnams kyi rtsa de rnams kyi'o //
T02D1198:203b-22: de rnams la pu lli ra la sogs pa'i gnas ji skad bcu bdun par gsungs pa dang /
T02D1198:203b-23: de bzhin 'khor lo dgod pa dang gzhan sa la sogs pa'i rnam ba ji ltar lags //
T02D1198:203b-24: gsang ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa la gsal
T02D1198:203b-25: bar mi bya ba'i phyir phyi'i gnas la sogs pa'o
T02D1198:203b-26: // shin tu gsang ba ni de lha'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lor ro //
T02D1198:203b-27: mchog ni ches gsang ba ste lus la'o //
T02D1198:203b-29: rtsa'i ngo bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang gnas la
T02D1198:203b-30: sogs pa rnams dang sa bcu rnams dang pha rol
T02D1198:203b-31: tu phyin pa bcu rnams te /
T02D1198:203b-32: de rnams kyi kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhir bcu bdun par gsungs par gyur pa ste //
T02D1198:203b-33: 'dir ni rab tu rnam par phye nas bshad par bya'o //
T02D1198:203b-34: dang por rten nyid kyi phyir mgo zhes pa la sogs pas dri ba bzhi pa'i lan gyis so //
T02D1198:203b-35: rgyab kyi stod ni rgyab kyi dbus las steng gi sgal tshigs kyi steng gi cha ste /
T02D1198:203b-36: mgo bo'i rgyab ces pa'i don to //
T02D1198:203b-37: smin ma mig dag dbus gnas pa //
T02D1198:203b-38: zhes pa smin ma dag gi dang mig dag gi dbus na gnas pa'i cha'o //
T02D1198:204a-0: @204a * // mig dag gi zhes pa mig gnyis ni de w'i ko ta'o //
T02D1198:204a-1: thugs kyi 'khor lor zhes pa mgo bo la sogs
T02D1198:204a-2: pa rnams dang ma la ya la sogs pa nang
T02D1198:204a-3: dang phyi'i yul rnams sems kyi rang gi ngo bor
T02D1198:204a-5: nam mkha' ni stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa
T02D1198:204a-6: sems te rab tu grags pa'i nam mkha' yang ngo
T02D1198:204a-7: // gzhan gyi don du de la spyod pa'i ngang
T02D1198:204a-8: tshul can mtho ris su son pa'i rdo rje lha
T02D1198:204a-9: // mo rnams kyi'o // chu so ni sa bon gyi sbubs gnyis so //
T02D1198:204a-10: yul rnams thams cad ni k'a ma r'u pa la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D1198:204a-11: mchan khung la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1198:204a-12: sa ni sa gzhi ste ngag gi tha snyad kyi rten nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:204a-13: de la spyod pa mi yul ma rnams kyi'o //
T02D1198:204a-15: sor mo zhes pa rkang pa la sogs pa'i sor mo rnams so //
T02D1198:204a-16: mthe bong ni rkang pa la sogs pa'i mthe bong gnyis so //
T02D1198:204a-17: mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis ni sku'i 'khor lo la
T02D1198:204a-18: rnam par gnas pa rnams kyis te sa 'og la
T02D1198:204a-19: spyod ma rnams kyis brjod cing bdag nyid bde bar
T02D1198:204a-20: bya ste / khyab ces pa'i bar ro //
T02D1198:204a-21: yul rnams zhes pa ma la ya la sogs pa 'dzam bu gling dang 'brel ba rnams te /
T02D1198:204a-22: 'di ni las kyis yin rtsi gling cig shos rnams ni ma yin no ;
T02D1198:204a-23: / gser gling ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi nang du gtogs so //
T02D1198:204a-24: las kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi dngos grub rnams
T02D1198:204a-25: so zhes pas rnal 'byor ma rnams phal cher gzhan
T02D1198:204a-26: du rgyu ba ma yin no //
T02D1198:204a-27: rang gi lus skyes zhes pa /
T02D1198:204a-28: gang gi phyir sems can so so la rang gi
T02D1198:204a-29: lus 'dzam bu gling yin pa de'i phyir gsungs pa
T02D1198:204a-31: rang dang 'dra ba'i phyi rol ni rang nyid phyi rol te 'dzam bu gling ngo //
T02D1198:204a-32: nang yang ste lus kyi bdag nyid de /
T02D1198:204a-34: rang gi sems kyi snang ba tsam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'gro ba'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1198:204a-35: 'di nyid kyi phyir 'di rnams su ste rang bzhin
T02D1198:204a-36: gyi 'khor lo gsum du rnam par gzhag pa rnams
T02D1198:204a-37: su rdo rje lha mo rnams bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1198:204a-38: rtsa'i gzugs kyis zhes gsungs pa ni dri ba lnga pa'i lan te /
T02D1198:204a-39: rtsa'i ngo bo rnams kyang lha mo ste phyag la
T02D1198:204b-0: sogs pa rnams dang ldan pa lha mo'i gzugs @204b
T02D1198:204b-1: rnams kyang rtsa'o zhes khyad par med pa rtog par
T02D1198:204b-3: sa rnams pha tol tu phyin pa rnams ni /
T02D1198:204b-4: gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa //
T02D1198:204b-5: zhes pa la sogs pa bcu bdun par gsungs pa'i
T02D1198:204b-6: rjes su 'brang bas ma la ya la sogs pa
T02D1198:204b-7: rnams la rnam par gzhag pa go sla'o zhes pas
T02D1198:204b-8: 'dir rgyas par ma bstan to zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:204b-9: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02D1198:204b-10: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma nyi shu gcig pa'o /
T02D1198:204b-12: // / dang po'i brten pa dri ba gnyis kyi lan mdor bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:204b-13: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:204b-14: gang yang rung ba'i zhes pa sems can so so'i lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1198:204b-15: de la gcig gi lus gang 'dra bar rnam par
T02D1198:204b-16: 'jog pa de 'dra bar gzhan gyi yang ngo zhes
T02D1198:204b-17: pa'i don to // de'i ni padma'o //
T02D1198:204b-18: rtsa ni aa wa dh'u ti'o //
T02D1198:204b-19: til mar mar me'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1198:204b-20: til mar dang ldan pa'i me sgron ma ste /
T02D1198:204b-21: de dang 'dra bar 'od zer gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir te /
T02D1198:204b-23: cung zad dbye ba'i kha can nyid kyis na chu shing gi me tog lta bu'o //
T02D1198:204b-24: kha ni 'di'i padma'i mdung ba'i nang du son pa'i chal ltos pas rnam par gzhag pa'o //
T02D1198:204b-26: dpa' bo ni mi mthun pa'i rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir he ru ka ste /
T02D1198:204b-27: lha nyid sngags kyi tshul gyis ni //
T02D1198:204b-28: dngos grub thams cad ster bar mdzad //
T02D1198:204b-30: de nyid kyi phyir mi shigs pa ste /
T02D1198:204b-31: mngon par 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'i ched du gzhom du med pa'i nus pa can no //
T02D1198:204b-32: sa bon ni gtum mo'i bde ba 'byung ba'i 'o //
T02D1198:204b-33: kha ba 'dzag pa ni bsil ba'i 'od can te /
T02D1198:204b-34: de dang mnyam par bdud rtsi'i 'od 'dzag pa nyid kyis dang dga' bar byed pa nyid kyis so //
T02D1198:204b-35: de nyid kyi phyir na bde ba'i dga' ston 'bar bar byed pa'i phyir dpyid do //
T02D1198:204b-36: rtag tu goms bzhin pa ni bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyud nyid kyi phyir dga' byed pa'o //
T02D1198:204b-39: ji ltar rgod mkha'i me rgya mtsho ma lus pa'i
T02D1198:204b-40: chu la sogs pa kham du byed pa de ltar
T02D1198:205a-1: po la sogs pa'i bud shing ma lus pa'o //
T02D1198:205a-2: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das ma bdag med ma
T02D1198:205a-3: kho na bdag med nyid de rang bzhin med pa
T02D1198:205a-4: spros pa mtha' dag las ldog pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1198:205a-5: de ltar gyur pa ni ti la ka ste thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1198:205a-6: ti la dga' bar byed pa la'o //
T02D1198:205a-7: ti la ti ste dga' bar byed de /
T02D1198:205a-8: dbang phyug mchog nyid ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes byas nas so //
T02D1198:205a-9: ae yig aa yig tu 'gyur ba ni gtsug lag nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:205a-10: las ni bsgom pa las byung ba'i sems kyi bya ba ste /
T02D1198:205a-11: des bskul ba lte ba'i 'og gi rlung ngo //
T02D1198:205a-12: des bskyod pa ni rab tu rgyas par byas pa'o //
T02D1198:205a-13: tshim pa ni dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:205a-14: snyoms par zhugs pa ni 'khyud pas so //
T02D1198:205a-15: ba san ta yang yin la de kho na nyid til ka yang yin pas dpyid kyi thig le'o //
T02D1198:205a-16: gang gi phyir rnal 'byor ma'i ste til ka'i rang
T02D1198:205a-17: gi ngo bo bdag nyid la dbyer med par bzung
T02D1198:205a-18: nas gnas te / rgyu ba yang dag rgyu'i rlung dang mi rgyu ba gnas pa ste de la'o //
T02D1198:205a-20: sgo rnams gsum gyis 'byung bas na /
T02D1198:205a-21: 'byung ba ni 'jug ba nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D1198:205a-23: de ltar mdor bstan nas kyang /
T02D1198:205a-25: lte bar zhes pa la sogs pas rgyas par ston to //
T02D1198:205a-26: aa yig gzugs kyis zhes pa aa yig ti la ka'o //
T02D1198:205a-27: de ni thung ngu ste phyi mo gcig pa'o //
T02D1198:205a-28: thig le zhes pa ni phra mo'o //
T02D1198:205a-29: 'dir phyi mo gcig pa la sogs pas nang gi brjod pa'i dus gsal bar byas kyi /
T02D1198:205a-30: brjod pa'i dus ni ma yin gyi /
T02D1198:205a-31: de gtum mo sgom pa la med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:205a-33: bris pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa'i yang
T02D1198:205a-34: ste 'dir rdzogs pa'i rim pa la 'jug pa'i thabs
T02D1198:205a-35: nyid rtogs pa'i dgongs pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i skabs
T02D1198:205a-37: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la aa yig ni phra mo
T02D1198:205a-38: thung ngu rdul gyi ri mo drang ba'i ngo bo
T02D1198:205a-39: ste / chos thams cad skye ba med pa las
T02D1198:205a-40: tha mi dad pa'i byang chub kyi sems nyams su
T02D1198:205a-42: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1198:205b-0: ga bur nyid ni bdag med @205b ma ;
T02D1198:205b-1: / bde ba bdag med tshul can no //
T02D1198:205b-2: de yi bde ba phyag rgya che //
T02D1198:205b-3: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1198:205b-4: dang po'i dbyangs kyi rang bzhin te //
T02D1198:205b-5: blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags //
T02D1198:205b-6: de nyid bcom ldan shes rab ma //
T02D1198:205b-7: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las //
T02D1198:205b-9: de yi bde ba 'dod mar bshad //
T02D1198:205b-10: ces pas ga bur las tha mi dad pa bde ba'o //
T02D1198:205b-11: de'i ste ga bur gyi shes rab bdag med ma
T02D1198:205b-12: ni lte bar gnas pa'i shes rab bdag med ma
T02D1198:205b-13: ste / bskyed pa'i rim pa kho na la ni
T02D1198:205b-14: bdag med ma phyag la sogs pa dang ldan pa
T02D1198:205b-15: ste / dang / yi ge'i gzugs kyang ngo //
T02D1198:205b-16: don dam par ni rim pa gnyis ka la yang /
T02D1198:205b-17: de ni ring min thung ba min //
T02D1198:205b-18: gru bzhi ma yin zlum po min //
T02D1198:205b-19: myang dang dri dang ro las 'das //
T02D1198:205b-20: lhan cig skyes dga' byed pa ma'o //
T02D1198:205b-21: de bzhin h'um yig dang aom yig dag sems dang ngag dag rdzogs pa'i rim pa la'o //
T02D1198:205b-22: ham yig ni ham gi dbyibs can gyi rtsa dang 'brel ba'i byang chub sems kho na'o //
T02D1198:205b-23: de nyid phyir yi ge sgom pa ni zhar la
T02D1198:205b-24: byung ba nyid du rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnam par
T02D1198:205b-25: gzhag pas gsal bar byed do //
T02D1198:205b-26: sa sogs zhes pa la sogs pas /
T02D1198:205b-27: ma zags pa bde ba las tha mi dad pa'i khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'das /
T02D1198:205b-28: ngag dang sems dang rdul rnams dang tha mi dad
T02D1198:205b-29: pas ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams
T02D1198:205b-30: kyi rim pa ji lta bar sprul pa la sogs
T02D1198:205b-31: pa'i 'khor lo rnams su khyad par can nyid las
T02D1198:205b-32: rol par byed do zhes 'brel lo //
T02D1198:205b-33: ma 'phos pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni lte ba
T02D1198:205b-34: la sogs pa rnams su rim pa ji lta bar
T02D1198:205b-35: sa la sogs pa 'phel ba'i phyir nye bar rgyas
T02D1198:205b-36: par bya ba'o zhes bdag gis drug pa dang nyi
T02D1198:205b-37: shu rtsa gcig par bshad zin to //
T02D1198:205b-38: de lta kho nar 'phel ba la dgongs nas bzhi par /
T02D1198:205b-39: ae yig sa ru shes par bya //
T02D1198:205b-40: zhes pa la sogs pa sprul pa la sogs pa rnams su gsungs so //
T02D1198:205b-41: thun mtshams bzhi zhes pa la /
T02D1198:205b-42: mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i bdag nyid zla ba dang
T02D1198:205b-43: nyi ma dag gtum mo 'bar bas 'dus pa dag
T02D1198:205b-44: gis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin nyid
T02D1198:205b-45: kyis dang stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid
T02D1198:206a-2: yang dag pa'i bsam gtan ni mtshams ting nge 'dzin
T02D1198:206a-3: rnam par mi rtog pa zhes pa'i don gyi mthar
T02D1198:206a-4: thug pas so // de'i 'char ba ni nor bu nas brtsams nas lte bar ji srid par te /
T02D1198:206a-5: ma 'phos pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'phel bzhin pa ni steng du nye bar 'gro /
T02D1198:206a-6: bde zhing stong pa nyid kyi ye shes phul du byung ba 'gugs par byed /
T02D1198:206a-7: chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang chen po'i
T02D1198:206a-8: chen po'i rim pas sprul pa la sogs pa'i padma
T02D1198:206a-9: rnams su'o // de ltar yang 'di rnams su rgyu
T02D1198:206a-10: mthun pa dang rnam par smin pa dang skyes bu
T02D1198:206a-11: rnams su'o // byed pa dang / dri ma med
T02D1198:206a-12: pa nyid rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
T02D1198:206a-13: rnams su'o // byed pa dang / 'byung ngo // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1198:206a-16: de skad du yang phyag rgya chen po thig ler gsungs pa /
T02D1198:206a-17: mtshan mo shes rab ces par bshad //
T02D1198:206a-18: mtshan mo'i cha ni zla bar 'gyur //
T02D1198:206a-19: nyin mo thabs su bshad pa ste //
T02D1198:206a-20: thabs ni nyi ma yin par 'gyur //
T02D1198:206a-21: de yang gnyis med tshul du brjod //
T02D1198:206a-22: zla ba'i skye ba nyi ma las //
T02D1198:206a-24: rtog pa dam pa'i don du ste //
T02D1198:206a-25: mchog tu bde ba cha med pa //
T02D1198:206a-26: mi snang stong pa'i lus can te //
T02D1198:206a-28: kha cig tu ni yang dag bzhugs //
T02D1198:206a-29: de nas gzhan pa mtshams bshad de //
T02D1198:206a-30: mun dang mun min gnyis ka spangs //
T02D1198:206a-31: 'dus pa gnyis kyi dbus na gnas //
T02D1198:206a-32: zhen pa gos pa rnam spangs pa //
T02D1198:206a-33: rdo rje padma'i bdud rtsi byung //
T02D1198:206a-34: zla ba nyi ma yang dag ldan //
T02D1198:206a-35: gang zhig mtha' nyid yang dag 'dren //
T02D1198:206a-36: de ni mtshams te srid pa sbyor //
T02D1198:206a-37: mchog gi rnam pa'i ngo bor bshad //
T02D1198:206a-38: phra ba'i mig gi mthong mtshan nyid //
T02D1198:206a-39: sems can kun gyi mtshams rnams ni //
T02D1198:206a-41: 'char ba mchog tu grags pa ste //
