T02D1198:251a-67: 'gram pa'i chang dang snyoms 'jug las skyes pa'i khu
T02D1198:251a-68: ba dang gi wang dang mar khu chen po las
T02D1198:251b-0: byas pa'i dud pa bsre bar byas nas @251b rdo
T02D1198:251b-1: rje dang padma'i chu yis mnur [*ma nur?] te /
T02D1198:251b-2: des mi'i pags pa'am gro ga'am ro'i ris la 'khor
T02D1198:251b-3: lo 'di lha'i rnal 'byor las gtor ma sbyin pa
T02D1198:251b-4: sngon du 'gro bar kha shar du bltas pas bri
T02D1198:251b-5: bar bya'o // rab gnas kyang nub tu kha bltas pas bya'o //
T02D1198:251b-6: de la cho ga ji lta bar 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'i lta ba la /
T02D1198:251b-7: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor gyis sam de yongs su gyur pas /
T02D1198:251b-8: cho ga ji lta bar bsgoms pa'i khang pa brtsegs
T02D1198:251b-9: pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo
T02D1198:251b-10: bo'i rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyis /
T02D1198:251b-11: bris pa'i 'khor lo la rig pa'i rgyal po'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
T02D1198:251b-12: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yang 'dir bcug ste /
T02D1198:251b-13: mchod pa la sogs pa byas shing /
T02D1198:251b-14: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags rnams kyis mngon par mchod nas yi ge rnams kyi nang du bcug ste /
T02D1198:251b-15: bsgrub bya yang dang po'i rang ming gi yi ge
T02D1198:251b-16: las byung ba'i dam tshig sems dpa' la bcug pa
T02D1198:251b-17: de dang / 'khor lo de yid kyis kha dang
T02D1198:251b-18: snying ga dang rdo rje'i lam nas padmar bcug ste
T02D1198:251b-19: de dang / / rang gi snying ga'i sa bon
T02D1198:251b-20: gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i lha'i tshogs kyis dbang
T02D1198:251b-21: bskur nas phyi rol du gzhag cing /
T02D1198:251b-22: bsgrub bya kho na khro bo'i tshogs dang khyad par
T02D1198:251b-23: du bgegs mthar byed kyi tshogs spros pas legs par
T02D1198:251b-24: bsrungs pa la / bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags kyi
T02D1198:251b-25: 'od las byung ba'i bdud rtsi dang byang chub sems
T02D1198:251b-26: kyi rgyun rnams kyis lus la mngon par khyab pa
T02D1198:251b-27: bsrungs pa la / la / sngags kyi tshogs mtha'
T02D1198:251b-28: dag gi 'od las byung ba'i lha'i tshogs dkar po
T02D1198:251b-29: rnams kyis bum pa dkar po'i bdud rtsi'i dbang bskur
T02D1198:251b-30: bas yang dag par sbyor ba las zhu bar gyur
T02D1198:251b-31: bsrungs pa la / la / te / byang chub
T02D1198:251b-32: sems kyi bdag nyid 'jug pa'i dbang bskur gyis kyang
T02D1198:251b-33: mngon par dbang bskur bzhin pas /
T02D1198:251b-34: skyon thams cad dang bral bar bsams nas /
T02D1198:251b-35: rig pa'i rgyal po'i phreng ba'i sngags dang /
T02D1198:251b-36: aom hr'i: ha ha che ge la sh'a ntim raksh'i ku ru ku ru h'um sarba p'a pam phat /
T02D1198:251b-37: ces pa nye ba'i snying po yang bsgrag go //
T02D1198:251b-38: de nas phreng ba'i sngags zlos shing 'khor lo skud
T02D1198:251b-39: pa dkar pos dkris te rig pa'i ngo bo mgo
T02D1198:251b-40: bo'am mgrin pa'am dpung par gdags so //
T02D1198:251b-41: de las rdo rje lha mo rnams byin gyis rlob cing bgegs med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:251b-44: bdud rtsi lnga'i chur 'khor lo bcug ste /
T02D1198:252a-0: @252a * // phreng ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bkrus nas nad dang bcas pa nad mad par byed do //
T02D1198:252a-1: chang gi nang du bcug nas des de ltar gtor
T02D1198:252a-2: na nad med pa nad dang bcas par byed do
T02D1198:252a-3: zhes pa la sogs pa rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1198:252a-4: las kyi dbye ba las kha dog dang bsam pa
T02D1198:252a-5: dang rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang bskul ba'i
T02D1198:252a-7: gzhan yang zhi ba'i las su las rab 'byam thams cad 'dus par gsungs te /
T02D1198:252a-8: zhi ba ni mngon par mi 'dod pa'i skyon thams
T02D1198:252a-9: cad zhi bar byed pa'i bdag nyid can gyi phyir
T02D1198:252a-10: ro zhes pa bri bya'i phyir zlog gi de kho
T02D1198:252a-11: na nyid do // de ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad
T02D1198:252a-12: kyi rnal 'byor gyis kha sbyor 'byed pa yang brjod
T02D1198:252a-13: na nyid do // par bya ste / rang gi
T02D1198:252a-14: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i
T02D1198:252a-15: lha'i 'khor lo rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ste /
T02D1198:252a-16: lha mo'i padmar gnod mdzes kyi gzugs su bskyed cing bka' bsgos nas /
T02D1198:252a-17: sgrub byed rdo rje'i lam nas zhugs pas /
T02D1198:252a-18: des de'i snying padma sbyar ba phye nas der gnas pa'i bsrung ba'i lha rnams la /
T02D1198:252a-19: de la gnod pa dang dmyal bar mchog tu gzhol ba nyid gsan du gzhug cing /
T02D1198:252a-20: 'byed pa'i ched du gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D1198:252a-21: khyed rnams kyis 'di rjes su gnang ba kho na'o zhes mkhyen par gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1198:252a-22: ji srid du rim gyis de'i skyon rjes su dgongs
T02D1198:252a-23: nas khros pa rnams bcom ste phyir gshegs pa'i bar
T02D1198:252a-24: du bsgom mo // de nas de rnams rang gi 'khor lo la gzhug cing /
T02D1198:252a-25: bcing ba dang mnyes pa dang dbang bskur ba dang
T02D1198:252a-26: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba
T02D1198:252a-27: yang cho ga bzhin du sgrub po zhes 'di'i ye
T02D1198:252a-28: shes kyi dkyil 'khor sbyar ba 'byed pa gsungs so
T02D1198:252a-29: // de nas gnod mdzes kyis de'i shes pa'i sems
T02D1198:252a-30: la khu tshur gyis bzung nas rdo rje gnyis sbyar
T02D1198:252a-32: aom phat che ge bha ksha ya phat ksha: h'um phat ces pa dang /
T02D1198:252a-33: h'um phat ram ram ram che ge mtshams med pa
T02D1198:252a-34: lnga byed pa ram ram ram h'um phat ces bzlas
T02D1198:252a-35: pa las khro bo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis
T02D1198:252a-36: brdeg bzhin pa gsol bzhin pa rang gi lha mo'i
T02D1198:252a-38: 'od gsal ba la bcug pa'i de ma thag tu
T02D1198:252a-39: h'um las skyes shing h'um dang bcas pa'i rdo rjes
T02D1198:252a-40: mi bskyod pa'i gzugs su bskyed de /
T02D1198:252a-41: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bcug la mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du btang ngo //
T02D1198:252b-0: 'o na de @252b ltar byed pa ci ltar sdig pa rnams kyis mi gos she na /
T02D1198:252b-1: gang phyir sbyin pa dang mgu bar bya ba la
T02D1198:252b-2: sogs pa rnams kyis ma bzlog pa dbang du bya
T02D1198:252b-3: ba dang bskrad pa la sogs pa rnams kyis bsgrub
T02D1198:252b-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par
T02D1198:252b-6: gsol ba btab pa rnams kyis rjes su gnang bas
T02D1198:252b-8: snying rje chen po kho nas sgyu ma lta bu'i
T02D1198:252b-9: chos nyid la rjes su byed pa kho nas kha
T02D1198:252b-11: ma rtogs pas ni de la mos pa brtan pa mi bya ba kho na'o //
T02D1198:252b-12: gzhan yang bsgrub bya sdig pa byas pa ngan 'gro
T02D1198:252b-13: rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes mngon shes kyis
T02D1198:252b-14: shes nas mngon spyod bya bar bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1198:252b-15: rjes su gnang ngo zhes gsungs so //
T02D1198:252b-16: de ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga yis //
T02D1198:252b-17: yang dag gsungs pas gang gsungs pa'i //
T02D1198:252b-18: gsod pa de yang rmongs rnams kyis //
T02D1198:252b-19: phyin ci log tu brtags byas shing //
T02D1198:252b-20: phyin ci log tu bzung ba 'di //
T02D1198:252b-21: sred dang zhe sdang mun bsgribs pas //
T02D1198:252b-22: skye bo rnams ni bsad byas nas //
T02D1198:252b-23: kha ni thur bltas mnar med 'gro //
T02D1198:252b-25: brgyad pa zhes pa ha'i sa bon te /
T02D1198:252b-26: rigs kyis gcig nyid de gsal bas ni ha yig bcu gnyis rnams so //
T02D1198:252b-27: ri r'i li l'i dang bral ba'i phyi mo bcu
T02D1198:252b-28: gnyis dang ldan pa rnams ni ha h'a hi h'i
T02D1198:252b-29: hu h'u he hee ho hoo ha: zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:252b-30: yi ge bar du chod byas nas //
T02D1198:252b-32: h'a h'i h'u hee hoo ha: zhes pa dor nas
T02D1198:252b-33: he ru ka'i yan lag drug rnams zhes rten dang
T02D1198:252b-34: brten pa dag tha mi dad par brtags pa las
T02D1198:252b-35: brjod pa'o // de ltar gzhan du yang ji ltar rigs pa rtogs par gyis shig /
T02D1198:252b-36: dpa' bo rnams mnyam sbyor ba ni /
T02D1198:252b-38: boo sha ta h'um h'um phat ces pa drug rnams /
T02D1198:252b-39: ha yig re re las sngon du gnas pa rnams te /
T02D1198:252b-44: phat ham zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1198:252b-45: 'di rnams ni go cha'i sngags kyi yi ge drug rnams te /
T02D1198:252b-46: snying ga la sogs pa drug rnams su gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa /
T02D1198:252b-47: dang po zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:252b-48: cis go cha rim pas bsgom zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1198:252b-49: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:252b-50: bzang po ni gar gyi nyams dgu rnams kyis rtsen pa la mkhas pa'o //
T02D1198:253a-0: srung ba'i 'khor lor he ru ka rdo rje sems dpar byas nas ye shes sems @253a * //
T02D1198:253a-1: dpa' mi bskyod pa bcug ste de dang ro gcig par byas nas /
T02D1198:253a-2: he ru ka nyid de rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs nyid du dran par bya'o //
T02D1198:253a-3: yang na he ru ka ni dam tshig sems dpa' ste /
T02D1198:253a-4: de'i snying gar ye shes sems dpa' dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' bsams nas /
T02D1198:253a-5: he ru ka nyid de sngon du grub pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i bdag nyid can bsams mo //
T02D1198:253a-6: khro bo spros pa 'bar bas nye bar mtshon pa rnams kyis te /
T02D1198:253a-7: gang las bgegs rnams 'khrugs pa de de skad do //
T02D1198:253a-8: gtsigs pa ni rol pa'i sku can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:253a-9: kha cig rnams mchog tu gtsigs pa ste /
T02D1198:253a-10: rtsub pa'i sku can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:253a-11: 'jigs rung ni sbrul gyi rgyan dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1198:253a-12: khro bo rnams kyis gang gi bka' sgrub par byed pa'i he ru ka de ni de skad do //
T02D1198:253a-13: phyogs ni phyogs dang 'brel ba'i gdug pa can rnams so //
T02D1198:253a-14: nyis 'gyur ni 'dab ma bcu drug gnyis te gzhan no //
T02D1198:253a-16: 'dab ma rnams la zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1198:253a-17: mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa mkha' 'gro ma'i sa bon te /
T02D1198:253a-19: de nas des de'i sgo mtshan pa'o zhes sbrel lo //
T02D1198:253a-20: kun nas ni phyogs bzhi rnams su'o //
T02D1198:253a-22: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bzhin du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:253a-23: snying por ni gzhal yas khang gi'o //
T02D1198:253a-24: pho nyas zhes pa pho nya rnams kyis nye bar mtshan pa'o //
T02D1198:253a-25: cho ga lha dgod pa la sogs pa'i rig pa
T02D1198:253a-26: gang du yin pa de ni cho ga'i rim pa
T02D1198:253a-27: ste / bsam gtan dang 'khrul 'khor bri ba yang ngo //
T02D1198:253a-28: de la bcom ldan 'di'i sgom pa'i rim pa'i rgyal po'i bzhin no //
T02D1198:253a-29: khyad par ni bcom ldan 'das ni gzhal yas khang gi dbus kun du ser ba /
T02D1198:253a-30: sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte ba la
T02D1198:253a-31: nyi mar 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mo g-yas brkyang
T02D1198:253a-32: gi stabs kyis mnan nas gar mdzad pa /
T02D1198:253a-33: mgo phreng dang thod pa'i phreng ba can /
T02D1198:253a-34: phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab pa'i sku can /
T02D1198:253a-36: ser po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang nag po'i shar dang /
T02D1198:253a-37: byang dang nub dang lho'i zhal can phyag bzhi pa /
T02D1198:253a-38: g-yon dag gis kha tv'am ga dang gzhu dag /
T02D1198:253b-0: g-yas dag gis @253b thod pa dang mda' dag 'dzin
T02D1198:253b-1: pa / rang 'dra'i rdo rje phag mo la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02D1198:253b-2: de'i shar gyi 'dab ma la ltung byed ma dkar sngo snang ba /
T02D1198:253b-3: phyag g-yon pa dag na kha tv'am ga dang dril
T02D1198:253b-4: bu dag / g-yas dag na rdo rje dang thod
T02D1198:253b-5: pa dag go // byang du gsod byed ma ma ga ta ser bar snang ba /
T02D1198:253b-6: g-yon pa dag na kha tv'am ga dang zhags pa
T02D1198:253b-7: dag / g-yas dag na cang te'u dang thod pa
T02D1198:253b-8: dag go // nub tu 'gugs byed ma dmar dkar du snang ba /
T02D1198:253b-9: g-yon pa dag na gzhu dang sna tshogs padma dag
T02D1198:253b-10: / g-yas dag na mda' dang thod pa dag go
T02D1198:253b-11: // lhor gar gyi dbang phyug ma dkar ser mdog can /
T02D1198:253b-12: g-yon pa dag na mdung dang rin po che /
T02D1198:253b-13: g-yas pa dag na ba dan dang thod pa dag go //
T02D1198:253b-14: bzhi po 'di rnams zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa /
T02D1198:253b-16: dbu skra gyen du 'bar ba gcer bu g-yas brkyang gi zhabs stabs can /
T02D1198:253b-18: gar mdzad pa spyan ma dang m'a ma k'i dang
T02D1198:253b-19: gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma'i rang bzhin rnams so
T02D1198:253b-20: // phyogs bral gyi 'dab ma rnams la padma'i snod bdud rtsi lngas gang ba rnams so //
T02D1198:253b-21: sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi rnams de lta bu kho na'o //
T02D1198:253b-22: de ltar lha bcu rnams snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:253b-23: khyad par gzhan yang ji ltar rigs par brtag par bya'o //
T02D1198:253b-24: 'khrul 'khor 'bri ba'i dus ni sngags pas skad cig
T02D1198:253b-25: gis srung ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i yongs su
T02D1198:253b-26: bskor ba bcing ba byas nas /
T02D1198:253b-27: go cha dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i he ru ka'i bdag nyid kyis /
T02D1198:253b-28: yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang ste /
T02D1198:253b-29: de'i snying por zla ba'i gzugs gnyis ri mo zlum po gnyis kyi rnam pa dang /
T02D1198:253b-30: de'i nang du sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D1198:253b-31: de'i lte ba la padma 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D1198:253b-32: de'i lte ba la zla ba'i gzugs gnyis dang /
T02D1198:253b-33: de'i nang du padma 'dab ma drug pa'o //
T02D1198:253b-34: dang po'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis las phyi rol
T02D1198:253b-35: du 'dab ma drug gi thad kar rdo rje drug
T02D1198:253b-36: go // de la chu skyes dbus ma'i lte bar /
T02D1198:253b-37: h'um che ge mo srungs shig ces pa la sogs pa dang h'um ngo //
T02D1198:253b-38: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la /
T02D1198:253b-40: na ma: hi sv'a h'a hu /
T02D1198:253b-44: zhes pa drug rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1198:254a-1: rol gyi zla ba gnyis pa'i steng du /
T02D1198:254a-6: 'dab ma bcu gnyis rnams la grangs ji lta bar /
T02D1198:254a-13: zla ba las phyi rol zla ba gnyis pa la /
T02D1198:254a-16: rdo rje drug pa'i lte pa rnams la /
T02D1198:254a-20: sngags kyi cho ga rnams gur gum dang rgya skyegs dang /
T02D1198:254a-21: rang gi khrag dang gi wang rnams kyis grog la bris te /
T02D1198:254a-22: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams
T02D1198:254a-23: kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin
T02D1198:254a-24: gshegs pa drug po gshin rje ma la sogs pas
T02D1198:254a-25: mnyam par 'khyud pa rnams bkug nas /
T02D1198:254a-26: bdag nyid la bcug cing zhu bar gyur pa rnams rdo rje'i lam nas byung ste /
T02D1198:254a-27: lha mo'i padmar lha'i gzugs su spros shing sngags rnams
T02D1198:254a-28: la nang du bcug nas gzugs brnyan bzhin du snang
T02D1198:254a-30: rab tu gnas pa'i de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bar /
T02D1198:254a-32: bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das ma'i go cha gnyis rim pa ji lta bar bzlas nas /
T02D1198:254a-33: cho ga ji lta bar dpung pa la gdags te /
T02D1198:254a-36: aom ham zhes pa la sogs pa dang aom bam
T02D1198:254a-37: zhes pa la sogs pa go cha'i sngags kyis bdun
T02D1198:254a-38: byas nas mngon par bsngags te lam du 'gro ba
T02D1198:254a-39: chom rkun dang stag la sogs pas 'jigs par mi
T02D1198:254a-40: 'gyur ro zhes pa la sogs pa yang rtogs par
T02D1198:254a-41: bya'o // cho gas zhes pa bcom ldan 'das dang
T02D1198:254a-42: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyis gzhi dang sngags kyi yi
T02D1198:254a-43: ge rnams dkar por bsgom zhing bzlas pa zhes pa
T02D1198:254a-44: bya'o // cho ga'o // lnga gnyis 'dab ma la zhes pa 'dab ma bcu rnams la /
T02D1198:254a-45: aom t'a re tu tt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:254a-47: de'i lte ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhes pa lhag ma ste /
T02D1198:254a-48: aom pra se na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:254a-49: 'khor yug ni dbus su che ge mdo dbang du gyis shig ces pa'o //
T02D1198:254a-50: aom sarba zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags /
T02D1198:254a-51: aom pra se na zhes pa la sogs pa'i gnas su ste /
T02D1198:254a-54: dang por gsal bar byas pa'i cho ga dang 'dra'o //
T02D1198:254b-1: dang po yis zhes pa dang po ta yig go //
T02D1198:254b-2: 'khrul 'khor snga ma kho na la zla bar pra
T02D1198:254b-3: se na zhes pa la sogs pa'i gnas su ta
T02D1198:254b-4: yig zlum po'i khog par 'khor lo zur drug pa
T02D1198:254b-5: ste / zur gyi nang rnams su /
T02D1198:254b-6: aom ku ru ku lle hr'i: ste /
T02D1198:254b-7: dbus su aom hr'i: che ge mo me ba shv'i
T02D1198:254b-8: ku ru hr'i: sv'a h'a zhes pa bri'o zhes pa'i
T02D1198:254b-9: don te // 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs pas sku ru ku lle bsgoms pas /
T02D1198:254b-10: gi wang dang rgya skyegs dang tsandan dmar po dang
T02D1198:254b-11: rang gi khrag gis bri zhing rab tu gnas pa
T02D1198:254b-12: la sogs pa ni cho ga'o //
T02D1198:254b-13: sgrol ma sgrub po'i mngon par phyogs pas 'dir 'byung
T02D1198:254b-14: ngo zhes pa sgrol ma mngon par 'byung ba ste
T02D1198:254b-16: 'di zhes pa aom ku ru ku lle hr'i: sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags so //
T02D1198:254b-17: thod pa dang bcas pa'i gyo dum la ste thod pa'i cha'i gzugs gsar pa la'o //
T02D1198:254b-18: bcings pa rnams su 'gyur ro zhes pa /
T02D1198:254b-19: gyo dum gyi nang du ste gnod par byed pa'i ched du mi 'jug go zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:254b-20: bskul ba zhes pa gang gi phyir lha rnams bskul
T02D1198:254b-21: ba de'i phyir nges par rnam pa 'di lta bu
T02D1198:254b-22: 'grub po zhes pa nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T02D1198:254b-23: 'khrul 'khor gzhan rnams la yang de bzhin no //
T02D1198:254b-24: zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dbye bas kha
T02D1198:254b-25: dog dang bsam pa dang phyogs la sogs pa'i dbye
T02D1198:254b-26: ba ni phye bar byas zin pa'i rjes su 'brang
T02D1198:254b-27: ba las ji ltar rigs par rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1198:254b-28: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02D1198:254b-29: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma nyi shu bdun pa'o /
T02D1198:254b-31: // / lnga par dkyil 'khor gsungs na de'i rab gnas ni ma gsungs shing /
T02D1198:254b-32: thang sku la sogs pa yang dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyu nyid du gsungs na /
T02D1198:254b-33: 'di rab tu gnas pa med pa 'di ni ma
T02D1198:254b-34: yin te zhes pas de dag gi rab gnas gsal
T02D1198:254b-36: bstan du gsol zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:254b-37: gzugs brnyan dang po te'i yi ge dang 'khrul 'khor
T02D1198:254b-38: dang mchod rten la sogs pa rnams la dbang bskur
T02D1198:254b-39: bar bya ba'i slob ma la dam tshig dang ye
T02D1198:254b-40: shes sems dpa' dag de'i bdag nyid du gnas par
T02D1198:254b-41: byed pa ni rab gnas te cho ga gzhan de'i
T02D1198:255a-0: 'khor ro // bzlas pa ni bsam gtan sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir bzlas @255a * //
T02D1198:255a-1: ba'i bsam gtan ni bzlas pa bsam gtan no //
T02D1198:255a-3: sbyin sreg gi las ni nyi shu drug par gsungs
T02D1198:255a-4: pa'i cho ga gzhan ci ltar zhes pa rgyas par
T02D1198:255a-5: bshad pa'i ched du dri ba'o //
T02D1198:255a-6: rdo rje ni stong pa nyid yin zhing /
T02D1198:255a-7: de kho na snying po ste tshad mas 'thad pa
T02D1198:255a-8: nyid kyis mchog gang gi bdag nyid yin pa de
T02D1198:255a-10: chos thams cad rnams kyi ste /
T02D1198:255a-11: phyi'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D1198:255a-12: nang gi thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin dang stobs
T02D1198:255a-13: dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa rnams kyi
T02D1198:255a-14: gcig kyang 'di yin pa bsdus pa yang yin pa'o
T02D1198:255a-15: // chen po ni phul du dbyung du med pa shin tu rgyas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:255a-16: zag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir mdzes pa'i dga'
T02D1198:255a-17: ba gang gi yin pa de ni de skad do
T02D1198:255a-18: // de ltar na yang stong pa nyid dang snying
T02D1198:255a-19: rje dbyer med pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D1198:255a-20: sku bzhi'i bdag nyid kyis bod pa gsum ni /
T02D1198:255a-21: slob dpon yang de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid la lhag par mos pas /
T02D1198:255a-22: 'chad par 'gyur ba rjes su sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes bslab par dgongs pas so //
T02D1198:255a-23: rnyed dka' ba zhes pa bod pa'o //
T02D1198:255a-24: 'phrul nyid du gsung du gsol te /
T02D1198:255a-25: phyis sems can gyi bsod nams stobs chung ba nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1198:255a-26: 'di lta bu'i bstan pa ga la yin zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1198:255a-27: slob dpon de yang de ltar rjes su sgrub pa po rnyed dka'o zhes mtshon to //
T02D1198:255a-28: las rnams thams cad ces pa bzlas pa dang rab
T02D1198:255a-29: gnas dang de'i 'khor sa yongs su sbyor ba la
T02D1198:255a-30: sogs pa rnams bsam gtan kho na rjes su bsgrub
T02D1198:255a-33: rdo rje theg par slob dpon ni //
T02D1198:255a-34: rnam gnyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
T02D1198:255a-35: sngags gtsor byed pa gcig tu 'gyur //
T02D1198:255a-36: gcig ni bsam gtan dpung gnyen can //
T02D1198:255a-37: sngags smra la gnas rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1198:255a-38: lha la dmigs pa lhur len te //
T02D1198:255a-39: de las mtshan ma thob gyur pas //
T02D1198:255a-40: rngul tshon dkyil 'khor kun nas bri //
T02D1198:255a-41: sngags tshul la gnas rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1198:255a-42: gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1198:255a-43: sgyu ma lta bu'i lus kyis ni //
T02D1198:255a-44: 'khor lo sgyu ma lta bur bri //
T02D1198:255a-46: bsam gtan tsam la yang ngo //
T02D1198:255b-0: dga' @255b ba ni nus pa phul du byung ba
T02D1198:255b-1: thob pa las bsod nams bsags pa'i slob ma rjes
T02D1198:255b-2: su bzung ba la sogs pa'i don du gsal bar
T02D1198:255b-3: dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul par bya'o zhes gzhan du
T02D1198:255b-4: gsungs so // de ltar yang rnam pa 'di lta
T02D1198:255b-5: bu ni bdag gis mi 'jigs pa'i gzhung 'grel du
T02D1198:255b-7: de'i phyir las rnams thams cad la bsam gtan kho na gtso bor nges par bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1198:255b-8: de la zhes pa las rnams thams cad la sngar dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bsnyen par byas pa /
T02D1198:255b-9: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi rjes thogs su nyin par dge ba la /
T02D1198:255b-10: bkra shis pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi yang dag
T02D1198:255b-11: par sbyang ba bsgrub pa'i ched du dang por gsungs
T02D1198:255b-12: pa / rdo rje zhes pa la sogs te /
T02D1198:255b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du rab tu gsal bar bsgyings pa can /
T02D1198:255b-14: rdo rje snyems ma'i ngo bo'i las kyi phyag rgya
T02D1198:255b-15: dang snyoms par zhugs pas sam ye shes kyi phyag
T02D1198:255b-16: rgya dang lhan cig bde ste bde ba de'i rang
T02D1198:255b-17: bzhin du gnas par gyur pa'i slob dpon no //
T02D1198:255b-18: 'dir gang zhig shes rab zab pa bsgom pa la
T02D1198:255b-19: blo gros byas pa chos thams cad skye ba med
T02D1198:255b-20: par bsgom pa de la bgegs rnams thams cad dang
T02D1198:255b-21: skyon gzhan rnams kyang 'jig par 'gyur to //
T02D1198:255b-22: rmi lam du yang snang ba'i lam du 'gro ba
T02D1198:255b-23: ma yin no zhes pas rim pa 'di kho na
T02D1198:255b-24: glags tshol ba thams cad sel ba la mchog go
T02D1198:255b-25: // 'di la mi brtan pa yin na rnam pa
T02D1198:255b-26: thams cad du rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D1198:255b-27: kho na brtan par bar ma chad par lhag par
T02D1198:255b-28: mos pa ni nga rgyal stobs can gyi rnal 'byor
T02D1198:255b-29: pa'i bgegs bzlog pa la sogs pa thams cad phun
T02D1198:255b-30: sum tshogs par byed pa kho na'o //
T02D1198:255b-31: mos pa tha dad pa rnams kyi dbang du byas
T02D1198:255b-32: nas lha dang phyag rgya dang sngags la sogs pa
T02D1198:255b-33: tha dad pa de dang de gsungs pa 'ba' zhig
T02D1198:255b-34: go zhes gsungs pas 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes pa
T02D1198:255b-35: la sogs pa'o // rdo rje rkang pas yongs su rgyu //
T02D1198:255b-37: de dgod pa ni ji ltar rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa de kho na'o //
T02D1198:255b-38: lha mo rnams kyi ste spyan ma la sogs pa
T02D1198:255b-39: nyid kyis rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rig ma
T02D1198:255b-40: rnams kyi yang dgod pa dang /
T02D1198:255b-41: gzhug pa mdor bstan pa de lta kho na'o //
T02D1198:256a-0: khro bo'i sbyin sreg gis kyang bgegs rnams tshar gcad @256a * //
T02D1198:256a-2: sbyin sreg gi phyogs la slob ma srung ba'i don du dang por zhi ba'i sbyin sreg kyang bya'o //
T02D1198:256a-3: de'i phyir de'i las la sogs pa de kho na'o //
T02D1198:256a-4: bsnyems bcas gnyis med bde gnas pa //
T02D1198:256a-5: zhes mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par ston pa /
T02D1198:256a-6: phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor byas nas zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:256a-7: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal zhes pa 'di'i rgyas par ston pa ni //
T02D1198:256a-8: khro bo rnam par rgyal ba zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:256a-9: bgegs rnams gzhom pa'i ched du khro bar mdzad pas na khro bo rnams te /
T02D1198:256a-10: gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1198:256a-11: de rnams gyis de rnams rnam par rgyal te zil gyis gnon to zhes byas nas so //
T02D1198:256a-12: gnod mdzes rgyal po 'di dang rdo rje h'um mdzad
T02D1198:256a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mdog dang zhal dang phyag
T02D1198:256a-14: dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa ni rdo rje sems
T02D1198:256a-15: dpa'i mngon par rtogs par rgyas par byas so //
T02D1198:256a-16: de rnams kyi ni khro bo rnams kyis so //
T02D1198:256a-17: 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis ni thob pa rnams kyi zhes pa lhag ma ste /
T02D1198:256a-18: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'khor dang lhan cig pa rnams kyis zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:256a-19: byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas rnams kyis //
T02D1198:256a-20: zhes pa dang po'i gcig gi tshig gi don la gsum pa'o //
T02D1198:256a-21: khyed rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la gsol ba btab nas /
T02D1198:256a-22: de rnams kyis byin rlabs kyis skyabs bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1198:256a-23: rang nyid kyis bsrung bar bya'o zhes bskul nas so //
T02D1198:256a-24: de ltar bka' bsgo byas pa de rnams snying ga'i
T02D1198:256a-25: zla bar rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa'i h'um
T02D1198:256a-26: yig la nang du gzhug par byas te /
T02D1198:256a-27: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba de yang
T02D1198:256a-28: ye shes sems dpa'i bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1198:256a-29: thams cad dang lhan cig khro bo bkug pa bdag
T02D1198:256a-30: nyid la nang du bcug nas zhes 'brel lo //
T02D1198:256a-31: de ltar ro gcig tu gyur nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas sa'i lha mo bkug ste /
T02D1198:256a-32: aom bh'u kham zhes pa'i sngags kyis nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang /
T02D1198:256a-33: h'um lam h'um zhes pas rdo rje'i rang bzhin du sa gzhi bsgoms nas /
T02D1198:256a-34: aom me di n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um zhes mngon par bsngags te /
T02D1198:256a-35: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa yi ge gsum gyis byin
T02D1198:256b-0: gyis brlab po zhes pas sa gzhi @256b yongs su
T02D1198:256b-3: sngags pas rdo rje sems bzlas shing //
T02D1198:256b-4: rdo rje lta stangs kyis blta bya //
T02D1198:256b-5: dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi cha /
T02D1198:256b-6: skyon dang ldan pa'ang dag par byed //
T02D1198:256b-7: rtog pa la gnas sngags pa yis //
T02D1198:256b-8: gang zhig sa ni rnam sbyong ba //
T02D1198:256b-9: 'di ni dag min gsang dbang po //
T02D1198:256b-10: byang chub sems ni rnam spangs pas //
T02D1198:256b-12: de yang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas 'dus bya'o zhes sa gzhi yongs su sbyang ba /
T02D1198:256b-13: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab pa sngon ma can nye bar sdud pa na //
T02D1198:256b-14: padma'i skor ba yang de sngon ma can byas nas
T02D1198:256b-15: sa yongs su gzung ba'i don du nye bar 'gro'o
T02D1198:256b-16: zhes gsungs pa / g-yas pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:256b-17: rkang pa'i mthil dag tu h'um las skyes pa'i rdo
T02D1198:256b-18: rje 'bar ba gang gis bkod pa de ni de
T02D1198:256b-19: skad do // nga rgyal dang bcas pa yang brtan pa ste /
T02D1198:256b-20: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid la /
T02D1198:256b-21: nang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin yang /
T02D1198:256b-22: phyi rol du zhal rnam par 'gyur zhing smin ma
T02D1198:256b-23: 'khyog pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sgro btags pa'i
T02D1198:256b-24: khro bo / de dag gis snying gar gnas pa'i
T02D1198:256b-25: h'um yig las spro bzhin pa shin tu nga rgyal
T02D1198:256b-26: gyi h'um yig yang yang du brjod cing /
T02D1198:256b-28: phyir dengs shig ces pa la sogs pa 'gyes par 'gyur zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1198:256b-29: khro bo zhes pa khro bo'i lha'i sku can gyi
T02D1198:256b-30: snying ga'i sa bon las phyogs rnams su spros pa'o
T02D1198:256b-31: // de ltar zhes pas de'i phyir 'di ltar brjod pa'o //
T02D1198:256b-32: phyag na rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas bdag nyid nye bar ston zhing /
T02D1198:256b-33: 'gro ba tshar gcod pa dang rjes su 'dzin pa'i nus pa 'chad par byed do //
T02D1198:256b-35: de kho na nyid bsdus par gsungs pa /
T02D1198:256b-36: de nas phyag na rdo rjes /
T02D1198:256b-37: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin rgya mtsho rnams thams cad na /
T02D1198:256b-38: 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po
T02D1198:256b-39: la sogs pa ji snyed pa de rnams lcags kyus
T02D1198:256b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gtsug lag rnams
T02D1198:256b-42: rtogs par gyis shig / bdag gi bka' yang srungs
T02D1198:256b-43: shig / de nas gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
T02D1198:256b-44: na lha chen po des smras pa /
T02D1198:257a-0: bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug bdag la yang bka' ster ba 'di su lags bcom ldan @257a * //
T02D1198:257a-1: 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T02D1198:257a-2: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang dam tshig dang
T02D1198:257a-3: sdom pa la gtsug lag rnams sgrubs shig /'di ni
T02D1198:257a-4: gnod sbyin phyag na rdo rje khros pa khro bo
T02D1198:257a-5: gtum po byang chub sems dpa' chen po /
T02D1198:257a-6: rdo rje 'bar bas khyed rnams dang khams gsum po mtha' dag brlag par byas na mi rung ngo //
T02D1198:257a-7: de nas dbang phyug chen pos 'jig rten gsum po
T02D1198:257a-8: mtha' dag gi bdag po nyid kyi shes pa la
T02D1198:257a-9: dbang bas phyag na rdo rje la 'jigs pa bstan
T02D1198:257a-10: pa'i don du // gtum zhing khro ba chen po nyid //
T02D1198:257a-12: 'bar ba spro ba chen po nyid //
T02D1198:257a-13: drag po'i gad rgyangs dgod pa chen po nyid tshogs pa rnams dang lhan cig ston cing smras pa /
T02D1198:257a-14: nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po yin na /
T02D1198:257a-15: khyod nga la bka' sbyin par byed do //
T02D1198:257a-16: de nas phyag na rdo rjes /
T02D1198:257a-17: rdo rje rol pa dang bcas par gsor zhing ;
T02D1198:257a-18: rnam par dgod cing gsungs pa /
T02D1198:257a-19: kho ste rtogs par gyis shig / lus srul po
T02D1198:257a-20: dang mi'i sha nga'i bka' bzhin byed na zo zhig
T02D1198:257a-21: / smras pa / khyod kyang nga'i bka' skyongs shig
T02D1198:257a-22: / de nas phyag na rdo rjes h'um zhes gsungs
T02D1198:257a-23: pa na 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams thams
T02D1198:257a-25: lha chen po yang sa la 'gyel zhing shi'o //
T02D1198:257a-26: badzra au tti shtha zhes gsungs pa na lha rnams
T02D1198:257a-27: lha'i bde ba rnams nyams su myong bas langs te
T02D1198:257a-28: / badzra a'a yu: zhes pa shi ba slar 'tsho ba'i snying pos gsos nas /
T02D1198:257a-29: phyag na rdo rjes lha chen po zhabs g-yon pas mnan nas /
T02D1198:257a-30: g-yas pas au ma'i nu ma'i khur 'tshir ro //
T02D1198:257a-31: de nas lha chen po phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs
T02D1198:257a-32: kyi mthil reg pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1198:257a-33: cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang rnam par
T02D1198:257a-34: thar pa'i sgo rnams nyams su myong zhing /
T02D1198:257a-35: lha chen po'i lus dang au ma yang bla ma'i
T02D1198:257a-36: yon du phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil la
T02D1198:257a-37: phul nas / 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
T02D1198:257a-38: med pa rnams 'das te thal bas g-yogs pa'i 'jig
T02D1198:257a-39: rten gyi khams su thal ba'i dbang po zhes bya
T02D1198:257a-40: ba'i de bzhin gshegs par skyes so //
T02D1198:257b-0: lha langs pa rnams kyang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam tshig la @257b gzhag go zhes so //
T02D1198:257b-1: chen po zhes pa chen po rnams kyang ste /
T02D1198:257b-2: don chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir la /
