T02D1198:263b-28: rdo rje khro bo de rnams kyis rnga mo'i rkang pa rnams su sbed du gzhug ste /
T02D1198:263b-29: shing los bcings pa'i rdul rang nyid gzhag pa de
T02D1198:263b-30: rnams kyis sbed par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to
T02D1198:263b-31: // de ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga las so /
T02D1198:263b-32: chos ma yin pa la zhugs pa'i mdza' bo gnyis
T02D1198:263b-33: chos ma yin pa las bzlog pa'i ched du bye
T02D1198:263b-34: zhing sdang ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:263b-35: bram ze zhes pa la sogs pa ste dge sbyong ni sh'akya'i dge slong ngo //
T02D1198:263b-36: 'ug pa'i gshog pa la bsgrub bya'i ming spel nas /
T02D1198:263b-37: aom hr'i: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags bris te /
T02D1198:263b-38: des dkris pa'i 'khrul 'khor gnyis so sor bsgrub bya
T02D1198:263b-39: gnyis kyi gnas su sa brkos pa las dbugs bkag
T02D1198:263b-40: pas gzhug go // 'thab bzhin pa ni 'thab par
T02D1198:263b-41: byed pa'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub bya dag go
T02D1198:263b-42: pas gzhug go // // stong pa nyid kyi rjes
T02D1198:263b-43: thogs su sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la ts'i'i
T02D1198:264a-1: pa'i rta mgrin ljang gu cung zad ser ba /
T02D1198:264a-2: rin po che sna tshogs pa'i cod pan can 'od dpag tu med pas rgyas btab pa /
T02D1198:264a-3: mdog ljang gu'i rta'i zhal can phyag bzhi pa ste /
T02D1198:264a-4: logs so sor mthe chung mthe bos mnan nas sor
T02D1198:264a-5: mo bar ma gsum brkyang ba las ba dan gsum
T02D1198:264a-6: pa'i tshul lo // langs pa'i tshul gyis g-yon pa gcig gis seng ge dang 'phrog byed dag dang /
T02D1198:264a-7: gnyis pas tshangs pa dang 'dod pa'i lha dag dang /
T02D1198:264a-8: g-yas pas dpal mo dang 'jigs ma'i lha mo dang /
T02D1198:264a-9: gnyis pas zhi ba'i lha mo dang dga' ba mo mnan te /
T02D1198:264a-10: g-yas brkyang stabs dang g-yon brkyang stabs kyis zhabs bzhi pa'o //
T02D1198:264a-11: 'di'i sngags ni aom ha ya gr'i wa rts'i sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:264a-13: aom ha ya gr'i wa hr'i: hr'i: aa ham aa ham a'am a'am h'um h'um sv'a h'a zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:264a-14: cho gas zhes pa 'dis ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa la sogs pa mtshon to //
T02D1198:264a-15: ts'i'i sa bon gyi 'od rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i
T02D1198:264a-16: sbub kyi rnam pa rnams kyis rta'i zhal nas nges
T02D1198:264a-17: par byung ste / chang 'tshong ma la sogs pa'i khyim na gnas pa'i chang dgug go //
T02D1198:264a-18: rts'i zhes brjod cing zhes kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D1198:264a-20: bsgrub bya'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:264a-21: kun du ste phyogs rnams so //
T02D1198:264a-22: yongs su sa bon zhes pa ya yig gis te /
T02D1198:264a-23: yongs su gyur pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1198:264a-26: rta mgrin gyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'am /
T02D1198:264a-27: rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa las 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rnal 'byor gyis /
T02D1198:264a-28: gla rtsi la sogs pa'i dri nag pos gru bzhi
T02D1198:264a-29: pa'i dbus su so sor ya yig gi dbus su
T02D1198:264a-30: gnas pa'i thig le bdun po rnams yam las skyes
T02D1198:264a-31: shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor bdun
T02D1198:264a-33: de las skyes shing de la gnas pa ri dags
T02D1198:264a-34: la zhon pa'i rlung lha nag po 'khor drug can
T02D1198:264a-35: gyi gtso bo gcig pa rnams snying gnas phyung ba'i
T02D1198:264a-36: khro bos zhags pas bkug pa'i ye shes sems dpa'
T02D1198:264a-37: dang gcig pa'i ngo bo rnams bcings par bsams te
T02D1198:264a-38: / badzra h'um bam dha zhes klog cing dbugs nang du bcug pas /
T02D1198:264b-0: h'um sum h'um las skyes pa'i ri rab rtse brgyad pa'i ngo @264b bos bkab nas /
T02D1198:264b-1: de'i steng du lam las skyes shing rdo rjes mtshan
T02D1198:264b-2: pa gru bzhi pa ser po sa'i dkyil 'khor sna
T02D1198:264b-3: tshogs rdo rje chen pos mnan pa bsgoms la /
T02D1198:264b-4: dbugs bsdams pas thams cad g-yas brkyang stabs kyi rkang
T02D1198:264b-5: pa g-yon pas nyed cing mdun du ral gri dang
T02D1198:264b-7: rlung lha la bsdigs shing sngags bzlas pas rab gnas
T02D1198:264b-8: la sogs pa la rlung chen po nye bar zhi'o
T02D1198:264b-10: gzir ba ni gzir byed pa'o //
T02D1198:264b-11: h'um yig ni dang por dang tha mar gnas pa'o //
T02D1198:264b-12: 'dab mar gnas pa'i klu brgyad rnams mjug ma rnams la dang chu lha lte bar gzir cing /
T02D1198:264b-13: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim par bzlas pas char pa 'bebs so //
T02D1198:264b-14: nyi ma dmar po'i mdog legs par phyogs bcu rnams
T02D1198:264b-15: su 'phro ba'i 'od gang yin pa'i rta mgrin de
T02D1198:264b-16: nam mkha'i mtshan can khros par bdag nyid bsgoms nas
T02D1198:264b-17: h'um las skyes shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'bar ba'i
T02D1198:264b-18: lcas / chu 'khyil ba la sogs pa'i sprin chen
T02D1198:264b-19: po bdun rnams dbugs kyis bkug pa zos nas phyir
T02D1198:264b-20: 'byung ba'i dbugs kyis gtor bar bya'o //
T02D1198:264b-21: gal te h'um gis bsdigs pa la brtson pas nang
T02D1198:264b-22: gi rdo rje khro bo'i lus thams cad kyi tshogs
T02D1198:264b-23: rnams snying ga'i sa bon las spros nas mtshon cha
T02D1198:264b-24: sna tshogs rnams kyis dral ba la sogs pa byed
T02D1198:264b-25: na shin tu char ches pa zlog par byed do
T02D1198:264b-27: ji skad bshad pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa can rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsams te /
T02D1198:264b-28: dpral pa las spros pa ram las skyes pa'i me
T02D1198:264b-29: la gnas pa gtum po khros pa chen po ji
T02D1198:264b-30: skad bshad pa'i zhal la sogs pa can khro bo
T02D1198:264b-31: grangs med pas yongs su bskor bas bgegs rnams 'joms
T02D1198:264b-32: par byed do // yang na mi'i khrag dang sa
T02D1198:264b-33: dag las mi'i gzugs brnyan byas pa la bsgrub bya'i
T02D1198:264b-34: bgegs rnams dang ro mnyam par byas nas de la
T02D1198:264b-35: snga ma bzhin du bsgoms pa'i khro bo'i gzugs can
T02D1198:264b-37: che ge'i bi ghn'am k'i la ye zhes spel nas phur pa'i sngags kyis phur pas btab ste /
T02D1198:264b-38: brdung ba'i sngags kyis brdungs shing mig dga' chad par
T02D1198:264b-39: 'gyur ba'i 'od zer can gyi sngags kyis lan nyi
T02D1198:265a-0: aom sum bha zhes pa bka'i @265a * //
T02D1198:265a-1: sngags kyis brdung bzhin pa myur bas tshogs bdag gi zhal du bcug pa nyams par bsgom mo //
T02D1198:265a-2: mkha' lding ni bya khyung ngo //
T02D1198:265a-4: kha cig gdong stong can no //
T02D1198:265a-5: char pa bsgrubs nas slar yang bsgrub ste /
T02D1198:265a-6: sprin gyi tshogs rnams bsgrubs nas de rnams kyis so ;
T02D1198:265a-7: / mche ba'i dug can rnams kyi ste klu rnams kyi mi ni dug gis 'bar ba'i me'o //
T02D1198:265a-8: 'tsham pa med pa'i me zhes kha cig tu klog go //
T02D1198:265a-10: stong pa nyid kyi rjes thogs su yud kyis padma
T02D1198:265a-11: rang gi phyogs kyi klu'i kha dog can gyi 'dab
T02D1198:265a-13: de'i lte ba la nyi mar h'um las skyes pa'i
T02D1198:265a-14: rdo rje bya khyung zhes bya ba rje btsun mdog
T02D1198:265a-15: nag po // mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs su rung
T02D1198:265a-16: ba gdong bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa khros pa lo
T02D1198:265a-17: bcu drug pa'i rnam pa can bsgom mo //
T02D1198:265a-18: de'i dang po sngon po g-yas pa du ba'i mdog / g-yon pa ljang gu /
T02D1198:265a-19: steng mkha' lding gi gdong pa dmar po /
T02D1198:265a-20: nyi ma bcu gnyis lta bur drag po'i 'od can /
T02D1198:265a-21: zhal so so la spyan gsum pa /
T02D1198:265a-22: gshog pa gnyis dang ldan pa /
T02D1198:265a-23: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje gsor ba la brtson pa /
T02D1198:265a-24: g-yon pas zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub bzung ba /
T02D1198:265a-25: g-yon dang g-yas gzhan pa dag gis dbang po'i pags pa'i gos 'dzin pa ;
T02D1198:265a-26: de bzhin du rim pa ji lta bar thod pa dang kha t'am ga gzung ba /
T02D1198:265a-27: de ltar lcags kyu dang cad te'u 'dzin pa /
T02D1198:265a-29: sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pas mdzes pa'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D1198:265a-30: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa /
T02D1198:265a-32: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D1198:265a-33: mche ba rnams kyis ma mchu 'tshir ba /
T02D1198:265a-34: g-yas brkyang stabs kyi zhabs kyis chu lha dkar po
T02D1198:265a-35: dang klu gzhang yi mjug ma mnan pa bsgoms nas
T02D1198:265a-36: / shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i 'dab ma
T02D1198:265a-37: rnams la rim pa ji lta bar mtha' yas dang
T02D1198:265a-38: / / nor rgyas dang 'jog pa dang padma rnams
T02D1198:265a-39: dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang
T02D1198:265a-40: / / gu rnams dang / dbang ldan dang me
T02D1198:265a-41: lha dang bden bral dang rlung gi zur rnams su
T02D1198:265a-42: padma chen po dang dung skyong dang stobs kyi rgyu
T02D1198:265a-43: dang ma dros pa rnams ser po dang dud ka
T02D1198:265a-46: klu 'di rnams thams cad gdengs ka dmar po gsum bsgreng ba /
T02D1198:265b-0: thal @265b mo sbyar bar byas pa /
T02D1198:265b-1: bcom ldan 'das la blta bzhin pa /
T02D1198:265b-2: bka' nod cing 'jigs par gyur pa rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1198:265b-3: de la chu ba dag la sogs pa dgu po rnams kyi snying gar so sor /
T02D1198:265b-4: h'um nam h'um zhes bsgoms te /
T02D1198:265b-5: sngags pa kha shar du bltas pas /
T02D1198:265b-6: rdo rje bya khyung gi thang sku'i mdun du ;
T02D1198:265b-7: aom badzra n'a r'a ya na zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas so //
T02D1198:265b-8: de nas sngags 'di grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:265b-9: grub par gyur pa na khro bo sgom pa dang
T02D1198:265b-10: ldan pa mi smra bar tshangs par spyod pa 'o
T02D1198:265b-11: ma dang 'bras sh'a la'i bza' ba can gyis /
T02D1198:265b-12: klu rnams la 'o ma'i khrus dang 'o ma'i zas
T02D1198:265b-13: ster zhing thun so sor 'o ma can gyi shing
T02D1198:265b-14: bud shing dang 'o ma dag gis sbyin sreg byed
T02D1198:265b-15: cing / chu lha dang klu rnams kyi sngags so sor khri bzlas so //
T02D1198:265b-16: aom aam aa na nt'a ya h'um nam h'um wa rsha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:265b-17: aom b'am b'a su ka ye h'um nam h'um ba rsha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:265b-18: aom tam ta ksha ka ya h'um nam h'um wa rsha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:265b-19: aom pam padma ya h'um nam h'um wa rsha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:265b-20: aom mam ma h'a padm'a ya h'um nam h'um wa rsha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:265b-21: aom sham sham kha p'a l'a ya h'um nam h'um wa rsha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:265b-22: aom kam ka rko t'a ya h'um nam h'um wa rsha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:265b-23: aom aam aa na ba ta pt'a ya h'um nam h'um wa rsha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:265b-24: aom bam ba ru n'a ya /
T02D1198:265b-25: n'a ga aa dhi pa ta yi n'a g'a na wa rsha ya h'um nam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:265b-27: de'i rjes su rdo rje mkha' lding gi gshog pa'i
T02D1198:265b-28: rlung rnams kyis mtshams med pa'i me zhi bar byed
T02D1198:265b-29: cing / mchu bsnun pas kyang chu bo byed do zhes pa bsgom zhing /
T02D1198:265b-30: aom badzra n'a r'a ya na zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas so //
T02D1198:265b-31: de nas zhag bdun gyi nang du klu rnams thams cad chu kun nas 'bab par byed do //
T02D1198:265b-32: char chen gu gul dang sa rdza ras dang sgog
T02D1198:265b-33: skya rnams kyis bdugs pas thang sku la gnas pa'i
T02D1198:265b-35: klog pa spangs nas bzlas bya bzlas pas char ches pa zlog par byed do zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:265b-36: yang na rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ma ram
T02D1198:265b-37: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor can nam rang
T02D1198:265b-38: gi 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis nam mkha' la
T02D1198:265b-39: h'um gam h'um yongs su gyur pa mkha' lding bka'
T02D1198:265b-40: byed pa / zhal gyi chu stong phrag sbyin pa klu brgyad can bsams nas /
T02D1198:265b-41: aom badzra n'a r'a ya na zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya'o //
T02D1198:265b-42: 'di yang nam mkhar gnas pa'i brgya byin la bka' bsgo zhing /
T02D1198:266a-1: sprin pa rnams la char pa'i don du bka' bsgo bar byed do //
T02D1198:266a-2: bka' yang thos nas chu'i char pa rnams kyis sprin
T02D1198:266a-3: rnams la me gsod pa lhur len par bsam zhing
T02D1198:266a-4: / nam mkha' lding yang de ltar gsod par byed cing /
T02D1198:266a-5: chu klung yang byed do zhes bsam mo zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:266a-6: nam mkha'i khams ni stong pa nyid do //
T02D1198:266a-7: der chu skyes dmar po dang nyi ma la hr'i:
T02D1198:266a-8: las skyes pa'i autpala dmar po hr'i: yongs su gyur
T02D1198:266a-9: pa las ku ru ku lle'i gzugs dmar po dang
T02D1198:266a-10: sngon po dang dkar po rnams kyi rtsa ba dang
T02D1198:266a-11: g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal can /
T02D1198:266a-12: phyag g-yas pa rnams su ral gri dang mda' dang
T02D1198:266a-13: da ma ru dang lcags kyu dang mi 'jigs pa'i
T02D1198:266a-14: tshul lo // nyi mar gnas zhes pa nyi ma'i steng du rol gnas pa'o //
T02D1198:266a-15: gos chen po ni 'dir 'dod pa'i lha'i pags pa'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1198:266a-16: de bla rer gang gis lag pa gnyis kyis gzung ba de ni de skad do //
T02D1198:266a-17: de'i phyir sgrol ma 'di phyag bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D1198:266a-18: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa 'bum bzlas pa'i rjes thogs su'o //
T02D1198:266a-19: aom ku ru kulle hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:266a-21: rang gi lus las te snying gar gnas pa'i hr'i:'i sa bon las so //
T02D1198:266a-23: aom t'a re tu tt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:266a-24: zhes pa'i yi ge bcu pa'i sngags te ;
T02D1198:266a-26: de'i 'od zer rnams kyis yang bsgrub bya'i ye shes pa bkug nas bcug ste sngags bzlas so //
T02D1198:266a-28: spyan gsum pa dkar po dang nag po dang dmar
T02D1198:266a-29: po'i rtsa ba g-yas dang cig shos kyi zhal gsum
T02D1198:266a-30: pa'o // bsnyems pas zhes pa bsnyems pa dang ldan pa'i phyir bsnyems pa ste rdo rje dril bu'o //
T02D1198:266a-31: de'i sgeg pa dang bcas par dril bu 'dzin pas dkur gnas pa'i phyag ste /
T02D1198:266a-32: byed pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1198:266a-34: spros pa gang rnams kyis yin pa'i sangs rgyas de
T02D1198:266a-35: rnams kyis mdzad pa'i sprin gyi tshogs gang yin pa
T02D1198:266a-36: de rnams so / sems can las phyung ba zhes klog pa las ni /
T02D1198:266a-37: sems can las te lus can gyi gzugs las phyung ba zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:266a-38: dbang bskur ni cod pan no //
T02D1198:266a-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis cod pan la sogs pa rnams las 'dzag pa ste spros pa rnams so //
T02D1198:266a-40: de la man ngag tu byed pa ni stong pa
T02D1198:266b-0: nyid kyi rjes thogs su gzhal yas @266b khang gi
T02D1198:266b-1: nang du sna tshogs padma'i lte bar nyi ma la
T02D1198:266b-2: h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang h'um yongs su
T02D1198:266b-3: gyur pa bdud bzhi po g-yas brkyang stabs kyis mnan
T02D1198:266b-5: mgo bo la sogs pa'i rgyan can /
T02D1198:266b-6: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1198:266b-7: rang 'dra'i shes rab dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1198:266b-8: de'i sa bon kho na las 'dab ma rnams la /
T02D1198:266b-9: nyi ma dang ro rnams la lha mo rnams so //
T02D1198:266b-10: de la shar du rdo rje mtshon cha ma ser
T02D1198:266b-11: mo ser po dang sngon po dang ljang gu'i gtso
T02D1198:266b-12: bo dang g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal can no
T02D1198:266b-13: // lho ru rdo rje k'i le k'i la dmar mo //
T02D1198:266b-14: dmar ba dang ser ba dang ljang ba'i zhal gsum pa'o //
T02D1198:266b-15: nub tu rdo rje snum pa ma /
T02D1198:266b-16: dkar po dang sngo ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum pa'o //
T02D1198:266b-17: byang du rdo rje snyems ma ljang gu ma ljang
T02D1198:266b-18: gu dang dmar ba dang dkar ba'i zhal can no
T02D1198:266b-19: // lnga char yang spyan gsum pa skra grol ba gcer bu /
T02D1198:266b-22: bdag po bzhin du rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshon cha 'dzin pa rnams bsam par bya'o //
T02D1198:266b-23: de'i rjes su nam mkha' las lhung ba'i rdo rje /
T02D1198:266b-24: aom ma h'a zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags mthar
T02D1198:266b-25: che ge'i phyogs che ge ru badzra p'a tam ni
T02D1198:266b-27: zhes pa spel nas byings dang bcas par zlos shing /
T02D1198:266b-28: rang nyid dang sangs rgyas spros pa rnams kyis rdo
T02D1198:266b-29: rje rngul phra rab tu phye mar byas pa rlung
T02D1198:266b-30: chen po sa ring du 'phen par bsgom pas nges
T02D1198:266b-32: bsgrub bya yang sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs nas rdo
T02D1198:266b-33: rje sems dpa'i gzugs la sangs rgyas nyid du dbang
T02D1198:266b-34: bskur nas dar dpyangs dang phreng ba'i dbang bskur bya'o
T02D1198:266b-35: zhes pa'o // nang gi bdag nyid can gyi rdo
T02D1198:266b-36: rje byang chub sems nor bu las phyi rol du
T02D1198:266b-37: lhung ba zlog pa zhar la bshad pa'i don du
T02D1198:266b-38: zhes pa'o // gsungs pa / byas na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:266b-39: shes rab dang thabs dag stong pa nyid dang ro
T02D1198:266b-40: gcig pa nyid kyis mdzes pa'i dga' ba ni legs
T02D1198:266b-42: des byang chub kyi sems 'ching ba'o //
T02D1198:266b-43: gtum mo gsum la yang de kho nas bde blag tu yun ring du 'ching ba ste /
T02D1198:266b-44: btsan thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni de ltar ma yin no //
T02D1198:266b-45: des na de bcings pas rdo rje zlog pa ste /
T02D1198:266b-46: 'ching ba kho na zlog pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:267a-0: de ltar byas na ste zlog par gyur pa na gsungs pa'i dpal mchog gi dang po'i @267a * //
T02D1198:267a-1: rnal 'byor gyi bla na med pa'i go 'phang mchog
T02D1198:267a-2: tu zag pa med pa bde ba'i rang bzhin rdo
T02D1198:267a-3: rje 'dzin pa nyid gsal bar 'gyur ba dang ldan
T02D1198:267a-5: dkyus ma las rab 'byam gyi don gsungs pa /
T02D1198:267a-6: gsod ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:267a-8: shar du mngon du phyogs pas ri mo drang por gnyis te /
T02D1198:267a-9: de bzhin du byang du mngon par phyogs pas so //
T02D1198:267a-10: dbus su ri mo zlum pos re mig dgu ru 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:267a-11: de la ya ni dbus su ste /
T02D1198:267a-12: ma me da kshe shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su g-yas skor gyis so //
T02D1198:267a-13: zur gyi re mig bzhi rnams su re mi ga so sor /
T02D1198:267a-14: h'um che ge ra ksha zhes pa la sogs pa dang h'um zhes rab tu sbyor ba'o //
T02D1198:267a-15: zlum po'i ri mo las phyi rol du zur rnams
T02D1198:267a-16: su ri mo drang po bzhi byas pa na re
T02D1198:267a-18: de rnams su shar gyi re mi gnas brtsams nas /
T02D1198:267a-21: ru na yo ni ra ya tstsha ni zhes pa bri ste /
T02D1198:267a-22: sngags kyi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
T02D1198:267a-23: de las ya ma r'a dz'a sa do me ya /
T02D1198:267a-24: ya me do ru na yod ya /
T02D1198:267a-25: ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
T02D1198:267a-26: ya kshe ya tstsha ni r'a ma ya zhes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:267a-27: zhi ba'i don kho na la ni ya gnyis dang ni gnyis mi bri'o //
T02D1198:267a-28: de'i gnas bzhi rnams su rab tu sbyor ba'o //
T02D1198:267a-29: ri mo de las phyi rol du zur so so
T02D1198:267a-30: la phyi rol du phyogs pa'i ri mo gnyis byas
T02D1198:267a-31: pa na phyi rol gyi ri mo zlum pos re
T02D1198:267a-32: mig bcu drug rnams su 'gyur te /
T02D1198:267a-33: de rnams kyi shar la sogs pa gcig gis par du chod pa'i re mig brgyad rnams su /
T02D1198:267a-34: aom hr'i: shti: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1198:267a-35: zhes pa'i sngags g-yon skor gyis te /
T02D1198:267a-36: aom hr'i: zhes dang shtr'i: wi zhes /
T02D1198:267a-37: kri t'a zhes dang nan zhes dang /
T02D1198:267a-38: h'um h'um zhes dang phat phat ces dang sv'a zhes dang h'a zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:267a-39: gzhan brgyad rnams su dgod pa'o //
T02D1198:267a-40: yi ge rnams thams cad dbu phyi rol du bstan pa'o //
T02D1198:267a-41: khros pa'i las nyid la dbus nas g-yas su phyung ste /
T02D1198:267a-42: g-yon skor gyis yi ge dgod pa'o //
T02D1198:267a-43: khros pas gshin rje'i phyogs su kha phyogs pas rang gi khrag dang /
T02D1198:267a-44: ro bsregs pa'i thal bas bya rog chen po'i gshog pa'i 'bri smyug gis bris te /
T02D1198:267a-45: gsod la gshin rje'i lus la gnas //
T02D1198:267a-46: sdang la ma he rta dag la'o //
T02D1198:267b-0: bskul la'ang rnga mo'i @267b rgyab la gnas //
T02D1198:267b-1: zhi la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1198:267b-2: dbang la mi mo'i snying gar ro //
T02D1198:267b-3: rgyas la rta yi rgyab tu'o //
T02D1198:267b-4: rengs pa dang dgug pa la sogs pa rnams la mngon par brtag par bya'o //
T02D1198:267b-5: gi wang ngam gur gum mam gzhan gyis gro ga
T02D1198:267b-6: la sogs pa la ji ltar rigs pa'i 'bri smyug
T02D1198:267b-7: gis bris te / kham phor kha sbyar du 'khrul 'khor gzhag go //
T02D1198:267b-8: bsten pa khri sngon ma can gyis 'di khyim gang du bzhag pa der 'thab mor 'gyur ro //
T02D1198:267b-9: gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyis 'di bri'o //
T02D1198:267b-10: 'dir ni mchog gi dang po'i rnal 'byor gyis kyang /
T02D1198:267b-11: aom ya ma zhes pa la sogs pa phat'i mtha'
T02D1198:267b-12: can gyi sngags bzlas par bya'o zhes mtshon pa'i ched
T02D1198:267b-13: du gsungs so // yang zhes gsungs pa ni mya
T02D1198:267b-14: ngan med pa'i brgyad pa la sogs pa la ltos
T02D1198:267b-15: du gsungs so // pas te / myos byed kyi
T02D1198:267b-16: 'bras bu dang thig le dag ni der yang shes
T02D1198:267b-18: 'bras bu'i khu bdag ni khu ba dang rdul dag go ;
T02D1198:267b-19: / sgra ji lta ba dag go zhes gzhan no //
T02D1198:267b-20: aom ku ru ku lle hr'i: che ge mo me
T02D1198:267b-21: ba sh'i bha wa tu hr'i: sv'a h'a zhes pa
T02D1198:267b-22: khri bzlas te sngags grub pa na'o //
T02D1198:267b-23: sngon du 'bum bzlas pas phyi nas spel tshig go //
T02D1198:267b-24: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa la stong pa
T02D1198:267b-25: nyid kyi rjes thogs su chu skyes dkar po dang
T02D1198:267b-26: zla ba la aim las rdzogs pa'i klu lhag ma
T02D1198:267b-28: g-yas brkyang stabs kyis gnas pa dkar po mi'i gdong pa can /
T02D1198:267b-31: g-yon pas yid 'od ma la rol pa dang bcas par 'khyud pa /
T02D1198:267b-33: snying gar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dkar po'i lte bar zla ba dang 'dab ma rnams la /
T02D1198:267b-34: so sor gnas pa'i aom yig dkar po'i 'od zer rnams kyis bdud rtsi char du 'bebs shing /
T02D1198:267b-35: gdengs ka so so dang mig dag las nges par
T02D1198:267b-36: byung ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun rnams kyis mgo bo nas
T02D1198:267b-37: brtsams pa'i zin pa'i lus rkyal bar byas nas dug
T02D1198:267b-39: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gsum ni /
T02D1198:267b-40: kye'i rdo rje bzhi gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
T02D1198:267b-41: zla ba la khu ba dang nyi ma la rdul bsre'o //
T02D1198:267b-42: bye ba drug rnams sngon du bsnyen par bya'o //
T02D1198:267b-43: de'i rjes su las ni s'a lu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:268a-2: bye ba bzlas pa'i rjes thogs su /
T02D1198:268a-3: aom badzra k'a rta ri zhes pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1198:268a-4: sngags kyis ril bu byas te bzung nas 'bum bzlas
T02D1198:268a-5: so // de nas ril bu 'grub po //
T02D1198:268a-6: des dgra bo dpung dang bcas pa'i gzugs su bsams
T02D1198:268a-7: pa'i ril pas mgrin pa dkri ba dang bcag par
T02D1198:268a-8: bya'o // lha rnams kyi zhes pa pha rol po'i lta ba'i lha rnams so //
T02D1198:268a-9: rdo rje ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khu ba dang
T02D1198:268a-10: rngul chu 'ching ngo zhes pa rdo rje 'ching ba
T02D1198:268a-11: ste ba l'a sha'i sa bon no //
T02D1198:268a-12: de kho na ni rdo rje can te /
T02D1198:268a-13: ro bcud 'ching ba la gzhom du med pa'i nus pa can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:268a-14: 'dir pa l'a sha'i sa bon gyi snying po gzung ngo //
T02D1198:268a-15: rgyal la zhes pa skar ma rgyal la'o //
T02D1198:268a-16: cho ga bzhin zhes pa chu sngon po can gyi klu'i rdzing bu'i /
T02D1198:268a-17: aom a'a: phu: zhes pa'i sngags kyi brgyad lhag pa'i
T02D1198:268a-18: brgyar bsngags pa'i sa kha dog sngon po'i dbus su
T02D1198:268a-20: sa des yang dag par bkod pa'i mtha' yas sngags
T02D1198:268a-21: des yongs su gyur pa can bsam mo zhes pa
T02D1198:268a-22: cho ga'o // bdud rtsi lnga ni 'o ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:268a-23: kham phor gnyis ni sa de kho nas byas pa
T02D1198:268a-24: so ma btang ba mtha' yas nang du gzhag pa'o
T02D1198:268a-25: mas bkang ba la dkri bar bya'o //
T02D1198:268a-26: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i bya ba bcu rnams
T02D1198:268a-27: la so sor aom a'a: phu: zhes pa'i sngags brgyad
T02D1198:268a-30: mi bskyod pa rnam par dag pas rdul tshon nag po dur khrod kyi sol bas bya'o //
T02D1198:268a-31: rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pas rdul tshon dkar po ni mi'i rus pa'i phye mas so //
T02D1198:268a-32: rin chen 'byung ldan rnam par dag pas rdul tshon ser po ni ba blas so //
T02D1198:268a-33: 'od dpag med rnam par dag pas rdul tshon dmar po ni dur khrod kyi so phag gis so //
T02D1198:268a-34: don yod grub pa rnam par dag pas rdul tshon
T02D1198:268a-35: ljang gu ni mi rus dang rkun ma'i lo ma
T02D1198:268a-36: dag gis so // rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par
T02D1198:268a-37: dag pas rdul tshon sngon po ni mi'i rus pa
T02D1198:268a-38: dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dag gis so //
T02D1198:268a-39: bcu bzhi pa'am brgyad pa la sbyang ba byas pa'i
T02D1198:268a-40: ro'i sa gzhi la thig skud byin gyis brlab par
T02D1198:268a-41: bya zhing / ji srid du 'dus bya ba rdzogs pa'i bar du ste /
T02D1198:268a-42: skud pa des mthe bong gsum lhag pa'i khru gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor thig btab nas /
T02D1198:268b-0: rdul tshon rnams kyis mi @268b bskyod pa rnam par dag pas bzhengs te /
T02D1198:268b-1: de'i dbus su mtha' yas mnan pa'i kye'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1198:268b-2: gnas ji lta bar rnal 'byor ma rnams bri'o zhes pa cho ga'o //
T02D1198:268b-3: yang na kye'i rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams bri bar bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1198:268b-4: shin tu ba ni brtson 'grus chen po'i tshul can no //
T02D1198:268b-5: khro bo'i sems ni khros zin pa'i sems so //
T02D1198:268b-6: bzlog nas zhes pa sv'a h'a la sogs pa'i tshig gi zlog pas bzlas so //
T02D1198:268b-7: aa rdza ka ni pa rn'a sha'o //
T02D1198:268b-8: 'dis ni gdon mi za bar char 'bab po zhes gsungs so //
T02D1198:268b-9: de'i tshe zhes pa gang gi tshe char ches par
T02D1198:268b-10: 'gyur ba de'i chos bcu bzhi pa la sogs pa
T02D1198:268b-11: la ro'i kha bkab pa'i ras kyi dum bu gcig
T02D1198:268b-12: la 'dug cing / dum bu gzhan la sngags bris te bzlas pas /
T02D1198:268b-13: sprin rnams dral bar byed do zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:268b-14: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02D1198:268b-15: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma nyi shu brgyad pa'o /
T02D1198:268b-17: // / gtor ma dang dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa la sogs
T02D1198:268b-18: pa bya ba rnams rdo rje la sogs pa 'dzin
T02D1198:268b-19: pa sngon du 'gro ba'o zhes pas de'i rang gi
T02D1198:268b-20: ngo bo gsal ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:268b-21: bcom ldan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:268b-22: gong med rnams kyis ni 'di rnams las mchog khyad
T02D1198:268b-23: par du 'phags pa yod pa ma yin pa zhes
T02D1198:268b-24: pa rdo rje theg pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis
T02D1198:268b-25: so // mtshon bya rnams kyi mtshan nyid de ltos
T02D1198:268b-26: pa dang bcas pa nyid na yang kha cig tu
T02D1198:268b-27: tshig sdud du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:268b-28: ci zhe na bzhi rnams kyi ste rdo rje la
T02D1198:268b-29: sogs pa mtshon bya rnams kyi de kho na nyid
T02D1198:268b-31: thabs kyi rgyud kyi yan lag nyid kyis so //
T02D1198:268b-33: zhes pas 'khor ba las sgrol ba yang yin la
T02D1198:268b-34: mtshan nyid kyang ngo zhes pa 'dis ni nyan pa
T02D1198:268b-35: la shin tu don gnyer ba'i ched du spro bar
T02D1198:268b-36: byed pa'o // ji bzhin de nyid ces mdor bstan pa rgyas par 'chad de /
T02D1198:268b-37: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:268b-38: rdo rje'i de kho na nyid dang po dang de'i
T02D1198:268b-39: rjes su dril bu dang bgrang phreng dang ye shes
T02D1198:268b-40: kyi de kho na nyid ces pa rim pas bstan
T02D1198:268b-42: ji ltar 'khor ba las sgrol bar mdor bstan pa yin zhe na /
T02D1198:269a-1: phyir bzhi po'i de kho na nyid kyis de'i yul
T02D1198:269a-2: can rnam par rtog pa rnams 'khor ba'i chu bo'i
T02D1198:269a-3: rlabs rnams te / de rnams las shin tu brgal
T02D1198:269a-4: nas pha rol thar pa skyes bu'i don mchog tu
T02D1198:269a-5: don gnyer ba'i sems can gyi don mthun 'dren pa'o
T02D1198:269a-6: rlabs rnams te / // so sor rgyas par 'chad de /
T02D1198:269a-7: dbus su zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:269a-8: dbu ma la sogs pa'i rtse mo rnams la me
T02D1198:269a-9: long la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid rnam
T02D1198:269a-10: par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams bsam par bya'o
T02D1198:269a-11: // rva las 'og tu lte ba'i mthar thug par
T02D1198:269a-12: padma'i 'dab ma rnams la rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1198:269a-15: 'dir lam gyi yan lag rnams kho na'o //
T02D1198:269a-17: gnas ji lta bar shar dang me la sogs pa'i
T02D1198:269a-18: rim pas byams pa dang sa'i snying po dang phyag
T02D1198:269a-19: na rdo rje dang nam mkha' mdzod dang 'jig rten
T02D1198:269a-20: dbang phyug dang 'jam dpal dang sgrib pa thams cad
T02D1198:269a-21: rnam par sel ba dang kun du bzang po rnams
T02D1198:269a-22: bsam mo zhes rgyud gzhan gyi dgongs pas gdams ngag
T02D1198:269a-23: tu byed do // ji ltar 'don pa ltar ro zhes gzhan no //
T02D1198:269a-24: lha brgyad po 'di rnams gzhag go zhes pa nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T02D1198:269a-26: lha'i sgo nga rnams kyi zhes pa sgo nga'i gnas
T02D1198:269a-27: su ye shes kyi lha ni rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1198:269a-29: lha thams cad 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na /
T02D1198:269a-30: de dang der shes rab dang thabs ro gcig par bsgom zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:269a-31: chang zungs kyi mtha'i padma gzhan la shar la sogs
T02D1198:269a-32: pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la rdo rje lcags
T02D1198:269a-33: kyu ma dang / rdo rje zhags pa ma dang
T02D1198:269a-34: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang rdo rje dril bu
T02D1198:269a-35: kyu ma dang / ma rnams so // phyogs bral
T02D1198:269a-36: te phyogs bral gyi 'dab ma rnams su rtsen ma
T02D1198:269a-38: rin chen sgron ma dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud
T02D1198:269a-39: ma dang gzhan gyis mi thub ma rnams bsam mo
T02D1198:269a-40: // mtha' gzhan gyi rtse mo rnams la ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1198:269a-41: mtha' rnams kyi ni mtha' ru ste nub kyi phyogs su'o //
T02D1198:269a-42: de ltar rdo rje'i de kho na nyid rnams lha ru shes par bya ste /
T02D1198:269a-43: mkhas pa kun rdzob dang cig shos kyi rnam par
T02D1198:269a-44: dag pa'i rnam pa la byang ba'i shes pa can
T02D1198:269a-45: gyis so // ci ltar don dam pa shes pa yin zhe na /
T02D1198:269a-46: gang phyir rdo rje'i de kho na nyid rnams ni /
T02D1198:269b-0: rdo rje'i @269b bdag nyid yin te /
T02D1198:269b-2: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bo'o //
T02D1198:269b-3: de'i bdag nyid de'i rang bzhin phyi'i rdo rje sems la nges par gyur pa na /
T02D1198:269b-5: rdo rje'i snying po can gyi'o //
T02D1198:269b-6: 'di la ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer
T02D1198:269b-7: med pa'i ye shes kho na snying po mchog ste
T02D1198:269b-8: / de dang ro gcig pa nyid kyis byas pa'i
T02D1198:269b-9: rdo rje de yang de ltar so sor snang ngo
T02D1198:269b-10: zhes dgongs la de'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:269b-11: ni ni khyad par la ste khyad par du 'phags
T02D1198:269b-12: pas rdo rje'i sems te gnyis su med pa'i sems
T02D1198:269b-13: slob ma byed du gzhug go //
T02D1198:269b-14: rang nyid kyang bden pa gnyis la lhag par mos pa'i ngo bo rdo rje'i don bstan par bya'o //
T02D1198:269b-15: de la don dam pa rnam par dag pa ni
T02D1198:269b-16: rdo rje byang chub kyi sems kho na chos te
T02D1198:269b-17: gzugs la sogs pa chos can rnams so //
T02D1198:269b-18: de la brtson zhing de la rtse gcig tu 'don pa'i yid do //
T02D1198:269b-19: yid ces kha cig tu 'don to //
T02D1198:269b-20: ci ltar rdo rje chos yin zhe na /
T02D1198:269b-21: rdo rje de kho na nyid de dag ci'i ngo
T02D1198:269b-22: bo yin pa de rnams ni rdo rje'i de kho
T02D1198:269b-23: na nyid can rnams te kun rnams ni gzugs la
T02D1198:269b-25: rdo rje las kyang gnod bya ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhi ba la sogs pa'i las so //
T02D1198:269b-26: de rnams la mngon par 'gro ba'i phyir te /
T02D1198:269b-27: chos kyi dbyings ni de'i bdag nyid kyis thams cad du 'gro ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:269b-28: kun rdzob kyi rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje
T02D1198:269b-29: lha rnams su lhag par mos bzhin pa rnams spro
T02D1198:269b-30: bar byed pas rdo rje rnams kyi brtan par mos
T02D1198:269b-31: pa las dbyer med pa rnams kyi sems can rnams
T02D1198:269b-32: 'khor ba las sgrol ba ni tshogs kyi sar ro
T02D1198:269b-33: // gang gi phyir rdo rje ste bden pa gnyis
T02D1198:269b-34: dbyer med pa goms pas bkug pa gsal bar bsgoms
T02D1198:269b-35: pa'i rnal 'byor shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug
T02D1198:269b-36: pa gang rnams kyi yin pa de rnams kyi /
T02D1198:269b-37: rdo rje bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis mi phyed
T02D1198:269b-38: pas gus pa dang bcas pa bar ma chad par
T02D1198:269b-40: gang rengs pa ni rnam par g-yengs ba'i 'phro ba 'gog pa ste /
T02D1198:269b-41: rnal 'byor de rig pa shin tu brtan par lhag par mos par 'gyur te /
T02D1198:269b-42: mos pa spyod pa'i sa la'o //
T02D1198:269b-43: de las kyang mun pa lta bu ni gang nyon mongs pa rnams te /
T02D1198:269b-44: de rnams la mar me lta bu rnams shes te /
T02D1198:269b-45: de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i phyir khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa'o //
T02D1198:270a-0: ye shes ni rdo rje dang 'bar ba @270a * //
T02D1198:270a-1: dang lhan cig ste dus mnyam par gzhom par bya'o //
T02D1198:270a-3: blo ldan sems mchog bskyed ma thag tu ni //
T02D1198:270a-4: sems ni mtha' yas nyes byas las ldog pa'o //
T02D1198:270a-6: mthong ba'i lam kho nar de kho na nyid mthong
T02D1198:270a-7: bas spang bya phrag brgyad cu rnams spong bar thub
T02D1198:270a-8: pa'i dgongs pa'i rgyan du gsal bar byas so //
T02D1198:270a-9: de ltar na yang snang ba de kho na nyid mthong ba ste /
T02D1198:270a-11: des ni lhag par rtogs pa brgyud pas rdo rje
T02D1198:270a-12: 'dzin pa'i sa rnam pa thams cad du rtogs par
T02D1198:270a-14: rdo rje ste de kho na nyid mthong ba des bsgrubs pa bsgom pa'i lam ni /
T02D1198:270a-15: thams cad ste bag chags kyi gnas skabs bag la
T02D1198:270a-16: nyal rnams la rdo rje'i bdag nyid ma lus pa
T02D1198:270a-17: 'byed pa po'o // sgom pa'i lam de las pha
T02D1198:270a-18: rol bla na med pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid de
T02D1198:270a-19: 'byed pa po'o // / rdo rje stong pa nyid
T02D1198:270a-20: dang snying rje'i rang bzhin byang chub sems kyi bdag
T02D1198:270a-22: rdo rje thar pa'i ste 'khor ba'i rgyu nyon mongs
T02D1198:270a-23: pa'i phung po'i bag chags lhag ma phra mo'i gnas
T02D1198:270a-24: skabs kyang gcod par byed pa'i rnam par grol ba'i'o
T02D1198:270a-25: // 'dis ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T02D1198:270a-26: rdo rje chos nyid kyis ni chos kyi sku rtogs pa mtshon pa'o //
T02D1198:270a-27: de nyid kyi phyir gnyis ka phun sum tshogs pa mthar phyin pas snying po nyid de mtha'i sa'i'o //
T02D1198:270a-28: de'i bdag nyid kyis de 'dzin pa'i phyir yang bcom
T02D1198:270a-29: ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes bsgrags
T02D1198:270a-30: so // 'di'i dngos su ba'i thabs kyang rdo rje'o zhes gsungs pa /
T02D1198:270a-31: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:270a-34: mdor bstan nas rgyas par ston pa /
T02D1198:270a-35: rdo rje kun rdzob pa'i byang chub sems padma rnams
T02D1198:270a-36: su rim pas zhugs pa'i bde ba chen po nyams
T02D1198:270a-37: su myong ba'i ngo bo'i ni /
T02D1198:270a-38: de kho na nyid thams cad nas stong pa nyid
T02D1198:270a-39: kyis goms pa las rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid bsgrub
T02D1198:270a-40: par bya ste / mkhas pa ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la byang zhing mkhas pa'o //
T02D1198:270a-41: 'di skad gsungs te las dang sbyor ba dang lhan
T02D1198:270a-42: cig skyes pa'i gtum mo rnams kyi bde ba chen
T02D1198:270a-43: po'i mtsho skyes las 'og gi mtsho skyes rnams su
T02D1198:270a-44: sbyor ba'i kun rdzob pa'i byang chub kyi sems po
T02D1198:270a-45: la ka kko la'i nang ji srid pa de bzhin
T02D1198:270b-0: nyid dang @270b ro gcig pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1198:270b-1: bde ba myong ba'i rang bzhin de ma thag pa'i
T02D1198:270b-2: thabs kyi ngo bo ni rdo rje zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:270b-3: de yang thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:270b-4: tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis //
T02D1198:270b-5: sems can kun gyi don ston pa //
T02D1198:270b-6: rang bzhin 'od gsal ba yi sems //
T02D1198:270b-7: rdo rje zhes ni mngon par brjod //
T02D1198:270b-8: chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa //
T02D1198:270b-9: gdod nas zhi ba nam mkha' mnyam //
T02D1198:270b-10: zhes pa'i tshig ni rab 'jug pa'ang //
T02D1198:270b-11: rdo rje dril bu zhes par bshad //
T02D1198:270b-12: sangs rgyas bzhi po gdan bzhugs pa //
T02D1198:270b-13: rdo rje padma rnams la gnas //
T02D1198:270b-14: nyams su myong ba'i rim kho nas //
T02D1198:270b-15: dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1198:270b-17: de ltar rdo rje'i de kho na nyid rgyas par
T02D1198:270b-18: bstan nas rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa'i dril bu'i
T02D1198:270b-19: de kho na nyid rgyas par ston pa gsungs pa
T02D1198:270b-20: nyon zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:270b-21: gsungs zin pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1198:270b-22: de nyid kyi phyir sems can mgu bar byed pa'i
T02D1198:270b-23: phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa dang rgyal por khyod skyes
T02D1198:270b-24: te / da ni 'di rdo rje snying po nyon cig /'dis ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1198:270b-25: shes rab ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:270b-26: shes rab kho na dkrol ba ste bsgrags pa'i de
T02D1198:270b-27: kho na nyid gang rnams kyi yin pa de rnams
T02D1198:270b-30: shes rab la lhag par mos pas dkrol ba rnams
T02D1198:270b-31: kyi sgra shin tu dga' bas nyan pa las mngon
T02D1198:270b-32: par 'dod pa 'grub pa ni mtshan nyid kyi dgos
T02D1198:270b-34: mtshan nyid kyang kun rdzob kyis dang don dam pas kyang ngo //
T02D1198:270b-35: de la dang po gsungs pa gsum //
T02D1198:270b-37: 'di ni dril bu'i steng du rdo rje phyed pa'i zhar las /
T02D1198:270b-38: rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i yang ngo //
T02D1198:270b-39: cha gsum rnams mnyam pa gang gi ring ba nyid du yin pa de ni de skad do //
T02D1198:270b-40: 'dzin byed ni rdo rje dril bu dag gi lus so //
T02D1198:270b-41: gsal ba ni so so'i cha shas gsal ba'o //
T02D1198:270b-42: ra'i 'og zla ba'i steng du dkris pa'i ri mo ni ske rags te /
T02D1198:270b-43: mu khyud ces gang ming du grags pa mdzes pa'o //
T02D1198:270b-44: cha ni rnam pa gsum du byas nas de'i dbus
T02D1198:270b-45: kyi cha zlum po cha shas brgyad pa mtho ba'o
T02D1198:270b-46: // dbus su sna tshogs pa'i phreng ba ldan pa ste /
T02D1198:270b-47: rin po che dang pa tra dang myu gu rnams
T02D1198:270b-48: kyis bkra ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1198:270b-49: dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:271a-1: 'dod pa ni bye bas rgyas pa'i autpala kha ma bye ba'i rnam pa can no //
T02D1198:271a-2: zhi ba ni ma gdangs pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1198:271a-3: autpala ku mu da zhes kha cig tu 'don te /
T02D1198:271a-4: dril bu la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1198:271a-5: rin chen padma rnam par gnas //
T02D1198:271a-7: lha dgu la sogs rtse mo can //
T02D1198:271a-9: padma'i 'og tu yang rin po che phra mo'i phreng ba'i khor yug bya'o //
T02D1198:271a-10: rdo rje rtse dgu pa'i de kho na nyid rgyas par ston pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:271a-11: phyogs zhes pa la sogs pa /
T02D1198:271a-12: phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi rva brgyad rnams la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D1198:271a-13: spyan ma la sogs pa rnams bsgom mo //
T02D1198:271a-14: rva dbus ma la sangs rgyas dgu pa mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1198:271a-15: mtha' gzhan du lha dgu rnam par dag par byed pa po nyid kyi phyir mchog rnams te /
T02D1198:271a-16: gtso bo rnams kyi yin pa'i rtse mo de rnams
T02D1198:271a-17: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams la
T02D1198:271a-18: phyag na padma la sogs pa brgyad rnams dang /
T02D1198:271a-19: dbus kyi rtse mo la rdo rje sems dpa'o zhes pa lha dgus byin gyis brlab pa ste /
T02D1198:271a-21: thun mong gi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1198:271a-22: chu srin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:271a-23: dbus kyi rtse mo ma gtogs pa shar la sogs
T02D1198:271a-24: pa'i rtse mo rnams chu srin kha nas byung ba
T02D1198:271a-25: rnams so // thams cad ni 'od zer dang zla
T02D1198:271a-26: bar gnas pa rnams bya'o zhes pa rtse dgu ba'i
T02D1198:271a-28: lnga pa ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes rdo rje'o //
T02D1198:271a-29: gnyis ka yang de kho na nyid la mos pa
T02D1198:271a-30: las 'gro ba 'di las sgrol lo zhes pa 'gro
T02D1198:271a-31: ba sgrol ba'o // zhar las byung ba song ste /
T02D1198:271a-33: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:271a-34: 'di ni gong gi shes rab dkrol zhes pa la sogs pa 'brel lo //
T02D1198:271a-35: dril bu shes rab kyi bdag nyid ni nam mkha'
T02D1198:271a-36: ji srid pa dang byang chub snying po ji srid
T02D1198:271a-38: sems can dang snod kyi dbye bas tha dad pa'i
T02D1198:271a-39: 'jig rten gyi khams su mtha' med pa rnams shes
T02D1198:271a-40: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du
T02D1198:271a-41: sgra rnams kyis gsal bar byed cing dga' bskyed par
T02D1198:271a-42: byed do zhes mos par bya'o //
T02D1198:271a-43: 'di'i rgyas par bstan pa ni bcu zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:271a-44: dril bu'i steng du 'og tu kha phyogs pa'i padma'i
T02D1198:271b-0: 'dab ma brgyad rnams la lha mo brgyad rnams @271b
T02D1198:271b-1: sam de'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnams bsam mo
T02D1198:271b-2: // mdog mdzes ma ni nor rgyun ma'o //
T02D1198:271b-4: mdzes ma ni khro nyer can no //
T02D1198:271b-5: rdo rje phreng ba ma ni don ji lta ba'i ming ngo //
T02D1198:271b-6: de la bam ser po las skyes pa'i ser mo
T02D1198:271b-7: lang tsho gsar pa rgyan dang gos kyis brgyan pa
T02D1198:271b-8: / 'bras so ba'i snye ma dang rin po che
T02D1198:271b-9: sna tshogs kyi char 'bab pa'i bum pa phyag g-yon
T02D1198:271b-10: / na ste / g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa /
T02D1198:271b-11: zla ba la gnas pa rdo rje skyil krung can /
T02D1198:271b-12: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi cod pan snying gar rang gi sa bon yod pa'i nor rgyun ma'o //
T02D1198:271b-13: tsum dkar po'i sa bon las skyes pa dkar mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1198:271b-14: rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa /
T02D1198:271b-17: g-yon pas po ti dang bcas pa'i padma 'dzin pa /
T02D1198:271b-18: phyag dag gis lhung bzed 'dzin pa /
T02D1198:271b-19: zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa skul byed ma'o //
T02D1198:271b-20: bhrim ser po'i sa bon las skyes pa ser mo spyan gsum pa /
T02D1198:271b-21: lang tsho gsar pa can ral pa'i cod pan can /
T02D1198:271b-23: snang ba mtha' yas kyis rgyas btab pa /
T02D1198:271b-25: g-yas pas mchog sbyin dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa /
T02D1198:271b-26: g-yon dbyu gu gsum pa dang ril ba chung ngu 'dzin pa /
T02D1198:271b-27: zla ba'i gdan can khro gnyer can no //
T02D1198:271b-28: de bzhin du mam gyi sa bon las skyes pa
T02D1198:271b-29: ljang gu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyag dag
T02D1198:271b-30: gis sgeg pas me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje
T02D1198:271b-32: sgeg pa dang bcas par dbu g-yon gyi char cung zad 'dud pa can /
T02D1198:271b-33: zla ba la gnas pa don yod grub pas rgyas btab pa'o ;
T02D1198:271b-34: / nam mkha' ste stong pa gang gi dbus yin
T02D1198:271b-35: pa de dril bu'i gzugs te 'dod pa'i khams so
T02D1198:271b-36: // dril bu'i steng du 'og tu kha phyogs pa'i
T02D1198:271b-37: padma rgyas pa rab byung ba'i ngo bo gzugs khams
T02D1198:271b-38: // so // padmas bskor ba'i steng du gzugs med srid pa'i phyogs gzugs med pa'i khams te ;
T02D1198:271b-39: de ru shes rab bdud rtsi'i bum pa ste /
T02D1198:271b-40: padmas bskor ba'i steng du ri mo gsum gyis bum pa'i rnam par dbyibs bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:271b-41: ye shes te shes rab ye shes kho na bdud rtsi ste /
T02D1198:272a-0: bum pa'i rnam pa de'i dbus su shes rab bdud rtsi gnas su yid @272a * //
T02D1198:272a-1: kyis mos par bya ba ni yid can te /
T02D1198:272a-2: bum pa'i dbus su shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D1198:272a-3: phyin ma'i lus su mos par bya zhing bum pa'i
T02D1198:272a-4: steng du ni zhal kho na blta bar bya ste
T02D1198:272a-5: / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma kho
T02D1198:272a-6: na chos thams cad kyi sgo yang dag pa ji
T02D1198:272a-7: lta ba'i rang gi ngo bo ston pa'i thabs so
T02D1198:272a-9: shes rab kyi zhal gyi steng du ske rags kyi skud pa la gnas pa'i padma ste /
T02D1198:272a-10: de'i steng du zla ba la gnas pa'i snga ma lta bu'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1198:272a-11: dril bu'i dbus su zur brgyad pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1198:272a-12: dbyug pa ste lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes gsal
T02D1198:272a-13: bar byed pa'o // de yang rang gi dang kho
T02D1198:272a-14: nas bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin can gyi rnal
T02D1198:272a-15: 'byor ba'i dngos po rnams thams cad spro ba dang
T02D1198:272a-16: sdud pa dag byed do zhes pas dbyug pa yang
T02D1198:272a-17: de ltar tha snyad du bya ste sgra spro ba
T02D1198:272a-18: dang sdud pa'i cha las so //
T02D1198:272a-19: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1198:272a-20: bskyod par bya zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:272a-21: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1198:272a-22: a'a la zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:272a-23: a'a li ni rdo rje ste /
T02D1198:272a-24: de'i k'a li dril bu chos 'byung ngo /
T02D1198:272a-25: de la rtsa brgyad kyi phyogs rnams su bde ba
T02D1198:272a-26: rab tu rtogs pa'i ched du rab tu sbyor bar
T02D1198:272a-27: ji ltar 'gyur ba de ltar rdo rje g-yas kyi
T02D1198:272a-28: rgan po dang / ming med dag gis dang dril
T02D1198:272a-29: bu g-yon pa dag gis bsdams nas dril bu'i nang
T02D1198:272a-30: gi phyogs brgyad rnams su lce bskyod cing dkrol bar
T02D1198:272a-32: de nyid kyi phyir nang gi rtsa brgyad bskyod pa mtshon pa'i don du lce zur brgyad pa ste /
T02D1198:272a-33: de ltar rdo rje'i lte ba yang cha brgyad pa'o //
T02D1198:272a-34: lcags kyi lce gang du 'phyang ba de ni mkha' 'gro gdong mtshan pa'o //
T02D1198:272a-36: a'a li zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:272a-37: a'a li shes rab dang k'a li thabs te /
T02D1198:272a-39: de dag rab sbyor bas te /
T02D1198:272a-40: phan tshun rjes su 'gro bas 'khor ba gcod do //
T02D1198:272a-41: gang gi phyir dril bu shes rab la nye bar 'gro'o zhes pas thabs te rdo rje'o //
T02D1198:272a-42: rdo rje shes rab nye bar 'gro'o zhes pa thabs ni dril bu'o //
T02D1198:272a-43: de dag dus gcig tu 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1198:272a-45: dbus ni dbus su ste chang zungs su'o //
T02D1198:272a-47: lag pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:272a-48: padma'i bskor ba ni rab tu grags so //
T02D1198:272b-0: mngon par 'dod @272b pa'i dngos grub la nye bar 'gro'o zhes pa thabs te lha'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1198:272b-1: lag pa g-yas par nyi ma ste /
T02D1198:272b-2: g-yon par zla ba bsam zhing rdo rje dang dril bu yang gzung bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:272b-3: byang du zhes pa ni shar la sogs pa rnams nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D1198:272b-4: sgro 'dogs pa ni lhag par mos pa'o ;
T02D1198:272b-5: / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje
T02D1198:272b-6: sems dpa' mnyes par bya'o zhes lhag par mos pas
T02D1198:272b-7: h'um yig brjod pa sngon du 'gro bar /
T02D1198:272b-8: mdzes pa zhes pa la sogs pa glog cing rdo rje gsor bar bya'o //
T02D1198:272b-9: rdo rje gsor ba mdzes pa yis //
T02D1198:272b-11: gang las sems can rnams rnam par thar par byed
T02D1198:272b-12: rnam par dag par byed do zhes pa rnam thar
T02D1198:272b-14: gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i chos stong pa nyid de /
T02D1198:272b-15: de kho nas rnam thar rnam par rtog pa rnams mtha' dag nye bar zhi ba ste /
T02D1198:272b-16: des bya ba thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1198:272b-17: de slar yang mtho ba nyid de ;
T02D1198:272b-18: rdo rje sems dpa'o zhes mnyes bzhin par brjod par bya'o //
T02D1198:272b-19: gang gi phyir rdo rje gsor ba 'di ni /
T02D1198:272b-20: rdo rje stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med
T02D1198:272b-21: pa'i ngo bo'i byang chub sems ni khyod kyi gzugs
T02D1198:272b-22: brnyan te rnal 'byor pa'i lhag par mos pa tsam
T02D1198:272b-24: brjod pa yang h'um gsum gyi sku dang gsung dang
T02D1198:272b-25: thugs rnams phan tshun dbyer med pa rtogs par byed
T02D1198:272b-26: cing / ho: gsum gyis chung ngu dang 'bring dang
T02D1198:272b-27: chen po'i sems can grol bar byed pa nyid kyis
T02D1198:272b-28: na yang dag par sad par byed do //
T02D1198:272b-29: dril bus sgra byed pa yang shes rab dang thabs
T02D1198:272b-30: su lhag par mos pas shes rab dang thabs kyi
T02D1198:272b-31: ngo bo nyid dang lha'i ngo bo nyid du yang
T02D1198:272b-32: gzhan rnams la bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:272b-33: shes rab ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:272b-34: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid zla ba dang /
T02D1198:272b-35: nyi ma ldan pa'i lag pa dag gis 'gro ba rnams kyi nad de /
T02D1198:272b-36: nad rnams ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:272b-37: nye bar zhi bar gyis zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1198:272b-38: aom badzra zhes pa la sogs pa dril bu dkrol ba'i sngags so //
T02D1198:272b-39: aom sarba zhes pa la sogs pa rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i sngags so //
T02D1198:272b-40: shes rab thabs kyis dkrol ba yis //
T02D1198:272b-41: zhes pa rgyas par ston pa shes rab ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:273a-1: sems kyi ngo bos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
T02D1198:273a-2: bskyed pa'i ched du 'gro'o zhes pa 'gro ba ste
T02D1198:273a-4: sogs pas snod kyang rtogs par bya'o zhes sgra bsgrags so //
T02D1198:273a-5: sems can zhes pa sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas
T02D1198:273a-6: don du zhes pa sangs rgyas nyid kyi don du'o
T02D1198:273a-7: // de ltar rdo rje thugs dang dril bu skur
T02D1198:273a-8: dang de'i sgra gsung ngo zhes gsum po byang chub
T02D1198:273a-9: kyi sems kho nar rtogs par bya'o zhes nye bar
T02D1198:273a-10: // bsdu ba / rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:273a-11: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ni kye rnal 'byor pa'o //

T02D1198:279a-36: rgyas pa'i dus su de shes bya //

T02D1198:279a-38: rgyas pa'i dus su gal te rlung //
T02D1198:279a-39: nyin phyed nyi mar son par 'bab //

T02D1198:279b-0: de tshe 'chi bas mtshon par @279b bya ;
T02D1198:279b-1: / nyin mo gcig dang nyin mtshan gcig / nyin mo gnyis gsum bzhi 'bab na //

T02D1198:279b-8: gnyis pa la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag gi lhag

T02D1198:279b-16: mi 'chad par rgyu ba de'i tshe lo gsum gyis

T02D1198:280b-9: zla ba sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyis zla ba thog ma'i dang po'i zhag gcig 'bab bo //

T02D1198:281a-8: gsum rnams su nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang nyid shu
T02D1198:281a-9: rtsa dgu dang sum cu rgyu'o //

T02D1198:281a-11: lhag ma rnams dang lhan cig bcu gcig par song
T02D1198:281a-12: nas gsum rnams su sum cu rtsa gnyis dang sum
T02D1198:281a-13: cu rtsa gsum rnams rgyu ste /
T02D1198:281a-14: de ltar nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum rnams kyis zla ba gsum 'dor ro //
T02D1198:281a-15: bcu gnyis par zhugs nas thog ma'i rtsa la ma
T02D1198:281a-16: bab pa'i nyin zhag gsum gyis nyin zhag gnyis 'bab
T02D1198:281a-17: po // lte ba la nyin zhag gcig go zhes pa zla ba'i 'chi ltas so //
T02D1198:281a-18: 'dir gal te mngal nas skyes pa'i dang por byis
T02D1198:281a-19: pa la sogs pa la nyin zhag gcig gam nyin
T02D1198:281a-20: zhag gnyis la sogs pa rnams 'bab pa de'i tshe
T02D1198:281a-22: lugs las bzlog pas tshe'i nyin zhag rnams 'dor ro zhes shes par bya ste /
T02D1198:281a-23: nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'chi ltas dag la'o //
T02D1198:281a-24: dus tshod kyi skad cig gang la rlung gi 'gro
T02D1198:281a-25: ba gzhan 'jug pa'i dus tshod kyi skad cig de
T02D1198:281a-26: rdzogs pa na 'chi ba ste 'di la the tshom
T02D1198:281a-27: med do // de ltar nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyis
T02D1198:281a-28: sam zla ba'i 'chi ltas kyis khyim bcu gnyis 'dor
T02D1198:281a-29: ba las rnam par shes pa yang dbugs kyi 'khor

T02D1198:281a-32: cig dri zas bar med par ram rnam pa gzhan

T02D1198:281a-35: 'chi ba ni skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyun gyis rnam
T02D1198:281a-36: par shes pa dang dbang po dang tshe 'gag pa'o
T02D1198:281a-37: // de kho na mtshan rtags nges pa rnams kyis
T02D1198:281a-38: shes nas 'pho ba'i don du rnal 'byor brtsam par
T02D1198:281a-39: // bya'o // rnal 'byor brjod pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:281a-40: nyon zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:281b-0: @281b rnal 'byor ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dag gcig pa nyid de /
T02D1198:281b-1: de'i bdag nyid kyis bsgrub bya'i khyad par las lha'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
T02D1198:281b-2: mnyam nyid ni ro gcig pa nyid de /
T02D1198:281b-3: sems zhes pa khams bco brgyad kyi ngo bo thog
T02D1198:281b-4: mar gsungs pa'i chos rnams thams cad nye bar mtshon
T02D1198:281b-5: pa'o // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1198:281b-6: sngar gyi mtshan nyid thams cad las //
T02D1198:281b-8: mnyam pa nyid 'di'i sgrub par byed pa'i rim pa gsungs pa /
T02D1198:281b-9: snying gar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:281b-10: sangs rgyas lnga'i sa bon ni h'um 'od zer dmar po can no //
T02D1198:281b-11: de ni des bkug pa'i lha mo'o //
T02D1198:281b-12: ji srid du gzugs la sogs pa thams cad du stong pa nyid kyi rjes thogs su'o //
T02D1198:281b-13: h'um zhes pa ni sa bon gzhan nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1198:281b-14: dbugs mi g-yo ba nyid ci ltar zhe na /
T02D1198:281b-15: dgang bya zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:281b-16: h'um sum yum yum kshum sm+r+yum hm+r+yum ym+r+yum kshm+r+yum zhes pa sgo dgu rnams su'o //
T02D1198:281b-17: snying gar ni h'um zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:281b-19: h'um sum yum sm+r+yum hm+r+yum ym+r+yum kshm+r+yum zhes pa go cha'i sa bon brgyad rnams so //
T02D1198:281b-21: a'a li zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:281b-22: ji bzhin zhes pa ji ltar rigs par ro //
T02D1198:281b-23: sa bon ldan ni sa bon dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1198:281b-25: gal te yang sngar kha dog sna tshogs rnams brjod mod /
T02D1198:281b-26: de lta na yang 'dir sa bon rnams thams cad dkar po 'od zer dkar po can rnams so //
T02D1198:281b-27: snying ga'i sa bon mdor bstan pa /
T02D1198:281b-28: chu shing zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:281b-29: snying gar padma chu shing me tog bzhin cung zad kha bye ba 'og tu kha phyogs pa ste /
T02D1198:281b-30: de'i dbus su sgong skyes so //
T02D1198:281b-31: de yang ye shes rlung la zhon pa h'um ngo //
T02D1198:281b-32: rnam shes ni yum yum hi ka ces pa'o //
T02D1198:281b-33: dngos po ni 'byung bas na ste khams bco brgyad kyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1198:281b-34: de'i dngos po ni rang bzhin te /
T02D1198:281b-35: rang bzhin med pa nyid mnyam pa nyid do //
T02D1198:281b-36: stong pa nyid dang snying rje zung du 'jug pa
T02D1198:281b-37: 'di thams cad bsgom par bya zhes pa'i don to
T02D1198:281b-38: // de las phyi rol te gzhan rnal 'byor rnam shes 'phrog pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1198:281b-39: phyogs kyi khyim rnams ni steng dang 'og gi gnas rnams so //
T02D1198:281b-40: de rnams su sems par byed do zhes sems te rlung rnams so //
T02D1198:282a-0: de rnams kyi dgang ba dang bum pa can dang zhi byed rnams kyis sdud pas gang @282a * //
T02D1198:282a-1: lte ba'i 'og tu sor bzhi dor nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1198:282a-2: de yi sems kyis bzlas pa bya //
T02D1198:282a-4: phyogs gnyis gnas zhes pa 'don pa la yang gnyis
T02D1198:282a-5: dag tu steng du 'og tu zhes 'don te kho
T02D1198:282a-6: na'o // de yi steng rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dbus su me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1198:282a-7: de'i steng du dbus su lte ba la nyi ma rtul lo //
T02D1198:282a-8: de ru a'a li'i gtso bo aam sa bon te n'a da'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1198:282a-9: k'a li ldan pa'i sa bon ni h'um ste snying gar ro //
T02D1198:282a-10: de kho na ni aam gi sa bon te kha dog dmar po'o //
T02D1198:282a-11: sems kyi rgyal po zhon pa'i phyir khyogs dang 'dra
T02D1198:282a-12: bas khyogs te steng du rjes su 'gro ba'i rlung
T02D1198:282a-13: ngo // 'khyer bar byed do zhes pa 'khyer ba kho na 'khyer byed de 'og tu 'jug pa'o //
T02D1198:282a-14: de dag gis goms par bya'o //
T02D1198:282a-15: de la khyogs kyis bsnun bzhin pa ni snying ga'i
T02D1198:282a-16: h'um gi sa bon 'khor dang bcas pa mgo bo
T02D1198:282a-18: de'i rjes su khyer byed kyis de nas snying ga ji srid par tshur 'dren no //
T02D1198:282a-19: de ltar k'a sh'i'i me tog bzhin 'dren pa dang
T02D1198:282a-20: tshur 'dren pa ni rnam par shes pa khyer bar
T02D1198:282a-21: byed pa'o // khyogs kyi khyogs ni gyen du bskyod pa ste /
T02D1198:282a-22: du la 'degs pa la'o zhes byings so //
T02D1198:282a-23: des khyogs kyi rjes thogs su khyer byed kyang bzlas
T02D1198:282a-24: pas dbang du byas nas rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid
T02D1198:282a-25: kyi lus las phyi rol du yang goms par bya'o

T02D1198:282a-27: khyogs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:282a-28: 'degs pa ni khyogs te snying gnas phyi rol du 'dren pa'o //
T02D1198:282a-29: de kho na mtshan nyid de /
T02D1198:282a-30: des mtshon bya rlung la sogs pa'i'o //
T02D1198:282a-31: khyer ba ni khyer byed de snying ga ji srid par 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1198:282a-32: de kho na mtshan nyid de bsam par bya'o //
T02D1198:282a-33: de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa rnam g-yeng med par
T02D1198:282a-34: ji ltar 'gyur ba de ltar yang dang yang du
T02D1198:282a-35: goms pas / khyogs dang khyer byed kyi ting nge
T02D1198:282a-36: 'dzin las mnyam pa nyid du ro gcig pa nyid
T02D1198:282a-37: rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba nyid 'grub 'gyur te
T02D1198:282a-38: goms pas / / rlung dang rnam par shes pa
T02D1198:282a-39: dag gi de kho na nyid ro mnyam pa nyid
T02D1198:282a-40: goms pas / / dang / de bsgom pa rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba 'grub bo //
T02D1198:282a-41: de ltar gyur pa na yang de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:282a-42: sgrub pa po'i lus las phyi rol du gyur pa /
T02D1198:282a-43: rnam par shes pa srid pa bar do la sogs

T02D1198:288b-17: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyi //
T02D1198:288b-18: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag gis mchod //
T02D1198:288b-19: bdag gis rgyal ba rnams mchod las //
T02D1198:288b-20: grangs med gsum pa 'das par gyur //
T02D1198:288b-22: / ji srid rjes mthun zhes pa /
T02D1198:288b-23: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum rnams su yang byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis /
T02D1198:288b-24: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams spyad cing rim gyis rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1198:288b-25: de'i rjes su byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don
T02D1198:288b-26: du dga' ldan pa rnams su 'khrungs par gyur to
T02D1198:288b-27: // de nas dam pa tog dkar po zhes bya
T02D1198:288b-28: ba 'dis rigs dang yul dang dus dang rus dang
T02D1198:288b-30: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams la lan gsum rjes su bsgrags nas /
T02D1198:288b-31: nam gyi gung thun la glang po che'i rgyal po'i
T02D1198:288b-32: gzugs su nges par bstan pas lha mo sgyu 'phrul
T02D1198:288b-33: chen mo'i lhums su zhugs so zhes pa 'bab pa'o
T02D1198:288b-34: // de nas zla ba bcu rnams 'das pa dang /
T02D1198:288b-35: lha mo las lu mbi n'i'i tshal du mtshan mo'i gung thun la bltams te /
T02D1198:288b-36: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D1198:288b-37: 'od dang snang ba chen pos gsal par byas shing
T02D1198:288b-38: / sa gzhi yang rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g-yos //
T02D1198:288b-39: lha rnams kyis kyang bar snang las rnam pa sna
T02D1198:288b-40: tshogs pa'i gos dang gdugs dang rnga yab dang me
T02D1198:288b-41: tog dang tsandan la sogs pa rnams kyis gtor ro
T02D1198:289a-0: // byang chub sems dpa' yang mngal gyi dri mas ma gos pa nor bu bzhin @289a * //
T02D1198:289a-1: du dang ba'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
T02D1198:289a-2: cu rtsa gnyis rnams dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad
T02D1198:289a-3: cus brgyan par 'khrungs so zhes pa skye ba rnam
T02D1198:289a-4: par dag pa'o // de nas gzhon nu'o rol rtsed
T02D1198:289a-5: nye bar bstan nas grags 'dzin ma dangs skyong ma
T02D1198:289a-6: la sogs pa bud med stong phrag drug cu'i btsun
T02D1198:289a-8: 'di skyes bu min pas rab tu byung ngo zhes
T02D1198:289a-9: smod pa yongs su spang ba'i ched du lha mo
T02D1198:289a-10: grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig yongs su rgyu ba
T02D1198:289a-11: mdzad do // de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa
T02D1198:289a-12: la sogs pa lha rnams kyis spro bar byas pa
T02D1198:289a-13: mdzad do // / 'dun pa dang lhan cig rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan la chibs te /
T02D1198:289a-14: 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i
T02D1198:289a-15: lha rnams kyis rjes su 'brang bzhin pa rnam pa
T02D1198:289a-16: sna tshogs pa'i gos dang me tog la sogs pa
T02D1198:289a-17: bus mo nub tsam la gshegs shing /
T02D1198:289a-18: dpag tshad bcu gnyis rnams su gshegs so zhes pa khab nas 'byung ba ste /
T02D1198:289a-19: gsal ba ni rab tu grags pa'o //
T02D1198:289a-20: de nas 'dun pa dang bsngags ldan dag bskur nas
T02D1198:289a-21: dbu skra rnams gris bregs te brgya byin la gnang
T02D1198:289a-22: zhing na bza' ngur smrig rnams bsnams te dge slong
T02D1198:289a-23: du gyur pas / chu bo nee ra nydza na'i
T02D1198:289a-24: 'gram du dbugs pa dbyung ba dang dbugs rngub pa
T02D1198:289a-25: bkag pa las mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
T02D1198:289a-26: til gcig re tsam gsol ba'i dka' thub lo drug
T02D1198:289a-27: du gyur pas / spyad de / 'di ni byang
T02D1198:289a-28: chub kyi ched du ba'i lam ma yin no zhes
T02D1198:289a-29: ji ltar bde par dbugs phyung nas sbrang dang 'o
T02D1198:289a-31: bzhugs pa tsam gyis brag ri chen po zhig pa'i
T02D1198:289a-32: rjes thogs su lha rnams kyis nye bar bstan pa'i
T02D1198:289a-33: lam nas / klu'i rgyal po nag pos bstod bzhin
T02D1198:289a-34: byang chub kyi ched du gzigs mo chen pos gshegs
T02D1198:289a-35: lam nas / te / rdo rje gdan gyi sa
T02D1198:289a-36: gzhi la 'dzegs nas byang chub shing gi rtsa bar
T02D1198:289a-37: lam nas / te / / ku sha gser gyi
T02D1198:289a-38: kha dog can ras bal ltar reg bya 'jam pa
T02D1198:289a-40: 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi
T02D1198:289a-41: 'khor can 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug gi bdud
T02D1198:289a-42: byams pa'i mtshon gyis btul te bla na med pa
T02D1198:289a-43: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
T02D1198:289b-0: tshangs pas gsol ba btab @289b pa w'a r'a na s'i ru gshegs te /
T02D1198:289b-1: rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum gsum du bzlas pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro //
T02D1198:289b-2: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas su gshegs nas
T02D1198:289b-3: chos bstan te brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs
T02D1198:289b-4: pa 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod
T02D1198:289b-5: pa'i lha rnams rjes su 'brang bzhin pa grong khyer
T02D1198:289b-7: mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po rab tu bstan te /
T02D1198:289b-8: gzhan mu stegs byed rnams tshad mas tshar bcad cing /
T02D1198:289b-9: ser skya'i gzhi'i nags su seng ge dang 'phrog byed dang dbyig gi snying po dang /
T02D1198:289b-10: gzhon nu dang 'gegs kyi bdag po dang dbang po
T02D1198:289b-11: dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan dang
T02D1198:289b-12: gza' dang rgyu skar dang dpal mo dang rnam thos
T02D1198:289b-13: sras dang yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po dang
T02D1198:289b-14: mig mi bzang dang sa dang me dag gshin rje
T02D1198:289b-15: dang chu lha la sogs pa'i lha dang klu dang
T02D1198:289b-16: gnod sbyin dang srin po dang dri za dang lha
T02D1198:289b-17: ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci
T02D1198:289b-18: brgya stong phrag du ma rnams mya ngan las 'das
T02D1198:289b-19: pa dang / so sor ldan pa'i chos bstan pas btul lo //
T02D1198:289b-20: de lta bu la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i gnas rnams su nye bar byon nas /
T02D1198:289b-21: thabs rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis skal pa
T02D1198:289b-22: ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi phung po
T02D1198:289b-23: dpag tu med pa rnams theg pa gsum rnams la
T02D1198:289b-24: btul nas / bde 'gro'i 'bras bu dang thar pa'i byang chub tu yang rab tu bkod do //
T02D1198:289b-25: theg pa chen po la rung ba shes rab rno ba rnams kyi dbang du byas te /
T02D1198:289b-26: rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis dngos
T02D1198:289b-27: grub thams cad kyi dbang phyug nyid nye bar ston
T02D1198:289b-28: cing / rdo rje theg pa bstan to //
T02D1198:289b-29: de la yang mi 'jug pa dbang phyug chen po
T02D1198:289b-30: la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil
T02D1198:289b-31: 'khor du gzhug pa la sogs pas gdul bya'i ched
T02D1198:289b-32: du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i sku
T02D1198:289b-34: 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa'i brtag pa rnams
T02D1198:289b-35: su yang dngos grub chen po'i lhag pa'i bdag po
T02D1198:289b-36: nyid bla na med pa nye bar bstan to //
T02D1198:289b-37: sh'akya thub pa'i skus ni w'a r'a na s'i ru
T02D1198:289b-38: 'phags pa byams pa bla na med pa yang dag
T02D1198:289b-39: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan nas da
T02D1198:289b-40: lta de rgyal tshab nyid du bsgrags so //
T02D1198:290a-1: khab tu bya rgod phung po la 'dzegs te /
T02D1198:290a-2: kun dga' bo ma ga dha'i sa gzhi ni dga' bar 'os pa'i zhes gsungs nas /
T02D1198:290a-3: yangs pa can du yang kun dga' po de bzhin
T02D1198:290a-4: gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rnams bsten
T02D1198:290a-5: pa ste / bzhed na bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i
T02D1198:290a-6: lhag mar gnas so zhes lan gsum bka' stsal te
T02D1198:290a-7: pa ste / / gang kun dga' bo cad mi smra bar dgongs nas /
T02D1198:290a-8: mdo sde la rton pas thams cad 'byung bar bya'i
T02D1198:290a-9: gang zag la rton pas ni ma yin no zhes
T02D1198:290a-10: bslabs te / grong khyer ku sha can du rgyal
T02D1198:290a-11: po chen po bzhi rnams dang brgya byin la bstan
T02D1198:290a-12: bslabs te / pa gtad nas / sems can rnams
T02D1198:290a-13: kyi don gyi ched du rdo rje lha bu'i ting
T02D1198:290a-14: nge 'dzin gyis sku gdung rnams til tsam du bzhag
T02D1198:290a-15: bslabs te / pa gtad nas / te / bsam
T02D1198:290a-16: gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs pas mi g-yo
T02D1198:290a-17: ba'i zhi ba lcogs nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir
T02D1198:290a-18: yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
T02D1198:290a-19: 'tsham pa med pa'i khams gsum pa gzhan rnams su
T02D1198:290a-20: slar yang dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab
T02D1198:290a-21: pa sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i tshogs rab 'byam rnams
T02D1198:290a-22: kyis rgyun mi chad par skye ba la sogs pa
T02D1198:290a-23: ston cing / lus 'dzin rnams la phan pa'i bya
T02D1198:290a-24: ba rnams kyis chos kyi rgyal srid mu mtha' med
T02D1198:290a-25: pas mchog tu rol cing da dung yang yod la
T02D1198:290a-26: ston cing / / bskal pa dpag tu med pa
T02D1198:290a-27: rab 'byam du chos kyi skur slar yang 'di dang
T02D1198:290a-28: gzhan du yang gnas par 'gyur ro zhes pa thams
T02D1198:290a-29: cad la dgongs nas gsungs pa /
T02D1198:290a-30: 'di lta ste zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:290a-31: 'di lta sogs kyis te rnam 'phrul gyi las rnams
T02D1198:290a-32: kyis rab tu 'jug ces snga ma dang 'brel lo
T02D1198:290a-34: 'o na rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi rjes thogs su las
T02D1198:290a-35: rnams yod pa'i phyir dang po yod do zhe na
T02D1198:290a-36: ma yin te / dpag tu med cing thog ma
T02D1198:290a-37: med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi las rnams kyang thog
T02D1198:290a-39: chos kyi sku la ltos pas ni shin tu yang ste /
T02D1198:290a-40: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1198:290a-41: kun zhes pa ste sangs rgyas kun rnams kyi bdag
T02D1198:290a-42: nyid la ste chos nyid la gang rnams sdom pa
T02D1198:290a-43: ste / de'i rang bzhin nyid kyis nang du 'dus pa de rnams ni de skad do //
T02D1198:290b-0: de rnams kyi spro ba dang sdud pa dag kyang de kho @290b na'i'o //
T02D1198:290b-1: gang mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:290b-2: chos kyi sku yi phrin las 'di //
T02D1198:290b-3: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du bzhed //
T02D1198:290b-5: de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ro mnyam par gyur pa'o //
T02D1198:290b-6: de yang dngos po dang dngos med du sgro btags
T02D1198:290b-7: pa dag dang bral pa kho na dang sprul pa
T02D1198:290b-8: nus pa ste / rmongs pa ma yin no //
T02D1198:290b-9: de dag kho na ni rmongs pa ste /
T02D1198:290b-10: de phyir de yongs su ste bag chags dang bcas pa dor bya ste /
T02D1198:290b-11: rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang dkyil 'khor bsgom pas so //
T02D1198:290b-12: de yang sngar rgyas pa dang bcas par gsungs zin cing /
T02D1198:290b-13: sdud pa gsungs pa'i ched du bka' stsal pa /
T02D1198:290b-14: bung ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:290b-15: mi mnyam pa'i bde ba len cing kun nas 'dzin no zhes pas a'a li ste khu ba'o //
T02D1198:290b-16: 'khrul pa 'bral par byed do zhes pa bum pa'o //
T02D1198:290b-17: ci ltar 'khrul pa 'dor bar byed ce na gang
T02D1198:290b-18: gi phyir de rdo rje 'jigs byed bcom ldan 'das
T02D1198:290b-19: te / khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'das 'gyur //
T02D1198:290b-21: rdo rje ni stong pa nyid dang ye shes ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:290b-22: de nyid kyi phyir de ni /
T02D1198:290b-23: ae ste aa yig ma skyes pa la thim mo zhes pa a'a li'o zhes kyang gsung ngo //
T02D1198:290b-24: de nyid kyi phyir 'jigs byed de /
T02D1198:290b-25: byis pa rnams skrag pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:290b-26: gang 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyis gsungs pa /
T02D1198:290b-27: byis pa rnams la 'jigs ston ma //
T02D1198:290b-30: a'a li zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:290b-31: bde pa mur thug par byed 'brel par byed do zhes pa nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa ste /
T02D1198:290b-32: aa ti aa de 'ching ba la skad kyi dbyings so //
T02D1198:290b-34: chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid yin la de
T02D1198:290b-35: gang gi rang gi rang bzhin de kho na nyid
T02D1198:290b-36: du yin pa ste chos can gyis chos nye bar
T02D1198:290b-38: yang na chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin de las skyes pa zhes 'brel lo ;
T02D1198:290b-39: / mtha' dag ni rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i mi rgyu ba rnams so //
T02D1198:290b-40: sdig pa la shin tu spyod do zhes rgyu ba'o //
T02D1198:290b-41: mi spyod do zhes pa mi rgyu ba ste /
T02D1198:290b-42: 'khor ba can gyi lus can rnams so //
T02D1198:290b-43: gsang bar byas na gsang pa shes rab dang thabs
T02D1198:290b-44: kyi rang bzhin gyi de kho na nyid 'dzin par
T02D1198:291a-3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mngon
T02D1198:291a-4: par ma zhen par gzhan gyi don bya ba'i ched
T02D1198:291a-5: du chos kyi dbyings kho na las skye ba zhes
T02D1198:291a-6: pa'i don to // gsangs ba nges 'dzin zhes 'don pa la yang don 'di ltar ro //
T02D1198:291a-7: de ltar de kho na nyid mi shes pa'i lus
T02D1198:291a-8: can rnams dang de kho na nyid shes pa rnams
T02D1198:291a-9: kyang byang chub kyi sems kho na las skye'o //
T02D1198:291a-10: des kyang skyes zin pa rnams phung po la sogs
T02D1198:291a-11: pa rnams bdud rtsis dga' bar byed pa nyid kyi
T02D1198:291a-12: phyir te / thams cad pa ste khyab par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:291a-13: dbang po ste bde ba skyed pa'i dor lhag pa'i bdag po nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:291a-14: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir de
T02D1198:291a-15: thams cad de rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1198:291a-16: su son pa'o // lte ba'i chu skyes kyi rtsa
T02D1198:291a-17: ba'i dbus su ji ltar sbyor ba de ltar goms
T02D1198:291a-19: de'i tshe ci ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1198:291a-20: 'jigs byed rdo rje dang sgra zhes pa yang dag sdud pa ste /
T02D1198:291a-21: de dang ro gcig tu gyur pas so //
T02D1198:291a-22: de yang gang las she na /
T02D1198:291a-23: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du gtum mo gsum rnams gang yang rung bas sbyor ba ste /
T02D1198:291a-24: de kho na phyag rgya yin zhing de goms pa las so //
T02D1198:291a-25: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1198:291a-26: rlung dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:291a-29: bdun nyid ni de kho na nyid du chos dang
T02D1198:291a-30: chos can dag tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1198:291a-31: / khams bdun pa khu ba ste de'o //
T02D1198:291a-32: rdo rje ma ni rdo rje phag mo'i //
T02D1198:291a-33: de'i sa bon rdul des so //
T02D1198:291a-34: thig le ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i khams bdun pa'o //
T02D1198:291a-35: sgra tsam ni lte bar gnas pa'i rdul gyi ri mo'o //
T02D1198:291a-36: de dag gi yang dag mnan pa ni phan tshun
T02D1198:291a-37: ro mnyam pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur ba de
T02D1198:291a-38: ltar gyur na byang chub sems te rgyun gyis char
T02D1198:291a-39: 'bebs te / skye gnas kyi padmar ro ;
T02D1198:291a-40: / bshad pa gzhan ni bcu bar bshad zin to //
T02D1198:291a-42: dbyangs zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:291a-43: dbyangs rnams kyi sngon ma aa yig dang por ma'i
T02D1198:291a-44: mngal du skye ba'i sa bon ni gang rdul gyi
T02D1198:291a-45: dbus su gnas pa na bu rgyud kyi skye /
T02D1198:291b-0: de gang du yin pa de'i ste lte ba'i chu @291b skyes kyi dbus su'o //
T02D1198:291b-1: de la kam bde ba kun nas myong ngo zhes pa k'a li'o //
T02D1198:291b-2: skye gnas kyi chu skyes 'dis rgyas par byed do zhes pa me tog ste rdul lo //
T02D1198:291b-3: rang gi gnas su drangs nas byang chub kyi sems
T02D1198:291b-4: 'tshed par byed do zhes pa rgyal po ste des
T02D1198:291b-6: me tog khyad par du len no zhes pa me tog lus can khu ba'i khams so //
T02D1198:291b-7: des khyad par du byas pa'i rdo rje can ni sems kyi rdo rje ste de gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1198:291b-8: ji ltar skye ba 'dzin pa'i gnas skabs su sems
T02D1198:291b-9: kyi rdo rje sgra gcan ni zla ba kho na
T02D1198:291b-10: la 'jug ste / 'od zer bsil ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:291b-11: zla ba ni nyi ma la zhugs pa na nyi
T02D1198:291b-12: ma bzung ngo zhes pa phyi rol gyi bzhin du
T02D1198:291b-13: nye bar sgrogs pa de ltar dbus mi'i gnas skabs
T02D1198:291b-14: su yang ngo // 'di yang rlung la sogs pa'i
T02D1198:291b-15: sgom pa'i rim par sngar rgyas par byas so zhes
T02D1198:291b-17: sems skye ba yang zla ba dang nyi ma dag
T02D1198:291b-18: la brten nas so zhes zhar las byung ba ston
T02D1198:291b-19: pa / 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:291b-20: thams cad ni yongs su ma dag pa rnams dang yongs su dag pa rnams so //
T02D1198:291b-21: gnyis ka'i rten can skye ba na yang rdul ma dang khu ba pha ste /
T02D1198:291b-22: de'i sgo nas padma dang rdo rje dag dang bud
T02D1198:291b-23: med dang skyes pa dag ma dang pha dag go
T02D1198:291b-24: zhes rnam par gzhag pa'o zhes pa ji ltar rigs
T02D1198:291b-26: 'dir ni ma'i zhes pa rdul te khu ba'i bdag nyid pha nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1198:291b-27: sa kun du ste 'gro ba'i dbye ba rnams su'o //
T02D1198:291b-28: ye shes ni bde ba nyams su myong ba'o //
T02D1198:291b-29: de kho na ni chu ste gdung ba zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:291b-30: de phal che bar brten pa'i phyir dang shes rab la sogs pa dang sbyor ba'i phyir rgya mtsho'o //
T02D1198:291b-31: 'di ni ma dang pha yang ngo //

T02D1198:296a-36: nyid kyang dngos po thams cad rnam par dag par
