T02D1198:305a-0: de yang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos @305a * //
T02D1198:305a-1: grub kyi'o zhes mngon par dgongs pa'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1198:305a-2: de ltar yang dang por rnam pa'i 'di lta bur kho bos phye zin to //
T02D1198:305a-3: gnyis med ni rnam g-yeng mtha' dag so sor spangs pa bsgom par bya ba la /
T02D1198:305a-5: spro bar bcas ni brtson 'grus mchog dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02D1198:305a-6: tshig gi don gnyis po 'di'i yul nyid kyis tshig
T02D1198:305a-7: phyi ma gnyis kyi shes rab dang snying rje'i rnal
T02D1198:305a-9: snying rjes ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul
T02D1198:305a-10: gyi rnam pa rnams kyis sems can gyi don mthun
T02D1198:305a-11: gyi sgrib pa'i dgra po spang ba'i ched du dang
T02D1198:305a-12: / sbyin pa la sogs pas tshim par bya ba'i ched du go gyon no //
T02D1198:305a-13: de ltar rim pa gnyis kyis kyang /
T02D1198:305a-14: shes rab mas 'grub pa'o zhes gsungs pa /
T02D1198:305a-15: gang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:305a-16: phyag rgya rnams kyi mchog la sogs pa nyid ni /
T02D1198:305a-18: cho gas shes pa lha mo'i rang bzhin du /
T02D1198:305a-19: bsgom pa la sogs pa dang byed pa'i khyad par rnams kyis dang /
T02D1198:305a-20: sor mo bskyod pa la sogs pas kyang /
T02D1198:305a-21: ji ltar rigs par 'dus bya ste /
T02D1198:305a-22: bde ba chen po nyams su myong ba'i ched du'o //
T02D1198:305a-23: 'o na 'dir ma phyag rgya nyid du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:305a-24: ci ltar te de ni nye bar longs spyad zin pas so //
T02D1198:305a-26: dam pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:305a-27: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes pas /
T02D1198:305a-28: de kho na yud kyi sa bde ba dam pa 'char ro //
T02D1198:305a-29: de nyid kyi phyir de gsal bar bya ba'i ched du bde ba chen po'i tshig go //
T02D1198:305a-30: zhe sdang bdag nyid gdol pa mo //
T02D1198:305a-31: zhes pa 'dis rigs nges par rtogs pa yang dang
T02D1198:305a-32: po pa'i lhag par mos pa la ltos pa kho
T02D1198:305a-33: na ste / rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor
T02D1198:305a-34: pa ni ma yin no zhes bsgrubs so zhes 'od
T02D1198:305a-36: de nyid kyi phyi phyag rgya chen po thig ler gsungs pa /
T02D1198:305a-37: gdol mo padma'i rigs las skyes //
T02D1198:305a-38: chos ma rigs chen las skyes bshad //
T02D1198:305a-39: g-yung mo rdo rje'i rigs nyid dang //
T02D1198:305a-40: gar ma las kyi rigs de bzhin //
T02D1198:305a-41: thod pa ma ni 'khor lo'i rigs //
T02D1198:305a-42: lnga po 'di rnams lus dag pa //
T02D1198:305b-0: @305b bud med ni gdol ba'i bud med dam /
T02D1198:305b-4: lha mo'i khyad par gyi ngo bo nyid du brjod pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:305b-5: spyan ma dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:305b-7: gser gyi mdog can spyan gsum pa /
T02D1198:305b-9: dril bu dang lcags kyu dang /
T02D1198:305b-12: rin po che dang ral gri dang /
T02D1198:305b-13: mda' 'dren pa lhur len pa can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1198:305b-14: thod pa'i dbu rgyan mtho ba /
T02D1198:305b-16: zla ba'i dbus su son par rnam par shes par bya'o //
T02D1198:305b-17: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyis /
T02D1198:305b-18: rang gi shes rab ni rim pa ji lta bar /
T02D1198:305b-19: spyan ma la sogs pa'i ngo bo rnams su rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1198:305b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di rnams kyang rdo rje sems
T02D1198:305b-21: dpa' dang bcas pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba rnams
T02D1198:305b-22: te / 'di rnams kyi yang khyad par dang ldan pa'i ming bshad pa ni /
T02D1198:305b-23: gzugs kyi khyad par gsal bar bya'i don du ste /
T02D1198:305b-24: gtsug tor gyi gnas lta bu nyid kyi rigs kyi
T02D1198:305b-25: bdag po'i dngos po gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D1198:305b-26: // 'di rnams kyang dkyil 'khor ba nyid du /
T02D1198:305b-27: ji ltar rigs par gsungs pa yod na yang /
T02D1198:305b-28: dkyil 'khor gyi lhag pa'i bdag po'i dngos por yang rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1198:305b-29: ji skad du 'dus pa phyi mar gsungs pa /
T02D1198:305b-30: 'khor los sgyur drug rgyal po yis //
T02D1198:305b-31: gtsug tor zhes pa rnam par spros //
T02D1198:305b-33: 'o na ji ltar phyi rol gyi phyag rgya kho na dang lhan cig dngos grub yin /
T02D1198:305b-34: ci ltar yang rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa tha mi dad pa las /
T02D1198:305b-35: 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs rnam par snad
T02D1198:305b-36: mdzad la sogs pa rnams tha dad pa yin zhe
T02D1198:305b-38: sems kyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so //
T02D1198:305b-39: zhes sems te bde ba chen po skye ba la /
T02D1198:305b-40: 'di kho na 'dis sbyar bar bya'o zhes pas sbyor ba ni phyag rgya ste /
T02D1198:305b-41: rgyu nyid du yang dag par rtogs nas /
T02D1198:305b-42: thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyis gsungs so //
T02D1198:305b-43: de'i phyir tshad mas rab tu grub pa'i rgyu dang /
T02D1198:305b-44: 'bras bu'i dngos po'i bye brag la the tshom ga la yod /
T02D1198:306a-1: pa la sogs pa'i gzugs tha dad na yang /
T02D1198:306a-2: sems kyis sbyor ba rnams te /
T02D1198:306a-5: rgyags pas kha dog tha dad de //
T02D1198:306a-6: zhes pa la sogs pa sngar rnam par bye zin to //
T02D1198:306a-7: de nyid kyi phyir bsgre ba ston pa /
T02D1198:306a-9: /'di yis ni sems kyis sbyor bas so //
T02D1198:306a-10: khro bo rnams ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs can rnams dang mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1198:306a-11: cho ga ni nyams kyis spro ba'i khyad par gyis rjes su bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1198:306a-12: bde ba'i bsgrub pa zhes pa bde ba chen po'i sgrub byed de /
T02D1198:306a-13: nye bar mtshon pa las bsnyen pa la sogs pa yang ngo //
T02D1198:306a-14: yang 'dir bsnyen pa la sogs pa ci 'drar blta zhe na /
T02D1198:306a-15: gang 'dra ba ni 'dus pa phyi mar te /
T02D1198:306a-16: bsgrub bya sgrub byed yang dag sbyor //
T02D1198:306a-17: gang de bsnyen pa zhes par brjod //
T02D1198:306a-18: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1198:306a-19: nye ba'i bsgrub par brjod par bya //
T02D1198:306a-20: bsgrub pa bskyod par rab bshad de //
T02D1198:306a-21: h'um phat yi ge yang dag ldan //
T02D1198:306a-22: rang bzhin rang gi bde zhi ba //
T02D1198:306a-23: bsgrub pa chen por brjod par bya //
T02D1198:306a-25: bsgrub bya sgrub byed yang dag sbyor ni rig ma la 'khyud pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:306a-26: de ltar mthar thug pa na 'jug pa'i yan lag bzhi po thabs su gyur pa rnams kyis /
T02D1198:306a-27: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhag pa'i bdag po dpal dang ldan pa /
T02D1198:306a-28: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i go 'phang thabs las byung ba /
T02D1198:306a-29: sangs rgyas rnams thams cad kyi chos rnams kyi chos
T02D1198:306a-30: nyid de kho na'o zhes 'dis thabs byung gsungs so
T02D1198:306a-32: zla ba drug tu rig ma'i brtul zhugs spyad nas
T02D1198:306a-33: nyin mo bdun rang gi lha blta ba byas te
T02D1198:306a-34: / sbyor ba rab tu gyur par shes shing /
T02D1198:306a-35: gang gi tshe nyin mtshan du mar me'i 'od kyi
T02D1198:306a-36: rgyun bzhin du rtag tu de kho na nyid kyi
T02D1198:306a-37: rnal 'byor la mngon du phyogs par nus pa de'i
T02D1198:306a-38: tshe / lhan cig spyod pa'i phyag rgya dang lhan
T02D1198:306a-39: cig rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams las
T02D1198:306a-40: gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor mngon du byas te
T02D1198:306a-41: tshe / / tho rangs kyi thun nas brtsams la
T02D1198:306a-42: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor khams gsum pa thams
T02D1198:306b-0: cad gcig pa'i rang bzhin mnyam par gzhag @306b pa
T02D1198:306b-1: dang mnyam par ma bzhag par gcig pa'i ngo bor
T02D1198:306b-3: rdo rjes rgyas btab pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D1198:306b-4: ro mnyam pa nyams su myong zhing /
T02D1198:306b-5: mar me'i 'od kyis rgyun lta bur rtag par nyin mtshan thog thag gnas par bya'o //
T02D1198:306b-6: de nas rab kyi mthar thug par son pa'i dga'
T02D1198:306b-7: ba bzhi'i de kho na nyid mngon du byed pa
T02D1198:306b-8: las skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su 'grub ste /
T02D1198:306b-9: sgrub thabs mchog rnams kyis zhes bshad pa'i phyir man
T02D1198:306b-10: ngag ji lta bar phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i
T02D1198:306b-11: nye ba'i nyin zhag la ste /
T02D1198:306b-12: byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i cha mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir /
T02D1198:306b-13: skya rengs shar ba'i dus su shin tu yongs su
T02D1198:306b-14: dag pa'i ye shes bdud rtsi yongs su rdzogs pas
T02D1198:306b-15: phyag rgya chen po grub pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'o
T02D1198:306b-16: zhes pa'o // de nyid kyi phyir mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:306b-17: me tog sogs kyis mchod byas nas //
T02D1198:306b-18: bsam gtan gnas su rab bdugs te //
T02D1198:306b-19: phyag rgya lhan cig rab zhugs la //
T02D1198:306b-20: rdo rje rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam //
T02D1198:306b-21: zla ba nyi ma nub pa na //
T02D1198:306b-22: sbyor ba 'di ni yang dag brtsam //
T02D1198:306b-23: skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su ni //
T02D1198:306b-26: 'di'i don bla ma rnams 'doms par 'gyur te /
T02D1198:306b-27: rdo rje nyi ma zhes klog pa gzhan la yang ngo //
T02D1198:306b-28: shin tu ni bla na med par ro //
T02D1198:306b-29: snying rje'i gzhan dbang nyid las 'di rjes su bsgrub pa'i ched du spro ba bskyed pa gsungs pa /
T02D1198:306b-30: thob nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:306b-31: le lo 'di yang 'di la the tshom dang phyin
T02D1198:306b-32: ci log dag gis tshul gzhan la zhugs pa dang
T02D1198:306b-33: 'dir zhugs pa nyid na yang don ma rtogs pa
T02D1198:306b-34: nyid kyis rmongs pa'am ma zhugs pa'i dbang du byas
T02D1198:306b-35: nas gsungs pa'o // 'dir ji ltar rigs par thob
T02D1198:306b-36: par rung ba nyid kyis na thob nas zhes gsungs
T02D1198:306b-37: nas gsungs pa'o // so // gang du zhes pa bde 'gror ram ngan 'gror ro //
T02D1198:306b-38: mi shes so ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa rnams kyis te /
T02D1198:306b-39: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:306b-41: las dang de yi bag chags dang //
T02D1198:307a-1: pas sangs rgyas las gzhan gyis //
T02D1198:307a-2: rnam pa thams cad mi shes so //
T02D1198:307a-4: legs par zhugs par brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i ngor gsungs pa /
T02D1198:307a-5: 'di ltar zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:307a-7: gang gis sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos rgyud la sogs
T02D1198:307a-8: pa kun shes pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o
T02D1198:307a-9: zhes pa'o // dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02D1198:307a-10: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma sum cu bdun pa'o /
T02D1198:307a-12: // / de ltar phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i rdo
T02D1198:307a-13: rje slob dpon la bsnyen bkur phul du byung ba
T02D1198:307a-15: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:307a-16: gang du ni nyin mor rab gnas su'o //
T02D1198:307a-17: grub pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes so //
T02D1198:307a-18: rig ma lngar gsungs pa'i phyag rgya dang lhan cig
T02D1198:307a-19: ldan pa'i skyes bu ni rig ma'i skyes bu ste
T02D1198:307a-20: / don dam par dbyer med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dang /
T02D1198:307a-21: kun rdzob tu rnam pa'i dbye ba las so //
T02D1198:307a-22: gang gi phyir rdo rje slob dpon ni rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1198:307a-23: don dam par byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo dang /
T02D1198:307a-24: kun rdzob tu rig ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs can no //
T02D1198:307a-25: de skad du yang 'dus pa phyi mar /
T02D1198:307a-26: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
T02D1198:307a-27: dbyer med dbye ba'i dngos po las //
T02D1198:307a-28: rig ma lhan cig yang dag sbyor //
T02D1198:307a-29: rig ma'i skyes bur brjod par bya //
T02D1198:307a-31: 'byor pa ni bsnyen bkur la sogs pa'i dga' ston no //
T02D1198:307a-32: rnam 'gyur drug tu g-yos pa kho na gang du yin pa de ji ltar 'gyur bar ro //
T02D1198:307a-33: 'dir 'gul ba dang g-yo ba dang ldeg pa dang 'ur ba dang /
T02D1198:307a-34: 'khrug pa dang chem pa zhes pa rnam par 'gyur ba drug rnams so //
T02D1198:307a-36: ljon shing rnams thams cad g-yos pa'o //
T02D1198:307a-37: ri bo rnams thams cad ldeg pa'o //
T02D1198:307a-38: lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams 'ur ba'o //
T02D1198:307a-39: rgya mtsho la sogs pa rnams 'khrug pa'o //
T02D1198:307a-40: sprin la sogs pa rnams sgrogs pa'o //
T02D1198:307a-41: 'di rnams kyang so sor dman pa dang bar ma dang mchog rnams so zhes pa bco brgyad do //
T02D1198:307a-42: de la gang gi tshe shar phyogs su ljon shing
T02D1198:307a-43: dang ri la sogs pa rnams 'khrug pa chen por
T02D1198:307b-0: 'gyur ba de'i tshe @307b shar phyogs mtho bar snang
T02D1198:307b-1: ste nub phyogs dma' bar ro //
T02D1198:307b-3: 'ur ro zhes pa 'og tu sgra 'ur 'ur ba'o //
T02D1198:307b-4: gang gis rgya mtsho chen po 'khrug pa de lta
T02D1198:307b-5: bu'i sgra de gang rnams kyi yin pa de rnams
T02D1198:307b-7: phyag rgya'i snying po ni phyag rgya dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:307b-8: khams ni 'dir dbang po ste chung ngu dang bar
T02D1198:307b-9: ma dang rnon po zhes pa rnam pa gsum mo
T02D1198:307b-10: // de ltar khams gsum rnams gang rnams kyi yin
T02D1198:307b-11: pa de rnams ni khams gsum kho na khams gsum
T02D1198:307b-12: pa nyid de sems can rnams so //
T02D1198:307b-13: gang gi tshe gzugs med khams pa gzugs cung zad dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1198:307b-14: chung ba la dgag pa'o zhes 'dod pa dang /
T02D1198:307b-15: gang gi tshe 'di skad du gzugs med pa'i khams
T02D1198:307b-16: par gyur pa dang gzugs khams par 'gyur ba'i sems
T02D1198:307b-17: can rnams / dgos pa'i dbang las 'dod pa'i khams
T02D1198:307b-18: su 'ongs pa na ji ltar thog ma med pa'i
T02D1198:307b-19: bag chags bsal bar gyur pa ltar bud med dang
T02D1198:307b-20: skyes pa'i dbang po can rnams te tshangs ma bzhin
T02D1198:307b-21: dang tshangs pa bzhin zhes 'dod pa /
T02D1198:307b-22: de'i tshe 'dod khams par gyur pa la sogs pa khams gsum pa nyid rnams so //
T02D1198:307b-23: 'dod pa 'di kho na mang po rigs pa rnams gsung ngo ;
T02D1198:307b-24: / tha skar gyi bu dag ni lha'i sman pa dag go //
T02D1198:307b-26: dang ba dang dga' bas cher rol pa'i tshig go //
T02D1198:307b-27: gzhan zhes pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams so //
T02D1198:307b-28: gzhan min dbang sgyur ni 'phrul dga' ba rnams so //
T02D1198:307b-29: bsgrub bya'i bsod nams kyis zhes pa la bsgrub bya ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1198:307b-30: khams gsum rnams su ste ji skad bshad pa rnams su gang mchod pa srid pa'o //
T02D1198:307b-31: bde ba chen po'i dngos grub ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo //
T02D1198:307b-32: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02D1198:307b-33: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma sum cu brgyad pa'o /
T02D1198:307b-35: // / de ltar grub pa'i rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi
T02D1198:307b-36: don la 'jug pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du
T02D1198:307b-37: gsungs pa / grub pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:307b-38: rig pa'i skyes bu ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste /
T02D1198:308a-0: yang dag par sbyor ba nyid kho nar gsal bar gyur pa'i bde @308a * //
T02D1198:308a-2: ma song ba ni chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid de
T02D1198:308a-3: de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro
T02D1198:308a-5: rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid ni gang las kyang 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med do //
T02D1198:308a-6: gang de de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes so //
T02D1198:308a-7: 'dis ni don dam par chos kyi sku bya ba med pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
T02D1198:308a-8: ma yin pa kho na zhes pa rten dang brten pa dgag pa yang ngo //
T02D1198:308a-9: gang gi phyir dang po skye ba dang mtha' 'gog pa dang dbus gnas pa ste /
T02D1198:308a-10: de rnams 'di la don dam par med pa'o //
T02D1198:308a-11: gang gi phyir gnyis med pa ste spros pa med
T02D1198:308a-12: pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings
T02D1198:308a-13: kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1198:308a-14: srid pa gsum rnams ni 'dod pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1198:308a-15: khams rnams te phyogs so sor dpag tu med pa
T02D1198:308a-16: snang bar byed do zhes pas de skad de me
T02D1198:308a-17: long ye shes kyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1198:308a-18: snang bar byed pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yid
T02D1198:308a-19: kyi blo bzhin du dbang po'i blo la sogs pa
T02D1198:308a-20: rnams kyis kyang yul thams cad yongs su gcod pas
T02D1198:308a-21: yul thams cad par bshad de /
T02D1198:308a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:308a-23: thams cad du ni phyag zhabs mtha' //
T02D1198:308a-24: kun nas spyan dang dbu dang zhal //
T02D1198:308a-25: kun du thos ldan 'jig rten du //
T02D1198:308a-26: thams cad khyab par byas te gnas //
T02D1198:308a-28: dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i mdor yang /
T02D1198:308a-29: 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni kun
T02D1198:308a-30: du gzigs pa'i mngon par shes pa drug gis sems
T02D1198:308a-31: can 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rnams gzigs te /
T02D1198:308a-33: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas gtsug tor gyis kyang gzigs so //
T02D1198:308a-34: de bzhin du mdzod spus kyang gzigs so //
T02D1198:308a-35: de ltar mtshan re res so //
T02D1198:308a-36: de ltar dus cig car du phyogs bcu rnams su
T02D1198:308a-37: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du gzigs
T02D1198:308a-38: so zhes so // thams cad thams cad ces pa ni 'di lta ste phung po lnga rnams so //

T02D1198:308b-0: chos bdag med par mnyam pa nyid kyis so zhes pa thams cad du song @308b ba ste ;
T02D1198:308b-1: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //

T02D1198:308b-3: to zhes pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste so sor
T02D1198:308b-4: rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //

T02D1198:308b-7: bzhin no ; / thos 'joms la mkhas pa ni thos 'joms pa zhes pa ltar aa na no //

T02D1198:308b-17: thugs rje chen pos ji ltar rigs par 'gro ba

T02D1198:309a-0: de dag dang bral ba ni don @309a * //

T02D1198:309a-12: stong pa nyid rdo rjer brjod par bya //

T02D1198:309a-22: rgya mtsho bzhin du 'phrog byed la sogs pa rnams

T02D1198:309a-26: ro // gdul bya thams cad kyi bsod nams dang

T02D1198:309a-28: pa med kyang yid bzhin gyi rin po che dang
T02D1198:309a-29: 'khor lo 'khor ba bzhin sems can gyi don byed

T02D1198:309a-31: ro // // sems can gyi don kho nas bsam
T02D1198:309a-32: gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa sprul pa'i
T02D1198:309a-33: lus rnams su bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:309a-34: bltams pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T02D1198:309a-37: gsungs pa las sh'akya thub pa'i ltar sangs rgyas gzhan
T02D1198:309a-38: rnams kyi gzhan don mdzad pa'i rim pa nges pa
T02D1198:309b-0: ma yin zhes mngon @309b par dgongs pa'o //
T02D1198:309b-1: dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i mdor yang bka' stsal pa /
T02D1198:309b-2: 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyogs
T02D1198:309b-3: bcu rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rnams
T02D1198:309b-4: su 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rnams su 'jig
T02D1198:309b-5: rten gyi khams re rer dang gling re rer dus

T02D1198:309b-8: / dka' ba spyod pa la sbyor ba dang byang

T02D1198:309b-10: 'joms pa dang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa

T02D1198:309b-14: / to // mu stegs pa'i skye mched kyi spyod

T02D1198:309b-18: chags pa med par ston pa nyid kyi phyir thogs pa med pa'i ston pa'o //
T02D1198:309b-19: yang dag par mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par dbyer med pa ste /
T02D1198:309b-20: mi bsten pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

T02D1198:309b-24: de ltar zhes pa ji ltar gcig pur grags pa
T02D1198:309b-25: bltams pa la sogs pa ston pa de ltar gang
T02D1198:309b-26: lam legs par goms pa'i rigs kyi bu nye bar
T02D1198:309b-27: bsngags pa'i tshul thob pa mang po de rnams kyang
T02D1198:309b-28: rim pas dang cig car du 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D1198:309b-29: gzhan rnams su ston te zhes tshig rnam par bsgyur
T02D1198:309b-30: bas sbrel ba'o // rgyu mngon du phyogs pa nyid
T02D1198:309b-31: kyi phyir 'bras bu 'byung ba nges par 'gyur ba'o
T02D1198:309b-32: bas sbrel ba'o // // de yang ji ltar gcig
T02D1198:309b-33: gi yin pa de ltar gzhan gyi bzlog tu med
T02D1198:309b-35: de nyid kyi phyir nye bar sdud de /
T02D1198:309b-36: de ltar gang grub pas ston to zhes khyad par med pas so //

T02D1198:309b-39: bur yang ngo // rtogs pa'i gnas skabs su ni
T02D1198:309b-40: rmi lam gyi ngo bo kho na dang sgyu ma'i
T02D1198:309b-41: rang bzhin kho na de'i zhes rmi lam lta bu
T02D1198:310a-1: sgyu ma'i ngo bo zhes pas gsungs so zhes pa'o //
T02D1198:310a-2: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02D1198:310a-3: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma sum cu dgu pa'o /
T02D1198:310a-5: // / bla na med pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs
T02D1198:310a-6: pa 'di ni rim pa gnyis goms pas dam tshig
T02D1198:310a-7: bsten pa kho nas so zhes de rgyas par bshad
T02D1198:310a-8: pa'i ched du 'jug pa gsungs pa /
T02D1198:310a-9: gsungs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:310a-10: khrag ni me tog ste ba lang la sogs pa'i khrag kyang ngo //
T02D1198:310a-11: nya ni chu'i nya la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:310a-12: sha ni ba lang la sogs pa'i 'o //
T02D1198:310a-13: ye shes sems dpa' rnams kyi ste phyi rol du
T02D1198:310a-14: thab khung dang nang du bsgoms pa rnams kyi zhal
T02D1198:310a-15: mi gtsang bas bkang ba ci ltar te 'di mi
T02D1198:310a-18: mi shes pa yang dag pa'i shes pa dang bral ba yang de rnams yin la /
T02D1198:310a-19: rmongs pa 'khrul pa rnams kyang ngo /

T02D1198:310a-21: bshang ba la sogs pa'i phyi rol gyi dngos po

T02D1198:310a-23: yin la der 'dzin pa'i ngo bo'i [?] mngon par
T02D1198:310a-24: zhen pas mi gtsang ba la sogs par sgro 'dogs
T02D1198:310a-25: pa rnams kyis blun par byas pa dngos po'i de
T02D1198:310a-26: kho na nyid mi shes te ;
T02D1198:310a-27: de rnams mi gtsang ba kun du spyod pa la
T02D1198:310a-28: sogs pas sdig pa dang gtsang ba nye bar spyod

T02D1198:310a-30: byed do // de la rang bzhin yongs su dag
T02D1198:310a-31: par lhag par dmigs pa kho nas dam tshig bsten
T02D1198:310a-32: par bya'o zhes dgongs pas 'khrul pa 'gags pa yang
T02D1198:310a-33: dag pa'i ye shes kyi thabs chos kyi dbyings rang
T02D1198:310a-34: bzhin gyis yongs su dag par ston pa /
T02D1198:310a-35: rang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:310a-36: rang bzhin ni ma bcos pa don dam par rang bzhin med pa nyid de /
T02D1198:310a-37: des dag pa rnams ni mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo rnams ma yin no //
T02D1198:310a-38: chos rnams ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir bshang ba la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1198:310a-39: gang gi phyir ma skyes pa rnams te skye ba
T02D1198:310a-40: dang bral ba nyid kyis na rang bzhin med pa
T02D1198:310a-41: nyid du bsgrub par bya bar mngon par dgongs so
T02D1198:310b-0: // de ltar yang dbu ma'i snye mar rnam par @310b bsgrubs zin to //
T02D1198:310b-1: gnas med pas na gnas med rnams //
T02D1198:310b-2: zhes te mi gtsang ba nyid la sogs pa'i rten ma yin pa'o //
T02D1198:310b-3: rigs pa 'di de kho na nyid shes pa 'phel
T02D1198:310b-4: ba'i ched du thabs so zhes pa sgom pas yun
T02D1198:310b-5: ring du rnam par gnas pa kho na'i gnyis su
T02D1198:310b-6: med pa'i ye shes kyis 'khrul pa nyams kyi /
T02D1198:310b-7: rnam pa thams cad du dus shin tu thung ba
T02D1198:310b-8: skyes pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no zhes dgongs
T02D1198:310b-9: pa'o // 'o na de lta na sdig pa med
T02D1198:310b-10: na legs spyad pa rnams kyang ji ltar 'dod pa'i
T02D1198:310b-11: g-yo bar 'gyur zhing ngan 'gro med la /
T02D1198:310b-12: bsod nams med na ni bde 'gro yang med na
T02D1198:310b-13: thar pa'i gtam ci zhig / gzhan yang las med
T02D1198:310b-14: na skye ba med pa'i phyir rtag tu grol bar
T02D1198:310b-15: 'gyur ba'am / yang na nam yang ma yin no //
T02D1198:310b-16: 'ching ba med na grol ba ga las yin //
T02D1198:310b-17: zhes pas thams cad ma bcad par bsnyil ba'o zhes dogs par byas nas gsungs pa /
T02D1198:310b-18: bsod nams zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:310b-19: dam pa ni bla na med pa ste /
T02D1198:310b-20: don du gnyer bar bya'o zhes pa don no //
T02D1198:310b-21: yang na ye shes dam pa'i de'i bdag nyid kyi yul lo //
T02D1198:310b-22: yang na dam pa'i don te lam gyi ye shes
T02D1198:310b-23: kyi bsgrub par bya ba ni dam pa'i don te
T02D1198:310b-25: / der bsod nams rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi ngo bo dor bar bya ste /
T02D1198:310b-26: bsod nams dang de'i rnam par rtog pa yang bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:310b-27: 'bras bu'i gnas skabs pa'i bsod nams rnam par mi rtog pa ni yod pa kho na ste /
T02D1198:310b-28: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ni bsod nams thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:310b-29: sdig pa ni ma yin te so so skye bo'i
T02D1198:310b-30: gnas skabs su yang de kun du mi spyod pa'i
T02D1198:310b-32: so so skye bo'i sa la ni ches shin tu'o //
T02D1198:310b-33: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /

T02D1198:310b-36: phung po lnga po rnams kyang don dam par rang
T02D1198:310b-37: bzhin med mod // 'on kyang kun rdzob pa rnams yod pa kho na'o //

T02D1198:310b-39: pa'i sdig pa dang bsod nams ngag kun rdzob tu
T02D1198:311a-1: pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyi nyes par spyod pa rnam pa bcu ste /
T02D1198:311a-2: rang bzhin gyi kha na ma tho ba dang bcas
T02D1198:311a-3: pa dang ji ltar rigs par bcas pa'i kha na
T02D1198:311a-4: ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1198:311a-5: bsod nams ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1198:311a-6: bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa 'di dag
T02D1198:311a-7: kyang thub pa'i dgongs pa'i rgyan du rgyas pa dang
T02D1198:311a-9: de la bsod nams ma yin pa ni mi 'dod
T02D1198:311a-10: pa'i rnam par smin pa can no zhes pas spang
T02D1198:311a-11: bya'o // bsod nams ni bde 'gro'i dang 'khor ba'i
T02D1198:311a-12: chu bo las sgrol ba'i rgyu'o zhes pas blang bar
T02D1198:311a-13: bya'o // bya'o zhes pa'o ; /'di kho na dpes rtogs par mdzad pa /
T02D1198:311a-14: pha rol zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:311a-15: brgal nas zhes pa chu klung brgal nas so //

T02D1198:311a-18: ba nyid kyis dang chos min te sdig pa dor
T02D1198:311a-19: bya nyid kyis / brten nas te blos lhag par gnas pa ste /
T02D1198:311a-20: 'khor ba las brgal nas 'khor ba las pha rol
T02D1198:311a-21: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa'i bar chad med pa'i lam
T02D1198:311a-23: de'i de ma thag par byang chub sangs rgyas nyid rtogs pa'o //
T02D1198:311a-24: 'o na ji ltar kun rdzob pa'i sdig pa'ang rab
T02D1198:311a-25: tu spang bar bya ba de bzhin du kun rdzob
T02D1198:311a-26: pa'i yang mi gtsang ba'i nyer spyod spang bar bya
T02D1198:311a-27: ba'o zhes dogs par byas nas nye bar sdud pas
T02D1198:311a-28: lan 'debs pa de'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1198:311a-29: ste / rnam rtog dra ba ni don dam pa
T02D1198:311a-30: pa'i dngos po yod do zhes pa 'di lta bu
T02D1198:311a-31: ste / la sogs pa'o // chos rnams kyi zab
T02D1198:311a-32: pa ni zab mo nyid de de bzhin nyid do
T02D1198:311a-33: ste / la sogs pa'o // // de gsungs pa /
T02D1198:311a-34: stong nyid chos kyi zab mo nyid //
T02D1198:311a-35: yon tan gzhan rnams rgya che ba'o //
T02D1198:311a-37: der 'phel ba ni tshad mas nye bar drangs pa'i nges pa bsags pa ste /
T02D1198:311a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa tshad ma mchog tu gyur pas
T02D1198:311a-39: gsungs pa'i bshad pa la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg la
T02D1198:311a-40: sogs pa byas pa dngos grub kyi lam yin pa
T02D1198:311a-41: la / 'di mi gtsang ba'o zhes pa la sogs pa sgro gdags par mi bya'o //
T02D1198:311a-42: mi gtsang ba nyid ces bya ba'am gtsang ba nyid
T02D1198:311a-43: ni kun rdzob tu yang 'gar yang yod pa ma
T02D1198:311a-44: yin gyi / rig byed kyis rnam par bslus pa'i
T02D1198:311b-0: bram ze rnams kyis tha snyad byas pa @311b 'ba'
T02D1198:311b-1: yin gyi / zhig ste / de'i rjes su 'jug pa gzhan dang gzhan rnams kyis kyang ngo //

T02D1198:311b-3: 'das kyis kyang tshul gzhan du dang bya ba'i rgyud
T02D1198:311b-5: zab mo la lhag par mos pa shes rab mchog
T02D1198:311b-6: can gyi sngags kyi tshul gyi dor ni ma yin
T02D1198:311b-7: no // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1198:311b-9: mi gtsang ba'i sgrib pa bsod nams ma yin pa yang ma yin te /
T02D1198:311b-10: de ni rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba ma yin zhing bcas pas kyang ma yin no //
T02D1198:311b-11: gdul bya'i khyad par la ni bcas pas kha na ma tho bar 'gyur mod /
T02D1198:311b-12: sngags kyis rtse ba la ma gsungs so //
T02D1198:311b-13: gzhan gyi lta ba la yang ji srid du thams cad du 'di ltar ma yin te /
T02D1198:311b-14: mchog gi ngang pa pa dang long pa pa la
T02D1198:311b-15: yang thams cad bza' zhing thams cad btung ba la
T02D1198:311b-16: sogs pa dang ba lang gi sha'i sbyin sreg la
T02D1198:311b-17: sogs pa bsgrags pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:311b-18: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i lam la rnam par
T02D1198:311b-19: rtog pa rnam pa 'di lta bu lta ci smos
T02D1198:311b-20: / de ni gti mug chen po ma rig pa ste /
T02D1198:311b-21: 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams dang las dang skye ba'i rgyu'o //
T02D1198:311b-22: des na dri ma de rtsad nas dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D1198:311b-23: de'i phyir dri ma dang bral ba so sor snang ngo //
T02D1198:311b-24: gang goms par byas nas 'di ltar 'byung ba'i ting
T02D1198:311b-25: nge 'dzin 'di ci zhig yin zhe na gsungs pa
T02D1198:311b-26: / gnyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:311b-28: nga'o zhes byed cing bya ba mngon par khengs pa
T02D1198:311b-29: gang du yin pa de'i dngos po ni de nyid
T02D1198:311b-30: de / des rgyal ba'i gzugs so //
T02D1198:311b-31: kun gyi ste lus dang ngag dang sems rnams kyi rnam pa rang bzhin no //
T02D1198:311b-32: nges don dam par stong pa nyid kyi na spangs pa'o //
T02D1198:311b-33: ye shes ni byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1198:311b-34: rdo rje dang padma sbyor ba las /
T02D1198:311b-35: lus dang ngag dang sems ro gcig pas stong pa
T02D1198:311b-36: nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1198:311b-37: rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i nga rgyal brtan
T02D1198:311b-38: pos sgom par byed pa rnams /
T02D1198:311b-39: rim pa gnyis ka la yang ting nge 'dzin 'di rdzogs pa na /
T02D1198:311b-40: skye ba 'di kho na la rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D1198:311b-41: ye shes can rnams su 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don
T02D1198:311b-43: bud med ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:312a-0: bud med dang skyes pa'i lus rnam pa sna tshogs @312a * //
T02D1198:312a-1: pa'i las srog chags gsod pa la sogs pa skye
T02D1198:312a-2: ba ni mi shes pa yod na 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1198:312a-3: bstan to // las de phan pa dang mi phan
T02D1198:312a-4: pa'i rgyu yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas mi
T02D1198:312a-6: dam tshig tu bya zhing 'gong par mi bya ba
T02D1198:312a-7: nyid kyis rtogs par bya bas na dam tshig go
T02D1198:312a-9: lus dang ngag gi dang nyes par spyod pa dag
T02D1198:312a-10: kun nas slong ba nyid kyis de dag las rnam
T02D1198:312a-11: pa sna tshogs pa'i gnod pa gang rnams las yin
T02D1198:312a-13: kun rtog ngan pa ni brnab sems la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D1198:312a-14: de rnams kyi rtog pa'i tshogs rnams kyis so //
T02D1198:312a-15: gdug pa yang de yin la rtsub pa yang yin pa ni /
T02D1198:312a-17: rtsub pa'i ngag gdug pa ma yin pa yod de /
T02D1198:312a-18: dper na bcom ldan 'das kyis lhas byin gyi dor
T02D1198:312a-19: 'bangs mchil mdor cig ces pa lta bu'i ngag phan
T02D1198:312a-21: khyad par 'di yang nye bar mtshon pa lhur len
T02D1198:312a-22: pa ste gzhan la yang mi gdug pa nyid rtogs
T02D1198:312a-23: pa'i ched du'o // de yang ji lta ba de
T02D1198:312a-24: ltar sngar srog chags zhes pa la sogs pa sdom
T02D1198:312a-25: pa rgyas par bstan pas brjod zin to //
T02D1198:312a-26: sogs pas brdzun gyi tshig go //
T02D1198:312a-27: rna ba'i mi bde byed pa ni ngag 'khyal pa'o //
T02D1198:312a-28: de ltar nyes par spyod pa gsum las ldog pa'i tshul khrims gsungs shing /
T02D1198:312a-29: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dag kyang dbang po
T02D1198:312a-30: gnyis zhes pa la sogs pas de ma thag tu
T02D1198:312a-31: bshad zin to // de ltar na yang 'khor ba
T02D1198:312a-32: zad pa las ji skad bshad pa'i mya ngan las
T02D1198:312a-35: tshul khrims la ni gnas nas mis //
T02D1198:312a-36: sems dang shes rab bsgom par bya //
T02D1198:312a-37: sdom pa yang dag bsrungs pa ni //
T02D1198:312a-38: myur du sdug bsngal zad par 'gro //
T02D1198:312a-41: shes rab ni stong pa nyid shes pa'o //
T02D1198:312a-42: phyag rgya dang lhan cig stong pa nyid dang ro
T02D1198:312a-43: gcig pa'i bde ba chen po nye bar longs spyod
T02D1198:312a-44: pa kho na 'di'i sdom pa ste ;
T02D1198:312a-45: spros pa thams cad las sdom pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:312a-46: ji skad du 'dus par gsungs pa /
T02D1198:312a-47: rtag tu gzhan gyi nor 'phrog cing //
T02D1198:312a-48: gsod pa yang ni rmad byung che //
T02D1198:312b-0: gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa la sogs pa'i gsang @312b chen ni sngar phye zin to //
T02D1198:312b-1: tshul khrims la sogs pa gsum po 'di kho na
T02D1198:312b-2: lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang lhag pa'i shes rab ste
T02D1198:312b-3: bslab pa gsum dang phung po gsum mo //
T02D1198:312b-4: rnam par grol ba'i phung po yang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa'i dngos gzhi'i sems bskyed pa ste /
T02D1198:312b-5: rnam par grol ba shes pa'i phung po ni rjes
T02D1198:312b-6: kyi'o zhes pa la sogs pa 'dir gdul bya'i 'dod
T02D1198:312b-7: pa sna tshogs las rnam par gzhag go //
T02D1198:312b-8: theg pa gzhan du ni ma yin te /
T02D1198:312b-9: chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi
T02D1198:312b-10: rnams su yang chos 'ga' zhig rnam par gzhag pa
T02D1198:312b-11: gang yod pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs
T02D1198:312b-12: ngag tu byang chub kyi sems rdo rje bcom ldan
T02D1198:312b-13: 'das kyi ngo bor ni ma yin no zhes pa
T02D1198:312b-15: de ltar 'dir dang sngar srog chags zhes pa la
T02D1198:312b-16: sogs pas shes rab kyi chags pas zhu ba'i dga'
T02D1198:312b-17: ba bcu drug gi thig le ro gcig tu gyur
T02D1198:312b-18: pa rnams rdo rje nor bur rab tu zhugs pa
T02D1198:312b-19: / tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin zhal //
T02D1198:312b-21: ma 'phos pa'i tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin du byed pa /
T02D1198:312b-22: rdo rje nor bu las steng du gsang ba dang
T02D1198:312b-23: lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral
T02D1198:312b-24: ba'i lte bar 'dren pa yang bsrung bar bya ba'i
T02D1198:312b-26: bza' bar bya ba brjod pa gsungs pa /
T02D1198:312b-27: sha zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:312b-28: che mchog ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste de las skyes pa'o //
T02D1198:312b-29: mi bskyod pa gnas pa'i sbyor ba mi bskyod pa gnas pa rkang ngo //
T02D1198:312b-30: 'dres pa 'bab la ste yan lag la rus pa'o zhes 'brel lo //
T02D1198:312b-31: cho ga las zhes pa snga mar yang shes par bya ste /
T02D1198:312b-32: cho ga ni sha la sogs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs par de'i bdag nyid du mos pa'o //
T02D1198:312b-33: gang khams kha cig la de bzhin gshegs pa khrag
T02D1198:312b-34: 'khrugs su 'ga' zhig tu brjod pa de ni de
T02D1198:312b-35: bzhin gshegs pa rnams phan tshun du don dam par
T02D1198:312b-36: dbye ba dang bral ba nyid du dgongs pas so
T02D1198:312b-37: // de la sha yis pags pa bsdus shing /
T02D1198:312b-38: khrag gis ro dang rtsa 'ching bas khu ba'o zhes
T02D1198:312b-39: khams bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi lus lha'i bdag nyid
T02D1198:312b-41: rnam par dag pa'i lus dang 'brel pa las /
T02D1198:312b-42: go ku da ha na'i sgron ma rnams rnam par dag pa'i don du ste /
T02D1198:313a-0: rnam pa gzhan du ma dam tshig gi skabs su khams rnam par dag @313a * //
T02D1198:313a-1: pa'i rnam pa ci ltar yin /
T02D1198:313a-2: sngar rtogs par byas pa rnams 'dir skabs kyis rtogs
T02D1198:313a-3: pa'o zhes rang gi ming gis ma brjod pa'o zhes
T02D1198:313a-4: man ngag rig pa rnams so //
T02D1198:313a-5: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
T02D1198:313a-6: ye shes la mkhas zhes pa ye shes la mkhas
T02D1198:313a-7: pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rtogs pa de
T02D1198:313a-8: bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsang ba gsang chen dam
T02D1198:313a-9: tshig go // bsten bya ni bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig rnams so //
T02D1198:313a-10: bsgom bya ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag par ro //
T02D1198:313a-11: byang chub sems rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor
T02D1198:313a-12: pa blo ldan gyis ni rnam par dag par lhag
T02D1198:313a-13: par mos par mkhas pas so //
T02D1198:313a-14: sred pa ni 'dir tshor ba ste rgyu la 'bras bu nye bar brtags pa las so //
T02D1198:313a-15: 'du byed kyang 'di yin pa 'phel ba yang ste /
T02D1198:313a-16: sprul pa sna tshogs rnams kyis bya ba rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:313a-17: 'dod chags la sogs pa 'di rnams sangs rgyas rnams
T02D1198:313a-18: su dang bshad pa la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga
T02D1198:313a-19: rnams dam tshig rnams su gsungs te /
T02D1198:313a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du mos par bya ba rnams so zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1198:313a-21: sred pa ni nga rgyal nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D1198:313a-22: 'du byed ni phrag dog la sogs pa'o //
T02D1198:313a-23: 'dod chags la sogs pa spong ba kho na bdud
T02D1198:313a-24: rtsi lnga bza' ba'i nges pa'i don to zhes dgongs
T02D1198:313a-25: pa'o // de skad du yang rnal 'byor ma bzhi yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02D1198:313a-26: khu ba khrag dang de bzhin sha //
T02D1198:313a-27: bshad dang lnga pa gci ba ni //
T02D1198:313a-28: rnam rtog med pas bza' bya ste //
T02D1198:313a-29: rang bzhin med pas blo ldan gyis //
T02D1198:313a-30: rmongs cha de bzhin nga rgyal dang //
T02D1198:313a-31: zhe sdang de bzhin 'dod chags nyid //
T02D1198:313a-32: phrag dog ser sna phra ma ste //
T02D1198:313a-33: dam tshig dri med bsten par bya //
T02D1198:313a-35: de rnams kho na yongs su 'dzag go zhes pas yongs su 'dzag pa'o //
T02D1198:313a-36: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rgyu dang rkyen
T02D1198:313a-37: rnams las 'byung ba bzhi rnams kyis yongs su gzung
T02D1198:313a-39: nur nur po'i gnas skabs nas brtsams nas ji ltar
T02D1198:313a-40: rigs par de las byung ba nyid kyi phyir dang
T02D1198:313a-41: / sgron ma dang bshad pa la sogs pa rnams de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1198:313a-42: 'di rnams kyang nang du 'dus par bshad pas spyan
T02D1198:313a-43: ma la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa yang bsgrubs
T02D1198:313b-0: so // de nyid kyi phyir @313b bdud rtsi'i bsam
T02D1198:313b-1: gtan gyi cho ga la spyan ma la sogs pa
T02D1198:313b-2: rnams kyi yang sa bon rnams so //
T02D1198:313b-3: rdzogs pa'i blo ste byang chub kyi sems bcom ldan
T02D1198:313b-4: 'das bsgom pa gang rnams kyi yin pa de rnams
T02D1198:313b-5: de skad de / de rnams kyis so //
T02D1198:313b-6: bza' ba ni bza' bya ste /
T02D1198:313b-7: de'i don du 'byung ba rtsol ba med par 'du
T02D1198:313b-8: ba gang rnams kyi yin pa zan dang bya na
T02D1198:313b-9: la sogs pa de rnams kyang bsten par bya zhes
T02D1198:313b-12: bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa dang po pas /
T02D1198:313b-13: bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga //
T02D1198:313b-14: zhes pa gnyis nag po'i brgyad pa'am bcu bzhi pa
T02D1198:313b-15: la ril bu byas te grib ma la skams pa
T02D1198:313b-16: padma'i snod kha sbyor du bzhag nas /
T02D1198:313b-17: cho ga ji lta bar bdud rtsir byas te /
T02D1198:313b-18: nyin zhag so sor re rer bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1198:313b-19: ji ltar rnyed pa'i 'di gnyis dang myos byed kyang bya na sogs bzhin du yongs su bza'o //
T02D1198:313b-20: 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pas kyang ste /
T02D1198:313b-21: 'on kyang 'di rang bzhin yongs su dag pa kho nar dmigs pas te /
T02D1198:313b-22: ce spyang bzhin du ni ma yin no //
T02D1198:313b-23: gzhan yang bshad pa la sogs pa rnams yul lnga
T02D1198:313b-24: rnams su nges pa'i tshig gis dgongs te de rnams
T02D1198:313b-25: kyis phyag rgya dang lhan cig dga' ba thams cad
T02D1198:313b-26: spyad par bya'o // gzhan yang dgongs pa'i skad kyis
T02D1198:313b-27: go ku da ha na rnams dang sbrang bu skyugs
T02D1198:313b-28: pa ni rim pa ji lta bar mig dang rna
T02D1198:313b-29: ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid de
T02D1198:313b-30: brjod zin pa zhes bza' bar bya zhing /
T02D1198:313b-31: de rnams med pa las de'i yul rnams dang de'i
T02D1198:313b-32: rnam par shes pa rnams kyang ngo zhes pa khams
T02D1198:313b-33: bco brgyad rnams bza' bya ste /
T02D1198:313b-34: stong pa nyid kho nas so //
T02D1198:313b-35: de ltar na yang sgro btags pas thams cad las
T02D1198:313b-36: log pa'i shes rab dang thabs phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1198:313b-37: bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid can gyi rnal
T02D1198:313b-38: 'byor pa 'di / ji skad bshad pa'i dam tshig
T02D1198:313b-39: dang sdom pa'i rang bzhin kho nar rig par bya'o
T02D1198:313b-40: 'byor pa 'di / // de ltar yang bcu dgu
T02D1198:313b-41: par gsungs pa'i 'gal brjod pas gsod pa dang 'phrog
T02D1198:313b-42: pa dang bsten pa dang brdzun gyi tshig rnams kyis
T02D1198:313b-43: sdom pa thams cad kyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1198:313b-44: dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid kyis de
T02D1198:313b-45: kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa'i rnam par snang
T02D1198:314a-1: sogs pa'i rdzas rnams chos sku'i bdag nyid rang gi lus kyi nang du 'dus pa las /
T02D1198:314a-2: der byin gyis rlob pa'i zhes pa dam tshig thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1198:314a-4: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag / ji ltar 'dod par rang mchod de //
T02D1198:314a-6: rang bzhin med pa'i dbang las so //
T02D1198:314a-7: don dam par gcig tu mthar thug pa 'di ni
T02D1198:314a-8: gar yang 'jug pa dang ldog pa ma yin no
T02D1198:314a-9: // de ltar ni dam tshig spyod pa rnams mi
T02D1198:314a-10: smra bar gyur pa'i mthar thug pa nyid du bstan
T02D1198:314a-11: pa'i ched du de nas phyag na rdo rje de
T02D1198:314a-12: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po //
T02D1198:314a-13: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1198:314a-14: dang thugs rdo rje'i snying po rdo rje mnyam pa
T02D1198:314a-15: nyid rnam par bsams nas cang mi gsung bar gyur
T02D1198:314a-16: to zhes so // de ltar don chen po'i rgyud
T02D1198:314a-17: bstan pa yongs su rdzogs par gsungs pa ji ltar
T02D1198:314a-19: ji ltar bud med rnams dang byis pa blang bya
T02D1198:314a-20: dang dor bya mngon par mi shes pa'i skyes bu
T02D1198:314a-21: rnams kyi dga' rtsed sna tshogs pa'i gtam gyis skye
T02D1198:314a-22: ba snga mar goms pa las rjes su yi rang
T02D1198:314a-23: ba ni rjes su yi rang ba rnams te /
T02D1198:314a-24: 'di lta 'di ltar bdag gis bya'o zhes sim pa
T02D1198:314a-25: dang bcas bar mngon par dga' ba skye bar 'gyur
T02D1198:314a-26: ro zhes ci zhig ltar rtogs nas mdza' bos de
T02D1198:314a-27: rnams 'du ba dang rjes su mthun par kun du
T02D1198:314a-28: smra ba dga' rtsed kyi bye brag dang rjes kyi
T02D1198:314a-29: gnas skabs su nyams su myong ba'i don gtam pa
T02D1198:314a-30: yang 'dus smra 'du ba'i gtam rnams brjod du gzhug
T02D1198:314a-31: pa ste ; 'du ba'i ched du mngag gzhug pa
T02D1198:314a-32: rnams la 'di rnams la 'di skad smros shig /
T02D1198:314a-33: de las 'grogs pa na dga' rtsed kyi bde ba
T02D1198:314a-34: pa ste ; skye bar 'gyur / gang gis de
T02D1198:314a-35: 'dra ba'i dga' rtsed kyi rol par 'gyur pa nyams
T02D1198:314a-36: su myong ba'i don ma smras par gnas pa'i ched
T02D1198:314a-37: du 'bros sum 'jug cig ces mdza' bos smras pa'o
T02D1198:314a-39: 'du ba'i gnas su 'jug pa'i ched du lam yang thob pa na /
T02D1198:314a-40: mi mthun phyogs med pa nyid kyis 'ching ba med pa'ang brjod du gzhug pa'o //
T02D1198:314a-41: rnam pa 'di lta'i rnam pa gang du yin pa de ni 'di lta'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1198:314b-0: rnal @314b 'byor ba'i ste rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi lam bstan pa ste /
T02D1198:314b-1: de rnams ni skye ba brgyud par 'dris pas nye
T02D1198:314b-2: bar rgyas pa'i rigs chen po phun sum tshogs pa
T02D1198:314b-3: de nyid la shes rab dang thabs bde ba chen
T02D1198:314b-4: po sna tshogs pa ston pas 'dod pa rgyas pa
T02D1198:314b-5: dang bcas pa'i dang ba'i gzhan dbang nyid skye bar
T02D1198:314b-7: bdag rdo rje sems dpa' de'i bde ba'i go 'phang thob pa'i ched du /
T02D1198:314b-8: rgyu'i gnas skabs su tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D1198:314b-9: don du gdul bya rnams la skal pa ji lta
T02D1198:314b-10: bar chos ston pa las sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1198:314b-11: de nas 'bras bu'i rgyud kyi gnas skabs su bla
T02D1198:314b-12: na med pa'i shes rab dang thabs ro gcig pa
T02D1198:314b-13: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sku skye bar
T02D1198:314b-14: 'gyur zhing / de bzhin du ji ltar nyams su
T02D1198:314b-15: myong ba'i de kho na rgyu'i gnas skabs dang bcas
T02D1198:314b-16: pa ltar mi nyung ba'i bskal pa brgyud pa rnams
T02D1198:314b-17: su nges par ston cig ces pa brjod du 'jug
T02D1198:314b-18: 'gyur zhing / pa'o ; / lam yang yan lag
T02D1198:314b-19: dang bcas pa'i thabs kyi rgyud kyis yongs su bskor
T02D1198:314b-20: ba'i rgyud kyi ngo bo rgyas pa dang bcas par
T02D1198:314b-22: lam rtogs pa'i rim pa las rim gyis sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa na /
T02D1198:314b-23: 'bras bu'i rgyud rtogs pa la ni bag chags dang
T02D1198:314b-24: bcas pa drung phyung ba'i phyir 'ching ba dang bral
T02D1198:314b-25: ba yang ngo // rgyud kyi don mtha' dag po
T02D1198:314b-26: 'di ji ltar rigs par sgrub pa khyed rnams kyis
T02D1198:314b-27: bya zhing byed du gzhug par bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o
T02D1198:314b-28: ba yang ngo // // des na ma 'ongs pa'i
T02D1198:314b-29: gdul bya spro bar bya bar dgongs pas mchog gi
T02D1198:314b-30: thugs rje'i gzhan dbang las 'khor rnams spro bar byed
T02D1198:314b-32: de ltar ni rgyud thams cad kyi mtha' ru rnam
T02D1198:314b-33: pa 'di lta bu'i dgongs pa mngon par brjod par
T02D1198:314b-36: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam /
T02D1198:314b-37: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1198:314b-38: rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa mthong lags so
T02D1198:314b-39: // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1198:314b-40: rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin
T02D1198:315a-1: cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'di
T02D1198:315a-2: 'gro ba gyis shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na
T02D1198:315a-3: / phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1198:315a-4: sems dpa' chen po de rnams chos kyi rnam grangs
T02D1198:315a-5: 'di'i skal pa can gyi phyir ro zhes so //
T02D1198:315a-6: de ltar gleng gzhi dang bcas pa'i rgyud sdud pa
T02D1198:315a-7: pos bsdus nas 'di dag gcig nyid du ston zhing
T02D1198:315a-8: yongs su rdzogs par gsungs pa /
T02D1198:315a-9: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1198:315a-10: dngos por na chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin med
T02D1198:315a-11: pa nyid kyi phyir dag dang yid kyi spyod yul
T02D1198:315a-12: ma yin pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa nyid du
T02D1198:315a-13: gsal bar bya ba'i don du de skad ces bka'
T02D1198:315a-14: stsal pa dang zhes ma gsungs pa'o //
T02D1198:315a-15: rgyud kyi lhag pa'i rgyal po ston pa'i dus su
T02D1198:315a-16: khad pa brtsegs pa'i nang dang phyi rol du'ang 'khor
T02D1198:315a-17: thams cad de / rnal 'byor pa rnams ni thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1198:315a-18: rnal 'byor ma rnams ni rdo rje phag mo dang rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1198:315a-19: mkha' 'gro rnams ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1198:315a-20: mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1198:315a-21: dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang 'jib byed ma
T02D1198:315a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1198:315a-24: rnam pa du ma ni sna tshogs pa'i kha dog
T02D1198:315a-25: dang dbyibs dang rgyan dang zhal dang phyag dang mtshon
T02D1198:315a-26: cha la sogs pa rab tu dbye ba mang po
T02D1198:315a-27: rnams dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02D1198:315a-28: chos ston pa bla na med pa nyan pa'i dga'
T02D1198:315a-29: ston las mchog tu dga' bas bde bar 'gyur ba'i
T02D1198:315a-30: sems dang ldan pa rnams te /
T02D1198:315a-31: ni ni khyad par la ste /
T02D1198:315a-32: phul du dbyung du med pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:315a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi ye shes
T02D1198:315a-34: ni sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa rtsad nas
T02D1198:315a-35: phyung ba stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i rang bzhin
T02D1198:315a-36: bde ba chen por ro gcig pa me long ye
T02D1198:315a-37: shes la sogs pa'i rang bzhin stobs dang mngon par
T02D1198:315a-38: shes pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i
T02D1198:315a-39: rnam pa ma lus pas yongs su bskor ba rtogs
T02D1198:315b-0: thams cad du zhes pa rtogs par bya ba'i rang bzhin @315b thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1198:315b-1: bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nang du gtogs na yang /
T02D1198:315b-2: rdo rje snying po ni sdud pa po nyid kyis dang /
T02D1198:315b-3: sa'i snying po dang phyag na rdo rje la sogs
T02D1198:315b-4: pa rnams ni mig la sogs pa yongs su dag
T02D1198:315b-5: par byed pa nyid kyis na gtso bo nyid kyi
T02D1198:315b-7: 'di rnams thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor ro //
T02D1198:315b-8: lha la sogs pa rnams 'jig rten pa'o //
T02D1198:315b-9: thams cad de gshin rje dang chu lha dang rlung
T02D1198:315b-10: lha dang thags bzangs ris dang bden bral dang nam
T02D1198:315b-11: mkha' lding dang mi'am ci la sogs pa rnam pa
T02D1198:315b-12: 'di la yod do zhes pa thams cad dang ldan
T02D1198:315b-13: pa'o // a'a yig ni 'dir nges pa'i tshig go //
T02D1198:315b-14: ci 'khor rnams thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D1198:315b-15: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul pa'i sku mthong
T02D1198:315b-16: ngam zhe na / ma yin te kha cig kho nas mthong ngo //
T02D1198:315b-17: kha cig rnams kyis sprul pa'i sku kho na'o //
T02D1198:315b-18: chos ston pa ni thams cad kyis thos pa kho na'o //
T02D1198:315b-19: de nyid kyi phyir thams cad gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste /
T02D1198:315b-20: rgyud kyi don rnams la dogs pa med pa nyid
T02D1198:315b-21: kyis na rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di ni legs par
T02D1198:315b-22: gsungs pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa bstod pa rnams
T02D1198:315b-23: kyis mngon par dga' bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1198:315b-24: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba dang
T02D1198:315b-25: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang brtag pa'i rgyal
T02D1198:315b-26: po chen po yang bcom ldan 'das te /
T02D1198:315b-27: de brjod pa'i gzhung yang dpal yang dag sbyor ba
T02D1198:315b-28: las byung ba rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi brtag
T02D1198:315b-29: pa'i rgyal po chen po yin zhing yang gang par
T02D1198:315b-31: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02D1198:315b-32: man ngag gi snye mar snye ma bzhi bcu pa'o /
T02D1198:315b-34: // / rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud rnams la //
T02D1198:315b-35: gzhan pa rnams kyis 'grel byas yod mod kyi //
T02D1198:315b-36: rab phye ma yin kho bos byas pa ni //
T02D1198:315b-37: nyams bcud bzang ngan srog bcas mchog yin no //
T02D1198:315b-38: rgyud gzhan thams cad rnams kyi gsang chen 'dir ni bla mar bsnyen bkur ba //
T02D1198:315b-39: byas pa kho bos 'grel pas mchog tu rnam par phye'o mang mkhyen pa'i //
T02D1198:315b-40: skye bo dam pa rnams kyis sgyu rtsal mdzod cig bla ma dam pa ni //
T02D1198:316a-0: @316a * // bdud rtsi'i 'od can las 'dir bdud rtsi skal ldan su yang 'thung bar byed //
T02D1198:316a-1: bla med bla ma ring du gnas las bdag la 'dir //
T02D1198:316a-2: rgyud kyi gsang chen nges sbas rig pa gsal bar gyur //
T02D1198:316a-3: mkha' yi nor bu'i mthu las 'og tu padma yi //
T02D1198:316a-4: 'dab ma sbyar ba'i snying po rnam rgyas ma mthong ngam ;
T02D1198:316a-5: / man ngag dpag bsam ljon pa'i snye ma 'jigs med kyis //
T02D1198:316a-6: bskrun pa rnams kyis 'bras bu dam pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i dpal //
T02D1198:316a-7: skal ldan rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub ro bcud kyi //
T02D1198:316a-8: dga' ston rnams kyis yang dag 'phel byas gzung bar mdzod //
T02D1198:316a-9: legs byas bdud rtsi rnams kyis 'grel pa snye ma 'di ni phyogs dang phyogs su yun ring du //
T02D1198:316a-10: 'khor ba'i ngal bzhi byed 'gro ba gsum gyi longs
T02D1198:316a-11: spyod bde dpal chen du gnas gyur cig / bdag
T02D1198:316a-12: ni shes rab thabs dang bde chen gnyis med rang
T02D1198:316a-13: bzhin gnas pa ches che rnams kyi skur //
T02D1198:316a-14: gyur cig 'di las sna tshogs sprul pa'i ro bcud
T02D1198:316a-15: rnams kyis 'di yi dga' ston rgyas byed shog /
T02D1198:316a-16: dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i
T02D1198:316a-17: 'grel pa man ngag gi snye ma mkhas pa chen
T02D1198:316a-18: po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D1198:316a-20: / rnam gnon tshul mkhas 'jigs med kyis //
T02D1198:316a-21: gnad la reg pa'i tshig 'di ni //
T02D1198:316a-22: dga' ba skyong gis rgyal srid lo //
T02D1198:316a-23: sum cu rtsa bdun pa la byas //
T02D1198:316a-24: yul dbus kyi mkhas pa chen po de nyid dang /
T02D1198:316a-25: mang du thos pa'i bsod snyoms pa sangs rgyas grags
T02D1198:316a-26: pas na le ndrar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
T02D1198:316a-28: / yang slad nas ma h'a pandi ta sh'akya shr'i dang /
T02D1198:316a-29: dpyal lo ts'a ba chos kyi bzang pos yul dbus
T02D1198:316a-30: kyi dpe dang bstun nas bcos shing bsgyur te zhu
T02D1198:316a-32: slar yang bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin
T02D1198:316a-33: dang sbyin bdag rnams kyis mthun rkyen bsgrubs pa las
T02D1198:316a-34: brten nas legs par sbyar ba brda sprod pa'i tshul
T02D1198:316a-35: la blo'i snang ba cung zad skyes pa dpang lo
T02D1198:316a-36: ts'a ba dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas
T02D1198:316a-37: / rgya gar gyi dpe gnyis la gtugs te /
T02D1198:316a-38: 'di'i snga 'gyur ma dag pa gzigs pa'i dge ba'i
T02D1198:316a-39: bshes gnyen sde snod 'dzin pa mang po'i gsung gis
